1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyag sa dang / sarba pud+d+haSh+ThashU ya sur saM grah+na gi ri kAT+Tat+taH/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i brdung bsdus
1b2(rnying rgyud): bo chags pa n+d+he / drim pa dang 'i ngas rgyas dge sa byu rgyu dang tshul TIg rna pa/
1b3(rnying rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis rtogs shing bshad pa'i dus gcig
1b4(rnying rgyud): kun gzhi ma kha'/ rnam par dag pa'i gnas//
1b5(rnying rgyud): rin po che 'od sna tshogs 'phro ba'i gdangs/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong kun gzhi'i pho brang /
1b6(rnying rgyud): phre yin 'bru 'dugs la na 'byung ba mngal/ sems sa 'i la khor/
1b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba/ de nyid du rnam par
1b8(rnying rgyud): dUg+sa pa/ rgyurkyen 'apa' skye gag grangs ba la dugs ng+yas kyi sas khyab kyi
1b9(rnying rgyud): pa'o//
2a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'du dang 'breb 'a zla ba med pa'i gnas so// gnas de na la thog ma'i sangs rgyas/ ka dag dngos med zang ka mi snang gsal ba'i rang bzhin du bzhugs so// smyon pa de nyid las maM
2a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan rang byung rang dngas kyi 'khor la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bstan pa/ ye med mtshan med blo 'das tha snyad ming las 'das pa'i theg pa/ ngag tu mi gsung sbyin gyis rlabs kyis gsungs so// ye thog
2a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi'i ston 'khor ro// byin gyis rlabs kyi ston pa ni/ dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi phung bya ba bzhugs so// des 'od gsul rnam dag dkyil 'khor la/ byA btsal rtsol bsgrub med
2a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bstan pa gsungs so// ye shes mthu'i ston pa ni/ rang bzhin kun tu bzang pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' la thugs kyi bstan pa byin gyis rlabs kyis bshad/ sngon byung phun sum tshogs pa
2a5(rnying rgyud): lda // de'i rjes 'jug phun sum tshogs pa lnga ni/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sems lhag can sogs 'khor rnams la// gsang sngags yang ti spyi theg bshad// 'od gsal gnas bshad ngo bo dus//
2b1(rnying rgyud): sa 'dag sun snyam tshogs pa ldang// de'i gdungags padunas chogs pa lta / mnan gnas dga' rab da phyos// 'jam dpal bshas gnyon ma so gsal bar rnam smral// / da de rdzob du / ngan ngog pas brgyad// dang /
2b2(rnying rgyud): sa pa phun sum tshogs pa lnga'o// ye thog ston pa'i rjes 'jug gdung 'tsho ba pa'o// dam pa dang po'i rjes 'jug gdung 'tsho ba ni// dopo rjes 'jug 'odra gsal snang mdzad kyis// 'og min gnas sus bcu'i 'khor gA bshad// gsang sngags
2b3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa rang gi ngo bo yis// de yi gdung 'tsha ba phun sum tshogs lnga ni// gsang ba'i gnas su ston pa ha ru kas// gsang sngags bskyed rim zhi khro'i 'khor la bshad// dus ni mtshan ma sna tshogs dus// dam pa dang po'i gdung gsob bo// rdo rje sems
2b4(rnying rgyud): dpa'i gdung 'tsho ba rjes 'jug ni// khang bzang gnas su sbrul sku'i ston pa yis// mos tshang kun dga' bo la sngo snod rnam gsum bshad// sbal skus tshig tu bsdebs te bshad pa'i dus// de yi gdung 'tsho ba phun sum tshogs lnga ni// kun
2b5(rnying rgyud): dga' bo yis 'dzam gling phug pa ru// dge slong lnga brgya'i 'khor la mdo sde 'dul ba bshad// dus ni tshig bsdebs bshad pa'i dus// rdo rje sems dpa'i rjes 'jug gdung 'tshonga'o// mdor bsdus phun sum tshogs lnga ni// rang bzhin ngo bo
2b6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje gsum// chos mu skyeb med pa'i ston pa dang // longs su ye shes mthu yi ston pa dang // sbrul sku byin gyis rlabs kyi ston pa ni// skye med ye shes byin rlabs ston pa yis// ston pa phun sum tshogs pas bshad// chos sku gsung du med pa'i
2b7(rnying rgyud): bstan pa dang // longs sku rang gi dpes bstan pa dang // sbrul sku gsung du brjod pa'i bstan pa dang // med dang rngo bo brjod pa ni// bstan pa phun sum tshogs par bshad// longs sku sbrul sku sems dpa' chos su'i 'khor// sa bcu rigs lnga
3a1(rnying rgyud): yab sum mangs spyo rdzogs pa ma// dgasu drug rdzob rgyad 'dod 'das yul pa na// rang tu zlas dang don gyis nargya/ 'dadapas 'azlas pa 'i 'khor rnams ni// mdzar ni thanas mtshugs par ba da/
3a2(rnying rgyud): sa dbyings rnam par dag pa chos sgra'i gnas// khyang pa 'og sa gongs spyong rdzogs pa das// khang parang sa sa su ma byanas// rnams cad rje nga cad pa nga dgas// ya pa rang skal pa bzugs gnas na// gnas du ma
3a3(rnying rgyud): pa bshad// rdzas nas sbyin gyi dpas kyis bshad pa'i dus// mangs sras ga pal bsha pa rjes// bral nam chen da pa ma/ 'das dang sany-i bdal gsas// rdzas na mtshogs pa shA
3a4(rnying rgyud): ldan zung sa dug gdung gas par bzhin no// gcig dung 'brel dang gtan ma babs// mtshang zad dang dgas pa tsha // rnying kyi phre sa ma chags pa'o// nas gsungasas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgangs pa brgya 'dus rlob gas
3a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud byas/ phun su ma tshogs pa gsal bar bstan pa'i lce b+ha dang ba'o// de nas la thig gang ga sangs rgyas so// da byu khre sa nga gis// mug btsal sras btsugs thal ma sna rtags pas 'den thas a dza h+Na ya
3a6(rnying rgyud): ldan sum tshogs pa'i don ni da ltar na// gang yang med pa'i thong ral na// rgyor rdzog/ dus na sbyar gnas// sangs rgyas sems can gzhon rjes gnas// yang rgyas ma 'khrul byon ni gang nus byung // de gnyis sbyin dang yon tan daska lags
3a7(rnying rgyud): nga bas dag gang gis phyogs// byar med blo 'das ji lar lags// dngos med rnal pa gang gis thob// sangs kyis kun kyi thugs kyi bzud// dgongs pa'i brgyad 'dir nge ska bar dus// ri bo brdzogs pa dang yas rdo ltar bsan// gas #
3b1(rnying rgyud): brda' mas de ltar bshad// sa bslabs 'brus bu ji ltar 'thab// theg pa'i blta ba sgom de ltar lags// de lun kyi tigang gis grags// sbyi to po ga'i dan rtogs nas// kAl d+hi ba 'khrul pa yod dam med// shas meng blo 'das brgyan
3b2(rnying rgyud): gang du bkra// 'khor gyis don dris bco brgyang po// ston pas 'khor la gnang bar zhwa// shin tu zab par bka' stsol cig/ ces zhwa baphul lo// ri bo brtsegs pa'i hud las/ gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas dang /
3b3(rnying rgyud): dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thoka ka dag sangs rgyas la// gang yang med pa'i sngon rol na// sngon thog du sa na ji ltar gnas// zhes zhus pas/ ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas kyis// 'od dang rtsal dang shes rig dran sems dang // 'gyub med
3b4(rnying rgyud): dang yan lag 'gag med 'khor// rang byung dang gas pa 'gag med 'khor// rang byung dang dag 'od gsal 'kho// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dag lnga// de sogs dug lnga rtog tshogs nyon mongs
3b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams dang // 'dzam gling mi rnams lha srin sde brkyang dang // sdang srid lce 'gul yod med rtag chang dang // sa brgya'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul ba rigs lnga dang // rnal 'byor rnam bzhi skal ldan mas tshogs dang // ngang dngas gsal dag 'khor/
3b6(rnying rgyud): gsal// thog ma'i kun bzang ka dag rnal ma yi// skra dang gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lngas// 'od zer nam lnga phyogs bcu kun tu 'phros// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyor bar byed pa'i 'od 'phros pas// nyon mongs pas ni sems
3b7(rnying rgyud): khrugs pas// mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus shes bya'i phyir// dbang
4a1(rnying rgyud): na ga su na nas
4a2(rnying rgyud): sa
4a3(rnying rgyud): na
4a4(rnying rgyud): nas sa sa
4a5(rnying rgyud): da ga shes/ yang ba mngon cid mi ba'ags pa la/ 'dag
4a6(rnying rgyud):  sa
4b1(rnying rgyud): kadrag dngal bya zag mdun dang // rtsal gyi rig bya bshad kyis ston// gdus rgyas sems can 'khar 'das gno// khyab gzhag yo gzhing byung bzhin// gnagazhi khang gror brda 'a khyab de// sangs rgyas sems can la'ang 'da' ban// da mAng mata
4b2(rnying rgyud): slong na kyad 'byung mdzod pacha// rgyal zer rna tshogs 'byung ba'i bang mdzad yin// rgya mtshos gas bang badzad bzhin// maN+Dam pas rgya'i bya yad med 'byung ba med// ces gsungasas// dbo bcags pa'i rgyud pas/ sangs rgyas sems can gyi gzhi gas
4b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ling gyi bzhi pa'o// / dan sa ngang dngas gas la dag shing // mthagag dag sangs rgyas la// gnyis ga ga zhi mnyam par// yang rgyas pa 'khrul byinani ni gang nas byung // zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khod la bkang bral pa// ma
4b4(rnying rgyud): khyab par mnyam pa la// rig dang ma rig rnam gnyis lus// yang rgyas mang 'khrul gnyis su byung // 'bru dang mi 'gyur pa gnyis las// sku gsum dug gsum gnyis su zung // 'gyur dang mi 'gyur rnam gnyis las// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'jal pa byung //
4b5(rnying rgyud): zin dang mthon rnam gnyis las// shes mi shes ni gnyis su byung // 'phrad dang ma 'phrad rnam gnyis las// 'char sgo 'khrul mo gnyis su ru // rtogs dang ma rtogs rnam gnyis las// sgra gsum khams gsum gnyis su byung // ra bo ga cig la snar tshul
4b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis// rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis su byung // gcig min gnyis ni yin ma yin// phrug don mad nga ga pur 'dra// ngo bo gcig pa snang tshul gnyis// rkyen dang gang 'phrang sman dug gnyis// dngos ma da kun byed gzhi gcig la// rtogs dang martog
4b7(rnying rgyud): rnam gnyis las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su byung // gzhig cig shugs la stog bcas gnyis// sngon la gang skyes ldog bcas so// don rtogs ka dag chos kyi sku// ma rtogs 'gro drug 'khor bar 'khyams// zhes gsungs so//
5a1(rnying rgyud): smra / nga smra pa / snang sa nas na/ / // mas pa
5a2(rnying rgyud): pa sa/ ga me// na pa sa / dgas sna sa sun byu ba
5a3(rnying rgyud): pas stan/ gas sa'o// yid sa la ma rnam sa ma
5a4(rnying rgyud): 'a sa smra ba/ gsas/ na nas sa kyi pa // nganas ngas pasus dgags/ ga kyi sangs kya sunasadus
5a5(rnying rgyud): pa
5a6(rnying rgyud): zhes// yin nam minan sa ming ga rnam pangs skyes// mau sa brtags bsdugams m+b+ha 'dod pa spyos// sngon gyi ma ba nang byung bar dkris// log gabras mi nas med mye zhin rgyas// da rnams kyinas byas mdag zugs 'ams
5a7(rnying rgyud): mangs sa na #// ma ma // #
5b1(rnying rgyud): mi langs// rtsa ba yid gnyis nga bdag zhe 'dod dug gsum skyon gyi rtsa ba yin// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ skyon gyi rtsa ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas ngang dngas gsal dag gis// ya thog ka dag
5b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la// snying po ka dag gang gis rtogs// zhes zhus pas// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snying po bcud srungs gnad chen bshad// 'od gsal dang dngas thugs la chongs// snying po ka dag rtogs thabs la// zhe 'dod bya rtsal
5b3(rnying rgyud): rtsol bsgrub bzhag/ mi blta mi bsgom mi spyod blo las 'das// dngos med ka dag zang ma de// bya ba tsal bas ma 'das mtshon du med// blo 'das bsam bral dgongs pa rtogs// rtogs pa'i dus na shes brjod mtha' dang bral// dngos med kun dngos
5b4(rnying rgyud): cad med cing snang de// ye med min te sna tshogs spang // sna tshogs snang la dngos gzhi med// cang med ma yin gnyis su snang // gnyis su ma grub gcig tu 'dug/ gcig tu mi 'dug dngos po med// dngos med mtshan nyid blo las 'das// re zhig
5b5(rnying rgyud): mtshon na gsal stong dbyer med de// rang byung 'od gsal dang dngas rnam par dag/ gsal dngas sang nge dngas la go skabs med// de yis snying po ka dag rtogs// ci yang ma yin byang chub sems// dngos med rtsis gdab blo las 'das pa'o// snying po bzud
5b6(rnying rgyud): spangs gdams ngag gnad// ces gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ snying po ka dag rtogs pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas dang dngas gsal dag gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// byar med blo 'das de ltar lags// zhes
5b7(rnying rgyud): zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// byar med blo 'das ras bshad kyis// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas nyon// dgu h+ye s+thi ti yog ni// bya btsal rtsol ba mo byed de// ma bcos dang la bzhag pas chog/ byas pa'i chos rnams la
6a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir// mu byas dang byung chos shig bshad// rtsol ba sgrub chos rnams yid smon yin// rtsol med bsrub med chos shig bshad// zhe 'dod pasam dpung blo yi chos// zhe 'dod pasam bral blo 'das chos shig bshad// ces
6a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ byar med blo 'das bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas ngang dngas gsal dag gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// dngos med rnal ma gang gis thob// ces zhus pas/ ston pas
6a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos med rnal ma thob thabs ni// lus ngag yid gsum rtsol bzhag la// mi blta mi bsgom spyod thob med// dngos med ye shes klo las 'das// gsal stong dang la mi 'bral ba// sang nge sal le dngos mtshan med// gang
6a4(rnying rgyud): yang mi rtog bsam las 'das// dngos med rnal ma zang ka la// gang la sems med rtog 'dzin med// yid rig dran pasam blo las 'das// zhe 'dod rtsis gdab med pas thob// thob pa'i dus na dngos med blo las 'das// snang srid chos la dbye
6a5(rnying rgyud): bsngal 'das// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ dngos med thob pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas ngar dngas gsal dag gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi bcud// dgongs
6a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i yang snying ji ltar 'dus// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dgongs pa'i yang snying bcud 'dus ngas bshad kyis// 'khor rnams ma yengs thugs la zhog/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra satwa b+ho/ a sid+d+hi a a/ dud+d+ha sarba pal
6a7(rnying rgyud): tiSh+Tha thu la du na a a/ de nas ye thog sangs rgyas kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ci// thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bzud// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs 'dus bshad// 'od gsal rang dngas yid la chongs// dngos med ka dag brjod
6b1(rnying rgyud): 'das kyang // blo dam rtogs pa bye phyir bshad// chos nyid rnam par dag pas na// chos kun rang bzhin rnam dag pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi yang snying nga drud 'dus 'di// dgongs pa'i mdo rnams gcig bsdus pa/
6b2(rnying rgyud): ye med ka dag dngos pad dkun byed ni// smod pa thams cad dang bral ba// mtha' dang dbus ni mi dmigs pa// sgo skur med pa blang ngor med// rgyu 'bras las 'das pa/ ye nas dag pa/ yenas zin pa/ bya ba med btsal ba med pa/ bslab pa med pa/ btsal du med pa/
6b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan nas mi 'byung ba/ gnyen po med pa/ byed pa po med pa/ ma byas pa/ ma brtags pa/ bdag med pa/ ma bcos pa/ de yin pa/ nges pa/ ma nor ba/ ji bzhin pa/ ma 'gags pa/ ma skyes pa/ mi nub pa/ ma lhags pa/ maM snang ba/ ma byung ba/
6b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba/ ye nas gnas pa/ kun la khyab pa/ ming med pa/ gzugs med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ tha snyad med pa/ bltar med pa/ gzung du med pa/ mtshon du med pa/ dpe med pa/ tshad med pa/ brtag tu med pa/ rtog ge las 'das pa/ dpag tu
6b5(rnying rgyud): med pa/ bsam du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ kun gyi 'byung gnas/ thams cad nas thams cad du btang snyoms chen po'o// stong pa nyid las rig par shar// rang byung dang dngas byung sar thim// phye med ka dag blo las 'das// dngos/ da ka dag
6b6(rnying rgyud): blang ka ye dag rnal ma shes// snying po yang snying bcud 'dus de kho na'o// ye thog ka dag gi sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus pa'i dpe ni/ shel gong / gsor dang / nam mkha'/ nyi zla/ nor bu/ chu shing / rgya mtsho'i tshul
6b7(rnying rgyud): ka dag 'gyur med gyogs dang bral// 'od gsal kun khyab dngos med g.yo rtsol med// ces gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ ye thog ka rab sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i bcud bskus bstan pa ri le'u sa bcu gcig pa'o//
7a1(rnying rgyud): de nas 'od gsal dang dngas kyis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi yang snying gsal ba'i bcud 'bras gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor
7a2(rnying rgyud): la bka' stsal pa// dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur bas gsungs pa/ chos kun rang bzhin med pa nyid// mya ngan 'das shes de la bya// stong nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de nyid mi gnas blo las 'das// zhes gsungs so// de nas rang bya
7a3(rnying rgyud): dang dngas kyis// 'di skad gsungs so// sems can gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsal ba'i yang rnying bcud 'dus/ ye med gdod nas ka dag zang ka rnal ma blo 'das de mthong na/ ye ji bzhin pa'i ngo bo ka dag zang ka mthong ba yin no// mthong med
7a4(rnying rgyud): dngos bral dmigs med de ni mthong ba yin no// de la ni chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs so// de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ de la ni byang chub par bya ba yang med la grub par bya ba yang med// de la sems can du gdagra pa yang med do// chos can yang med la/ chos can
7a5(rnying rgyud): gdags pa yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ka nas dag pa'i byang chub sems te/ nam mkha' ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'o// de'i phyir na byang chub ni/ ye med ka dag blo 'das las btsas bar bya'o// ka dag dngos med nang ka
7a6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir// dngos po med cing blo'i byed pa po las 'das pas/ nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// de la sangs rgyas kyis ma gzigapa mi gzigs gzigs par mi
7a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji ltar ma gzigs na/ kha dog dbyibs dang mun par ma gzigs so// pho mo ma ning khams gsum ji lta bur yang ma gzigs so// ka dag dngos med blo 'das ni// ming du btags pa yang med do// ming du btags pa thams cad bla dang sa
7b1(rnying rgyud): shA byag// de'i byor nasangs rgyas ni bla dgas sa// tsam ni bla dgas so// dge 'dun par bladags so// de bzhin du byangs dang ye shes dang / chas kyi sru dang / smra zadad pa dang / sems can dul gtan la sogs pa thams ca dang btags shing da
7b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ljid pa bla dgas 'ba' zhig tu rig par bya'o// zla dgas gang yin pa den glo zur du ming du btags pa ste/ ye nas ldan pa ma yin no// gal te ye nas ldan pa zhig yin na ni/ gang blo zung 'thams cad kyis mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gangs ming btags ga
7b3(rnying rgyud): med/ rgyu btags chags pa grub pa yin/ de ni byar med byas so yin// mi snang ba la kun snang ba// thams cad thams cad glo bur sdang // snang nyid med pa'i snying po de// yod med gnyis su dmigs pa med// sangs rgyas med la sangs rgyas dang //
7b4(rnying rgyud): mtshogs papa/ da mas/ sa// dbyung zhog pa pa/ bya mye na da// rnam pa pa dang // // shu nga gA/
7b5(rnying rgyud): zed // lung bstan pa med do// nges par rnyed pa med do// yaM medaka dag yo gsal rdul mablo 'das te// thams cad nas thams cad du byang chub pa nyid do// stong pa nyid do// de kho na nyid do// ngas pa dam pa nyid do// gzhan ma yin pa nyid do// sde ba med/
7b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid do// 'gag pa med pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do// chos nyid do// chos kyi dbyings nyid do// bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsam du med pa nyid do// de dag thams cad kyang dngos po ka dag zla 'das nyid do// ka nas dag bzang
7b7(rnying rgyud): de la/ gcig dang / mang po dang / gcig mang por snang ba dang / mang po gcig tu 'gyur ba de la ni/ gcig ces bya ba blo las 'das pa'o// tha dad zhes pa gnyis sdang las grol ba'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas sangs rgyas kun tu bzang pos/ thugs
8a1(rnying rgyud): kyi yang snying bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin gcig pa dang / ma gos pa dang / go 'byed pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang / dbyigs med pa dang / kha dog med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang /
8a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa med pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa dang / g.yo ba dang 'gul ba med pa dang / chags pa dang gnas pa med pa dang // 'jig pa dang stongs pa med pa dang / 'gyur ba dang ma khyab pa
8a3(rnying rgyud): med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang ma chub pa med pa dang / skyo ba dang dub pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang rgyu rkyen med pa dang / 'bras bu dang rtsol ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin no// dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra'o// nam mkha' de ni yod pa las med par
8a4(rnying rgyud): ra ba ma yin/ med pa las yod par 'gyur ba ma yin// de bzhin du gsal ba las mi gsal bar 'gyur ba'am/ mi gsal ba las gsal bar 'gyur ba'am/ tha dad pa las gcig tu 'gyur ba dang / yin pa las min par 'gyur ba dang / mid pa las yin par
8a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / nye ba dang ring ba dang / de bzhin du che chung bzang ngan bde stag dang / khyab dang ma khyab dang / gyang dang ma byung dang / dag dang ma dag dang / grub dang ma grub dang / mthong dang ma mthong dang / ya sa dang dog dang / dbyibs dang kha dog dang / phyi dang nang dang / skye ba dang 'gags pa
8a6(rnying rgyud): dang / 'pho dang mi 'pho dang / 'gyur dang mi 'chur dang / mun pa dang snang ba dang / sngon dang phyi ma dang / mtha' dang dbus dang / gor ma de dag thams cad kyang / bdag dang gzhan du gyur pa dang / de bzhin du blangs nas dor bar gyur pa dang / dor ba las blang bar
8a7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' ni thams cad du ma bcos pa'o// de bzhin du dngos med ka dag rnal ma pa/ dus thams cad du ma bcos ma bslang ba'o// mi col mi sems/ spo bcos zhe 'dod dang rtsis gdab med par gnas so// rgyal ba kun tu bzang bas
8b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus nas gsungs so// de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpas thugs dgongs kyi bcud bsdus nas gsungs pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab chos 'di rnams/ de ba'i
8b2(rnying rgyud): nyid du gcig pas na// gang gis de bzhin de shes na// kun la dbang bskur thob pa yin// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud// sems lhag can gyis bka' stsal pa// ka dag rnal ma rang dngas pas// 'di zhe
8b3(rnying rgyud): tshig tu ma gsungs pa/ khyab pas gcig pa'i byin rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod pas so sor 'jal// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje yis// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs kyi brgyad// dgongs pa'i bzad 'dus bka' stsal pa//
8b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis mi khyab kun shes na// bsam du med par de bzhag la// dpag tu med pa'i yon tan 'byung // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'od gsal rnam dag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi bcud// kun gyi
8b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'dir bcad pas// 'do don gang rig thos pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'di las 'byung bas na// 'di shes kun shes shes rab mchog/ ces gsungs so// de nas gsal dag dang dngas khye'u chung gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dgongs pa/
8b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i nang nas gsang chen 'di// nyid kyis nyid kyang mi mthong bar// gzhan gyis ka dag ga la mthong // zhes gsungs so// de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud gsungs pa// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// gser dang
8b7(rnying rgyud): mkha' bzhin mi 'gyur bas// mi nub stor bral med pa'i phyir// chos kyi dam pa chen po mchog/ ces gsungs so// de nas dang dngas rin chen gyis// sangs rgyas thugs kyi bcud byung ba// mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rang bzhin te// dag pa dag la dag pa nyid//
9a1(rnying rgyud): martogs pa rtogs pas rtogs par 'ang// thams dang sa yang zad// gsusas// des bya ma dag dgangs gsungs pa// rang nga dan gdag ma bcos pas// rang tu ngapan nyid// dun rtsa da /
9a2(rnying rgyud): spangan durtsibs nam mkha// zhas gsungs s+ho// zhen modang dngas rla gaphrengs pa/ ngapanyid tu stong pol/ tshogs snang ba ma gyis bdod// sras kyangs dras byang ba// gdag bzhin dkyil pa ra/
9a3(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i kyang chung gis// sangs rgyas gsung ba'i yang gsungs// med ga dag pad pa // me sa med 'i byung ba yi// rgyaba'i yo kun 'dzung // sna kun 'byung rin chen gtad// zhas gsung mam// dang sa dung
9a4(rnying rgyud): gas / sa sa ga pad// gsanas lag gnas pa// da dgang sna 'ang ga sa gsum so// sa/
9a5(rnying rgyud): bcud gsungs pa// kaM dag dngos med na ga ma// gzhi su med pa'i skad cig ma/ deni na pa sbyin thog// ces gsungs so// yang rig pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa// kwa ga rnam mde nyid ni// dpag ci gzhal par mtha' yas pas// dpa
9a6(rnying rgyud): mad rgyal pa'i ma brang yin// res na kun bkod kun sa de gcigaganas// zhes gdungs so// yang dngos med kun byed dgongs pa'i brgyad ga spangs pa// ye nas ka dag pa bcom ji bzhin pa// chos sa tsag ga snying pos// med pa las byung chags d+hA
9a7(rnying rgyud): spang med de bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// de nas cang med cing lngang gtsang rtsi bdag ngas 'dus gsungs pa/ de bzhin nyid nga don bstan du// de bzhin nyid kun gcig pas// gang gis gang la gang gis bsan// nyid la nyid klo la ning zadang //
9b1(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// sems nyid kun byeng rdzal pos dgongs pa'i brdud gsungs pa/ ji lgang bas ma sa ni khyab pa'i// chos bur // dag nang rig na// sangs rgyas kun dang mthapa sbyong bas na po bas pa ba
9b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// gsal dang sa smos gcod kyi sa gsungs pa// gdag su brjid med pa pas// de ma tshan bye na sa nang brjod// gang zu ni ni dngo pa med da// de nyid rjes mang gro'adas // zhes gles sa s+ho// nganas rang gyu ga gis
9b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// dngos med kun snang dun gyi gzhi// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis kyi dbyings// reg dang ma rig gnyis kho na// ngag dang ma dgu gnyis su snang // zhes gsungs so// de nas rang dngas rin chen gyis gsungs pa/ bsam gyis
9b4(rnying rgyud): khyab mi shes par// bsam med ngang du gang 'dzeg pa// byis pa de ni blun pa yin// mun pa'i skye mched nyid du 'gyur// zhes gol bar gsungs so// de nas 'dzin med kun gsal gyis gsungs pa// bsam med bsam gyis mi khyad chos// lhag
9b5(rnying rgyud): par 'thong na gzhi gnas pa// rnam rtog spyad len gang byed pa// de dag sgrib pa ma mtha' yas// zhes gsungs so// dngos med zang thal gyis dgongs pa'i brgyad gsungs pa/ dngos med kun gyi rang bzhin ni// mgyes pa las thams cad rgyus//
9b6(rnying rgyud): skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// ces gsungs so// blo 'dus ye med kyis gsungs pa// gdod dag kun snang ye shes 'di// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ni// rang las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so//
9b7(rnying rgyud): gnyis sdang spos gcod kyis gsungs pa// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// so sor snang ba ma yin te// glo bu rna ma rtog mtha' yas pa'i// ji bzhin nyid der bste// de la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med// ces gsung so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i brjod
10a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// ka dag de nyid cir yang mi snang na// glo bur rnam rtog tha dad pa'i// rnam rtog de ni zad par snang // snang ba nyid ni snang ba med// ces gsungs so// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos thugs kyi bcud gsungs pa// da
10a2(rnying rgyud): med ka dag ye med ye shes dngos grub pas// zad pa med cing 'phel ba med// da gdod bsgrub tu ga la yod// ces gsungs so// rang byed rgyal pos dgongs pa'i bcud gsungs pa// zhog ma med nas bsags pa yi// rnam rtog sprin phung dpag med
10a3(rnying rgyud): pa// stong nyid skad cig rig pa yis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par gsal// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dri med dgongs pa'i bcud gsungs pa// yod mthong snang grag chos so cog/ tha dad sna tshogs mtha' yas kyang // dngos me ga dag de bzhin
10a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// ma bsgribs 'od gsal rnam dag go// zhes gsungs so// de nas sna tshogs 'ub chub dgongs pa'i brgyad gsungs pa// dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten du// sgron ma bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ji snyed pa yi tshem bstan pa// mtha' yas don ni
10a5(rnying rgyud): gcig tu zad// dngos med zad ka ka dag dgongs bcud do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dgongs bcud// snying po yang snying bcud bsdus pas// thams cad thams cad ji snyed pa// tshig gi tha snyad tsam dag las/ 'di
10a6(rnying rgyud): ba ci yang med// dngos med ka dag ye sadas rgyas// e ho a a sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ang+ku thi ma She dus gsum bu de gshegs sangs chus kyang // dngos med ka dag br-i skad sh+lo 'das te// ka dag lhun grub thugs 'gongs brjod// mA lus dgongs 'dus ri rab
10a7(rnying rgyud): lhun grub brtsegs// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i btsud 'dus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ sangs tshus thams cad kyi thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus par bstan pa'i yadz+ra ste bcu gnyis pa'o/
10b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ya thog ka dag sangs rgyastsa la// ri bo brtags padapa yis ji ltar bstan// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngog med ka drug dpe las 'das na pang // don gsal 'odags pa dpe yos na snun
10b2(rnying rgyud): nas bskrad// dper na po brtsegs pa yang // ldan pa'i ngang la 'gyur med brdegs// g.yo rtsal 'bo 'thun med par srub// yaM med gdong dag ka dag brtsegs// dngos med dri 'das byar med brdegs// song gas la gdangs la dang sa sangs brtsegs
10b3(rnying rgyud): snying po'i ngang du ye shes brtsegs// chos nyid klong du rtsal zer brtsegs// chos sku'i klong du sku gsum brtsegs// snying po skye 'gag gnyis med brtsegs// ka dag bstan pa mi 'gyur te// dngos med ma bcos gsal la drangs pa'o// ka dag blo 'das byar med
10b4(rnying rgyud): brtsegs// ye nas rgyun chad med pa ste// de phyir ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud// ces gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ ri bo dper bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la/
10b5(rnying rgyud): sa
10b6(rnying rgyud): bcug pa dang // skyon pa glang po chur zhugs dang // ri rgyal lhun po 'gyur med dang // shel gong nor bu rin chenu gser// brda' don gnad 'grol man ngag 'des// shes rab can gyis brda' gnang bkrol// zhes gsungs so// seng ge nam mkha'i
10b7(rnying rgyud): 'brug thos dang // rus sbal mkha' la bsnyag pa dang // ral gri sbrum gyis ngar btags dang // glang pos dmag gi tshogs bsgyur dang // bkres pa g.yos legs zas za dang // btso ma g.ya' dang bral ba dang // me long dri ma bral ba dang // nyi ma mun pa
11a1(rnying rgyud): med pa dang // rgya mchog yo 'gul med pa dang // dung nyid ye dag dkar ba dang // smon mes mun pa sel ba dang // chub rgyun chad med pa'o// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags brdas bstan pa
11a2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu ji ltar 'thob// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// theg gzhan zhe 'dod ngas ma bshad// rtsol med ye
11a3(rnying rgyud): nas 'bras bu bstan// dang dngas khye'u chung thugs la chongs// ye nas dag pa dngos med de// rang la gdod ma nyid nas gnas// ka dag blo 'das rtogs pa'i thabs// de la 'bras bu thob ces bshad// ces gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/
11a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas rang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// theg dgu'i lha skom ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ye thog ston pas bka' stsal pa// snying po ka dag bltar med
11a5(rnying rgyud): kyang // blo khyad theg pa'i lta sbom bshad// dang dngas khye'u chur thugs la chongs// nyan thos pa yi lha sgom ni// yul rdul gang zag bdag med blta// 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug tshogs drug yul bkag bsgom// rang rgyal ba yi lta skom ni// /
11a6(rnying rgyud): rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam par rig byed blta// byang chub sems dpa'i lta sgom ni// bden pa gnyis su blta la stong par bsgom// gsang sngags phyi rgyud lta sgom ni// dag pa chos nyid kri ya'i lha drug bsgom// u pa ya yi lta sgom ni// dpon
11a7(rnying rgyud): g.yog tshul ltar sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom// yog pa yi lta ba ni// skye 'gag/ gnyis med byang chub rnam lnga bsgom/ ma hA yo ga'i lce sgom no// snang stong gnyis med ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// a nu yo ga'i lha sgom ni
11b1(rnying rgyud): kyis da ye shes pa bskyed rdzogs tshul bsgom// a ti yog 'i lta bzhom ni// snang srid chos su stang ba had por ba rnam// zhes gsungs so// ra bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud pas/ zag pa la rgos bstan pa'i denyas pajug
11b2(rnying rgyud): de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// dku las s+ye tI gang gis grags// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la dka' phral pa// dngos med kA dag grags dang ma grags med// blo khyad dgu rtsaji sngags tshal ni
11b3(rnying rgyud): ka dag blo 'das zhe 'dod rten med kyi// phyogs bral lta ba dgu las spags// yid sems g.yo 'gul gang la'ang bsam bsgom med// dran sems gang la mi skye bsgom pa'i rgyal po spags// gang yang ma chags yid smon bloms 'das//
11b4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ dgu las spyi ti 'phags pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas ngang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// dgu me rtogs nagol sgrib yod dam med// ces
11b5(rnying rgyud): zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// spyi rje blo 'dis 'di rtogs na// gol sgrib 'khrul pa gang yang med// stong gsal ka dag gsal dag stong // ye med gdod nas dngos gzhi med// gol sgrib 'khrul gsum ka nas dag
11b6(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// ston pas 'khor la yang gsungs pa// de ma rtogs kyi gang zag la// gol sgrib 'khrul pa bsam mi khyab// theg pa re la bcu tshan bcu// gol sgrib sum brgya drug cu yod// mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum du bsdus// gnas
11b7(rnying rgyud): don ma rtogs sgrib pa yin// ka dag ma rtogs 'khrul pa yin// 'og ma 'og ma'i lha sgom gyis// gong mgor ma bsgribla pa yin// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i chung pas/ gol sgrib 'khrul pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
12a1(rnying rgyud): de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ya thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// shes med blo 'das gal sgrib la ni gang du bzla// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// shes mang po 'das rtogs pa ya
12a2(rnying rgyud): snying po ma bu ngo 'phrad 'khrul du med// dngos med 'od gsal mun sangs sgrib pa med// 'gro sgom nor gol du med// go la sgrib 'khrul gsum la bzla'o// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ grol sgrib 'khrul pa la bzla
12a3(rnying rgyud): bA'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas rang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka rag sangs rgyas la// lha sgom pa bzla ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal po// skom spyod 'bras la badz+ra re/
12a4(rnying rgyud): yin rgyu ye med tshig med bltar med zhe 'dod med// lta ba'i rgyal po rten meng byal bas lta ba'i la chen bzla// min rgyu ye med g.yo rtsol dran rtog bsam dmigs med// g.yo 'gul rtog med bsgom pa'i la chen bzla// byar med gang yang
12a5(rnying rgyud): ma chags spyod pa'i la chen bzla// dngos med gdod grub ka dag blo 'das 'bras bu'i la chen bzla// lta sgom spyod 'bras la chen bzla// rten med mi 'gyur rtog dpyod blo las 'das// gzhir bskus dbyer med gcig tu bzla// gcig ni dngos med ka
12a6(rnying rgyud): dag go// zhes gsungs so// ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ lha sgom la bzla ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dang dngas khye'u chung gis// ye thog ka dag sangs rgyas la// mtshan dang gtad rgya ji ltar gzung // zhes zhus
12a7(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pas gcig tu bsdus// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dgongs yang snying bcud// bcud 'dus ri bo brtsegs pa sku gsum lhan sub brtsegs// de phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi
12b1(rnying rgyud): dgongs 'dus ri bo brtsegs par zung // theg pa dgu las khyad par 'phags pa'i phyir// dbu sbyite yog bya bar zung // lha sgom spyod 'bras kun gyi la bzla'i phyir// la blo gyi rgyal kun gyi rgyud du zung // zhes gsungs so// smon pas yang
12b2(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa// rgyud 'di gtang ba'i slob ma snod ldan ni// ri bo'i blo la nyi zla'i sems// ral gri'i shes rab dang dkar rgyud// shel gong dam tshig bu chung spyod// de ldan 'jig rten 'di na dkon// bla ma gtsug khur dam tshig bzung // shes rab tshul gtong pod che//
12b3(rnying rgyud): dang ring dge sems man ngag 'chang // de lta bu la rgyud 'di gtad// rjod med rnams la ma gtad cig/ ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i btsud bsdus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan dang gtad rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste nyid gcig pa'o// /
12b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ a ma la shud+d+ha tan+t+ra rat+na ma hA pra ka Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ dri med ka dag gi rgyud/ rin po che gsal ba chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ye
12b5(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po/ skyon ka dag yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i ston pa/ dri ma med pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bud+d+ha sanA ma la/ sa ma d+hI a ho/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
12b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ston pa 'od mi 'gyur ba rin po che dri med 'od gsal ba/ ye ji bzhin pa chen po gzhon nu bum pa'i sku ru bzhugs pa/ gzhon nu'i mtshan rab tu dngas pa/ shes rab kyi skur bzhengs pa ste/ chos nyid dri med ka dag gi klong / mi 'gyur ba'i gzhal
12b7(rnying rgyud): med khang / phyi nang med par zang thal ba/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i klong du rin po che 'od gsal bas/ sbrul sku'i gnas su shar ba ni/ lho phyogs bde ldan yid 'dres pa'i tshal/ pad+ma brtsegs pa'i pho brang / gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod/ me ri 'bar ba'i rtse
13a1(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs te/ dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la/ mngon par 'khod pa'i mkha' 'gro rnam pa lnga dang / byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi shugs can bdun dang / gsang ba'i bdag po rnams byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dus so// de'i tshogs nga
13a2(rnying rgyud): bdag pos snga drangs te/ 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis mar me mdzad la brkyang phyag 'tshal te/ bskor ba lan dgu mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ dpal gyi dpal mchog he ru ka/ gsang ba yang gsar dr-i med ka dag don// rin chen 'od gsal chen
13a3(rnying rgyud): de'i byad// me rig mu pa bsal ba phyog/ shes bcad pa par ba'i 'angs// 'dus pa gas pa sa ga s+ho// zhes grasas// da pas bka' thal pa/ \u0f7f/ gsung bcom ca dang tshar thags kyi ga
13a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyas btab pa// shes rab ka dag chen po'i rgya bral nas// ka dag 'od gsal rgyud chen gter byung ba// dbugs med 'gyur ba ye shes rlung gi rta// rang byung ye shes mi bo chen pos chibs// yid las 'das pa'i shes rab ka dag mtshor// phyag tu
13a5(rnying rgyud): bsnams te zla gam pad+ma can// gsung gi sgo mo chen por lam phyung nas// chos bu dri med ka dag la sogs pa// rin chen 'od gsal chen po ngas bshad kyi// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rngub nges lhogs dang // tshig gi bdud rtsis blo yi the tshom nad/
13a6(rnying rgyud): gtang nas phyung la gzhi dgongs chen po'i dor// dri med ka dag rin chen 'od gsal 'di// skal ldan thugs la sgron ma gsal bar bstan// zhes gsungs so// dri med ka dag gi rgyud rin po che 'od gsal ba las/ gleng gzhi le'u rtse dang po'o//
13a7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan dpal gyi dpal// chos nyid ka nas ji ltar dag/ dag pa'i ngo bo ji ltar gnas// dri ma phra rags ci yis snang // dag pa'i ngang du sgrol thabs gang // 'dus pa'i tshogs la gsung du gsol
13b1(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus sa// ka dag gzhi nas ngag la rang sngang tshul// 'brur gsum tha rags rnam pa gsum// dngas ma'i chu la sa btab rtog dang mtshungs// rab dz+ra mad ka dag gar ma bzhin// d+ha ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab mig yod pas// rnam gsum
13b2(rnying rgyud): ma thub ngo bo 'dug tshul yang // gsum nyid byung tshul gnas tshul ngo la gsal// dbugs dang bral bas phra rags rang dag 'gyur// shes rab can la da lta nyid la dag/ de ltar ma mthong sgrol bas dag 'gyur med// ces gsungs so// de med ka dag
13b3(rnying rgyud): gi rgyud rin po che 'od gsal chen po las/ chos nyid ka dag rin po che 'od gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas yang rdo rje 'chang la zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan dri ma med// rtog med ye shes rarags la mnga'// rig pa
13b4(rnying rgyud): ka nas ji ltar dag/ dag pa'i ngo bo ji ltar gnas// dri ma phra rags ci yis snang // dri ma dag par gang gis byed// 'dus pa'i tshogs la gsung du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// skye 'gag med pa'i ye shes las// phyogs ltang med
13b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes rab gsal// de nyid rig pa nyag gcig gsal// gdod nas dag pa'i rig pa la// sgo lnga'i chos can ka nas dag/ reg pa zang thal spos med la// yid kyi rnam shes ka nas dag/ rang gsal 'dzin med ye gnas la// dar 'dzin ton
13b6(rnying rgyud): mongs can gyi yid// ma sbyangs ka nas dag pa yin// rig pa spros dang bral ba nyid// nyag gcig ka nas dag pa la// 'phel 'grib gang stongs med pas na// kun gzhi ka nas dag pa yin// de dag yon tad phyogs sdang ste// ro ba 'dug tshul 'di
13b7(rnying rgyud): ltar gnas// mi rtog ye shes rang gsal la// sems med rang rig ye gnas don// lha yi lha mchog bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin sogs nges zung zhig/ gyi nang med pa'i zang thal ni// chos nyid gzung 'dzin bral ba la// 'byung bzhi'i sgrib pa
14a1(rnying rgyud): ka nas dag/ chos nyid mthun ma sa thal la// 'byung bzhi mtshan ma gnas dag/ chos nyid 'byung ba za dpal// sa ma~M mtshan ma ga nas dang// chos nyid ga do nas dag bral// chul mtshan gnas dag/ chom nyad pa
14a2(rnying rgyud): gsam chen po la// me yi mtshan makun pa dag/ chos nyid mig la thogs med pa// rlung gi matsun ma kAnas dag/ 'byung zad chos nyid la gdangs la// nam mkha'i mtshan ma gan pa dag/ chos nyid gdod nas dag pa rnamargya tshan po la// 'a
14a3(rnying rgyud): lnga'i rdul gyi mtshan ma ka nas dag/ chos nyid la dog med pa'i dang gsal la// 'byung ba bzhi pa bag gi kha dog ka nas dag/ ka dag rang gi chos nyid 'dug tshul ni// yon tan mtshan nyid grangs las 'das me kyang // chos nyid don gyi 'jug tshul 'ang
14a4(rnying rgyud): ltar gnas// dngos med spos bral dag gsal zang thal de// mtshan ma'i rdzas med thams cad 'char ba'i rten// dag pa'i chu dang dag pa'i me long bzhin// dri mtha rags rnam gsum snang ba yang // chos nyid mtshan nyid la nyid 'byung ba lnga// rig pa'i mtshan
14a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ye nas 'byung ba lnga// de nyid mtshungs pas rin chen 'od gsal ba// de lnga'i nang du de las de ltar gsal// de gsum mtshungs pas mthu banas rags par sdang // gcig la gcig 'thab dri mtha bar snang // dag pa'i grong du gong ma'i gdangs datha rabs/
14a6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid ngang la sgrib pa'i bag tu snang // yon tan mtshungs pas 'od gsal phra rags sngang // glos btags kyi nas blta ba'i don bsgribs kya // gzhan la ltos 'gyur chas ma yin// rim gsal stong nyid snying por gnas// bum pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin
14a7(rnying rgyud): gsal la ga ya sems med pa'o// tshogs brgyad chos ca ldang ba yang // rang rig 'byung lnga'i mtshan nyid kyis// phyogs ring grong nas ye shes drung // dbugs med 'byung ba lngas bskyed pas// shes rab rdung 'byung sdang ba wa// 'od/
14b1(rnying rgyud): ga// rgyasanod pa la na gas ga// dun pa gyu ma gas pa// bgatugs pa susu dzad// zla ba rnamams pad pa// / byung // pa yo dgas pa yo// sogs pa pag
14b2(rnying rgyud): skyeng // bsal cang sbyangs pas mi 'dag ni// shes rab kyi thabs rnamaganyis kyis// ma rig meng rtog bsal ba yis// shas dbugasal ba'i spyan gyi byas// dri me dag dag ngas snang // de dag sdang tshul 'digasas na// dpe ma
14b3(rnying rgyud): nga// skad gnalas 'dzin pa dag/ dpe jim gyur// zhas gsangs so// ji ga dug rten pa 'dagasul bu las/ reg ga ga na pa tsho gA brtan pa'i la sngagasas pa'o// dus yang gas ba dan
14b4(rnying rgyud): thos zhus pa/ kyai rtse bcom ldan mtha' las 'das// chos rba kA nas ji ltar dag/ dri ma tha rags kyi gyis stong // dag pa'i thabs su gang rnams bstan// 'dus pa'i tshogs la gsung du gsal// zhes zhus so// dri bzhi rdzogs pa dpa
14b5(rnying rgyud): dbul// khrag 'brang rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// hod cig rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyang// zos sraka nas 'di ltar dag/ chos su dri med dag gsal la// gzung ba ma rags kA nas drag/ reg pa dri med rang gas pa la// 'dzin pa phre rigs ka nas ngan
14b6(rnying rgyud): dbyi gi sa me 'al sa sngang na na dag/ ma ny-i 'di t+ta ma // gang yid lag yas// mang pa'i rnamag nang drAg/ rig pa dri med spyong gas pa la// chos nyid dri med stong gsal gyis// gnyis su med pas rgyas btab pas// dag pa
14b7(rnying rgyud): miganas dag/ de dang mtshungs pa'i drim nga// ma bsil ka dag la yin mod// 'dug tshul bag nas lugs ni// dri med nam mkha'i skyed pol// rtag med rig pa'i snying po shar// stong gas la dbang pa dang gsalal// rang ga dngas
15a1(rnying rgyud): 'gag mtshan ma mad// thugs rdo sgo nas ma 'gags pas// mi 'gyur ba ni sa la bdag nyid che// dri mod kun 'dus chu yi bdag nyid cha// gzung 'dzin rtog med ma yi bdag nyid cha// byan pa yin naH/ gnyis la thogs
15a2(rnying rgyud): med rlung gi bdag nyid che// rang gsal me 'gag nam mkha'i bdag nyid che// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid chos kyi phra// rig pa nyag gcig 'gyur med ldan gyis grub// spros med mkha' la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// chos nyid klong na rig pa 'gyur med gnas/
15a3(rnying rgyud): dri ma phra rags sdang ba yang // 'gyur med 'od gsal rags par sdang // dngos med spros bral 'od lnga 'phro// de stobs nyid kyis shin tu phra// yon tan sdang chang ngo ma shes// dri ma gzung 'dzin de yis byas// de phyir dri med 'od gsal yin// dang
15a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs su brda' dang ngang // brdas mtshon sbas ni brjod pa yid// ngo bo snang tshul gnyis rtogs pas// dri med ka dag chos kyi sku// dri med dag pa'i nam mkha' la// dri med ka dag rang bzhin shar// zang thal gsang ba'i sgo bzhi nas// ma bsgribs
15a5(rnying rgyud): ye shes sun la gsum// rin chen 'od la phra rags gsum// mi gnas ka dag ngol snang // gsal ba bku' ma byas par// dbugs dang bral bas rang dag 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dri med ka dag gi rgyud rin po che 'od gsal chen po las/ chos
15a6(rnying rgyud): sgra ka nas dag pa rin po che 'od gsal 'bar ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan mkhyen gsal rig/ shes rab lu lA ka nas ji ltar dag/ shes rab sku lnga'i bzhugs tshul ji ltar gsal/
15a7(rnying rgyud): dri ma phra dgas rtsal snang ji ltar gsal// dag pa'i ngang du grol thabs ji ltar lags// 'dus pa'i tshogs la nges par bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des zung zhig/ chos sgo snying po 'byung lngar ldan// rang gi rigapa
15b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'gag par// bum pa'i nang gi mar ma bzhin// 'byung lnga'i gnas rig pa 'gyur// dbugs med 'gru ba ya shas drung // shas rab gsal ba lngar ldan pas// 'od kyi mtshan ma ku nas drag/ gsal ba'i me tog shes rab sba lnga la// ma rnyig las
15b2(rnying rgyud): byang yul gyi rjes 'brangs pas// dngas mtshan gzugs med rnam rtag chas// gsal 'grib skya dang 'gagus par bcas// yaM gnyis mtshanam bzhin sde ku nas dag/ dmed de 'dzin pa yi zhwad pa kanas dag/ shes rab phra la 'drag zul na/
15b3(rnying rgyud): u 'byung lnga'i rang bzhin can// mi g.yo gsal la mi rtog pa// phyogs ljang med pa'i shes rab la// chos su dran rtog med pa'i thugs// snying po bcud 'dril mtshan ma med pa'i sku// sgra yi rang bzhin snying po 'byung ba lnga// dngos med 'gyur med yon
15b4(rnying rgyud): tan dri ma med// thog ma gnyis mad 'byung ba lnga yi bdag/ de ltar ma 'gags rig pa'i ye shes rlung // dbugs med 'grub shes rab ngor ltung ba// sa rlung dal gsal sku lnga 'char ba'i rgyu// chu yi rlung 'grus sku lnga'i ngo bor 'gril// me yi rlung 'grus su
15b5(rnying rgyud): lnga phyag rgyar rdzogs// rlung gi rlung 'grus chos nyid klong du bskyod// su mdog phyag rgya ma 'dres so sor gsalnga// rang bzhin ma 'gags brjod du med pa'i gsung // shes rab don la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya med// shes rab rang bzhin ye nas gsal ba la//
15b6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i sku lnga wal le khrug ga gsal// dngos mtshan med pas gdul byas mthong ba med// shes rab yin pas rang gsal 'gag pa med// yid 'das kun tu rgyabs gzung 'dzin med// 'dus byas tsam la sgyu matsam snang dang // yid kyi yul
15b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur phyogs mthun mtshan ma yang // shes rab sgra lnga rin chen 'od gsal te// rlung gi stobs las yid kyi rnam pa byung // rlung lnga 'thabs pas 'byung lnga rdzogs par byas// chos nyid klong na ye shes lha mtsham// ma lo gzugs snang chu zla 'ja' tshon tsam//
16a1(rnying rgyud): ma 'gags dngos med ma 'dres so sor snang // phyi nang glos btags shes rab su bsgribs kyang // shes rab ngol dngos mtshan ka nas dag/ de tsam snang ba shes rab sku pi gdangs// de ltar rtogs pa ka dag shes rab dang /
16a2(rnying rgyud): so sor rtog po'i shes rab rol gsal// dbugs dang bral bas dri ma rang dag 'gyur// chu lha'i nang du byed kyi gdangs shar bzhin// stong gsalam 'gags shin tu phra ba'i bdag/ man shel klong nam 'dres gsal ba ltar// chos sku med
16a3(rnying rgyud): zang thal dang na gsal// zhes gsungs so// dri mad ka dag gi rgyud rin po che 'od gsal chen po las/ shes rab ka dag gi rin po ze 'od gsal bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pas zhus pa/ kye kye bcom
16a4(rnying rgyud): ldan thugs rngargyan// pral thug nas rig dag/ srul cu gnas lug sa 'i ltar bzhugs// drim phra dgas kyi las blang // dri ma gnyis po dag pa'i dag lugs gaH// zhes nyas pa// rang byang thugs cis bka' thal pa// tshan tu gnas das
16a5(rnying rgyud): pa yi// me long g.ya' dag lta bu la// rang byung ye shes zer shar ba// mi 'gyu pa yi 'gyu ba ste// ye shes rlung gis zer lnga bskyed// thugs rje rgyun gyi zag par shang // chos nyid dag pa'i klong du 'khyil// 'byung ba lnga yi rlung chen gyis// bskyed
16a6(rnying rgyud): bsdus smin bskyed lnga byas pas// chos sra'i 'bras bu gzugs slar sbyin// mi bskyod rin 'byung mtha' yas grub// sdang mdzad kun tu zhal du shar// de ni chos sgyu skul pa'i sku// shes rab sra yi rtal stobs yin// gyis ni gdul bya rang ldang
16a7(rnying rgyud): la// 'dul byed rig pa rang snang gsal// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor 'od du gsal// rang byung sku lnga 'od kyi sbubs nas 'bon// che ba'i ye shes ma btsal ldad kyis grub// thugs rje'i rgyud las thun mong gdul gyi sgrol// dri med lugasu
16b1(rnying rgyud): sa lags dus da // bgazugs thubasas gsu su na dang zla// dag rlob pa dang // ma tan can ba 'ang// da dug d+hA bya ga da da// gas na/
16b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa ltar// rtsol bslab ma byas dI la ka nas dang // me btsal ldan grub skra dang ye shes gsal// ma mar rtog pa'i shes rab sma ngol// dbugs dang brngas nas snying po gzhi la rdzogs// gribazed la shes 'tho zu la khyab/
16b3(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'i ka dag glong na gsal// ye shes 'od kyi bum pa'i gsang drim nas// phyag cu'i snang ba gang bstan nga duganas// spu dang ye shes rgyu yin grong thim// shes rab skul mtshan pa'i gzugs med pas// mtshan pa'i yul rtog pa mi mnga' bang // le gas grong na tha dad
16b4(rnying rgyud): dpang bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// dri med ka dag rin pa che 'od gsal chen po'i rgyu de las/ sgra la staka dag rin pa tsha'od gis la bar bstan pa'i lce gadrug pa'o// / rdo rje 'dzin pas yang zhus pa// \u0f88\u0f90 kye bcom ldan pa shes
16b5(rnying rgyud): dgas// yaM she sa ka dag dri ltang dag/ da na dpo ltar gnas// dregs pa snang bci yis kyang // je madrug par gang gis skyed// 'dus pa'i tshogs la ga sang du gsopa// zhes sras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phyim pa/
16b6(rnying rgyud): a ma haM// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs nyon// dang par rgya mo de rang byung ye shes dang // bar du rgyun med bde ba chen po'i dang // ma bcas 'brus bu ye shas rnam lngar snang // 'dus byas 'phral byung ka nas dag pa'i don// phyogs lung med pa'i
16b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab las// 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab shar// mdog gti mug ka nas dag/ drim phra ba'i tha ba dag/ 'byed pa med pa'i shes rab dang // mnyam nyid bde bar lod rnams pas// dmyal phrag dag dri ma thab med// shes
17a1(rnying rgyud): !/ rab nga gas la rang ldang la// chags srung skye ba'i yul med pas// rags pa'i rnam gnas dang/ ya shus drang gA 'dug nas na// rnam grangs ba rtsa lags grangs ma dbyung // blanyams phyags tsam cha mthun yin/
17a2(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i 'dug tshul ye shes lnga// lnga po gsum 'dus de nyid kag gcig dang // chos rnams 'byung gnas ka nas dag/ ka dag dbyings nyid chos sru yi shes nyid// snying po 'bru lnga chos su'i rang bzhin las// rang bzhin ma 'gags ma spa la
17a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'od// shes rab sgonas ma sor rang gsal bas// kun tog ye shas ma btsal ldan gyis grub// gdul bya'i 'khor la 'phrul byed dang snang bas// sku lnga yongs rdzogs thugs rjes don mdzad pa// bya ba grub pa 'i ye shes rang bzhin
17a4(rnying rgyud): gsal// su dang ye shes tha dad med par snang // rang bzhin yod med gnyis med khong ba skams pas// mnyam nyid ye shes rang gi 'dug tshul te// de yi rang gdangs ye shes la yi 'od// dug lnga dug gsum ye shes 'od gsal ba//
17a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs grol ye shes sgrib mong kyang // ye shes ngal gdong nas rnam par dag/ yon tad dang snang ma rtogs sleb par shar// ye shes kyi rnams parda' dang ga bstan pas// ngag tsul snang chubs so nga mthong ste// sgrib med la shes rang
17a6(rnying rgyud): nga // shes rab bstan la sa shes rang gsal ba// 'dam pa de bzhin du skyon gyis gas pa mde// skyon dang bral bas sku gsum ye shes gas pa// zhes gsungs so// dri med ga dag gi hud rin po che 'dags la chen po las/ ye shes ka dag rin
17a7(rnying rgyud): bca 'dugs la bar bstan pa'i se ga bdun pa// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pas rnas pa// bye ba mdzad nas dun// sa rna 'dug tshul 'i ra 'dug/ drimathal du spa #
17b1(rnying rgyud): mamasas// 'dun da ga / / / stsu na/ sa ga / sa
17b2(rnying rgyud): dazugs kyang dag ma pangar // shes rabasas brgyan d+ha med// rje bdug pas nas dag/ nas ba dgas sa zla 'gas/ des 'dogags pa 'brib med pa// de ma la sgrunasapa// shes ya cwag ga gas na
17b3(rnying rgyud): dang tha gnas dag/ 'dun tshul gas la lam dug tsug // dngags la rtson me dus gsamamanyam// pa rnamagasanyis don// 'byed pa me dngas par togs// tha'i la phyimaldan pa'i dag// darnyed mardzogs shes
17b4(rnying rgyud): pas// gnanas kyi da du dri ma thar bsdu dang // rjod kyi man dan rin chen 'dagasal pa// dgas par thang ba da pa rnams pa'o// ring gis par bsas yon tan tha~Mng snang bas// dang gzung bar gnyis medang nyid bang // dribyed de/
17b5(rnying rgyud): dag 'odags pa yin// brda' dang ngag gis gong ltar gtan pa pas// shes rab sbyar bya rang gas la bas// gnyis kyis ma bsgribs yong med shes rab gas pa// gsal ba'i rta po ye shes rlung gis byed// 'od gsal rta ru 'gyur zang rdung gis
17b6(rnying rgyud): de dang bral ba de nyid dang dag 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dri med ka dag gi rgyu rin pa chu 'od gsal ba las/ shes rab ka dag rin po che 'od du bstan pa'i leT ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag thos
17b7(rnying rgyud): zhus pa/ kye bye bcom ldan mig yo mgon// dgongs pa ga dag dri ltar dag/ dgongs pa'i 'dug tshul gang dang gang // tha rags snang bgang las byung // bas ma zhing bri nga'i thabs rnams gang / 'dus pa'i tshags la bshad drug sos/
18a1(rnying rgyud): zhu nas padag tshu na du na gnas rnam du kun nga/ 'ad
18a2(rnying rgyud): na na
18a3(rnying rgyud): pa nga bya// sa pa du
18a4(rnying rgyud): ma banas pas/ da dang / nugs gam sa pa'i la/ dani na da mi ga nas
18a5(rnying rgyud): ga/ rnam / tu rgyun ma ba/ shegs/
18a6(rnying rgyud): sa ga// nangasan pa na/ bsas / da napa rag rtsus pa /
18b1(rnying rgyud): nyams rgyabs mthar d+ha rang bzhir shugs kyis 'chad// nyin gyi rigs sung bzhin pada' la bste// snang ba gyur la yun du dmigs pa gtad// pra Tha gyi rigs la gan par rna bapa // rusas pas sa dngal ba//
18b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku ts+tsha ba// kha dang thugs su rang sdang snang ba shar// bag la nyal ba mngon du dbyung ba'i thabs// gong bsnyen bzhin du bzhag nas dbyung // dri ma phra rags tsam du snang ba yang // rang gi dri mdzod du de dung // rang bzhin yon tan rin chen 'dag
18b3(rnying rgyud): du// 'phro rgod tog dpyod rang gi rtsal yin pas// skrod man dag gi blo yi dri ma yang // rtogs ldan pa rin chen 'od du gsal// de ltar rtogs pas rtsol ba ma byas par// shes pa'i ngobadag nyid des dag/ dbugs dang bral nas ka dag dngul
18b4(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes gsungs so// dri med ka dag rin po che 'od gsal ba'i rgyud las/ dgrongs pa ka dag 'od gsal du bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas ston pas gdams pa/ oM ma hon rje lag na 'chang // gsang ba'i
18b5(rnying rgyud): don ni ngas bshad rgyud// kun la ma bstan rin chen gter du thos// skal ljin can gyi bdud rtsi sman// skal med drug tu gyur te // zhes gsungs so// e ma hA rdo rje chang chen pos// dri med ka dag rin chen 'odagus pa 'di// dri ma de dgongs pa
18b6(rnying rgyud): 'dis rtog pas// blo yi rnam rtog kun dang bral// mgon po nyid la rjes yi rang+ga// zhes gsung so// dri med ka dag 'od gsal chen po'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / rdzogs pa chen po dri med ka dag gi rgyud rdzogs
18b7(rnying rgyud): so// / rgya gar skad du/ tat+t+wa sarba rA Ad+ya tsar+m+ma hr-id ya pra h+mA tsA pA mr-i te sa mu dra kuN+Da li tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i rting po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i rgyud/ sngon thog spyi phud kyi ston pa snying por
19a1(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ chos nyid kha gting med pa'i klong na/ rang byung mu mtha' grol ba'i ston pas rang snang 'od kyi 'khor la/ gsal dag rang grol gyi bstan pa bshad/
19a2(rnying rgyud): dus kyi rgyal po thog mtha' med pa'i dus na/ sdud pa po ni rang rig khye'u chung ngo // de ni sngon byung thog ma'i phun sum tshogs pa'o// rang byung rtsal gyi phun sum tshogs pa lnga// ston pa'i rgyal po rang byung dang dngas kyis// 'khor gyi dam pa rang
19a3(rnying rgyud): gsal khye'u chung la// bstan pa'i rgyal po rang dngas chen po bshad// 'od gsal gnas na lnga phyi med dus so// gzhi rtsal dbyer med phun sum tshogs pa ni// 'od gsal gnas nas dang 'angs ston pa yis// dang spang 'khor pa
19a4(rnying rgyud): rang krol bstan pa bshad// dus gsum dbyer med rang sangs chen po'i dus// de yi rjes 'jug phun sum tshogs pa ni// 'od gsal gnas nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// dga' rab rdo rje snying po'i 'khor la ni// kun rdzob tsam du bla
19a5(rnying rgyud): med theg pa bshad// yongs rdzogs thod rgal man ngag tshig brjod du// gdung sob ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// sdud pa po ni rang rig khye'u chung ngo // zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho
19a6(rnying rgyud): 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rang snang gsal dag gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na// ci yang med las gang ma byung // spyi gzhi sngon thog ji
19a7(rnying rgyud): ltar gnas// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// brda' dang gnad kyis bstan bya yi// 'khor rnams ma yangs gus pas nyon// thog ma ye yi dus tsam na// a a a'o// nam mkha' med pa'i sngon rol na// 'byung
19b1(rnying rgyud): bgang yang yod ma yin// dngas med ming mdamatshan las 'das// de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can ga nyis// gang yang btags sbyang med pa rda ma// gang yang mgru ba cir mi snang // ming med mtha' grangs blo yul min// ya tong sha
19b2(rnying rgyud): dngos po med// mngon sum mi snang rang bzhin khyab// ces gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho lakhril pa'i rgyud las/ thog ma'i gzhi'i gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
19b3(rnying rgyud): de nas rang snga 'od gsal gyis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad zhus// gting yangs chos nyid don gying po ji ltar gnas// 'od gsal rdzas kyi yan lag de ltar shar// chos can sngang srid lnga tshogs ji la 'gror
19b4(rnying rgyud): de nyid 'gro la thabs gdams ngag ji ltar lags// grol ba'i 'bras bu ji ltar thob par 'gyur// yongs rdzogs theg par rim dgu dgos mi dgos// theg pa rim pa'i grub mtha' ji ltar shar// su mtha' grol ba'i lta bzhi ma ji ltar mthong // gsang
19b5(rnying rgyud): sngags zab mo brda' yis ji ltar bstan// gnad kyi gdams pa dgos don gang du 'dus// nyon mongs dug rnams ma spangs ji ltar grol// dug lnga gtan nas brlag par ji ltar bgyi// ma rig mun pa gnas ji ltar dag/ nga bdag 'di dang dug gsung
19b6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bsad// sems can sangs rgyas tshul ni ji ltar rgyas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mya ngan ji ltar 'das// mtshan mar sdang ba'i dngos po rdo ltar grol// mkha' 'phrogaseng bde brda' gan ji ste reg nga // theg pa rnams kyi grab mdzang ji ltar chen
19b7(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs thod rgal bla med lha bsgom gang / rig sems yid blo rgyad nas dzaM lta rab cad/ snang ba'i gyu ba kun gzhi ji ltar grol/ sems med rig med chos rnams ji ltar lags/
20a1(rnying rgyud): nadag pa'i 'dug pa rnams sa ma ga tugan // bgazugs thob gta dag nas so// sangs nan rnams zags nan ma sa dus// byas mam sa can
20a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul chod bro zad lugs su ji ltar bskyal// srid pa thams cad tho nas ji ltar bzlog/ nyon mongs dmag dpung chen po ji ltar 'azlog/ khams gsul 'khor brla nas ji ltar bzlog/ 'gro badrug gi ka yang sa ji skar bcad// cho rnams gtsug dan
20a3(rnying rgyud): skar rtogs// 'gro drugang log chen po ni war bskur// gong dag theg pa'i the zag ni daH// chos med zad par rab rgyal ba'i gdams pa kang // jig bcwam sangs thar pa tha~Mng lags su ma// dge bdum spang byang chubardzi ltar thob// rdzogs pasas
20a4(rnying rgyud): lam med par sangs rgyas gang // lha dbang ma bsrer dngos su ba ji ltar thob// chud kyi rgyal pos ji ltar btul bar bya// nyi zla'i snying po dpe don ji ltar lags// dpe mtshon snying po'i don ni ji ltar 'char// bdud rtsi' rgya mtsha chen po'i dpes mtshon
20a5(rnying rgyud): nas// gdams ngag bdud rtsi'i chu mtshor ji ltar 'khyil// chos rnams blo zad ci ltar bstsal// rgyud kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa ji ltar lags// kye ston pa'i rgyal po thog ma'i sangs rgyas khyod// 'khor gyi dam pa rang sdang gsal dag la//
20a6(rnying rgyud): ga rnams zhus mtha' dzagal baT// zhes kye brlabs po rgya zhus sa// ti zla'i snying po 'ad 'ang bdun rtsi'i rgya mtshol rgyas pa'i gyud pas/ gle skyong pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / nas rang snang bye chung gis// ru mthang yangs
20a7(rnying rgyud): sman pa la zhus de// gting yangs chos nyid dond y-i// nga ba gnas grags ji lder gnas pa lags// zhes gsol pa da / smon pas 'khong la bka' la pa/ gting yangs chos nyid don gyi gnas grags de// bdag gisazang pa
20b1(rnying rgyud): bshad kyis gus par spyod// a thang 'bong ya gtis// gting yangs don gyi gnas lugs de// cang med dngos med brjod med kyang // rtog pa bsal phyir re zhig bstan// mun khung gser 'chol snyan ma'i dpas// don gyi gsar dang spad par bya// gteng
20b2(rnying rgyud): yang+ga don gyi gnas lu grwa ni// sngon thog ci yang med pa yin// thog ma ming dang bral ba yin// gzhi pa 'khrul pa med pa yin// dngos gzhi grub pa med pa yin// rlung lnga 'gyur ba med pa yin// 'byung lnga dang sar thim pa yin// 'od lnga rang sang dag pa yin// rtsal lnga rang bar thim pa yin// zer lnga rang sar dag
20b3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // shes pa shes rgyu ba dang dang / rig pa skye ba med ba dag / ma ga gnas dag pa dang // min la bral snyems byed med pa dang // stong pa gsal ba las 'das dang // thugs rje yon tan 'char ba med// yid 'khor rnam gsum 'bul tshad nas// phrin pa'i 'khor sgor
20b4(rnying rgyud): ma 'khyams pas// rang bzhin ngo bo thugs rje las// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // de nyid klong gyur ye sangs rgyas// dam ya dang po'i sangs rgyas yin// chos nyid dbyings su mngon sangs rgyas// thog ma'i kun tu bzang po'o//
20b5(rnying rgyud): gting yangs kha gting med pa'i don// chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs yin// mi snang gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs yin// cad med cing snang cing ma grub// chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// sna tshogs mtshan
20b6(rnying rgyud): ma'i dngos po med// chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// ye med kun 'byung stong pa nyid// chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// dngos med rang byung gsal ba'i bdag/ gting yangs don gyi gnas lugs yin// gting yangs mi mngon mkha'
20b7(rnying rgyud): gsal dag/ chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// dngos por mi sdang yongs la khyab// gting yang sa don gyi gnas lugs yin// dngos med sna tshogs kun gyi gzhi// kun ldan gang yang grub pa med// lhan grub rgya ma chad pa'i don// chos
21a1(rnying rgyud): nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// dngos po dngos med kun gyi bdag/ chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// dpe med zla med mtshon du med// chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// cir yang ma grub cing
21a2(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa dang // gtir yangs chos nyid don gnas lugs// phye med ka dag yid dbyer med// ye nas chos nyid rnal ma'o// 'bras pA yi srab dngos gzhi med// rang bzhin car med ngo bo gsal// drug
21a3(rnying rgyud): dngas chen po yin// yon tan ma bsgrubs rang las 'khrungs// phrin las thogs med rang sar grol// chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa yin// snying po ma bcos gshis su gnas// dngos med zang ka rang 'khrungs yin// rig med yid med
21a4(rnying rgyud): sems las 'das pa'o// chos nyid grub pa'i mtha' las grol// bsam brjod dmigs blo'i yul las 'das// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zha'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ gting yangs
21a5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid don gyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yangs grol ston pa la// 'ad gsal rtsal gyi yan lag rnams// chos nyid dang las ji ltar shar// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor
21a6(rnying rgyud): la bka' stsal pa// 'od gsal rtsal gyi 'char lugs ni// dpe dang don du sbya ral bshad// 'khor rnams ma ye ras gus par nyon// dper na nyi ma'i snying po la// rtsal zer yan lag shugs las shar// de bzhin snying po'i gnas lugs las// rig snang
21a7(rnying rgyud): rtsal zar shugs la 'char// tsan+dan gla rtsi sgrog pa la// gang na gnas kyang dri dang ldan// de bzhin chos nyid rang bzhin yang // gang na gnas kyang 'od dang ldan// nyi zla gar yod 'dagasal zhing // snying pos kar khyab rtsal zer 'char// de yang ji ltar 'char zhe na/
21b1(rnying rgyud): gzhi med ngang las kun gzhi shar// dngos med dang las dngos kun shar// snang med ngang pas sna tshogs shar// yod med dang las 'khor 'das shwar// gnyis med dang las ma rig ye shes shar// cing yang grub pa med pa'i ngang nyid las/ rang bzhin
21b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje gsum du shar// rig dang ma rig rnam gnyis las// de las sku gsum dug gsum gnyis su shad// de las zhing khams rnam gsum yid 'khor gsum du shar// de las rang sar grol dang ma grol las// 'char sgo 'khrub sgo gnyis su shar ba d+ha/
21b3(rnying rgyud): sa 'gyu dang mi 'gyu las// rig med sems 'khrul 'khrul med shar// de las rtogs dang ma rtogs pas// gzugs lnga sku lnga nyid du shar// de las mngon du gyur dang ma gyur pas// 'khor ba mar 'das gnyis su shar// ci yang med las mir yang shar ba
21b4(rnying rgyud): yin// rtogs ma rtogs las sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// gting yangs chos nyid nga yi rtsal du shar// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho khyil pa'i rgyud las/ 'od gsal rtsal gyi yan lag 'char lugs bstan
21b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dang ldad 'od gsal gyis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// chos can sna tshogs mu mtha' ji ltar grol// ston pas rang snang 'khor la bka' stsal pa// chos can sna tshogs pu mtha' grol lugs ni// yongs rdzogs thod rgal bla med theg pa
21b6(rnying rgyud): 'dir// rtsol bsrub ma byas grol bar bshad// bya btsal rtsol bsgrub 'khor ba'i 'dam du tshud// de bas byar med blo 'das 'di// ci yang ma byas las rnams zin// gang yang ma bsgrub don rnams grub// ci la'ang ma spyad grol ba thob// gar yang ma zhug chos sgo mthong // ci yang
21b7(rnying rgyud): bsung med don mi 'da'// sgrib pa ma spangs ka nas dag/ dam tshig ma bsrungs rang sngon ka nas dag/ lta ba ma bltas chos nyid mthong // sgom pa ma bsgobla snying po'i klong // spyod pa ma spyad chag sngar krol// 'bras bu ma bsgrubs rang las grub// gang yang ma brtag blo bzhig pas// mtshan ma sna chog
22a1(rnying rgyud): da gro pa gyur/ tshul ba med par ra gnas pas// rjes can tshogs rang grol thu // yang dgas ma du na gagis// gang yang rtog rtsod pa bcug pas// chos canan tshogs ra grol gyur// sngags pa
22a2(rnying rgyud): dngas chos dbyings la// yid sems 'dzin rtog ma skyes na// chos can sna tshogs dang grol gyur// snang ba dang sdung chen po la// 'dzin rtog ma bzug dang grol gyur// ldang srid sna tshogs ji snyed la// mi bkag ma bslabs rang zo nga/
22a3(rnying rgyud): glang len med pa'i snang bar rang sol// mi khyen mi 'dor mnyam pa gnas pa yis// chos can spang srid sna tshogs pa dz+wal gyur// chos nyid gting mna' myangs pa chen po la// reg pa gcig sum mtha' yongs grol bas// chos can sngang
22a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs mu mtha' grol// zhes gsungs so// gyad thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi rma'i sring po 'ad ba ba bdud cing rgya tsho 'khyil pa'i d+hA las/ chos can nA rdzogs su mtha' grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye
22a5(rnying rgyud): rung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// de nyid 'grol thabs gdams ngag gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// de nyid 'grol thabasangs bshad kyis// 'khor rnams ma yongs gus par nyon// gdams
22a6(rnying rgyud): dag bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum// phyi ru sdang srid dang grol bdud rtsi dang // nang du drug gsum 'joms pa'i bdud rtsi dang // gsang ba skye med ka dag go// de la gyi yi bdud rtsi ni// sdang bsna tshogs rang sol// gzung 'dzin dag ga 'asgrub med par grol//
22a7(rnying rgyud): nad gi bdud ci bstan pa ni// dug gsum sku gsung thugs su bcom// de yang ji ltar bcom zhe na// gti mug chos skus 'dud dngas bcom// zhe sdang dug ni lobs skus com// 'dod chags dug ni sprul skus bcom// der ni dug ga
22b1(rnying rgyud): gcod// rmugasang thugs kyi bdud rtsis bcwos// gsang brgya ma ka dag go// bdud rtsi can po bstan pa ni// sa nyid gtang mtha' yangs pa dang // zas can rig pa chu mtha' grol// snying po bye ba med pa dang // yan lag pa 'gag
22b2(rnying rgyud): kanas dag/ dngos med rnal mar gnas pa dang // snying po lhun grub 'pho 'gyur med// gsang ba blo yi spyod yul min// skye med ka dag bdud rtsi'o// bdud rtsi rnam gsum gdams ngag 'dis// rnam pa gsum gro la sku gsung thugs// zhes
22b3(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ grol thabs kyi gdams ngag bstan pa'i le tra ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u zung gis// mu mtha' yongs su grol ba la// grol ba'i
22b4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu ji ltar thob// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// grol ba'i 'bras bu thob lugs las// snang ba grol ba'i 'bras bu ni// gsal dag zar thal chos kyi dbyings// rig pa grol ba'i 'bras bu ni// skye med ka dag
22b5(rnying rgyud): chen po thob// sems gzhi grol ba'i 'bras bu ni// dngos med gting yang sa chen po thob// gyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// snang ba rig pa sems gzhi gsum// snang grol rig med skye med grol// zhes gsungs so// nyi zla'i snying po
22b6(rnying rgyud): 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i chung las/ grol ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rang dngas rang grol gyis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa 'dir// theg
22b7(rnying rgyud): pa rim dgu dgos mi dgos// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs thod rgal theg pa ru// theg pa ma lus kun 'dus pas// theg dgu'i lta ba mi dgos so// nyan thos rang bral byar sems dang /
23a1(rnying rgyud): ya a pa lag dang // de dag zlos brtags byas chos yin// maN+Da a r+tha a ti gsam// ngagasum lwa ba gnyis su bzung / zhal zlas pa kha 'jams pas// zlas brtags zag dbus ngag la
23a2(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// ti d+ha'i snying po bcud rtsi'i rgyamatsho lakhril pa'i khyud las/ zag pa de dgu mi dgas par bstan pa'i la wa ste dbu pa // / de nas rang snga rang dgasal gyis// theg pa'i zab mtha' mang rlabs par// ma
23a3(rnying rgyud): sgo mji ltar mthong // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' phul pa// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa yi// theg gzhan grub maza' bya bslabs par// mtha' grol blta bsgom mthong bar 'gyur// theg pa ga za da smin
23a4(rnying rgyud): kyis sangs mi rgyas// der ni grub mtha'i dgos pa med// blos brtags chos rnams yongs grol bas// mtha' grol ba lta bsgom chen po mthong // mthong ba'i dus na ngos bzung med// ces gsungs so// nyi zla'i snying po bdud gyi'i rgya mtshol khye
23a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyung las/ theg pa'i grub mtha' ma bsgrubs par lha sbom mthong bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzla pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// gas bsngags brda' yis ji ltar bstan// zhes
23a6(rnying rgyud): zas pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// mahAn ti si ya as b+ho ya d+de tra ya/ gas sngags gnang rnams brda' yis bshad// 'khor rnams ma yengs yid lazung // gu ru badz+ra sarba shrI mar+tha/ ta thA ga ta/ b+hah+ma sarba na ma/ g+har+d+ha ya/
23a7(rnying rgyud): d+harma kA ya/ rat+na ko la ta b+ha li/ as b+ho ya/ su r+ya ma hA la as/ zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro mas brda' chos gsungs pa/ gnam rim pa bcu gsum gyi steng na/ yab rdo rje gtsug+sa padzin bya ba dang / yum sdang srid kyi bdag mo
23b1(rnying rgyud): stong gsal kun sgrol ma bya ba gnyis kyis/ yul mkha' klong kun 'byung yangs pa can gyi pho brang zhes bya bar/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba byas pas/ gnyis su med pa'i byin rlabs las bdud rtsi dkar dmar gyi char nam mkha' la ba'as
23b2(rnying rgyud): pas sems can rnams kyis 'thungs pas mgrin pa'i lamadu brgyud de thugs rje dbyings su thim/ sems can thams cad skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob ste 'gro drug tu mi 'khor te/ skye sha rtsad nas gcod pa'i brda'o// nam mkha'i dbyings nas nyi zla shar/
23b3(rnying rgyud): gti mug ma rig mun pa sangs// zhes gsungs so// nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho khyil pa'i chung las/ steng lha'i 'jig rten du gsang sngags brda' chos su gsungs pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rang sngar
23b4(rnying rgyud): chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// bar du brda' chos gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bar mi'i 'jig rten khams su ma hA gu ru pa dang / ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mas chos gsungs pa/
23b5(rnying rgyud): mahA dro a a/ gnams ga'u kha skor bar snang snang gsal 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya bar/ yab khye'u dang dngas kun rig 'phrul rje btson bya ba dang / yum mdzes ma lhan ne lha ma gsal ba'i 'bar zhes bya ba ste/
23b6(rnying rgyud): yab yum gnyis kyis gnyis su med par sbyang ba'i byin rlabs las bar sdang stong khams gsul ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bskal pa'i me bo che 'bar te/ sngang srid dngos po blos brtags kyi chos thams cad gzhob tu bsregs te/
23b7(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa thams cad sa bon med par brlag nas/ thal ba ni gzugs bsdus dngos po'i chos nas kyu chos blos brtags bya btsal mtha' la zhen pa rnams te/ de dag thams cad bskal pa'i 'thor rlung la bskur bas/ snang srid snang brtags gzung 'dzin
24a1(rnying rgyud): chags sdang gcag kyang ma lus pa rlang pas/ khyer nas sto/ sangs kyis zapa la// de bar snang gsal ba'akhri sbyang na/ sngar gsal 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas gsapa pa'i zla ba shar bas/ gta mug bag chags zla
24a2(rnying rgyud): g.yogs kyi mun pa'i smag du ma thams cad dus gcig tu sangs nas/ de nas rin po che gsal ba'i 'od lnga shar te/ 'od de'i rang bzhin gsal ba la/ spang ba dang dngas te rang bzhin med par 'od snying po la thim mo// de bskal ba dang lA
24a3(rnying rgyud): nams kyis gsang sngags brda'i gnad go ste/ rtogs nas sangs rgyas pas skye shi med par 'khor bar 'khyims mi srid nge rdo rje lta bu'i skur gyur to// de ltar skal ldan gang gis rtogs kyang 'gro drug sems can gyi sdug bsngal gcig kyang mi mang
24a4(rnying rgyud): 'o/ sarba d+harma d+hA tu a a/ dbyings skye pa med par thim mo// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po te zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho khyil pa'i gyad las/ bar mi'i 'jig rten du gsang sngags pa rna sa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
24a5(rnying rgyud): de nas rang snad khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs gol ston pa la/ 'og klu'i yul du brda' chos gsung du gsol// zhes zhus pas// b+ha ra tri tA ma g+ha ra a/ sa rim pa bcu gsum gyi 'og na/ yab srin po dz+wa la rak+Sha dang / yum bdud srin nag mo kun
24a6(rnying rgyud): grol ma gnyis/ yab yum gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i byin rlabs las/ sgor mtshams nas bskal pa'i 'thor rlung chen po byung nas snang srid dngos po rtog tshogs thams cad rlung la bskur te/ rnam rtog nyon mongs kyi rtsi sgrar thams cad gcig
24a7(rnying rgyud): kyang ma lus pa khyer nas/ der snang srid kyi dngos po blos brtags 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gtan med par gyur te/ nam mkha' stong mi mtha' dang dbus med phyogs dang ris med par stong sangs kyis zab lo// rten med nam mkha' la gnas pa'i
24b1(rnying rgyud): bza' chos yin gsungs so// te zlang snying po 'od 'bar ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i klung las/ 'og klu'i 'jig rten du brda 'chos bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rang skad 'od gsal gyis// mu mtha'
24b2(rnying rgyud): krol ston pa la// gnad kyi dgos don gang du 'dus// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gnad kyi dgos don 'du lugs ni// thog mtha' gnyis kyi gnad du 'dus// sngon thog ye yi gnang bstan pa// ye med gting
24b3(rnying rgyud): yangs skye med dbyings// rgyu rkyen skye 'gag med pa ni// thog ma'i gnad du shes par bya// rtsal zer rig pa g.yo 'gyu ni// tha ma'i gnad du shes pa gya// dgos don thog mtha' gnyis med gnad// 'khrul ga nang gzhi la bzlog gnad bu// ma
24b4(rnying rgyud): gan dbu la bu gnad ma// mgu dbyer med dgos don gnad// skang gnad bu la 'khrul gnad ma// snang sems dbyer med dgos don stong // stong gnad ma la dngos gnad bu// stong las kun 'byung dang grol gnad// gnad kyi dgos don dbyer
24b5(rnying rgyud): med 'dus// 'khrul pa'i gnad ni yid rig sems// rig med 'gye med sems med gnad// gnad kyi dgos don 'khrul pa sangs// snang gsal nyi ma'i gnad yin te// 'od gsal zla ba'i gnad yin no// ske lnga yul lnga 'khrul pa'i gnad// 'dzin
24b6(rnying rgyud): med zang thal 'khrul bzlog gnad// srog gnang snying yin gyi gnad kha// de bzhin thog maza' gnyis kyi gnad// gnad kyi dgos don 'khor 'das gnyis// rtogs dang ma rtogs gnyis las gyur// zhes gsungs so// nyi zla'i snying lo bdud
24b7(rnying rgyud): rtse'i rgya mtsho 'khyil po'i rgyud las/ gnad kyi dgos don 'khor 'das gnyis su bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas rang skang 'od gsal gyis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// nyon mongs ma spangs ci ltar grong/
25a1(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyan mongs ma spangs grol lugs ni// gti mug ma spangs chos srur grol// zhe sdang ma spangs longs sgyur grol// 'dod chags ma sbyangs sbal skrar grol
25a2(rnying rgyud): ngargyal ma spangs dbyer med grol// phrag dog ma spangs bde chen grol// zhes gsungs so// dug lngam spangs rang grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// drug
25a3(rnying rgyud): lnga gtan brlag ji ltar bgyi// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dug lnga gtan nas brlag lugs ni// zab par bshad kyis gus par nyon// skye med ka dag rtogs pa yis// gti mug ma rig gtan nas brlag/ 'od
25a4(rnying rgyud): gsal ka dag chos nyid mthong // rang snang rang bzhin sangs rgyas pas// zhe sdang ngo bo gtan nas brlag/ chos nyid gas la gdangs chen por gnas// chags med 'dod chags rang grol bas// 'dod chags zhen pa gtan nas brlang// bde chen
25a5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i klong na gnas// nga rgyal rang bzhin rna ma dag pa'i// che ba'i 'dzin pa gtan nas brlag/ mnyam nyid ye shes chen por gnas// mu mtha' yongs grol gdams ngag gis// phrag dog 'dzin pa gtan nas brlag/ gnyis 'dzin gtan
25a6(rnying rgyud): sangs don rnams grub// drug lnga gtan brlag med yang med// ces gsungs so// nyon mongs dug lnga gtan nas brlag par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas rang sdang lde'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la/
25a7(rnying rgyud): ma rig ka nas ji ltar dag/ ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma rig ka nas dag lugs ni// sngon nas 'thibs pa'i ma rig mun pa la// ye shes snang gsapa nyi ma shar ba yis// ma rig mun pa'i skrag ru ma ka nas dang /
25b1(rnying rgyud): bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i gti mug dang // rang byung 'od gsal chen po'o nyi ma shar// ma reg mun par grub g.yogs ka nas dag/ ces gsungs so// ma rig pa'i sdug rum ka nas dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bdun pa'o//
25b2(rnying rgyud): de nas rang sbrang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// de bdag dug gsum ji ltar bsad// ces zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nga bdag dug gsum bsad lugs ni// zab par bshad kyis 'khor rnams nyon
25b3(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes gshed ma yis// 'gong lor bdag don snying phung // rang byung ye shes chen por gnas// sku gsum dpa' bo chen po yis// nyon mongs dug gsum snying bton nas// sku gsum rgyal ba'i pho brang gdag/ gti mug bas dpas mos
25b4(rnying rgyud): sku mthong // zhe sdang bsad pas longs sku mthong // 'dod chags bsad pas sprul sku mthong // dug gsum bsad pas sgra gsum mthong // zhes gsungs so// ngagadag dug gsum bsad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas rang snang
25b5(rnying rgyud): gye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// sems can sangs ni ji ltar rgya// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ngan rtog grol na sangs rgyas yin// yid 'khrul sangs na sangs rgyas yin// nyon mongs med na sangs
25b6(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin// rnam rtog med na sangs rgyas yin// dug lnga brlagla na sangs rgyas yin// globs grol na sangs rgyas yin// snang grol 'dzin med sangs rgyas yin// zhe 'dod med na sangs rgyas yin// sdug bsngal med na sangs rgyas yin// zhes gsungs
25b7(rnying rgyud): maM// sems can sangs rgyas tshul bstan pa'i le'u skye badru dbu pa'o// / de nas rang sngang khre'u chung gis// mu mtha' yong bkrol ldan pa la// 'khor ba ltar nangasar 'das// rjes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khar la bka' stsal pa/
26a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal grol ni mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba'i 'khrul sdang tshod na mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba'i chags sngang grol ma mya ngan 'das// 'khor ba'i gnyen 'brel spangs na mya ngan 'das// 'khor bdi 'dam nas na
26a2(rnying rgyud): 'das// gzung 'dzin sgrog las grol na mya ngan 'das// 'dzin rtog rtod phur phyin na mya ngan 'das// nyon mongs rgya nas thar na mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog dra bachod na mya ngan 'das// bya btsal zhe 'dod med na mya ngan 'das// zhes gsungs so// 'khor pa'i
