26a3(rnying rgyud): bsngal las grol nas mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// mtshan ma'i dngos po ji ltar grol// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/
26a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i dngos po grol lugs ni// sdang srid stong bcud dngos po kun// rang snar chos nyid dkyings su grol// yul gyi dngos po rang sar dgrol// sdug bsngal mtshan ma dngos med grol// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par grol// sgo lnga zang thal chen po tshwapa//
26a5(rnying rgyud): yul yang badzin zhen med par grol// thams cad rade bzhin dngos med grol// zhes gsungs so// mtshan ma'i dngos po rang sar grol bar bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// / de nas rang snang / khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa
26a6(rnying rgyud): la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i brda' gan gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ma hA gu rba dam pa dang / las kyi mkha' 'phoms gsang ba'i brdad chos gsungs pa// sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshal sdug bsngal
26a7(rnying rgyud): du 'dug pa'i dgra'i srog ma bcad na sangs mi ga'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas rin chen gsal ba'i mkha' 'gro mas las kyi mkha' 'gro ma la zhus pa/ sems can thams cad la gnod pa'i dgra de ni gang lags/ de'i srog tu ji ltar bcad/ dgra de
26b1(rnying rgyud): la rnam grangs du mchis// dgra de'i rtsa ba gang du mchis// dgra de la rdo bo yod dam med/ yod na dgra de'i rdo ba ji ltar 'dul// zhes zhus pa dang / las kyi mkha' 'gro mas lan gsungs pa/ sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tsho ba'i dgra ni ru
26b2(rnying rgyud): lnga lags so// dgra de'i grangs ni nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong lags so// dgra de'i rtsa ba ni 'gong po nga bdag tu 'dus so// dgra de'i jo bo ni ma rig pa zhe 'dod lags so// dgra de'i srog rtswa ni rtse la med par gcod do// zhes gsungs so//
26b3(rnying rgyud): yang rin chen mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ dgra de'i srog rtswa bcad lags sam// zhes zhus pa dang / las kyi mkha' 'gro mas lan gsungs pa/ dgra de'i srog rtsa ni bcad mi dgos te/ dgra de'i rtsa bar bdag chod pas 'chi'o// zhes gsungs so//
26b4(rnying rgyud): yang rin chen mkha' 'gro mas zhus pa/ nga bdag srog rtsa ji ltar bcad// srog gcod pa shan pa gang gis bgyi// srog rtsa bcad thabs ji ltar bcad// dgra de'i jo bo gang gis 'dul// zhes zhus pa dang / las kyi mkha' 'groms bkar stsal pa/ @
26b5(rnying rgyud): de'i srog gcod gshed ma ni// rang byung dang grol bshan pa yis// mu mtha' yas pa'i grogs btsal nas// skye med ka dag dpung brngas te// shes rab ral gri'i mtshon khyer la// mun sngar gnyis kyi so mtshams su// 'phrar gsum bcad nas mkhar grong
26b6(rnying rgyud): nang // yid 'khor gsum gyi khang pa na// dgra bo rab dag 'dug pa la// rang byung dang dngas bshan pa yis// shes rab ral gris ske bcad de// rdo rje lcags kyus snying bton nas// ma rig ngab dag srog bcad pas// skye shi rtsad chod dbyings su thim// ka
26b7(rnying rgyud): dag 'od gsal klong na gnas// sku gsum lhun grub dpa' bo yis// jo bo zhi 'dod srog rtsa bcad// de ltar dgra rnams sreg chod pas// lce med ka ra gzang kar gyur// byar med blo 'das dbyings su thim// chos can rig pa'i mu mtha' krol//
27a1(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gting mtha' yangs pa ste// ming med mna' skangs klong dgyur// zhes gsungasas// mkha' 'grogasang ba'i brda' chos bstan pa'i la'us sa gnas pa da// da nas rang snga wa'u zung gas/
27a2(rnying rgyud): su mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// theg pa'i grub mtha' ji ltar med// ces zhus pas// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs bla med don rtogs na// theg pa'i grub mtha' kun 'das pas// rim dgra'i grub mazang med par bshad/
27a3(rnying rgyud): dri yang de ltar med chen// nyan thos dka' bu 'dul khrims med// rang rtsal bcwal zhugs tshangs spyang med/ thang sems sdo pa bsrung bu med// saM yA'aM khrus dang ga tsung med// sra pa'i drim ga byud mer// ga'i sngags dang rgya
27a4(rnying rgyud): med// yod med cho 'phral rnam bzhi med// ma hA'i ting 'dzin bsnyen bsgrub med// a ru'i dbyings dang ye shes med// e ti'i sdang ba tshos sgra dang // rig pa sangs rgyas btags pa med// yongs rdzogs bla med don rtogs na// rim
27a5(rnying rgyud): grub mtha' dung gis med// ces gsungs so// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa 'don rtogs na/ theg pa'i grub mtha' med par bstan pa'i letra ste nyer gsam pa'o// / de nus dang snar khye'i chung gis/ yu mtha' yongs bral sa
27a6(rnying rgyud): pa la// zod rgal lha sgom je ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / rton pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bla med zod rgal lta sgom ni// don la mtshon brjod las 'das kyang // ma mtshon rtogs par mi 'gyur bas// murma lung gas
27a7(rnying rgyud): glon lta bur bshad// mu mtha' yongs grol lta ba'i rgyal po yin// bu med gting yangs sgom pa'i rgyal po yin// mtha' tshang phyogs bral spyod pa'i rgyal po yin// re med rang gnas 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin// yongs rdzogs zor ma
27b1(rnying rgyud): blta bsgom ldan par 'phags// mu med mtha' yas nam mkha' gling yangs lta ba yin// chos nyid gting grol rgya mtsho grong yangs sgom pa yin// mtha' ljongs phyogs med grang chen smyon pa spyod pa yin// sku gsum snyan grub 'bras bya
27b2(rnying rgyud): po yin// zhes gsungs so// yongs rdzogs bla med kye blta bsgom bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// rig sems yid blang rtsed gcod gang // zhes zhus pa dang /
27b3(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// de dag rtsa ba bcad thabs ni// rig med phye med rtogs pa yis// rig lce 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad// rang byung 'do dngas rtogs pa yis// sems 'khrul chags sdang byed nas bcad// 'gyu med rang zi me na rtogs pas//
27b4(rnying rgyud): yid 'bru'i 'dzin rtog rtsad nas bcad// rig sems yid kyi gzung 'dzin med// 'khrul med blo zad rtog tshogs med// ces gsungs so// sems reg yid blo rtsad nas bcad pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis//
27b5(rnying rgyud): mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// snang ba 'gyu ba kun gzhi yi// grol lugs ji ltar bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// snang 'gyu gzhi gsum grol lugs ni// snang ba dgag bslab mi bya rang sar zhog/ spang
27b6(rnying rgyud): len med pas stang srid rang grol lo// 'gru ba gzung 'dzin mi bya rig pa'i med 'dzin bzang // 'gyu med dang dngas reg pa rang sar grol// kun gzhi skye med dpag chags sgrib g.yogs sangs// snyam byed rtsis gdab me byas nyen por grol// de gsum nyid kyang gcig
27b7(rnying rgyud): tu grol ba ni// snang byed 'gyu med kun gzhi chos nyid klang // zhes gsungs so// snang ba 'grub kun gzhi'i grol lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// sems rig ches
28a1(rnying rgyud): rnams ji ltar yang// ces nus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs thod zha'athar dang // sems na rdzas rnams yang ma yin/ da gnamed pas sems mang// d+hA dang rang
28a2(rnying rgyud): za snyad med pas chos rnams med// dran sems 'khrul pa yin pas sems kyi btags chags med// rig pa 'khrul chu yin pas rig mod skye ba med// theg dgu blo chos yin pas chos med mu bza' grol// rig sems chos gsum med par
28a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u sa nyer bdun pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' mongs grol ston pa la// thog 'jug blta bsgom ji ltar med// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ kun rdzor khrong rgal sgor zhugs nas/
28a4(rnying rgyud): theg pa ma lus yongs rdzogs pas// theg grang ga du 'jug me gos// theg pa ma dgang 'jug pa phred // 'jug pa'i rgo ma sbom zeng// de yang dzi ga med cen// 'ad pa'i rten 'brel bde na gnyis 'jug sa meng // bdag de de ngos zer rgya
28a5(rnying rgyud): bcobargyad med// srapa dz+wa la rten ba zung sems kyi ba med// rigs sasum dag pa rigs su byung gang / med// nga dod shA bras las ngas ni 'dod med/ ni bstor rdzogs gsum thebs bsgom par/ snang srong gnyis mdu dablangs dang ma
28a6(rnying rgyud): med// ces gsungs so// theg pa'i 'jug pa ste sgrom med par bstan pa'i lardA na ting brgyad pa'o// / de nas rang snang khyed glang gis// mu mtha' yongs bral ston pa la// rnam rtog kanas ji skar dag/ ces phus mos/ ston pas/
28a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa'i don rtogs na// chos dbyings gting mtha' yangs pa la// rig pa pu mtha' yongs grol bas// sdig dang rnam tog kanas dag/ dpeng na bskal pa'i 'thong rlung gis/ che sbar ma lus
28b1(rnying rgyud): dag pa zhin// gtang yangs mtha' grol gdams pa yis// zag la mthang rdol ye shes gsal// 'dagasal chos tid don rtogs pas// rnam rtog sgrib pa ka nas dag/ rtse mdang ngas med cang med rtogs// mtshams mar lnga dang mi dag dag/ nyi rdo rje/
28b2(rnying rgyud): ma rab gnas nas// dge sdeg gnyis ka ma spyad pas// rang grol ngan song ste lhung med// gting yang sa snying po'i klong gnas pas// dge sdig gnyis ka ka nas dag/ dper na shel skong dag pa'i nang // smad dug bzang ngan gnyis dag nyan// gting
28b3(rnying rgyud): yangs su mtha' yongs grol bas// rtog sgrib rnam smin ka nas dag/ ces gsungs so// nam rtog sgrib pa ka nas dag par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// bag
28b4(rnying rgyud): gas sgrib pa ji ltar dag/ ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'od gsal ka dag don rtogs pas// bag chags slob pa gtan nas sangs// sems la dngos med sde med pas// bag chags sgrib pa gtan nas sangs//
28b5(rnying rgyud): med ka da ga don rtogs pas// bag chags sgrib pa gtan nas sangs// gzhi la bag chags sgrib med pas// bag chags sgrib pa gtan nas sangs// thig le khong gsal gting gsal bas// bag zabs sgrib pa gtan nas sangs// rang zung 'od
28b6(rnying rgyud): gsal sgrib chags med// rdzas gsungs so// bag chags sgrib pa gzhan nas sangs par bstan pa'i le'u sta sa madz+nyA pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u zung gis// mA mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// gsang sngags brda' yis ji ltar shad//
28b7(rnying rgyud): ces gus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags brda' yi chos bshad kyi// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus par nyon// a b+ho ya hre tra b+ha zi ma e a// snang srid thams cad kyi skye med sngon thog/ khri rje gtsug brtan grags pa bya ba nges// nam
29a1(rnying rgyud): mkhang gos su gyon/ sa gzhi ga dan du bting / skar mnga' zheng la bcings/ na yun mgo la go na/ 'jang tshon rgyal mtshan byas/ g.yas su nyi ma thogs/ g.yon du zla ba zogs/ snang srid nyo bar ma
29a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug gi sems can thams cad kyi snying bton nas zos pas/ lus thams cad bde bas gang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi steng bton nas zos kyang / de thams cad ma shi bar sangs rgyas skang de/ de ngo mtshar che'o// de nas snang srid rnams
29a3(rnying rgyud): mnga' bdag mo/ sems can thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yum srid pa'i rgyal mo/ kun gzhi kun gyi dbang mo che bya ba de las sred pa'i sems can skyes kyang sems can mdadu ma song la/ skyes pa thams cad she yang nyung du masong skad de/ nga ya
29a4(rnying rgyud): pa 'am 'grib pa 'am/ zad pa dang / gdab dang / stongs pa yang med do// de yang shin tu ngo mtshar che'o// yang nam mkha'i dbyings stong gsal gyi lha khang na// dri nod rang gsal gyi khye'u chung bya ba des/ 'od kyi na bza' gsol/ 'a
29a5(rnying rgyud): lngas sa rags byas/ sprin gyi wa gon/ rlung po rkang pas ma nan/ chu gter khar blags/ phyag g.yas su mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor nas/ mthal pa gang skyes thams cad rtser nas bcar/ g.yon du nyi zla'i sgron me thogs nas ma rig pa'i spab ga
29a6(rnying rgyud): bsal/ bdud rtsi'i bcud 'thungs pas snang sring mnyam par sbyar/ nor bu rin po che snying la bcangs pas dgos 'dod thams cad rang las byung skar de shin tu ngo mtshar chen// de yang nam mkha'i dbyings su bltas/ rgya mtsho'i klong du nyal/ nyi zla'i
29a7(rnying rgyud): mtshams su 'dug/ 'od lnga'i nang du bakhregs/ rlung nag 'dzub mas khyed/ ril ma chen 'bar ba'i leT ga sa gcig pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// sangs rgyas thugs dgangs ji
29b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dgongs ni// yongs rdzogs thong rgal zag par 'dus// de yang rnga ltar 'dus shen// sngon thog spyi phung thugs dgangs na// drangs mang gtang gsam
29b2(rnying rgyud): dgongs par 'dus// ye thog ston pa'i thugs dgongs ni// yengs med gting yangs dgongs par 'dus// thog ma'i sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// gnyid mtha' yas la mu mtha' grol// dam pa dang po'i thugs dgongs ni// skye med chos nyid
29b3(rnying rgyud): dgongs par 'dus// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dgongs ni// rang byung 'od gsal dgongs par 'dus// sems dpa' rdo rje'i thugs dgongs ni// dbyings nas rig shar dbyings su grol// ngang dngas khye'u chung dathugs dgongs ni// chos can chos nyid
29b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings su grol// longs sku snang mdzad thugs dgongs ni// dngos med sna tshogs rang bzhin grub pa med// sbrul swa shAka thub thugs dgongs ni// rang bzhin cir yang ma grub pas// chos rnams gang yang yod ma yin// 'das dus sangs rgyas dgongs
29b5(rnying rgyud): yang // rang bzhin stong la ngo bo gas la// de la sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// snying srid 'khor ba'i chos rnams ku ni// rang sar grol nas rang bzhin med// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// 'khor ba'i chos ni 'khrul la ste// 'khrul pa
29b6(rnying rgyud): sangs nas cir ma grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs 'dus pas// sna tshogs gsog snang chos rnams kun// brtags na cir yang med pa la// ma brtags pa na rang bzhin gsal// dga' rab rdo rje'i thugs dgongs ni// ming med mtha' stongs
29b7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams med// ces gsungs so// de nas thun mong ma yin pa// de kho na nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag dra la 'dus pa// snying po lhun grub byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa ni// ye nas dngos po med pa la// rang gsal rang bzhin grub pa med// rgya
30a1(rnying rgyud): gtanams bcang bshAgs// dus gsu ba // ma sa stsang pa// rnam pa ba na ga yang da/ bsang padu/ zung/ shA nang bdags pan// 'du ra
30a2(rnying rgyud): nas dag pa/ gnyis med rangs dpal ba/ byed pa pos mabyas pa/ dz+ha las mazung ba/ rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// dang sa mang cang ming ming med pes// 'angs tsas yang bstan rnyed pa// chog med zod pa'i yul las 'das/ mtha
30a3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi grags dgongs ni// byas pas ma byang sa thas grod dgasal// bas pas ma mdzangs bskas byings dgapa/ kha rnams pas sa na ma rnams kyang nagangs/ btsal bas pa da ma patsal 'ang las thab// srung pas mthol ma spang nag
30a4(rnying rgyud): rdza grol// bsrungs pas mthab ma bsrangs ku nas dag/ spangs pas mi 'ablangs ma spangs rnaM 'i za na// sbyin pas mamangs thab mo med pa zhes// brdabs las mgrub su gsum rang las thub// yang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgangs 'dus pa/
30a5(rnying rgyud): ches dkyibyengs gding mtha' yangs par 'das// chos can ma mtha' yongs bral la// sgra maung ka gzugs dgangs 'dus// ngas me ga ka'i dgangs par 'dus/ zla gang gro 'das dgongs par 'das// chang mad ngangs mang thugs dgongs yin/
30a6(rnying rgyud): bas da sa na ldan ma dpar 'dus/ na nyid na/ gzhi par gyu bzhi da/ yang sa sa nga thal/ snang rang yang dras pa// gshes kyi sa kyi ma nan// se bcas rnas ma dang brnang ba'o// mam bas
30a7(rnying rgyud): pa pag yangams// bad ba gshegs pa bur kyi thugs dgangs ni// bya bcol rtsol bas mi rnyed me byas spyan kyis thAs/ tsal thang 'inings sa 'bre ma btsal nga 'grub/ 'azlas shing bskams pas ma mtha sa gags rapa lags sa/
30b1(rnying rgyud): chos thos brtags rgyas min bur mad gro las 'das// dngos rnams ming med mtha' stangs gru yi yul las 'das// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs dgongs ji ltar 'dus par bstan pa'i lengs so gnyis pa'o//
30b2(rnying rgyud): deras rang snang khye'u chung gis/ lu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// chos rnams la bzla chen po bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas dgongs pa la bzla'i chos bshad kyi// 'khor rnams nyon la
30b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil du chongs// a d+harma sarba d+hA tu hri tra b+ho ya thu la a a/ yongs rdzogs thod rgal chos rnams la bzla 'di// dbang po yang rab thod rgal tshig chod las// kun gyi thun mong men no ma bstan cig/ kun rdzob chos rnams bla med la bzla zhing /
30b4(rnying rgyud): sngon thog ming med chos nyid skye med la// rang byung rang rtsal yan lag rol pa'i chos// blos brtags 'khrul pa yin las la zla bshad// dngos med skye med snying po'i gnas lugs ni// kun gzhi med la rlung dang 'byung lnga med// snying po med la 'od dang
30b5(rnying rgyud): rtsal zer med// shes med rig med ma rig 'khrul pa med// rang bzhin ngo ba thugs rje rnam gsum med// yid 'khor gsum med yid rig sems 'khrul med// 'char sgo 'khrul sgo gzugs lnga sgra lnga med// gsal dngas mi g.yo don snyeng
30b6(rnying rgyud): rnam lnga med// dbang po rnam lnga rnam shes tshogs brgyad med// yan lag lnga dang gzugs rnams dngos po med// dug gsumadug lnga sgo lnga yul lnga med// rig 'khrul rkyen 'khrul glo bur 'khrul pa med// phyi nang yul sems gzung 'dzin
30b7(rnying rgyud): dgag bsgrub med// dgra gnyin chags sdang bdag gzhan ngar 'dzin med// sku dang ye shes ming du 'dogs mkhan med// tshig dang yi ger po don brjod mtshon med// chu 'azas dge sdig gnyis su ston mkhan med// bstan bya ston byang rim dgrar
31a1(rnying rgyud): bcang mkhan meng// chos rnams nyan pashad dngas pang rang bzhin ma// nA rgyan gtan pa zla 'gag 'gro dang mad// 'pha 'drar gnasas zungs rdzogs med// shas dang ma nang rtags dang martags mang // sangs
31a2(rnying rgyud): rgyas sems can 'khor ba myang 'das med/ marig ye shes rnam rtog chos nyid med// lce rgan 'chi gnod gsum chu bzhi med// snang srid sdod bcud zlos brtags lha sgom spyor 'bras gang yang med// lhun rdzogs phrin las rtsol ba byar med de/
31a3(rnying rgyud): bsungs spangs bgrod bsgrubs spangs thob sangs rgyas med// dge sdig mtho ngas ngan song skye gnas med// mang nyung 'phel 'grib snang ba rtags blo ches med// nyams rtags drod dang yon tan sa thob med// 'di sdug longs spyod yin min gnyis ka
31a4(rnying rgyud): med// gzhi med 'khrul med blo yi yul las 'das// ming med bsam brjod dmigs pa'i spyod yul grol// zhes gsungs so// mos rnams ma lus la zlo chen po 'di// blo dman rnams kyis spyod yul ma yin pas// yang rab skal ldan
31a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi thugs la chongs// rtogs shing mngon du gyur na de ltar yin// skal med thol byung kun la bstan gyur na// de don mi rtogs skrag cing skur la 'debs// tshig zhen kha chos don med 'chal pa'i rgyu// kha rdzogs min no chos dang sems su
31a6(rnying rgyud): bsres// ye shes yin no stong gsal mtha' grol 'dis// blo dngos 'dres nas snying po'i klong du nyol// bya ba kun thong rtog med dbyings su sdod / bud med rnal ma snying po'i don la ltos// med pa ma yin gsal zhing rig pa che// yod pa ma yin/
31a7(rnying rgyud): dngos po rang bzhin med// gnyis pa ma yin gnyis med chos nyid don// gong 'og khyad par blo yi tshig don gyis// zhes gsungs so// chos rnams la bzla chen po'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// / de nas rang skar khye'u chung gis/
31b1(rnying rgyud): mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// 'khrul mod blo zad thugs bsngal gang / zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'khrul pa 'argya rtsen d+hang nas tshad// 'khrul med ye shas zugs su bsngal// 'khrul snang 'khor ba chos
31b2(rnying rgyud): rnams la// mi bden rang bzhin stong pa'i phyir// 'khrul tshad chos nyid dbyings su bsngal// de ma yin la der 'dzin pa'o// 'khrul ba'i shes pa rnams chod nas// sdug bsngal sangs pas mya ngan 'das// blo zad chos ting mtha' ru phyin//
31b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul sangs chos nyid phyugs sa bsgral// zhes gsungs so// chos nyid phugs su bsgral bar bstan pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// srid pa lho nas ji ltar bsgyur//
31b4(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// srid pa lto ba star 'di ltar bltar// b+hi phag bya dang sbrul bsang la// me 'bar mtsho skem mun pa bsal// skye med kang gtogs pa yis// skyed pa skye ba med par bstar// ste 'gag
31b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med rang grol bas// srid pa sangs rgyas dgongs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// srid pa lto bskur bstan pa'i leju sa so lnga pa'o// / de nas dang snad khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la/ nyon mongs dmag dpung
31b6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bzlog/ ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' tshul pa// ming med blo las 'das pa yi// mu mtha' yangs grol ston pa la// ste med kang ga dpa' bo mos// nyon mongs dmag dpung dgra rnams bzlog/ snying po ches sku ste med kyis//
31b7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs gti mug dmag dpung bzlog/ rang byung 'od gsal chen po yis// nyon mongs zhe sdang dmag dpung bzlog/ bde chen da dgasal chen po yas// nyon mongs 'dod chags dmag dpung 'azlog/ spros gcod rang grol dpa' bo yis//
32a1(rnying rgyud): sa
32a2(rnying rgyud): ma shes la #
32a3(rnying rgyud): na thos// nig yang shad pa na sa/ shi pa / nga pa nangs/ bya ga bsal
32a4(rnying rgyud): gnas jug rna sa mas #sa pa sagangs pa
32a5(rnying rgyud): mags pas/ pas sa da yang gnas sa
32a6(rnying rgyud): yang zad ma dud pa su ma dgas gnas pachis// many+dzu dgapa sayang zlas// mi shes dag gas sa / la mgrol sa ma dag ma
32a7(rnying rgyud): shid pas midag sa gang ga / nyi sha sa mas pa pa
32b1(rnying rgyud): khyi mi ngagag gro drug g.yangs bcang// rjes gsu 'o// 'gro drugag pangs bcad pa'i ldaT byaso brgyad pa// / de nas rang snar khye'u rgyang gas// mu mna' yongs grol ston pa la// chos rnams ga ldog Na ltar rtogs// zhes gsol pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' du
32b2(rnying rgyud): pa// yongs rdzogs thod rgal theg pa yis// chu 'bras chos rnams go bzlog pas// bskyed gya steng byed med par rtogs// blos brtags chos rnams go bzlog pas// byang med blo 'angs chos nyid rtogs// theg tshu chos rnams go bzlog pas/
32b3(rnying rgyud): rtse bcu 'das yongs rdzogs rtogs// grub mtha' lha sgo mgo bzlog pas// mtshon med bltar med bsgom med rtogs// byas chos rtsol bsgrub go bzlog pas// byar med kun rdzogs zla med nogs// reg pa go bzlog rig med rtogs// yid 'gya go bzlog
32b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyu med dang dngas rtogs// sems kyi go bzlog sems med chags med rtogs// sangs rgyas 'dod las go bzlog sangs rgyas med// ces gsungs so// chos rnams go bzlog gi le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye du chung gas//
32b5(rnying rgyud): mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// dug lnga rnga log ji ltar 'gyur// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dug lnga rnga log sku lngar 'gyur// de yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na// gti mug rnga log chos skur 'gyur// zhe sdang nga
32b6(rnying rgyud): log longs skur 'gyur// 'dod chags rnga log sbrul skur 'gyur/ nga rgyal dza log mnyam pa nyid// phrag dog rnga log bde chen sku// zhes gsungs so// dug ldan log bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye'u chung gis//
32b7(rnying rgyud): mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la/ gsang sngags brda' yis ji ltar bshad// ces zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags bza' yi chos bstan gyis// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pas ton// a b+ho ya d+hi tra a d+ha thi ma ya/
33a1(rnying rgyud): ri mchog rtse nas bsdus pas stang srid thams cad mthong // nyi ma mkha' pa shar na rgyal khams thams cad gsal// a tha stis tha ma hA su kha to/ de nas mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i brda pa gnang bshad// rin chen ska gsal 'od
33a2(rnying rgyud): gsal gyi lha khang na/ lha kun gyi spyi phud nye zla'i me long can bya ba dang / lha mo mdzes ma 'od stong ldan ma gnyis bzang mi byas pas/ snang srid 'khor 'das thams cad nyid de gnyis kyis bskyed de shin tu ngo mtshar che ba'i brda'o// yang skar gsal rnam ngas
33a3(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal gyi lha khang na/ khye'u chung kun rig 'phrul gyi rje 'a'on dam pa dang / lha mo dang dang sa 'od gsal mdzes ma 'od 'bar ma gnyis bza' mi byas nas yab yum gnyis med sbyar ba las/ der yum la sa la rang kun 'od gsal kun mkhyen bya ba sra 'khrungs
33a4(rnying rgyud): pas/ sras des phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshal du phyin pas/ de la mtha' dbus ma rnyed de snang srid 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad spros pa bcad nas/ snying po'i klong du thim pa'i min ngag go// yang sras 'odags pa
33a5(rnying rgyud): kun mkhyen spos gcod kyis/ 'gro sa ma rnyed sngar log ste/ 'jigs pa'i dgra yis khyer gyis dogs nas/ chu 'gul ma byas par yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcangs nas khyim du bsdan pas/ rtsol bska bzhi 'dod bu ma dgos par/ dgos 'dod thams
33a6(rnying rgyud): da shugs las byung / bya ba thams cad btang bas las rnams zin// bya btsal rtsol bslab med pas don rnams khyab/ ye nas don rtogs de dogs rtsad nas bcad// thig la nyag gcig gsang ba'i brdal chos yin// zhes gsungs so// gsang
33a7(rnying rgyud): sngags brdang chos bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// / de nas rang sngar khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i brda' chos gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la brda' chos bshad pa/
33b1(rnying rgyud): snga drag dgu ru ma brtsegs pa'i nang nas rin po che'i gter rnyed/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rang byung dang dngas kyi khye'u chung gis rin po che gser gyi za ma tog tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed nas za ma tog tu bcug ste/ mi 'gyur mi shigs pa'i rgyas btab pa'i ma
33b2(rnying rgyud): dag go// rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'bang ba'i nang na/ rin po che gcig gzhan pas khyad du 'phags te/ de ni snying po mchog gi rin pa chabya ba yid pas/ rin po che sna tshogs de las 'byung ste/ de'i khong du 'dus pa'i san ngag go// mkha' 'phags
33b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i brda'i chos bstan pa'i leT ste zhe gnyis pa'o// / de nas rang skang khye'u rlung gis// ma mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// theg pa'i khad par ji ltar dgye// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ba// yongs rdzogs
33b4(rnying rgyud): thod rgal theg pa ru// theg pa ma lus kun 'dus kyang // 'on kyang re zhag dbye ba bstan// sems can blo yi khyad par las// rab 'bring gsum du rtse bas dgu// yang rab thod rgal tshig chod do// theg pa'i sgo yang de ltar bstan// nyan thos rang
33b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal brang sems gsum// tha ma'i rab 'bring gsum la bsan// kri ya u pa yog gsum// 'bring gi rab zing gsum la bstan// ma hA a nu e ti gsum// rab kyi rab 'brir rnams la bstan// yang rab d+ha Ni log ste// thog rgal yang ti yo
33b6(rnying rgyud): ga'o// dbang po cheg tshong skal ldan la// yongs rdzogs thong rgal bla med bstan// zhes gsungs so// theg pa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste'i gsum pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung dgos// mu mtha' yongs grol rton pa la// de
33b7(rnying rgyud): rnams blta ba ji ltar 'dod// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// theg pa'i rim pa'i lta ba ni// bshad kyis ma yengs gus par nyor// nyan thos lta ba rnam pa gnyis// bye brag sma la'i 'dod lpags ni// snying po'i rang bzhin ma
34a1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas// yan lag zu yi skang rgyal pa// g+ha yul rang sems sas mthong // mthong bas ga par dang sa// g.yag rnan mang lta bung srang / rjepa ma lbubaH// rdul phran ma nga song thag cis rba sngag/
34a2(rnying rgyud): ma rdzogs drug yul 'gegs 'dod// de las rang rtul ltabs 'phags pa ni// phye yi yul yang 'byung brten 'brel snang // nang gi sems cad rten 'aze ma la brdung // bdag med rnam par rig pa med pa 'o 'dod// de las 'phags pa sems
34a3(rnying rgyud): blta ba ni// rnam bden rnam med rnam pa gnyis su 'dod// rnam par bden par 'dod pa'i lta ba ni// rang gi rig pa rgyun gyi rtag pa la// rtog pa skad cig rgyan gyis mi rtag pa// rnam par snang ba sems su bden par 'dod// mtha' bzhi bral bas gzung 'dzin
34a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis song pa// rang rig gsal ba'i ngo bo gcig tu 'dod// sems tsam rnam med pa yi ltab ni// phyi rol sems kyi rnam pa med pa ru// rang rig bden pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo la// de nyid gzhan du brjod du med pa pa// gsal byed gzhan pa ltos pa ci yang med/
34a5(rnying rgyud): dbu ma pa yi lta ba'i/ 'dod lugs ni// sgyu mar 'dod dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'o// sgyu ma lta bu'o lta ba'i 'dod lugs ni// snang sems thams cad sku me tsam du 'dod// kyi yi chos po dag ni thams cad kyang // yang dag par na rang bzhin grub pa
34a6(rnying rgyud): med// 'jig rten 'khor pa'i sdug bsngal snya ma 'dra// brtags shing dpyad na rang bzhin grub pa med// yod dang mi dngang dbus dang dbus ma yin// nyan rdzob chu yi zla ba tsam du 'dor// rnal 'byor spyod pa lta ba'i 'dod lugs ni// chos rnams thams cad
34a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du 'dod// yod med dngos po ci yang 'dod pa med// skong pa la tsab kyang nam mkha' dang 'dra'o// zhes gsungs so// mtsham nyid sde gsum gyi lba ba bsten pa'i le'u sten bzhi pa'o// / de nas rang snar khyed chung gis// mu mthang /
34b1(rnying rgyud): yangs grol ston pa la// the log sngags ma blta ba gang // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gaM ya'i blta ba'i 'dod lugs ni// dngos med snying po ma rtogs pas// yan lag 'di ltar spang ba kun// rigs gsum lha la
34b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dod// don dam dag pa rnam gsum blta// snying po ma rtogs u pa yas// kun rdzob rigs bzhi'i lhang la la// don dam ste 'gag med par 'dod// yo ga'i blta ba'i 'dod lugs ni// snying po ma rtogs yan lag las// kun
34b3(rnying rgyud): rdzob rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor 'dod// rnam shes lnga po rigs lngar 'dod// don dam skye 'gag med par 'dod// ces gsungs so// kri yog ste gsum gyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis//
34b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// de las byeng par 'phags paste/ bre steng rdzogs gsum m+b+hi wA bgang // zhes byas pa dang / stor bas 'khor la bka' sngal ba// ma N+Dal ga'i lwa ba'i 'dar lugasu ni// tsham ting gcing yengs martogs
34b5(rnying rgyud): pas// phyi nang snod bcud snang ba la// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su 'dod// snod ni thags kyi rang bzhin la/ bcud ni shes rab rang bzhin te// thabs ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul// shes rab rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i tshul// thabs shes gnyis su
34b6(rnying rgyud): sdang ba yang // snying stong gnyis med zung 'jug 'dod// de las 'phags pa'i a nu ni// snying po ka dag ma rtogs paso// rtsal gyi yan lag shes pa la// phyi yul chos dbyengs gzhal yas khang // nang bcud lha yi rang bzhin te// de ltar gnyis kyi
34b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med 'dod// de las khyad 'phags a ti ni// gting langs mtha' grol ma rtogs pas// phyi yul chos nyid sdang bar 'dod// skye 'gag 'gyur ba'i shes pa la// rig pa rang thung chos skur 'dod// @#
35a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas // smras pa pa ste/ /
35a2(rnying rgyud): khre'azung zhes// su mthang yongs sol zhen pa la// zag pa dkyilas byung phags pa'i/ la 'di skar lags// nas nus pas/ rlo pa pa na 'asum / dag pa ba pa da /
35a3(rnying rgyud): snang med pazang ngan stan pa dag bzhan yang // spang ba ma 'gags pa bzhin gnas dang// de btid bye ba dag pa/ rdu la bci drug mas/ mtshan la she mtshan yin na ngas/ ni ngams/ na mo
35a4(rnying rgyud): brda pa'i 'a gezhe brdzun pal/ da nas rba gis/ mnang yangs rgya du bapa// mas dpa thugs pasaman pas la sha sa ngag/
35a5(rnying rgyud): yang te yo ga'i lta ba ni// chos nyid gting mthang med pa la// chos can thams cad mu mthang grol// dper nanam mkha' mtha' med las// cho 'phrul snga tshogs mkha' dbyings grol// de bzhin gting mtha' yangs pa la// yan lag reg pas brtags
35a6(rnying rgyud): blang san// lag pa m+b+ha mtha' dbyings ma grol// zhes gsungs so// ya sho lhab bstan pa'i bye skye zhi brgya pa// de ma byang skyed kyi bu rlung gis// mamaH'amangs grobaldan pal// longasardzogs thongan pa lta bgang/
35a7(rnying rgyud): zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bkang sprul pa// snying po mang med mtha'agrol 'di// rlom spyod yul ma yin te// 'on kyang ro zhig 'khor bstar// dngos mi dathun ldan gang mtha'o// rig ma rig byed kyi me dmapa//
35b1(rnying rgyud): kun 'byung ma mtha' grol// rang bzhin ldan gyis grub pa la// rab gsal la dag par grol// de rnams bsdus pa'i blta ba ni// dbyings las kun shar dbyings su grol// dper na nor bu rin chen bzhin// kun dbyung gang yang grub pa med// dgag
35b2(rnying rgyud): med cho 'phrul rang sar grol// zhes gsungs so// yongs rdzogs thod rgal gyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// / de nas rang skar khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// chos rnams zad sar ji ltar bskal// zhes
35b3(rnying rgyud): zlas pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal// chos rnams zangasar bstsal ba ni// dngos med ye gdangs meng med blo las 'das// rang bzhin cang med do bo gsal zhing khyab// glos brtags chos med 'khrul chos zad sar bstsal// sems med reg
35b4(rnying rgyud): med chos rnams zad sa rab stsal// cang med dngos med brjod pa'i yul las 'das// zhes gsungs so// chos med zangs rabastsal ba'i le'u ste lnga ban+d+ha pa'o// / de nas rang snang khyed chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// gsang ba'i
35b5(rnying rgyud): brda' chos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// atha d+ha ti sa ya a/ rgya gar yul gyi pha rol/ srin po'i yul gyi tshur rol na/ de gnyis kyi so mtshams su gyad rtsal po che gcig gis srin po thams cad kyi ske
35b6(rnying rgyud): bcad/ snying bton nas zos pas rgyal khams thams cad bde ba la bkod de/ rgya gar yul du chos kyi char chen po babs pa'i man ngag go// yang dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba na/ dur khrod kyi bdag mo 'bar ma'i gdong can ma bya bas sems can
35b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi srog bcad/ sha zos khrag 'thungs pas 'gro drug g.yangs bcad de/ sems can thams cad mi mngon pa'i dbyings su ye sangs rgyas pa'i man ngag go// yang rin po che stong ldan gyi lha khang na/ shel skra ka dag chen po la 'khor gzi'i
36a1(rnying rgyud): rked dang to ba chadangs rgyas bkar ba'i man ngags/ nas gsungs so// mkha' 'bamags 'a' bdang chos bstan pa'amajug gcig pag// dngas dang drang bya'ang gas// dam nga tha
36a2(rnying rgyud): tho brton pa la// sangs rgyas da spong brda' chos gang // zhes byas pa dang / ston pas 'kho la bka' stsal pa// 'khor rnams ma yengs zhus pa bton// mkha' da byings gsal ba'i 'od khang nas// 'od lnga zung thal du chung pa'i mnangs
36a3(rnying rgyud): yang mun pa'i sdug rum/ grangs pa'i nang du gsal ba la te ma sha rabs mun pa ka nas dag ste/ snang srid thams cad gsal ba'o 'od kyis khengs pa'i man ngag go// yang snang ba'i 'od kyi sku khang dang / mun pa'i 'khor khang chen mo gnyis yod de/ mun pa
36a4(rnying rgyud): zla bcad nas/ ye shes kyi 'cha nabye bas/ snang srid 'jor 'das kyi sems can thams cadas sargyas su 'jigs shing mthong ba'i mad nan/ ni slong brda 'chis bzhin ma la rban gnyis pa'o// / denasapa' rgya gas
36a5(rnying rgyud): mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// mAn ngag brda chos 'astan du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dug ma zos na nad me ldang // sman zos nang dang bral zhing bde dang ldan// rin chen gsal ba'i khye'u chung khyod//
36a6(rnying rgyud): gar yang ma 'gro dbyings su zhol// ci yang ma bye dngal bar rjod // sgra brjod na mar kha dog 'dug/ tshogs lam dga' gzig sar bsgom// 'khor yul chags sdang 'brel bachod// zang zing 'dra 'dzi kun por la// gcig grwar ra khro da
36a7(rnying rgyud): par sgoms// bsgom du med kyis bya med dbyings su nyal// sbyang du med kyis lam ngal bar 'du// bslab tha med kyis da dal// Tu 'bras 'das so pa badz+ra chos min b+hang me d+mo 'das ltos/ sngar 'dags chos min ming med
36b1(rnying rgyud): sa// rnam da dgas pa 'phrul pa mi ma byung/ 'ab gas ga sa shAng nga// gangams pa gdung sa nas pa sas// sa ba// kyang ga su gsatagasasapa da
36b2(rnying rgyud): ga ma pa// rang+ya ga gan kyi bdu sa rnas pazlas pa'i 'i Sh+Ta/ gus mye / danas rgya ngas/ tha seM ba mngasas pazhin pal// ga sa/
36b3(rnying rgyud): spyo pas 'khyo la bka' stsal la// songs rigs kyang rgyal ma hU~M/ chos hU~M ga tu la ma ma na nags pas// rjebyabargya ma sangs sel bar bad la zen// ga
36b4(rnying rgyud): du ma spyod cid / bral rtogs pas ma spangs pas// ba pa chen pa 'bri' bar bshad// rdzas gsangams// dag sa / da yang da bye'u ma gas// rgyam ma
36b5(rnying rgyud): skyon pa la// dge bcum lhung byang chub gang // zhes nus pas/ sten pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// mongs rdzogs zla med sgo grags nas// chos dbyings slong dganas pa'i rgyur// dge brgyam snang byang chub thab// de yang ji ltar thob chen// sa
36b6(rnying rgyud): nyid gting yangs snying po'i klong gnas pas// mtshan bcas chos spyod dang du me len te// b+h+yAms pa phyogs med ming rje kun la khyab// ka dag mu mtha' yongs grol don rtogs pas// dge ba rnam sbyang byang chub thob// ces gsungs so// dge brgya ma sprad par
36b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas par bstan pa'i le'u zhing lnga pa'o// / de nas rang sngang khye chung gis// mu mna' yongs sul ga rab la// tshogs bsags smon la la la bad pang // yang dag sangs kyis ji lta thob// ces byas pas/ ston pas 'khong la bka'
37a1(rnying rgyud): gsanan ma sa
37a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzum tshogs gsag sngon ma nga // yang dag rnams sa rgyas 'thog/ sa gsungasas// na tshog rdzogs sa mas pang pa ma sa 'thos par 'as pa'i 'jaga'adas
37a3(rnying rgyud): mthar pa 'ol ga pal// dab pa yan bas bza bar// sa rbamasabs/ sabab bag /
37a4(rnying rgyud): rang phrar 'od gsal chen po'i lha tshogs bzhugs// chos can srid 'khor ba'i sems can la// rig pa bu mtha' longs grol dbang bda' bas// dngos thab 'anas 'o// rdeg pa rig pa dkyis la dzang mthugs shing // bya btsal zha'ang
37a5(rnying rgyud): dbang bkur mthus par// rting ba gror yangs rgyas ti dkyil 'khor // blon thog skyes pas rten pa dag bzhugs// bram tshogs rdzas kyi dbang rnamapa bzu bar// nga dbang shes 'i ba dngas mdang po grabasas par ma
37a6(rnying rgyud): mdzem ma spang pa don rtogs pas// zhe 'dong dbar nga spang ma byas chos lnga thob// zas gsungs sa/ 'khor skang bang ma ka bar zhing po chos lda po 'dud med pa' 'bras bu so par bstan pa'i wa wa ste 'dun pa// / sa
37a7(rnying rgyud): rungags// sram ba mang mthal snyan pal// gyi sangs kar bal// zhes byamasapas mes pa 'dang stsal pa/ da pa pa rdzogs ca na zhadas pa tha cad 'drum/
37b1(rnying rgyud): thig 'og bya rtsol rgyud rnams btul// nyi zla'i snying po'i rgyud chen gyis// gti muka ma rig rgyud kun btal// 'od 'bar ka dag cud cheran gyis// bag chags sgrib g.yogs chud rnams btul// bdud rtsi'i rtsa mtsho'i rgyung chen gyis// nyon mongs dug lnga'i rgyung
37b2(rnying rgyud): rnams btul// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal pos gzhan btul tshul bstan pa'i le'u snang ba rgyad pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// nyi zla'i snying po'i dbo don gang // zhes zhus pas/
37b3(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyi bla'i snying po'i dpe don ni// dper na nyi ma'i snying po yis// snying po sa gar khyab 'od kyis khyab// ri rab rtse nas nyi shar bas// 'od kyis rgyal khams snang srid gsal// gsal yang snying po bltar mi mthong //
37b4(rnying rgyud): zhin sems can thams cad la// sems kyis gar khyab snying pos khyab// snying pos gar khyab sems kyis khyab// 'gro drug sems can thams cad la// rang rig 'od gsal kun ldan yang // sems kyi rang bzhin mthong ba med// rtogs ma rtogs
37b5(rnying rgyud): kyis 'khor 'das gnyis// ma rig ye shes rnam gnyis las// rang byung ye shes 'od gsal ba// ma rig gti mug ka nas dag/ bag chags sgrib g.yogs mun pasangs// ka dag sangs rgyas dgongs par gnas// snang gsal nyi ma'i dpe yis ni//
37b6(rnying rgyud): gsal dag ma reg mun pa sangs// skye med ka dag dgongs pa'o// 'od gas la zla ba'i rgyud kyis ni// gti mug bag chags sgrib pa sangs// rang byung 'od gsal dgongs par gnas// nyi zla'i snying po mthong ba med pa bzhin// sems nyid snying po dngos
37b7(rnying rgyud): po med// dngos por ma mthong ba ni 'od gsal nyid// ces gsungs so// nyi zla'i dbedo na bstan pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o// / de nas rang sdang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dpes mtshon
38a1(rnying rgyud): te// gdams ngag bdud rtsi'i ltar 'khyil// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// thog mar rgya mtsho'i dpes bstan nas// dper na bdud rtsi'i mtshor 'khyil bas// gang 'thungs nad 'gron skye 'chi med/
38a2(rnying rgyud): ltar gyur kyang rgya mdzod// zer pa med cing 'phel ba med// gang ba med cing stongs pa med// ces gsungs so// dpe bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// / de nas dang sdang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs zol ston pa la// dpe mtshan
38a3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi ji ltar 'khyil// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs thod rgal bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshon// rjes te gtir mtha' med pa'i ni mtsho dang // chos ca ni rig pa mtha' mo la bdud rtsi dang // grol gyur mtshan sa sa
38a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa'i bdud rtsi'o// de las dang po chos nyid kha gter du// med pa'i gdams ngag bdud rtsi bstan pa ni// sna tshogs snang ba ye med dngos po med// dngos med gtid gsal khags la snying por grol// gshis kyi gnas lugs nges pa dmapa
38a5(rnying rgyud): nyid// thog mtha'i ming med blo 'das mtshon du med// skye med ka dag dngos med zang ka ma// so ma rnal ma rang 'khrungs ye nas grub// ye sangs ye rgyas ye zin yi rdzogs so// ming med mtha' stobs bsam brjod dmigs yul grol// zhes
38a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// chos nyid mu med gting yangs rgya mtshor 'khyil pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o// / de nas rang sngang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// chos can rig pa'i mu mthar rnams// yongs grol bdud rtsi'i rtsa
38a7(rnying rgyud): mcho gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dug gsum 'phrang lcags dgra gsum bsad// snang gsum gtan dbang rjod gsum bzhugs// dgra gsum bsad la mkhar gsum bsung // phur mkhan snying bton nas ma/ kha shapa/
38b1(rnying rgyud): 'odon gdams ngag stan pa ni// 'phrar gsum 'das dang da lta phyis// dgra gsum yid rig sems dang gsum// rang snang rang bzhin dang grol gsum// lce med ka dag blo 'das rjong // dug gsum daza bsar su gsum mkhar// nga bdag zhe 'dod ga cu
38b2(rnying rgyud): 'jed pon// chos nyid skye med dbyings su nyol// zhes gsungs so// de nas chos can grol lugs ni// skang srid sna tshogs snang ba la// gnas lugs snang tshul gro la lugs gsum// gnas lugs snying po gting mtha' yas// kye med ka dag go
38b3(rnying rgyud): las 'das// sdang tshul yul gyi sdang lugs la// rang sdang rang bzhin rang so gsum/ de la zol lugs rnam gsum ste// rang skang ma bkag ma zhen rang sar grol// snang ba'i rang bzhin dbye bas la med par grol// rig pa sems kyi grol lugs
38b4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni// rig med 'gyu med sems med dang dngas su// zhen 'dzin thams cad ka dag chen por grol// chos can grol bas chos nyid bdud rtsir 'khyil// snang ba rang sar grol na chos dbyings 'dud rtsir 'khyil// kun gzhi rang sar grol na bdud rtsi rgya mtshor
38b5(rnying rgyud): sa das sa// rna // zu phyin pa nas pa ni/
38b6(rnying rgyud): 'khyib// zhes byas pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// skye med chos nyid bdud rtsi yis// snying po klong gyur mngon sangs rgyas// gtid yangs don ci bdud rtsi yis// chos nyid dbyings su mngon sangs rgyas// snying po ka dag bdud rtsi yis//
38b7(rnying rgyud): skye med chos srur mngon sangs rgyas// sngon nas rang sems sangs rgyas te// don rtogs klong gyur mngon sangs rgyas// zhes gsungs so// snying po krod gyur mngon sangs rgyas pa'i bdud rtsi rgya mtshor 'khril pa'i le'u sker gsum pa'o// / de na
39a1(rnying rgyud): rang snang gye'u byung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// yangs rdzogs bla med theg pa la// galas sgrib pa yong dam med// ces rnas pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' phrul pa// yongs rdzogs zad nas dan
39a2(rnying rgyud): nogs na// golas sgrib pa 'khrelas med// ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor gyis yang gus pa// de martogs kyi gang zag la// gr-i las sgrib pa ji ltar 'byung // zhes nus pas/ sbron pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// gol ni nyis
39a3(rnying rgyud): brgya yod// dbyebs ma rdzogs gsum du 'dus// snying po martogs go lus 'byung // kangadag martogs sgrib pas bsgribs// rangs mtshan 'gro drug 'khrul// zhes gsungs so// yongs rdzogs martogs pal gol sgrub bstan par le'u khye bzhi
39a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// gol sgrib 'khrul pa ji ltar bcad// ces zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// chos nyid snying po ma rtogs go las yang // gting yang
39a5(rnying rgyud): snying po'i don rtogs go las med// ka dag ma rtogs sgrib pas bsgribs pa yang // 'od gsal dngos po'i don rtogs pa sgrib tu med// sgo lnga 'khyams pas 'khrul par gyur pa yang // lce med rangs zin pas 'khrul rtsa chod// lta ba spyod pa la sogs
39a6(rnying rgyud): gol sa yang // zhe 'dod phyogs dang bral sa med// nyan thos la sogs theg pa'i sgrib pa yang // kun rdzogs bla med don rtogs sgrib pa med// 'gro drug 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i 'khrul pa yang // mtha' gro la yid rtsad chod pas 'khrul
39a7(rnying rgyud): du med// ces gsungs so// gol sgrib 'khrul pa rtsad nas bcad pa'i le'u ske re lnga pa'o// / de nas rang ljang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol rton pa la// gol sgrib la bzla ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston
39b1(rnying rgyud): pa bka' ma pa/ sang jugs pa ga pa da gas sa/ khyog pa sang ba ban/ da pa dgasan/ spyo ma ba ba nan/ mas ma danags// mang ma
39b2(rnying rgyud): gdag don rtags na// lugs ma med pa la brtan// dug lnga kang gdon nags na// sgra lnga med pa la ban+d+ha'aM// gtir yangs mu mthar bu dgos don nags na// mau me sde 'das chen por po bzla'o// rang sems dngas med chos ma
39b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas zhing khams la brgya'o// theg cos theb mtha' meng de'i don rtags ni// bas ma brjod dmigs las 'das par la bzung // sems rag sa ngas rgyas med pa'i don rtogs de// rdza zad 'azhal sang bzhi 'ad meng par la ba/
39b4(rnying rgyud): sgrol spyong 'bras nyams rgyags me nags na// byang med rtsal thal rnal sa mangs par la na// zhes gsungasas// rgyal bal rdza la gas ral bzla pa'i le' dag pa/ [।]/ de das rang snang ze chang gas// mu man+ta
39b5(rnying rgyud): yongs grol ston pa la// snying po dor myig dmas pagang // zhes byas pa dang / ston pas 'khyong la bka' stsal pa// skang po don gyi gdams dag 'di/ la ldan thugs kyi dkyil du dzangs// snying mo meng ming gting mtha' yas// @
39b6(rnying rgyud): skye med mu mtha' zol// dngos med blo yi spyod yul grol// zhes gsungs so// snying po don gyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ster bdun pa'o// / de nas rang snad khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol lton pa la// bdud rtsi
39b7(rnying rgyud): bzung thigs rnam gsum gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bdud rtse brgyad thigs rnam gsum 'di// gsal dag rin chen thugs la chongs// chos nyid rgya mtsho'i klong nas ma spangs bdud rtsi'i brgyar thegs pas
40a1(rnying rgyud): ti las ter shar nga nyid dang dgral// bla med rgya mtsha'agar nas bdu rtso bzung thigs pas// dang lta 'dugs pa chen po dbyangs pa thal/ sa can sna gyung nas bdang rdzogs papa/
40a2(rnying rgyud): spangs ma bsgrubs ces ga ba med par grol// rjes gsungs so// bdud rtsi brgyad thigs rnam gsum skal ldan la zegs pa'i la'u sor brtad pa'o// / de nas rang snang khyi'i chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol son pa la// gdams
40a3(rnying rgyud): ngag rtsa ba'i bka' tshoms rnam gsum gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ gal 'gegs 'phrang ga nad rtsa ba'i chos gsum ni// nga yi rang bzhin ci yang med pa la// nga yi mtshan nyid sna tshogs cir yang shar// shar tsam
40a4(rnying rgyud): nyid nas sna tshogs rang sa grol// zhes gsungs so// gdams ngas rtsa ba'i tshom bu bstan pa'i le'u ster dgu pa'o// / de nas rang sngang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol rton pa la// rgol rtsod smra ba'i mtshon cha gang // zhes zhus pa dang
40a5(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// smra ba'i mtshon cha bskor ba'i thabs// 'khor rnams ma yengs gus pa nyon// s+ye ti yang ti thong rgal la// theg pa dgra yi dgra rong ste// a ti nas ni nyan thos par// grub mni' mi mthun ga/ med pas// de dga'i
40a6(rnying rgyud): rgol babyung ba na// dang po pa can po mkhar du brtsigs// de nas mi 'jigs dpa' bo btang // de nas sa pa'i go cha btsal// de nas rno ba'i mtshon thogs la// theg dgu rtsod pa 'dri ba'i tshe// pha rol grub mtha' chab tu gzhug/ dpa' bo bzhag la btsan mkhar/
40a7(rnying rgyud): bsrungs// phang la sems 'di yod med 'dre// yod na gzugs dang 'a dog 'dre// gal te med do zhes sman// sems 'di ye nas med par// sna tshogs sems can gang las byung // yid las byung res zer ba na// med par 'dod pa nyams par
40b1(rnying rgyud): denas 'gyur med 'phrang du gzhug/ chas gsungs so// mtshan cha'i 'khar la dang po bstan pa'i le'u sna bdun cu pa'o// / nga nas rang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yangs gro lon pa la// 'khor lo gnyis pa ji ltar
40b2(rnying rgyud): khrus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// 'a yi ro bo dngos po med pa la// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs rang sdang ba'o// 'di ltar gyi nang snang ba'i yul rnams la// nyan thos rdul phran gzung 'dzin gnyis su 'am// rang rgyal rten 'brel rnam
40b3(rnying rgyud): par rig byed kyis// rdul med yul gyi rnam pa stong par 'dod// de las sems tsam pa yis brgal ba ni// yul sdang thams cad sems las ma 'das te// dkar dmar sna tshogs sems nyid spang ba'o// de la dasnum pa yis brgal ba de/
40b4(rnying rgyud): phyi rol sna tshogs sems las log pa ste/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin lha ma'i dpe brgyad pas// de la brtags shing dpyad pas rang bzhin med// de la phyegyi chung gri ya bas brgal ba// phyi rol sdang ba rigs gsum lha ru sbar// den ma rang bzhin dag pa
40b5(rnying rgyud): chos nyid blta// u pA ya la lta ba gzhung tshugs med// de la yog pa yis brgal ba ni// 'di ltar snang ba kun rdzob rigs lnga lha// don dam lho 'gag med par 'dod pa yin// gyi mung gsum pas na de rgyud khyad 'phags pa// bste
40b6(rnying rgyud): ma hA logs snang srid 'di// snang ba ma 'gags lha dang lha mor sbyar// thabs kyi rang bzhin bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshul// lha rnams snang la rang bzhin med par 'dod// shes rab rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i ngam pa la// don dam rang bzhin sa stong dargya
40b7(rnying rgyud): 'dod// de la a nu yogs brgal ba ni// snang pa lha dang lha mor mi 'dod de// chos kyi dbyings la rig pa ye shes snang // don dam dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med blta// de rnams man zang a ti gsum banon pa// rgya btsal rtsol bkrungs
41a1(rnying rgyud): nas ka na la ba gru la 'gas na yong rdzun mams pa smra nga gas// ra ga jums
41a2(rnying rgyud): bas nam mkha'i mtha' ni 'tshal dang 'dra// bskal ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas 'thob pa min// zhes gsungs so// theg pa bgyid sun 'byin par bstan pa'i le'u sa don gcig pa'o// / do nas rang skad lce'u chung gis// mu mtha
41a3(rnying rgyud): yongs grol ston pa la// a ti s+ye ti'i khyad par gang // de gnyis rtsod pa ji ltar bgyi// a hes s+yai til rgol bar// sba ba'i mtshon cha ji ltar bskor// zhes nus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// a ti yo ga rnal 'gyur bas/
41a4(rnying rgyud): b+hi'i thag pa lnga 'job// theg pa dkyil ma gnags pa'i/ skye sgos brtags ma man nas// seMn dang ya ati dang // sbyi khyang par gang gis thugs// zhes pa ma thas brgal ba la// rkyen 'dzin pas lan smras pa// sems gro'ang ma zad pa /
41a5(rnying rgyud): zag pa zad pa med par gsungs// nyon mongs brgyad zhib na skar gi/ gnyen por chas skad snyed gsungs/ grol rab 'bring rnam pa gsum/ de las gsum gsum sde bas dgra// de la theg pa dgu ru gsungs// dbang ba yang rab zod rgal la/
41a6(rnying rgyud): yang ti thod rgal bstan/ blo zang yod kyir theg khyang yong // zlom dang khrul tshang sangs pa na// theg pa med cing 'jug pa med// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'gyur la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bu rag nas// gnas la rtsibs ngag yin te// ngas
41a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdams ngag gcig nas 'byung // gcin zo sbyite yog yin// sbyini theg pa'i dbyings phyung ba// haM yis kun gyi/ he ka stan// ya na wa spyod zung 'brel na/ g.yis rang gnas tshig zong bstan/ skom gang
41b1(rnying rgyud): snang pa 'bras thang ltar spyug// 'di ltar snang brda ltar 'dod// chos dang sangs rgyas yong dam med// dmyal pA yi dgas tsal zer// thog ma sems 'di yong dam mad// myed du sems canag las dang // yang na dus ngas gnas//
41b2(rnying rgyud): kyis sems can namang gnyis// de gnyis gzhi la gcig mi gcig/ gcig na 'khor 'das ji ltar 'byung // mig cig 'brel pa med par 'gyur// 'brel med bsgrubs pa don med 'gyur/ kye ma las ni mad bzhin no// 'brel pa yodan
41b3(rnying rgyud): 'grel gnyis brtags// dang po bdag nyid gcig pAH// 'jal banas 'khrul med pan tshun dag pa// dedang de las byung 'bral na// sangs nis las ni sems can nam// sems can las na sangs rgyas byung // dang po ltar na ma 'khrul
41b4(rnying rgyud): sangs nas pa yang ngan ma 'gyur// gnyis ba ltar nanan sangs rgyas// dab ba meng par thong bar nal// yang na ma zhal rtag can du gyur// gzhil phrul pa yong dam med// yid ngos la par byeng ba na// rjes pas
41b5(rnying rgyud): snangs ngas miH// gzil 'khrul pa med pa nA// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dgas// gzhil 'khrul pa med pa la/ gle byang 'khrul pa byung zad na// rnam mkha'i sprin ltar rang sangs dgas// thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur// khyod
41b6(rnying rgyud): A ti'i lha ba// rig pa chos spang 'dod mi 'dod// snang ba chos slar 'jod mi dza/ sgom da 'dras d+hun// de nas bdag gis khang bzhin gyis// zhes pa la 'a dra bar za// zhes gsungs sa// phar la rdzong zlogarjes pa'i la
41b7(rnying rgyud): ste don gnyis pa'o// / de nas rang snga khwa'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// a Nang spa ba'i mtshon chag // zhes zhus pas/ ston pas 'khor pa bka' stsal pa// da la a ti'i 'dod gzhung ni// yoM gzhi ldan
42a1(rnying rgyud): grub kyi med pas// kadag lhan thapa gnyis sru da// sgrub snang mad rgyas snang ba// / rnam pa snang ba'i dngal bskus// sdud pa mal 'a ba bla// 'bas nar dgas ma dpang bsgru // dag pa ma sangs rgyas pang
42a2(rnying rgyud): snang ba chos nyid zhing khams yin// zhes gsungs pa dang / de la s+thi ti'i mtshan gyis brdeg/ khyod kyi yo med sngon rol na// gzhi la lhun grub yod pa'i phyir// rgya chang phyogs lcang gyon du 'gyur// thog ma gzhi la ming med la// kyad lagazho la ming 'a
42a3(rnying rgyud): ming med dam bca' nyams par 'gyur// yang ni khyod kyi gzhi da ka dag na// nag po ma dag nyid du 'gyur// ye shes ka dgu ma rig bcas// khyod kyi lta ba chos su na// chos su 'dus byas yin nam min// yin nang dus byas 'jig pa
42a4(rnying rgyud): chos su kye 'jig can du 'gyur// min na sdang ba 'jig pa dang // chos sku mi 'jig mngon du 'gal// rig pa sangs rgyas yin nam min// rig pa sangs rgyas yin zer na// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'gyur mi 'gyur// de ni 'gyur ba med chen// khyod kyi ngag
42a5(rnying rgyud): rig pa de// snga ma 'gags la phyi mar 'gyur// rig pa skye 'gag 'gyur ba'i phyir// 'gyur ba med dang mngon sum 'ag la// 'gyur ldog yod do zhes zer na// sangs rgyas sems can du 'gyur bas// rig pa sangs rgyas yin na nyams// yang
42a6(rnying rgyud): na rig pa rang byung ye shes na// bsgom dus rig pa skyon mi skyon// gal te mi ston pang 'dod na// stong pa'i dang bsgom dz+nyAn dang dgal// spyod 'bras la sogs dgos pa med// nyon med tshe tshad nad du 'gyur// gal te rig pa smon pa na// rang byung
42a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyams par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// a ting sme ba'i mtshon cha'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa // de nas dang sdang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs bras ston pa la// a tis su ting dri ba yis//
42b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshon cha ji ltar bskor// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// a te sa s+thi ti la lba ba// nga yi 'dod gzhung de ltar na// de las khyod kyis khyod dpogs dang // khyod kyi s+thi ti'i rang gzhung gis// thog ma'i dus na ji ltar 'dod//
42b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can rnam pa gnyis// de gnyis gzhi la gcig nyid dam// mi gcig zer na 'bel med dam// gzhi de mnyam mam bzang ngan yod// gzhi la 'khrul pa yod dam med// med na glo bur pa yin na// sems dang rig pa yod dam med// mad
42b3(rnying rgyud): na sems can gang nas byung // thig chos grub mtha' yod dam med// yod na blos brtags tha snyad yin// med na thos bsam dgos pa med// sangs rgyas bya ba yod dam med// yod na sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs// dmyal ba yi dgas yod dam med// /
42b4(rnying rgyud): yod na dmyal ba ston dang yi// mad na sdig pas gang la gnod// khyod nyid lta sgrom ji ltar 'dod// ces pa a tis dris pa dang // dang sbyang khye'u chung gis smras pa// rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di ltar bskor// mi phigs sra ba'i go cha gon// mi phebs btsan pa
42b5(rnying rgyud): rdzong bzhugs nas// lung dang rigs pa'i mtshon chas brdeg/ khyod kyis ngal 'dI ba las// thog ma'i dus na gnas lugs de// chos nyid gzhi la 'dri ba'am// tron te chos can rtsal la 'dra// drang po lta na lce thog ma// sgron rol ming ma
42b6(rnying rgyud): thogs pa la// gting yangs blo laM yul las grol// skye med mtshon brjod dmigs las 'das// sangs rgyas sems can rnam pa gnyis// gzhi la gcig mi gcig 'dri ba// ngo ba mtshan nyid gang la 'dri// ngo bo ltar na de gnyis gcig
42b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dus kyi kun ga zhi kyog gi ma tshan nyid rtogs ma rtogs kyis gnyis// gzhi la bzang ngan 'dri ba de// rtags dang martogs gang la 'dri// ma rtogs sgrol bzang ngan snang // gzhil 'khrul pa yod med ni// chos nyid gzhi la 'khrul pa me//
43a1(rnying rgyud): dper na shel sgong drung dag tu// dkar nag sman dug gang bstan snang // shel la gang yang grub pa med// de bzhin skye med snying po la// rtsal zer 'khrul pa cing snang yang // gzhi la ma grub ka nas dag/ 'khrul pa gzhi la med
43a2(rnying rgyud): par bcad// rig pa rtsal lam ma 'gags par// sna tshogs cing yang 'chang bar snang // sems rig yod med 'dri ba ni// rtogs dang ma rtogs gang la 'dri// dang po ltar na gang yang med// ngang dang garang sar brlag pa'o// rtogs sgol
43a3(rnying rgyud): na// snang srid sems can thams cad la// yid rig sems gsum kun la khyab// sems can gang khyab sems rig yod// theg chos grub mtha' yod med de// sangs rgyas dgongs pa la 'dri 'am// 'on te sems can rgol 'di// sangs
43a4(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i klong gnas na// theg chos grub pa'i blo yang med// ci phyir sangs rgyas dgongs pa de// blo 'das rtsis gdab med pas so// sems can blo yi do gang la// theg chos grub mtha' bsam mi khyab// dri srid sems can blo yod par//
43a5(rnying rgyud): ka pa sna tshogs grub mtha' yod// sangs rgyas yod dam 'dri ba de// chos nyid gting mtha' med pa dang // chos can ngo gcig gang la 'dri// chos nyid gzhi la 'dri ba na// sangs rgyas med pas ming yang med// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin pas gzhan na
43a6(rnying rgyud): da// chos can dro la 'dri ba na// ma 'gags rol pa sna tshogs la// sangs rgyas yod pa ltar yang snang // sreg tog gzhung yin gong la med// dmyal ba yi dgas yod med de// rtogs pa'i rol 'dri ba na// dmyal ba med pas sdug bsngal
43a7(rnying rgyud): med// ma rtogs pa yi ngo la ni// sdig pas dmyal ba ltar yang snang // spyi ti'i lha sgom dri ba de// nga yi rang bzhin ming mid blo 'das kyang // re zhig khyod la lta sgom bstan par bya// zhe 'dod gtad med phyogs bral lta ba'i rgyal po yin// dngos
43b1(rnying rgyud): med gza' gtad med pa sgom pa'i rgyal po yin// zang ka rnal ma so ma gtad med spyod pa'i rgyal po yin// dun chung rang gnas re med 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin// zhes gsungs so// s+thi ti zla ba'i mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o//
43b2(rnying rgyud): de nas dang snang khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// snying po don gyi ro sprod gang // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// don gyi ngo spod thig le mthong brtol nas// zang thal gsang lam chen po'i man ngag la// rang
43b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin snying po'i gnas lugs dang // rtogs lugs yin lugs ngo skrod dang // gdams ngag rtsa tshams gsum gsum ste// ye med gting yangs chos kyu dang // ye gdangs rang byung dang dngas dang // rang gsal dag pa'i khye'u chung rnams// rang gsal chos
43b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings 'od khang du// 'di 'bral med pa'ang spyod ni// rtse tshems dazang gan ga la 'gags bzhi// sprin ma bzhi mar slad ste// dper na mun par gser stong ba// btsal bas me rnyed glon mes rnyed// de bzhin mngog mun pa'i nang // snying du dan TI
43b5(rnying rgyud): gser stor pa// gzhan min sgron ma bzhi yis rnyed// de la sgron ma rnam pa bzhi// rang gsal sems kyi sgron ma dang // rtogs pa ye shes sgron ma dang // rang byung dang dngas sgron ma dang // snying po ches nyid sgron ma'o// sgron ma bzhi yis ngo sprad de// snying
43b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin dngos med la// de nyid lha tshogs rtogs par shing // shang tsam nyid na rang sa dgrol// maung med gting mtha' yongs grol ba// chos kyi dbyings su mngon sangs rgyas// snying pa grang thung gzhi la khyim// dbyer med gdeng ljin lakhrul pa
43b7(rnying rgyud): sangs// ka dag snying po'i grong nas shing // zhes gsungs sa// snying pa'i nga spod bstan pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// / de nas rang skang khyer chung gis// pra mtha' yangs grol ston pa la// gseng mdzod lnga yi wa lnga la// lde mig swa ya
44a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ nas rnas pa dang / na pas lab 'astsal pa// nan da gsang pa pa// nal bslang ba mas pad// dag thog brgya gsang 'dal// la brgyabasalas sa/
44a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs gnyis kyi gas mdzad pa// thabs kyi snong de 'is babyed// rdzogs pa 'i gsang badzad pa// 'jigs byab pa'i rnams bcad// s+thi ti yang tu'i gsang mdza ga// gdapog pa'i byams mas bcad// gsang pa ni sngags byeb na/
44a3(rnying rgyud): don gyi gtor dang 'phrad// shes rab 'phrul gyi lde mog gis// spyod pa'i 'dren no phye ba yis// mtshan nyid sde gsum chos rnams shes// dag byed mngon pa'i lde mig gis// bya ba tsal rtsol bsgrub rko rtse bas// rigs gsum rigs lha'i lha tshogs mthong // thabs
44a4(rnying rgyud): lag sa da zhisas rtsi b.las yong bzhigamazhes kyi ma sadapabazhis sa pa
44a5(rnying rgyud): kha rdzogs phyal ba'i sgo bye bas// sdang srid chos su sangs rgyas mthong // sdang gsal zang thal lde mig gis// gzhi thog kha 'byams sgo bye bas// skye med ka dag chos sku mthong // gsang mdzod lnga yi sgo phye bas// nges pa don gyi chos lnga shes// zhes gsungs pa/
44a6(rnying rgyud): gsang mdzod lnga'i sgo lpags la 'phrul gyi lde mig lngas dbye ba'i le'u ste don drag pa'o// / de nas dang sna khye'u chung gis// mu mtha' yengs grol ston pa la// gsang ba'i brda' yis ji ltar bshad// ces byas pa dang // ston pas ga sang sngags brna
44a7(rnying rgyud): pa// ma d+hi li tra~M tris a a/ ri ba dgu ba rgyas kyi steng du shing rtsem byung rgyal skyes te/ shing de ladzin pa che gser gyin tso gcig chags nas skad sa tshogs rlogs pa'i man ngag go// gnam rim pa du gsum gyi la na sha bas sdang srid thams cadags
44b1(rnying rgyud): na ma sun mas ma na mas sa ca sus/ na na na
44b2(rnying rgyud): g.yangs cad/ khams gsum 'ong ba med de sems can thams cad ye sangs rgyas pa'i man pag/ rtsom nyag pa ldan rnapa 'byor bun// don dam skye me mthong 'did na// ming med pa tid mitha yas pa'i 'a sa// des gsungs pa de/ dang 'a
44b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis ming med gting mtha' yas pa'i lha khang bltas pas/ ci yang ma mthong gang yang mi 'jug nas/ don med kyi ma pa la shes rig gi rdun sems gzung 'dzin med par dang grol lo// gsang sngags padas pa tu dang de 'a snyed de bdun pa'o//
44b4(rnying rgyud): de nas rang ljang khye'u chung gis// ma mtha' yongs grol ston pa la// yongs rdzogs thod gal theg pa ru// theg pa ri ma dgu ji ltar rdzogs// zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khod la bka' stsal pa// yongs rdzogs bla med theg pa 'dir// theg pa ra lus yongs rdzogs
44b5(rnying rgyud): laTal gibang 'dzin dang grol bas/ nyan thos thas pa yongs mardzogs// rkyen 'bre' rnam par ga byed med// ngang rgyal thog pa dang gis rdzogs// badren pa gnyis su ma bzung bas// byang sems theg pa yongs sardzogs// dgegasu pa'i thug sum lha 'dabs/
44b6(rnying rgyud): thog pas sas gas// yang ba mang byed cig rgyas ma// la mjig 'ardzogs/ gas gas gnyis med pa// mag theg pa yangs sa rgyags// rlub ma dang shes nga banyis sad pas// sahA ma ga'i cig rdzogs/ rdos sa
44b7(rnying rgyud): dang sa shes med// la gang theg pardzogs// rig par byung ba 'dod pang // snang ba yin sa chas su yin// ma til ga'i thag pardzogs// dgra ma dag sumathang tshur// myiti miga'i bre pardzogs// meng medas thar skyengs thos la 'das// ya te mo gang cig
45a1(rnying rgyud): dzA/ nga mdus pa das thangs rdzogs// dngan dugs / sa sa na ga gas pa gas/ na pas byung byung nas/ / Na 'jugs// mags bcu dang

46a1(rnying rgyud): ba grus ngas// na sungs sa// ga ngas rgya sa dus// na pa dang sa drus/ ma nganas 'asug
46a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs thodan la than med pa'i theg pa pa rda'i sgo nas btsun pa'i le na dguba'o// de nas dang ngas smye ng+ge nang gis// mu mtha' yongs grob rten pas// rgyud kyi mtshan 'di ste gcung // zhes nus pa dang / sbyin pas 'khod pa pa 'bul pa// yongs rdzogs spyong kyi mtshan pa shad ky-i/ 6
46a3(rnying rgyud): ma yangs thos par byo// rgyud rnamathas pa rgya tshuman// kyang byung ban ci rdul byed rje/ khyena'i snying pa 'di bang ma gsal/ gyi rjod pa spyod rgya/ ngas pa chos ci sa drasabs/ 'ad nadas zung ba/ ma byang thong na ma dab tu ma ngas
46a4(rnying rgyud): lce da ku dag phran gyi su mchor kyang // sumathar yongs gropa lta ba'i dadu sa gyi mchong dkyis// chos nyid gting mdza' yangs pa'i bsgos pa'i bdu rtsi gyumatsho dkyil// chos byi mtsha mthun pal spyod pa'i bdud rtse bya mchor 'phyi// snying po den dam 'bras bu bdud kyi rgya mchor 'byol// chos kun yongs rdzogs /
46a5(rnying rgyud): rtse rgya mtshang 'khyil// de phyir bdud rtsi rgya mchod 'khyil ba'i rgyud du rung // theg pa mo glags pa pang ston pa'i phyir// chos dun gsal ba'i nyin zlabang zung // chos na ma kun gyi ga byud 'brang sel byed// go byed 'phrangs la chen pa'i rgyud du zang // theg pa thams cad la bzla gnya' gcog phyir// la zlo gtang ba
46a6(rnying rgyud): rgal bya bar zung // snar srid chos na bla ma lus kun rdzog pas// yongs dzas/ bla med tha~Md rgal theg par zung // theg pa kun rje sgo 'byed ba lta bsgom ston// shes rab 'phrul gyi sde mig bya bar zung // chos na phra de chen rtsang la bkrus po yis// rin chen gser gyi phreng ba bya bar byung // zhes gsungs so// nyi zla'i
46a7(rnying rgyud): po bdud ci'i rgyamatsho 'khyil ba'i rgyud pas mtshan bsnyen pa'i le'u sde brgyad drub // de nas dang snang khye'u chung gi// su mthar yangs gro brton pal// byud 'di gtad gnas gang lagata// ces nus pas/ ston pas gtad pa gnas bsta pa/ ti rjer snying po 'chud di// ngi byo
46b1(rnying rgyud): sems// gas rab 'a gri bya mtsho'i thugs// das tshig shel slong dang byung 'jam// tham la gus man ngagazug// chags pa med par yon rnams 'bul// bka byud gter bachang dmatshag babrang // de lta ba skad la byung 'dag tad// snang dang mi na pong du ud pa ma ma'i 'ams/ dU /
46b2(rnying rgyud): sul krol dug gi sems// dam ma dang rgyal g.yo sgyunan// slob dpon gsang zhing dang che 'byin// rje skyed rdzogs pas grogs mched ba rgya// rin chen med par g.yo sgyus 'bral// drang nas mi 'chad zong du byung // sdig la rnams pa dging dgags// nga rgyal snod lnga rdzun// de lta'i sdod la
46b3(rnying rgyud): par// be'u skal g.yang la lhung ba bzhin// gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro/ dper na seng ge'i 'o ma yang // snod ngan phal par blugs gyur na// snod kyang chag la bcud kyang 'bo// de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di// snod med dam nyams la bstan na// chos dang rang nyid gnyis ka ba dag/ de bas
46b4(rnying rgyud): snod kyi thad btags gces// zhes gsungs so// rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal pa ti/ 'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gyi gcig pa'o// / rkyed thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'ang ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mchod kyil
46b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// // bka' rgya/ gtad bya'o// u rgan gu ru pad+ma yis// phyi mang ci 'byung da ltar shes// yongs rdzogs bla med 'byung ba'i dus// khru dang gsung gi bstan pa nub// thugs kyi bstan pa dang ba'i tshe// de dus yongs rdzogs thod rgal 'byung // lnga brgya dus kyi
46b6(rnying rgyud): tha ma la// dus den zer zhing skrod dngan byed// sde khrug nang rgyas chos 'khong 'joms// khrims zhig bong khams sil bur 'gro// pha lun nAng 'thab ngan 'gran byed// gos su kyi thul rnal 'byor mang // zong du chos 'tshong lag chang mi thod thogs// nyams myod glang len tho tsos
46b7(rnying rgyud): 'gengs// me thub rnam gsum thung dus su// yongs rdzogs tha mad theg pa 'byung // zhes gsungs sa// u rgyan bzlas bshad cing / skab dpal brtsegs kyis sbyar/ rgya dro khri srong rje btsan la gtad pa'o// gter ma/ gtad na/ wasaH/ zab rtsaro//

47a2(rnying rgyud): sra yis// dngos med ston pas ba ka'i 'ab la bshwad// mr-i byi dus mdang pa 'gyur med pa'i dus// gleng gzhi na sum tshogs pa // de nas dngos med zang kA yis// skye med ka dag ston pa la// thun sum chags pa'i dod nidi ltar na// skyo ma don ni ltur lags//
