47a4(rnying rgyud): ma tshogs pa'i le'u ste dang pa'i// / de nas dngos med zang ka yis// skye med ka dan chos sbal// skye med chos su ji ltar gnas// zhes zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// bye med chos sgra'i gad+has lugs ni// skye ba med pang gnas pa
47a5(rnying rgyud): yin// 'gag pa med par gnas pa yin// gnyis su med par gnas pa yin// slong ba nyid las grol ba yin// mya rkyen 'pho byung med pa yin// tsal bsgrub bu btsal med pa yin// g.yo 'gul gyis gdang med pa yid// tshul gyi ldan la rnam pa gang yang med pa yin//
47a6(rnying rgyud): dpe med tha med de med yin// dngas med gtad med byang med pasam brlag par// mi med ga dag zang ga med pa// cang med cing spung 'dzin med mini phyeng ba// mtshon med tshig med spang med brjod med pa'o// skye ma dang gnas rtog pa med pa'i ni// gsal byed gzhan la ts+tsha/
47a7(rnying rgyud): bcing yang med// nam ma'a' yid ni cing 'drug myos// zhes gsungs sa// skye medag dag gi spyad las/ kye med chos pa'i gnas lugs pasbyin pa'i la'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas dngangos med zang ga yos// gdag don cigang rnams dag/ ces rlom
47b1(rnying rgyud): lazhus pa dang // snyan pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// ka dag nyid la dag dang mdag med// de ma rtags kyi blo can la// nyi ma'i dpes mtshon shal gang ka dag bstan// dngos med zang ka ka dag chung ma tan// nyi ma'i dpe la mun pa kanas dag/ shal gang pa ni gzhan
47b2(rnying rgyud): skyon gnas dag/ de bzhin ka dag rang bzhin kyang // 'khrul gzhi mgrub ka nas dag/ dakhrul rgyu mgrub ka nas dag/ 'khrul rkyen mgrub ka nas dag/ 'khrul 'bras mgrab ka nas dag/ 'khrul tshul ma grub ka nas dag/ 'khrul tsApa ma grub ka nas dag/ dug gsum
47b3(rnying rgyud): ma grub ka nas dag/ dug lnga ma grub ka nas dag/ yid 'khor gsum med ka nas dag/ 'gyu ba'i rlung med ka nas dag/ gsal ba'i 'od med ka nas dag/ 'char ba'i zer med ka nas dag/ skye ba'i rig med ka nas dag/ shes rab mnyam med ka nas dag/ ma rig
47b4(rnying rgyud): 'khrul med 'khrul sgo dag/ 'khrul tshul rnam gsum ka nas dag/ 'khrul min gzugs lnga ka nas dag/ khams gsum 'gro drug ka nas dag/ yid gnyis gzung 'dzin ka nas dag/ 'gong po nga bdag ka nas dag/ yul sems dbye bsal ka nas dag/
47b5(rnying rgyud): phyi nang dgag bsgrub spang len kA nas dag/ snang srid 'khor 'das ka nas dang // yod med rtag chad ka nas dag/ gzugs snang rig brtags ji snyed ma lus ka nas dag/ snang srid 'khor 'das ka nas dag/ ces gsungs so// yang ston pas
47b6(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// kun gyi gzhi med ka nas dag/ g.yo 'gul rtsal med ka nas dag/ klung 'gyu 'od zer ka nas dag/ ma rig ye shes kA nas dag/ shes dang ma shes ka nas dag/ 'phrad dang ma 'phrad ka nas dag/ zin dang ma zin ka nas dag/ 'gyur//
47b7(rnying rgyud): dang ma 'gyur ka nas dag/ mnyam dang mi mnyam ka nas dag/ rig dang ma rig ka nas dag/ yid 'khor rnam gsum ka nas dag/ rang bzhin ngo ba ka nas dag/ 'chang sgo 'khrul sgo ka nas dag/ ma rig gnyis 'dzin yul sems kanas dag/ sems
48a1(rnying rgyud): can sangs rgyas ka nAs dag/ 'khong pa rtsang 'das ka nas dag/ zho lnga yul lha ka nas dag/ rnam shes chags brgyad ka nas dag/ gzugs med la sogs yul med ka nas dag/
48a2(rnying rgyud): yid rig mi 'jug mi rtog ka nas dag/ sgrib g.yogs ye med ka nas dag/ nyon mongs bag chags gtan med ka nas dag/ yul sems gnyis 'dzin rtog tshogs ka nA sa dag/ ces gsungs so// skye med
48a3(rnying rgyud): ka dag gi rjud las/ ka dag gi dag lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas dngos med zad ka yis// skye med ka dag chos lha la// zang ka'i don ni ji ltar yin// zhes zhus pa dang / ston
48a4(rnying rgyud): pas 'khod la bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba gzhi med zang kA yin// 'khor pa'i bu med zangad ka yin// 'khor ba'i rten med zad kwa yin// 'khor ba'i gzugs med zad ka yin// 'khor ba'i yul mid zad ka ye na/
48a5(rnying rgyud): gti mug ye med zang ka yin// zhe sdang ye med zang ka yin// 'dod chags yi med zang kA yin// ngartul ye med zang ka yin// zag dog ye med zang ka yin// ma rig sgrib med zang ka yin// sgrib nyid dngas
48a6(rnying rgyud): maud thang ka yin// yul med kyogs ris dbye bsapa med// gling la dag sems 'dzin med tha na phyin// d+hA ton rnam khyen zung ka len// rang byung dang dngas dang sangs pang ka yan// 'dags pa sleb med
48a7(rnying rgyud): des mi ngapa rig 'ad// gdig ngas mdu da/ nga da cing drung dngas ginadu/ da sa 'a dri ga ni kyi/ ci bathung nge dang dang sa mngasango// songags pa ma bco
48b1(rnying rgyud): sal le ldan ni phyed de bran no'o// tha spyad tsam yin mtshon du ci yang med// mid med mtshon 'das gang gi dngos gzhi med// de ltar sras rtogs zang ka yin// zhes gsungs so// skye med ka dag gi chung las/
48b2(rnying rgyud): za ka ma'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas dngos med zang klu yis// lce med ka dag ston pa chos sgra la// dngos med zla 'das ji ltar bshad// ces zhes pa dang / ston pas
48b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor la bka' stsal pa// dngos med blo 'das bshad du med na yang // yang dag tshig gi sgron mas skal ldan 'khor la bshad// bya btsal blo 'dus chos shig bshad// yul sems dngos med chos shig bshad//
48b4(rnying rgyud): zha 'dod med pa'i chos shig bshad// rtsol bsgrub med pa'i chos shig bshad// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs chos shig bshad// 'ub chub chen po'i chos shig bshad// gsal dag rang grol chos shig bshad// rang
48b5(rnying rgyud): byung dang rig chos shig bshad// zil byung dang dngas yul med chos shig bshad// lce med ka dag chos shig bshad// dngos med zad ka'i chos shig bshad// sngon thogs rnan ches shig bshad// bya bral ye
48b6(rnying rgyud): bzhag chos shig bshad// chos zang blo zad chos shig bshad// sems med du ngos med chos shig bshad// reg med sde med chos shig bshad// snang med rtag med ches shig bshad// sbas pa'i mtha' rnams
48b7(rnying rgyud): yongs bral chos shig bshad// sna tshogs gcig 'dus chos shig bshad// gcig med zad par zad pa'i chos shig bshad// thug sar thug pas stsol sa dmyal ba'i chos shig bshad// dngos med kun 'byung sna tshogs chos
49a1(rnying rgyud): shig bshad// gcig med mtshan med ma bshad kun rtogs bshad// sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes rigs lnga byang chub lnga// theg chos grub mtha' tha snyad med 'dogs rnams// bla dgas yin te don la brjod
49a2(rnying rgyud): med// chos por sangs rgyas rig med ka dag rtogs// sems med sangs rgyas yid med snang ba dag/ mtshan med dpe med bshad med dngos gzhi med// snang srid 'khor 'das yod med ji snyed ma lus kun// skye med ka dag blo 'das/
49a3(rnying rgyud): dngos med snying po'i chos shig bshad// tha snyad kun bral brjod med de nyid kho na bshad// bshad pa ma yin mtshon du tshig las 'das// chos gcig ma bshad chos ga/ cig dngos po med// med pa ma yin stong gsal mtha' rnams thong // /
49a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// dngos med bshad thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas dngos med zang ka yis// sde med ka dag rgyas yul// yang dbyuka dag ji ltar rtags// zhes zhus pas/ ldan pas 'khrir la
49a5(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// yang rabaskal ldan rnal 'byor gyis// gong ltar don las ma g.yos par// skye med ka dag dngos med zeng ka rtogs// gong bshad don rnams sems dang 'dres// rang byung ris mod rang sar thim//
49a6(rnying rgyud): gsal skyong snad med yul sems med// 'khrul chod 'dzin med sdang ba dag/ phyi rol nang dag yid gnyis med// zol bung dang dngas klong du thim// gnyis snang zhe 'dod 'a col yongs mi rtog/ zhes gsungs so//
49a7(rnying rgyud): ka dag gi rgyud las/ yang rab bsten pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas dngos med zang ka yis// skye med ka dag chos slu pa// rtogs thabs gdams rig ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pa dang / ston
49b1(rnying rgyud): pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rtogs thabs thugs kyi bcud phyung bshad// dngos med zang ka'i thugs la chongs// skye ba med par gtan la dbab// la ma ka nas dag par gtan la dbab// 'bras bu dngos med zang ka la
49b2(rnying rgyud): yang bzla// gzhi ni skye med brjod 'das tha snyad med// rnam pa gang gis ming ma thogs// thig pa chen po yi ge med// rnam pa kun ldan rnam med dpe yang med// sna tshogs chos rnams mtha' yas grol// skye med rang dngas
49b3(rnying rgyud): shes med rtog pa med// ces gsungs so// ka dag lam du khyer ba ni// sgrib gnyis 'khor 'das chos rnams ka nas dag/ yul rnams ka dag phyogs ris med// rig yid sems dag 'dzin rtog med// sna tshogs
49b4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams yul snang la// rig sems dran blo gang la yid mi 'jug/ rtog dpyod gzung 'dzin dbye bsal med// rang byung rtsal dngas 'dzin med zang thal lo// snying po yan lag gnyis med shes pa me bu 'phrod// gsal stong dbyer
49b5(rnying rgyud): med nam mkha' 'dra// shug 'byung dang dngas nam mkha' 'dra// zhes med gsal dngas dang sa sangs de// nga byung dang dngas spyong sangs de// gsal dag dang grol bde khyod de// rang sangs dang rlag go skabs med// med las kun 'byung snying po 'od gsal klong // cang med cing
49b6(rnying rgyud): snang dngos med sna tshogs gcig tu 'dus// gcig dang med shes med kun shes// kun 'phye slong lag pa'o// snang stong rig stong yul sems gnyis med stong // kun 'byung kun gsal kun snang kun brtags kun gzhi med// mkha'
49b7(rnying rgyud): dbyings chos nyid kun gzhi'i pho brang nas// sna tshogs rtsal zer mkha' dbyings chos nyid klong du thim// stong la gsal dngas dang la dngos gzhi ci yang med// mtshon pa'i tshig med tha snyad kun dang bral// brjod du yo med chos rnams zad sar
50a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ bskal// zhes gsungs so// 'bras bu dngas mad zang ka la bAH ni// rgas rnams ka ga su la sa nas gnas// gang bstan kyang du gyur cing de las ma 'das chos// zag ma med nas skye me gnas ngag/
50a2(rnying rgyud): re dogs yid sngon byar med la bzlang dang la grub// ces 'bras su bstan pa'o// skye med ka dag gi rgyud las/ rtogs thabs thugs kyi brgyad phyung gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas dngos med zad ka yis// khyi med ka
50a3(rnying rgyud): dag ston pa la// skye med ka dag ji ltar thob// ces zhus pa dang // ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// skye med ka dag dang la thob dang ma thob med// 'khor rnams thod pa bskyed phyir thob ces bshad// mi phyi mi 'gag skye med de/
50a4(rnying rgyud): shes med dang gsal nyid la gnas/ gsal dngas ma g.yos skye med klong du kur// de ka nyid la thob ces bshad// nyon mongs khams rnams ka nas dag/ sgrib g.yogs mdog mun pa med// bag chags tshogs sdang gnas dag
50a5(rnying rgyud): rang dag rang gdangs rang sangs skyon sgrib gang yang med// gsal dag 'od gsal ka dag dri ma med// gting gsal kha gsal gsal dag gzung 'dzin dag/ de bzhin nyid dag yang dag rnam par dag/ de ltar sus rtogs ka dag
50a6(rnying rgyud): bshad// ces gsungs so// skye med kA dag ge rgyud las/ kye med ka dag dri med dngos med ka dag / thob pa'i le'u ste brjed pa'o// / de nas de dog med zang ka yis// rgya med ku dag zas sga la// hud 'a
50a7(rnying rgyud): ni ji ltar gzung // zhes zhus pa dang / ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal ro// gang yang ma skyes mtshan med kyir// bye ba med pa'i khyud 'azung // ma rig bag chags ka dag kyid// ka dag dri me rgyud du zung// shes med 'ong /
50b1(rnying rgyud): gas la dang sa sangs ro// ye shes mig gcig dri ma dag/ ye dag shel sgong ti bla bzhin// rtog tshogs sgrib g.yogs nyon mongs dag/ dang dngas gsal gdangs rgyud du zung // lce med ka dag chas sra zang kang gnas// ka dag zang kar
50b2(rnying rgyud): spyad du zung // zhes gsungs so// ka dag zang ka'i rgyud las/ mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas dngos med zang ka yis// skye med kau dag ston pa la// rgyud 'di gtad pa gang la gtad// rjes zhus pas/
50b3(rnying rgyud): ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rgyud 'di gtad pa'i slob ma ni// smras pa mi 'gyur ri ba 'dra// dam tshig shel skyong pad+ma 'dra// rang rgyud gla breng dang dkar 'dra// shes rab rig pas gr-i ral gri 'dra// bla ma la gus dge sems dam
50b4(rnying rgyud): tshig ldan// man ngag gter 'chang 'dod don khang mi gtang // de lta bu yi slob ma la// skye med ka dag chud 'di gtad// snod med dam med da rgyu 'dregs pa can lam sbyin cig/ ces gsungs so// lce med ka dag zang ka'i rgyud las/
50b5(rnying rgyud): yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / skye med ka dag gi rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gang skad du/ kA yA lo ki d+hir+NaD+he ShiSh+Ta ma hA swa yaM d+h+ya tat+ta n+t+ra ma/ bod skad du/ sku thams cad kyi snang ba ston pa/ dbang
50b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang thams cad kyi bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ rlig pa'i sdang ba yongs su gsal ba'i gzhal yas na/
50b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i rtsal gyi dbang gi mdo'i bdag des/ 'di skad ces bstan to// snang ba'i rig pa khyad par can kun tu snang ba rnams nyan cig/ rig pa'i gnas lugs 'gags pa med pa'i dbang // zlab rgyun du spyod pa'i dbang / 'dras
51a1(rnying rgyud): pangs su bzung ba'i dbang // ma 'ongs gan dul 'gal ba dbang // da smon par byud pa 'a dang // mardzogs dgas par byed pa 'ad dang // thams cad pa/ ga par byed pa'i dbang // gas kyang mazad na
51a2(rnying rgyud): skyedadang // 'du byed do langs gsang bsgyur dbang // thal byed nga bsig la bang pa'i dbang // skab byed del po mtshan cha'i dbang // rjen byeng rnam pa rnam pa ni'i dbang // thams cad dbang gi 'khor par bstan par// 'din de bdag gis
51a3(rnying rgyud): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rang rig tan na 'ding ba'i gzhal yas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ duHhe du gzhes bya ba khrigs te/ dwe yang bcom ldan 'das de nyid du bu ga sum pa rtsagadrug pa/ zhabs pani babyung po/ skal da
51a4(rnying rgyud): thod kyi rkyen sna tshogs kyis brtan pa/ glang chen gyi pags pa dang / chu rigs bzhis dbu dang yan lag btsud pa/ zhing ni d+ha dang rin po che'i rkyen sa tshogs kyis brtan pa/ bskal po'i mo den tshogs sgra la sa 'grub/ phyag na mtshon cha ga yang
51a5(rnying rgyud): nges pa bsdams pa/ zhabs ri re la lpags kyi ta mig gsum gsum byung ba/ dbu re rel rta mgo ljang zung nge re ta skad kyigs bcur rdzogs pa/ zhal nas pad+me to ba ta kyi sa sgrogs pa/ dbang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'gro ba yongs la bsrung ba/ swa mdog le ban
51a6(rnying rgyud): dbang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa/ zhabs kyi 'og tu ta wi ta zo ba chen po brgyad po 'dris pa/ lte ban rta mgrin dmang po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thugs kan gsang ba'i bdag po phyug na rdo rje skya mdog sngon po/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas rdo rje tshangs pa'o/
51a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten du gsor zhing / g.yon mi m+ba mdzub dang gagapa bsdams pa/ dpung par rje gang dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na gsod pa'i myur byang ba/ g.yon na grangs 'dril ba'o// rta mgo'i ste na rdo rje sems dpa' dgar / g.yas rdo rje rtse dbu thugs gang 'dzun
51b1(rnying rgyud): shA / dun chupa mtshan ma dpa/ la ga nags su \u0f7f/ ga / dang / dun dang / sa dang dag
51b2(rnying rgyud): nga/ dang sgrub pa nga/ das/ tshul ma / shi 'a / 'i
51b3(rnying rgyud): nga/ na 'ad / sa sa su su
51b4(rnying rgyud): nga na sa ba skye
51b5(rnying rgyud): dzin sa dang / badz+radza~M gis dang / mas kyi rigs nga/ dbyings kyi na mi nga / ye shes kyi rigs dang / lam kyi gas dang / shazla'i ngas myedang/ khrig 'ang ga shes dang / rngas bzung ba'i rigs dang / ma na pa
51b6(rnying rgyud): rtswa 'dzu m+b+his shrI dang / bags kyiskye tha ba dang / snang ban nas 'am ba dang / 'byung sanan nas 'am ba dang / da kyis dutho ba dang / dus byade 'a thabar// sa cad pal gnas pa da / dbupa pa gnas pa / 'dra ba'i
51b7(rnying rgyud): rgyam ba ga ba dang / 'angs bu gyi/ mi ming / dkyi pag pa// ga ni dza/ ma dang / gzhon gi zhing du/ ma ba yang/ da de/ di pa gshegs da/
52a1(rnying rgyud): bya khrob bsam byes mi khyab par // thul bram gyi skal pa dang / mngam tsho'i rgyal ba dang // kau'abyung rgyal ba dang / skam yin gyi thal ba dang / dz+nyAna'i thal dngan/ byung ba thams cad kyi rgyal ba dang / sha ba'i rgyal po dang / ye dwags
52a2(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po dang / sa la gnas pa dang / chul gnas pa dang / rlung la gnas pa dang / me la gnas pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po de nyid dregs pa can thams cad dbang du srud pa
52a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'khor dpag tu med pa'i rigs rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs so// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le rba ste dang ngo // / rgya ga skad du/ sarba
52a4(rnying rgyud): sin d+hu hu ka ra ya sid nA ma/ bod skad du/ khrus thams cad kyi lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'khor de rnams kyi nang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje rnam 'joms kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
52a5(rnying rgyud): kye bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can la// rnam tog dri ma bsam yas pas// sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis spangs pa'i// thabs chen mtshon pa'i yan lag dang // sems can dri ma can dag gi// rtogs pa sbyangs pa'i khrus
52a6(rnying rgyud): chen dang // khrus kyi sgrub pa gsung du gsol// de nas pad+ma he ru kas// rnam 'joms nyid la bka' stsal pa// kye ma rdo rje rnam 'joms nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung // khrus kyis rnam rtog skyong byed na// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/
52a7(rnying rgyud): gyi mtshams tshul bzhin bya ba dang // spyi bshags la sogs rab tu bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dom gang la// ba yi rnam ldes sbyang bar bya// tsan+dan la sogs dri zhim pos// chag chag dab tu btab nas ni// then ni gzhung dang mthud pa ste// shin tu byas
52b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang rgyaH/ 'das nan tha ma na/ da na rgyam par babyud / mangs pa 'dang ldan // / ldan nga// 'ad marnams nom sa rgyad pa// das nga da / dang brgyas pa / du nga
52b2(rnying rgyud): du mdzes pa ste// sgo rnams rigs dang 'dra ba'o// sgo yi mtha' mazlum po ste// rdo rje'i radabar bcas pa bri// zlum po'i kha dog dmar po bya// bar byams nag po dag tuH// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// dzas ni 'di ltar dgod par bya// pan+d+ha'i lte ba'i dkyi
52b3(rnying rgyud): dag tu// bum pa mdzes pa gcig bzhag ste// tshon srud lnga yi gzung thag gdags// pad+ma'i 'dab ma re re la// lha bshos re re gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams brgyad nyid du// phur pa bcu la khro bo'i ljags// phyogs bcu nyid du rab tu
52b4(rnying rgyud): kod// phyogs skyong bcu la gtor ma bcu// yi dwags 'byung po'i gtor ma dang // rigs drug rnams la gtor ma gcig/ chos myong 'khor dang bcas pa dang // ma mo rnams la gtor ma gcig/ dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma bca'// sgo bzhir ral rba
52b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi yang gzug/ gru bzhir mda' bzhir me long bzhi// dar sna dag kyang gdags par bya// khrus chu'i bum pa gcig ni gru chad de// bum pa de dag rnams la yang // sman gyi yo byad sna tshogs dang // ka ra bu ram la sogs dang // gser dang man shel nor bu dang //
52b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen lnga lnga ci skyed dang // rgya mtsho'i tshwa dang lan tshwa dang // tshwa sde ci snyed yod pa dang // spos dang tsan+dan grwa rtsi dang // de zhim pa yo rdzas rnams dang // mir dang sha dang ngo zhim dang // 'bras dang nas dang 'bru rnams dang // shing thig la sogs 'bras bu rnams//
52b7(rnying rgyud): bum pa dag gi snying por gsungs// ras dkar dri med gtsang ma yis// mgul chi ng+ga dag ni bya ba gsungs// de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// ras dkar mdzes pas gdugs su bya// yungs ka stsa lu/ ldang ba yis// bum pa'i kha rgyan bya bar gsungs
53a1(rnying rgyud): // de nas bcom ldan dbang chen la// nam 'joms nyid kyis yang zhus pa// TI kye bcom ldan dbang can sra// dkyil 'khar rdzas nyid du sbyang na// skom thabs mchod pa'i rim pa gsangs// bcom ldan pan te drags// rdo khro ba
53a2(rnying rgyud): la// stobs ldan nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig rnam par 'joms// sgrub pa chen po de nyid la// 'jug dus chos chen bco lnga la// bsgrub pa'i zhag grangs rab ni bdun// 'bring po zhag lnga tha ma gsum// de ltar bsgrub pa byed pa'i tshe// dang
53a3(rnying rgyud): dang gi bro brdung zhing // de tshe rnal 'byor chen po rnams// bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// pad+ma dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams// skad cig tsam la rab tu bskyed// dbus su pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni ljang gu
53a4(rnying rgyud): g.yon ni sde la dbus ni dmar// phyag dreg g.yas kyi dang pon// dgra sto bsdams shing skye rtsa gcod// 'og mi gnyis kyi phrag mtshan ni// mdung thung ral gri bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gsum gyi phyag mtshan ni// bam dgug thod pa sdigs ma
53a5(rnying rgyud): s+t+waM// dbu mi steng ni ta mgo gsum// ta skad sgrogs shing dbang skad 'tshor// mo ri sna tshogs 'phro ba'i ma// de lta bu yi dbang chen nyid// bdag nyid thugs ka'i dkyil 'khor du// yi ge hrIHny+dzing dmar po bsam// de nyid 'od du zhub dang // bdag nyid
53a6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dbang du bskyod// de nas hrIHhrIHzhes brjod pas// bdag nyid steng du chad par bas me// de nas rta mgo gsum du bsam// de nas badz+ra hrIHzhes brjod// de nyid 'od du zhu ba dang // bdag nyid dpal chen mdun dag tu// rdo rje rnam 'joms bsgom
53a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// de nyid bye mdag phrag mchen ni// zhal ga cig rgyag gnyis su mdzag // g.yas pas bum pa dkar pa'i sdams// dri tubra ma dum pa'i 'ad pa dpa 'o// g.yon pas sdigs mdzu ba phreng ba 'dril// gle dbang rigs bzhis phral bcar
53b1(rnying rgyud): sh+tsa/ da gas pa bu sa rgyu pa / na du / na na sa da/ smra nas// na smras/ da /
53b2(rnying rgyud): mams pa las// khrus mgrangs med pa ma// byang gyis mthams pes pa sa pa/ ma dag// sra ma ga dashi ba 'dubyu na// g.yas pa rnams ma pa // gA seM panam sa ni thigs sang ga// nas
53b3(rnying rgyud): chen des// rnam 'jam nyid pa lung bstan pa// ma mdzan nam 'joms nyan// gsang sngags rdzas kyi sgrib kyang sngags// khyod kyis 'dus pa'i chags la sa// de nas napa 'jams nyid ces// gas sngags zlas kyi ga 'di zlas// ni
53b4(rnying rgyud): hru hU~M / den kyigs de ldan tu ga sa / sa sasmras/ sa sdigs smra na// ga ngas / sa
53b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// gsal ba 'di dang ldan gyur nas// bdud rtsi'i bum pa de dag gis// nang nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs// ga nyid stong gsum khyab pa las// bdag dang mtha' las sems can gyi// sdug bsngal thams cad med pa dang // sgrib pa thams cad dr-i
53b6(rnying rgyud): pe bsam// phyi dang glen de rnams kyang// lha ming dag rnams cad kyis// bdun ci'i rgyalas ba zlam par bsum// sbyin du byung bsam bzhinas// b+h+r-i nag gzhung dang mthu par // rgyun dra bgrangs pa'i sngags 'di rje// oM dz+haiM b+h+yas rba A r+thang+ge mAM/
53b7(rnying rgyud): sa d+ma phrin ti rje rje/ nga da / don rkyed la dag ci rgyas// donas bskyod pa'i tha la// rigs bya kyi ma dgapa// dbun kyi ma pos dpang baphreng \u0f7f// rdzus kyi dus pas thas sbyid bya// naci pa'i ma pa da/
54a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid su bstan pa// slob bu'i gtsug dag tu bzhag/ 'og ma'i sngags 'di nyid lan bdun brjod// de nas rdu rna mapa dang na des// rba ba'i bu 'di ba tu blangs// rje bdud ci dag pa'i bshas sra// chos nyid mkha' ma nya du/
54a2(rnying rgyud): shes bum// rnam rtog kun skyong ye shes chu// rig pa 'od gsal snying por bcas// mkha' gsang mnyam sbyor lan tshwa'i ro// rnam dag dri med bcud len snyan// 'dod yon las grub rin po che// rin chen 'od 'bar dri zhim gros// gso byed do
54a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i chu// 'dod pa tshim byed 'bras bu dang // bsnyen 'dri la thugs rje'i dang dpyad dang // 'bras bu bcud kyis gtams pa yi// chos nyid mnyam pa'i bum pa yis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// chos nyid dang stobs rnyed nas kyang // dbang chen sa
54a4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan par shog/ oM maN+Da thA la sha sad+d+he dz+ra d+hI/ de nas khrus kyi bum pa yis// slob ma de la khrus byas te// sgo gtsug dag tu bzhag la yang // sngags ni 'og ma lan badren 'arjod// de nas khrus kyi bum pa de// rnam 'jims nyid du gsal ba
54a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// che ba'i glu 'di brjod par bya// rnam dag dri med ye shes chus// bkrus pas rnam rtog sdug bsngal bral// rnam rtog dri ma las skyongs shing // sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams kyi// ye shes chu rgyan babs
54a6(rnying rgyud): khyod kyi rnam rtog byung gyur nas// phyi dang nang gi sdug bsngal rnams// thams cad zhi bar gyur nas kyang // ye shes snang ba gsal bar ston// dag pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'dis// dri ma'i skyon rnams byang ba dang // mi gtsang la sogs nyams pa
54a7(rnying rgyud): kun// shal sgong lta bur gyur nas ni// rnam 'jo mas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rigs kyi phu la rdzogs par shog/ oM tsat+ta badz+ra kro d+hak+Sha~M madz+dza dz+dza hrIH/ de nas gtar mas dbang bsrung bya// gtong ma gtang zhing dkyil 'khor bkru// zhes rdzogs
54b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang byung chen pa'i rgyud las/ khrus kyi leT ste gnyis pa la// / sdug ga d+ha/ mahA swa kas pa ya du na ma/ bad sa dang / gzhan gyi gnas srung can ma zhus bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal mnyam pa'i rgyal pa la phyag 'tshal ma// da
54b2(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma'i rgyal po de nyid kyis/ sems can tshe 'das pa'i sems/ rig pa ngo spang ba'i cho ga dang / rigs drug nas drangs shing lam ston pa 'di gsungs so// phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i lha dang / kla dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang /
54b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la rab tu bos te 'di gsungs so// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs phal cher de la nyon cig/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal la chags shing // sdug bsngal la spyod pa'o// tshe 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang / rnam rtog sbyong ba'i
54b4(rnying rgyud): phyir/ ngas tshe 'das pa bang dro las 'das pa'i lam du lung bstan pa 'di bstan gyis/ legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pas/ de nas 'khor rnams rab tu dga' ste 'di skad brjod do// e ma ho// legs so bdag cag rnams kyi legs par bzung /
54b5(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsol cig/ de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis/ nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// gnas kyi cho ga chen mo ni// nga yis lags par bshad par bya// sems can las kyis mnar ba yi// dbang
54b6(rnying rgyud): po rab 'bring tha ma gsum// shin tu rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dbang po nyi shu rtsa gcig go// yang gsol pa/ sems can las kyi mnad de yi// bar do'i gnas lugs ci ltar lags// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sems can kun gyi lam chen ni// bar
54b7(rnying rgyud): de'i snang ba chen po yin// rnam pa bzhi dung yis gsungs// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar do dang // chos nyid dang snang bar de dang // rmi lam 'dzin pa'i ba do dang // srid pa'i khyams byed par de'o// rang bzhin gnas pa'i bar dol// chos nyid gsang ba'i don rtogs
55a1(rnying rgyud): rnas zhugs sa / nga da dag// brgyas dang dag na// na dus 'du da / ma
55a2(rnying rgyud): gnas te// sems dang rig pa'i ye shes gnyis// zhag bdun par du rab tu bral// chos nyid rang yul mthong ba'i phyir// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang // sems kyi sa bon langs pa dang // lhan grub chen po rab 'das nas// rmi lam ba de chen por 'ja
55a3(rnying rgyud): de che sngon gyi bag chags dran// de tshe gnas kyi cho ga gsungs// gnas kyi cho ga chen po rnams// phyag rgya 'khor los mtshams bcad bya// de nas bur+Na he ru kas// dbang chen nyid la don zhus pa// kye ma dpa' bo dbang gi bdag/ gnas lung chen po bsgrub pa ye/
55a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga gsung du gsol// de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis// zhus pa'i tshig 'di bka' stsal pa// gnas lung bsgrub pa 'di lta ste// tshe 'dis lus parjes gnas de ru// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi ste// ji snga gsum gyis chag chag gdang /
55a5(rnying rgyud): nas tshon thig byin gyis brlab// bcu drug thig dang ldan byas la// de nas tshon nyid rab tu dgye bar bya// ro brang gru zhing ldan pa la// tshon tso mthing ka dag gis dgang // phyi rim zlum po dag tu gsungs// rdo rje'i dbang bcas pa bri bya zhing // pho brang bsnol ma'i pa
55a6(rnying rgyud): dag ni// dmar po dag gis rab tu bkang // de yi phyi rim gru bzhi ste// sgo dang bcas par rab tu ba shang // sgo ni rigs dang mthun pa la// ba khyams sngon po dag tu bya// gru chad ljang gu mdzes pa'o// de yi gyi rim zlum par gsungs// thigam bzhi
55a7(rnying rgyud): ni dmar po'o// kye ma bcom ldan dbang gi bdag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// mngon pa'i rdzas ni 'i ltang lags// dpa' chen khyed kyis bka' stsol cig/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// dbus kyi pho brang steng dag tu// bum pa mdzes pa gcig /
55b1(rnying rgyud): bzhag ste// ras dkar gtsang mas mgul tshangs bya// nang du chu gtsang dag gis dgang // kha rgyan ci 'byor dag gis bya// shar phyogs dag tu gtor ma gcig/ rak+ta bdud rtsis bran la bzhag/ dz+ha lcags gtar ma khud kyis bran// nub kyir k+ta dag gis rban//
55b2(rnying rgyud): byang du bdud rtsi'i dri chus bran// byang shar mtshams su lan chags gtor// sha sna tshogs tshad dag dang ni// dkar gsum mang ngagasum la sogs dang // nya sha dag dang sgong dang // khung ba la sogs zas sgra rnams// ci 'byor pa yis gtor ma brgyan// 'bras
55b3(rnying rgyud): chang gro chang yos chang dang // bu ram chu dang kar rgya dang // dang bzho dang mar khu yis// gtor mdo nyid bran te bzhag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// sgo bzhi ral gri bzhi yang gzug/ gru bzhir mda' bzhi me long bzhi// dang sna bzhi yang gdags
55b4(rnying rgyud): denas dkyi la'adzin nyid 'i// ni gro m+b+hi yid kyi lakhong dam// gdunan stong du dgram pa ts+yai// dem ny-ing rgyas dag cang ma mas// gdugs ni dang tu brabs par // das dkar gcing mdo nyid la// ma u ny-id dkyil duH/
55b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la// mthing nag dang k+ShuM yol ba bre// dkyil 'khor de yi shar lho ru// dri ma dag ni dgod la bzhag/ pho la gzhu dang dong ngal dang // pho yi chas su ci yod bzhag/ mo la 'phang dang srur ma dang // mo yi cha byin ci yod bzhag/
55b6(rnying rgyud): de nas dri ma de dag la// gshin gyi ming byung bstan pa ni// shog gu dang la rab bris nas// mda' 'phang dag la btags la gzug/ de nas gtor ma cha gsum btang // gyi cho ga la sogs mchod pa lnga// gzhung dang mthun par rab byas nas// zhi ba'i
55b7(rnying rgyud): phrin las rdzogs par bya// de nas khro bo'i gzhung bsrang la// gshed byed bskrad pa'i cho ga bya// de nas dri ma de nyid la// slob dpon ting 'dzin ldan pa des// pha mo gang yin rnam shes dgug/ de yi khaMgs bsreg sbyang bkrus// de nas sngags 'chang de
56a1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis// em zhes rab da pas// snod brgyad 'jig rten thams cad ni// zing nag su gsum me drubs pa// gshed byed thams cad brlag par bas pa// de nas dri ma de nyid pa// dba'i lung ni ba brjod
56a2(rnying rgyud): pas// zhi khri'i lha tshogs de dag kun// dri mtshe 'dis lus le gzug// de nas dri ma de nyid ni// lha tshogs rnams su gsal ba dang // tsho ngas de yi lus po la// mdzes pa'i rgyan cha dag gis brgyan// dang dbyang ba dag dang gdugs kyis dag pa
56a3(rnying rgyud): de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// dbang chen stabs su bzhugs nas ni// tshogs bcad 'di skad brjod par bya// e ma ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// su dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan phrin las zag pa zang // zad mi shes pa yi bden
56a4(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gzhan yang bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon dang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bden pas/ gshin po tshe la 'das pa 'di/ rigs drug gang na gnas kyang rung ste/ ngan song gsum gyi sgo chod cig/ mtho ris su sgo 'byed pa'i gsang
56a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir/ skad cig la mchis par gyur cig/ gzhan yang 'di la gnod par byed pa'i bdud dam/ bgegs gang yang rung bas/ 'di'i gnod par ma byed cig/ gal te gnod par byas na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyi byin rlabs
56a6(rnying rgyud): kyis/ thal ba rdul phran bzhin du gyur cig/ de skad ces brjod cing sngags 'di gsum brjod do// oM bi sha kro d+ha ha na ha na ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ ces brjod cing / nyung ka ra la bsngags pa phyogs bcud gtong ngo // de nas 'dzab tu 'grang ba'i sngags 'di gro
56a7(rnying rgyud): brdung zhing bzlas so// oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badz+ra kra d+ha ha ya k+Shi pa hUM hrIHsngags de las ni 'od 'phros pas// rta mgrin dmar po grangs med 'phros// 'gro drug gnas nas drangs par bsam// de nas dri ma'i snying ga nas// rta mgrin de dag thams cad kyis/
56b1(rnying rgyud): bzung nas gnyis med lha rugs lapa// de nas g+hAr+d+ha ta drags// dbang bdag nyid la dan zhus pa// kye ma bcom ldan dbang chen sgra// tshe 'das sems can de dag ni// ngan song gsum nas drangs pa'i phyir// cho gang sbyor ba gsung dugs pa// de nas pa#
56b2(rnying rgyud): kas// de dag rnams la bka' stsal pa// de nas zhi ba'i 'dzab dbyangs bgrangs// oM AHhU~M badz+ra tri kra mr-i d+hA trI shwa dI/ l-I dwai Sha ra ti/ bI ra ga ra ti s+t+waM/ mAM ma~M ha raM ti/ AM a ro li ka/ de skad brjod cing gzugs la bstim// yi ge de dag re re yi// 'od ze
56b3(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'phros pa yis// shes bya'i rnam rtog sgrib pa dang // blta ba gol ba'i sgrib byang bsam// de nas sngags kyi 'od zer des// tshe 'das lus la phog pa dang // lus ngag yid gsum sgrib byang nas// lus kyi dngos po med par bsam// de nas tshe 'das dngos
56b4(rnying rgyud): po de// yi ge nr-i du gyur nas ni// de nas hU~M du gyur par bsam// de las 'od zer 'phro 'du las// badz+ra AHhU~M rab brjod pas// rdo rjer gyur nas skye 'jig bral// de ltar skye ba med pasam+b+ha nas// dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol ba yi// cho ga mnga' gsol
56b5(rnying rgyud): byin brlab bskyed// daM yaM khaM gis bsregs sbyangs las// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di lan gsum brjod// b+hI bi shud+d+he b+han+ta dz+nyA na tsakra b+hI// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// gzhal yas khang ni rab tu bsam// 'khor lo rin chen gzhal yas khang // d+han d+ha ye shes
56b6(rnying rgyud): rnam par bsam// rgya khyon dpag tu med par bsam// de yi nang du bsam bya ba// sngags 'dis rab tu bskyed par bya/ oM tsan+d+ra maN+Da le hU~M/ ma lUr+ya maN+Dal hU~M/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la hU~M/ hU~M traM ting baM la sogs pa'i// zla ba'i dal dang nyi ma'i dal// pad+ma stong dang
56b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yi// bdag nyid rab tu bsam par bya// ting bi la sogs pa yi// phyogs skyong gdan yang rab tu bsam// de yi steng du dbang chen bsam// phyogs mtshams kun tu khro bo bsam// de ltar dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhengs su
57a1(rnying rgyud): ngasanas// na nas na su/ na sa smras / ga // ga
57a2(rnying rgyud): ba shes cig ldan pa// mala'as nyam martson dpa myed/ 'ad bye nam tha ba sa// rang gis ga 'khong ba'i dbyabs// nang ga yin sa 'i da kyis/ dung ma sa za// ma gas dru gis ma rtag thams
57a3(rnying rgyud): gting// ming la shes shes rabang byingasas rna'i/ shes pa'i mi rtog pas sbyang ba sreg/ shes ba shes bskal pa'i min / yags ma nyi mngasanam grus// ma shes rgyam ngon bas 'khrugs/
57a4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid sa yis spang mi de 'byung bdag 'dags// chos nyid med kyang theb pa'i sarnams bapyod// kauH/ kyis gti zug 'bras zugating // tsha nyid mgyis rkyong ba'i zlas bu yAn// hU~M/ yi gas dam ngan grang dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba
57a5(rnying rgyud): rnams la zhengs pa thugs mi 'a la yang // stong cing rtso ldan rgyal ba'i gagag sa// mas gzhag sa nas pa bang bajugapa gas zhin mes tug / mashes pa'i da na kyang ngas// chom nyid gta ma
57a6(rnying rgyud): zhal zas bdud rtsi hU~M// rig pa'i ye shes yi ga~M a~M du gsal// rnam rtag rgya nagacod cig chen 'bras bus mdzes// bdud rtse gtor ma bsreg srung bkrus// oMH/ ye shes lnga ldan rig pa'i ye shes oM// ye shes rang ldeng sna tshogs lnga ldan pa// ye shes
57a7(rnying rgyud): bdud ldan thams cad ga tor mas tshim// po brang dab mangs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// thabs// gru rdzas byin gyis 'dra ba cing btan par bzhugs// sgo ba'i rab ma se ye shes phyogs pa zhi gsal// ye shes rang lding 'khrong mi na bu'i dbyibs
57b1(rnying rgyud): 'bad ba dkyi bang gags zung dang/ mkhas gnabang bzug sugadus// dbang rgyasas spyo pa/ kyipa nga sdu/ ga gas su// na kyi ma rnam// 'das sa byas na/
57b2(rnying rgyud): can to// dkyil 'bang la gang thongs// bzag sa lda ma/ des bran 'di da / gang kyin pa da // rig pa 'i migs so thaMd kyis/ par ma rgya zhig/ dgas chags tsud ste/
57b3(rnying rgyud): nam tog rje mthal// tsiti'i dkyil 'khor thabs// ye shes drang bgrogs bcu dgas pa// sgron pa mig slo ngas// rig pa lo zhes tog me gsal// sems kyi yi go ni gnas pa// gas pa pa'i ma shes mig skye sa// rig pa'i ye shes
57b4(rnying rgyud): hrIs gyur// ye shes gas la byu skyebs// dkyil la bzhed mngon par rjong // rje da kyil la 'di gas pa bye ngas// yeshes thams da bab tu gsal// sa ma ta ba d+h+yas twAdz+dza// sum brtsam ldan dpal chen s+ya// tshe 'das senas kyi
57b5(rnying rgyud): nyid// dkyil lakhong ma tshogs de dag gi// ga zhig gis palta bar 'dzud// dbang zin nyid kyi sgra nga bstan pa/ bye ma nyodan cig te dran/ de rje slob ba na gsang badris// chog pa shid 'di dag brjod bris na// dkyil la nga lha yizhal mdza
57b6(rnying rgyud): byu // de nas dkyil labar gang sbyinas// rjem 'dzin pa'i mi dag gis// drim dag du bzlas pa yis// dkon ma chog gsum la phyogags pa nal// de nas rdo rje sleb pa na des// tshig ni 'di skyed brjed par bya// ta mi gnas bram
57b7(rnying rgyud): shes chen pa'i bdag nyid gi thogs pa'i dkyil long bcas pa dang / bcom ldan padra dbang ge dkyil 'khong gyis/ tshe 'das 'dis zhal bsnyed du gsal/ byin gyis brla bcugs pa/ dbang bsngang du gsol/ mthu bstan du gsal/ sgrib pa kyang
58a1(rnying rgyud): du gsol/ gnas spang bar mdzad du gsol// oM badz+ra sa rba ka pa dza hU~M/ de nas ting 'dzin rab brtan pas// sngags kyi 'od zeng ldan 'phros pas// tshe 'das nyid la dbang bsdang bas// de nas byin na'ab bshags pa bya// brtan
58a2(rnying rgyud): kr-ita tho brdung zhing // du lu gar gyis mchod pa 'bul// de nas dbus bum byin gyis brlabs// bum pa'i nang du lha rnams bskyed// bum pa mdzes pa de nyid la// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs gsal ba dang // dang po'i gnas su gzhag par bya// mchod dang bdag
58a3(rnying rgyud): pa byed tsam na// tshe 'das nyid kyis byed par bsam// de nas byin dbab byas pa dang // lha dang dkyil 'khor je gsal bsgom// phud dang gtor ma byin gyis brlabs// de nas rdo rje slob dpon des// ting 'dzin gsum la 'bad par bya// de ltar ting 'dzin ra
58a4(rnying rgyud): gsal bas// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir dbang gro brdung // de nas dbang gi zhwa gon la// mchod pa chen po 'di skad brjod// hU~M mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba dang // sangs rgyas zhing
58a5(rnying rgyud): khams rab 'byams su// sangs rgyas rol mo sna tshogs dang // dbyibs legs rdzing bu ro mchog bsil// ye shes rol mo'i rgyan ldan pa// chos kyi glu dang ye shes gang // snang ba'i bro dang sangs rgyas gsung // tshangs pa'i gsung dang ru lu'i sgra// dbang
58a6(rnying rgyud): gi stabs dang pad+ma'i gsung // dbang mchog byin rlabs chen po yis// hUM bla bre rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang // bdug spos mar me tsan+dan dri// 'dod yon la sogs rin chen gyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// sil lhan zhal zas gzhal yas khang //
58a7(rnying rgyud): mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang // sems dang chos dang glu chen po// dbang chen dkyil 'khod nyid la 'bul// rin chen rgyan dang yo byad chu// zhi ba'i tshogs la mchod par 'bul// a la la ste mchod par bzhes// nang gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni// dri chen
58b1(rnying rgyud): rje tshe mchog dang // byang chub sems dang rak+ta'i dbang // dri chu rdo rje sgrib sbyangs rgyu// bdud rtsi yon tan las grub gter// thogs pa med par mnyam sbyor nas// dbang chen sku la mchod par 'bul// tshe dang gal gyi dza gad dang // drag pa tshim byed kun du drug/
58b2(rnying rgyud): gzod ma'i phud dang gtor ma yis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// tshil chen snang gsal chen po dang // drag po'i rgyan cha sna tshogs dang // dbang chen dro dang ru lu'i sgra// khro rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul// rnga chen dang ni dril bu 'i sgra// cang til
58b3(rnying rgyud): he paM wang sgra// mchog chen dung dang gling bu dang // ting ting shag dang kar ko ta// cha lang la sogs sgra rnams dang // lha dang klu yi sgra skad rnams// mthud sbyang gnyis med mchod pa 'bul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang do// reg bya la sogs 'dod yon lnga//
58b4(rnying rgyud): ma ldan dpal chen nyid la mchid// dkyil 'khor tshogs dang mchod rdzas kyis// gnyis med bsdus te mnyam sbyor nas// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la mchod// rgyal srid rdza sa dang yo byad dang // sna tshogs mchod pa chen por 'bul// a la lA
58b5(rnying rgyud): lte bzhes su gsol// 'byung po kun la mchod pa ni// lan chags mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni// gtor ma ye shes rnam dag dang // zas kyi ro mchog sna tshogs pas// sbyangs pa'i lan chags bral gyur cig/ nya sha dang ni phag pa'i sha/ sha ba'i sha dang dgo
58b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sha/ rtsa rgod sha dang 'dab chags sha/ stag sha dom shwa spre'u'i sha/ khyi sha sre mo byi la'i sha/ ba sha bong sha rta sha dang // rkyang sha la sogs sha sna rnams// 'bul lo lan chags rnams la 'bul// 'dod chags lan chags bral byar cig/ ri
58b7(rnying rgyud): dgas sha snga phul ba yis// yid kyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ 'dab chags sha snga phul ba yis// sems kyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ sder chags sha sA phul ba yis// lus kyi lan chags bral gyur cig/ sems can rkang med sha phul bas//
59a1(rnying rgyud): lus dag padag su 'ji la na chags bral krung mi// shas gas rnams phul ba gyis// ldan chags thams padabul gyur ma// dbras cang gro nang yos na zang // sun mang shing thog mang dang // thar ma chang dang man
59a2(rnying rgyud): tshwa'i chu// sos chu bsil chu gur gum thu// rgya mtsho steng ka su ma'i rgya// kar dang ni sgang ci'i chu// khrag dang zho dang dang ba yi// btung ba'i mchod pa 'di phul bas// lan chags thams cad thal gyur cig/ mang gsu ma dag gi chu phral bas//
59a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i ldan chags thal krung cig/ mang gi rigs mchog 'di thul bas// rdo rjeng len nags thal ba cig/ dka gsum dag gi du phral bsa?// blo rigs pang chags thal zur rtsig/ lad na'i chu rnams phul ba 'is// gtad kyi lan chags
59a4(rnying rgyud): gur cig/ chu sna ji snyed phul ba yis// sa bdag lan chags bral bu ma cig// hU~M sha dang mar dang khur ba dang // dza ga da gtong ma phul ba yis// lta bu gnod sbyin dri za dang // s+ho 'ches bdag rigs rnams dang // gul bum gtan gyi rigs rnams
59a5(rnying rgyud): dang // byol song sgra yi rigs rnams dang // yi dwags sha zla'i rigs can dang // stobs men bdud rtsi rigs rnams dang // bcad dang rdul 'gong 'khor bcas dang // ma so dang nig shin rje dang // khyed rnams kun gyi lan chags ni// skad cig nyid la bral
59a6(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ tshe las 'das pa'i sems can 'di// sems kyi mdud pa ltar du khrol// lan chags rkyen gyis zas nor longs// tshe 'das rigs kyi bu 'di dang // lus dang grib mar me 'grogs par// ngan song gsum gyi lam ma bstan// sngags chang
59a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gang ga 'di nyid// ngang bkra ma na gyin sa shes / dza da badz+ra naH// thams cadang med bang du srid// rdzogs pa rnams kod byed// gnad byed skyong bathong dru // gshed kyad
59b1(rnying rgyud): par brlag pa'i blo// sri chen dbang du sdud pa'i blo// dregs pa gnad la dor ba'i bro// nga yi bka' 'di ma bcags par// lan chags gtor ma 'di longs la// rang dang gnas su byer par gyis// rang rang gnas su byed nas kyang // tshe 'das gshed du ma byed
59b2(rnying rgyud): par// ngan song lam gyi sgo tshad cig/ yon bdag rigs rgyud 'di rnams la// phyin chad ldang bar ma byed cig/ oM pad+hAt+ta kr-i h+ya badz+ra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ sngags de bzlas shing yungs kar gtor// mchod pa'i gzhung rnams rdzogs pa dang // tshogs kyi
59b3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa rab tu bya// tshogs chen mchod pa de dag kun// tshwa 'das de yis drangs par bsam// de bzhin gzhung bzhin rdzogs par bya// de nas bdun tshigs dang po la// dang po'i cho ga 'di dag brjod// ljags 'di brjod cing spro bar bya// de nas glu chen 'di
59b4(rnying rgyud): skad brjod// tshe 'das mdun du bsam pa'o// hU~M nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// khyod kyi rnam rtog ngas spang gis// nga la gus par phyag 'tshal cig/ sems kyi the tshom nyid sol la// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug la// sngags 'chang nga yi dang
59b5(rnying rgyud): 'di nyon// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// 'di nas 'jig rten 'og 'di na// dmyal ba bya ba 'jigs rung ba// sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs pa// mi bzad khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rgyud las log pas na// sdug bsngal de las bsgral
59b6(rnying rgyud): zla'i phyir// bzod pa'i chu bo 'di longs shig/ oM du sin nga ka sa mA dza hUM/ de nas dri ma de nyid la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga bsap+la la// kyai gtsug zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// lce la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// snying gang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/
59b7(rnying rgyud): lte bar rin chen zur brgyad bsam// rkang mthal e nyid zur gsum bsam// de lta'i dkyil 'khor de dkyil du// dang po la ni a dkar po// gnyis par su nyid ser por bsam// / gsum pad nr-i nyid nag bor bsam// bzhi par bre nyid seng po ste/
60a1(rnying rgyud): thabang du nyid du 'o// drug sa da nag paste// de ltar gnas pa'i rang bzhind// dbang nyid du ltung ba rang bzhin gyis// dam ga sa byu bsam// gnyis \u0f7fpra gsum pan+de// bzhing las kun //
60a2(rnying rgyud): lngapa hA ru kur par bsam// drug pa hrIHnyid bsam par bya// de ltar bsam+ba par bum pa yi// chu yis dri la bkru bar bya// bum pa dri ma'i steng du bzhag// dbang nyid bsrung bar dang bya/ dmyal ba'i gnas nas zin par bsam// de nas 'di skad dang bya
60a3(rnying rgyud): glang ngo // bru~M nyon cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// 'di nas 'jig rten 'og na ni// yi dgas 'jig rten bas mA mi khyab// bkres dang skom gyi sdug bsngal ni// mi bzad khyod kyis myong bar 'gyur// de las
60a4(rnying rgyud): bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// da ni bcom ldan dpal chen te// yi dgas lhag bsgral ngas bskal gyis// sbyin pa'i chu bo 'di longs shig/ a s+'ut+saM pre du tri hrI a aH/ bgyid rim bsrung thabs gong dang mthun// ye dwags sdug bsngal bral bar bsam//
60a5(rnying rgyud): de nas byol song sdug bsngal yang // de yi spyong tshig 'di skad du/ rje tshong 'des rigs kyi bu khyod nyon// nga yis bstan pa 'di la nyon// bstan pa 'di la ma zhugs na// 'di nas mngon snang yul 'di na// kyol song bya ba'i sdug bsngal ni// mi bzang khyod
60a6(rnying rgyud): kyis myong bar 'gyur// de las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// da ni pad+ma he ru kas// snang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam ma~M khyub// dang rig gsal ba'i sgo dbye bas// snang gsal ye shes mi long ltos// sdug bsngal mtha' las ngas bsgral gyis// byol
60a7(rnying rgyud): sidri rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni// ngayes phral bar bya ba'i phyir// shes rab su po 'di longs shig/ a~M kA yang dz+ra tsa~Mkra a sunr-i pre du tra~M hUM a aH/ de ltar 'jig rten rapags la bas byol song sdug bsngal bral ba bas ma// de nas rim gyis drang ba ni lha'i yul nas drang ba dang / lham
60b1(rnying rgyud): yon dang byud mnas// ma la gnasas drang bar bshad// de nas mi sbrul ngan can nas// gnas spa sa mchog dang // dbang baphrang tsaganas par \u0f7f// de nas slob da na gsang bdas// ngan sa dgasas nas badrangs nas// rdzang das gnas mdag tu
60b2(rnying rgyud): yang // 'bru lnga'i dbang bskur 'di skad brjod// hU~M ngan song gsum gyi phung po ldar// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i pra bkod de// rgyu lnga 'khor ba'i lam rgyun gcad// thams cad rgyal ba'i sras por bya'o// dbang chen gsang ba'i ngang nyid nas// sangs rgyas
60b3(rnying rgyud): sems can gnyis med pas// srid gsum zos kyang ngam 'grangs// khams gsum 'thud kyang nga mdoms// stong gsum thams cad bskal ba'i zhing // ma skyes pas na 'gags pa 'jig/ rang bzhin med pas bsgral ba'i gru// sems nyid yangs
60b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mkha' klong du// stong gsum ma lus ston pas na// 'bum gyi chang yang mi phod de// nam mkhas gang khyab rig pas khyab// rig pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi sku// phyi nang gnyis ka sems su bsgral// rig pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// skye shi gnyis
60b5(rnying rgyud): ka rgyud nas dag/ yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das// cing yang snang la gzung du med// med pa ma yin snying po'i ngang // mi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid la ye shes gsal// blo ldan gang zhig skal che bas// 'di ni bskal pa'i
60b6(rnying rgyud): lung zhes grags// tshe 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// 'di na ma chags gnas su gshegs/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ badz+ra s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas d+hU tra nag po'i ting nge 'dzin gsal la// nyon mongs lnga las bskyed pa yi// d+hU tra sdig chen 'di
60b7(rnying rgyud): byung bas// 'di nyid rab tu gnan par bya// de nas ltung ba bshags gyur nas// chags pa bral bas 'di skad brjod// hU~M lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang // tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// rig pa'i ngangal gnyis med pa'i// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu
61a1(rnying rgyud): bstan// / rkoN+Di'i dkyil du gnas bcas pas// stong gsum thams cad gzhal yas khang // yid kyis dkyil 'khor lha bkod de// skye 'gro ma lus rgyal ba'i sras// byang chub sa nas su dbyer med pas// ji ltar snang ba ju
61a2(rnying rgyud): bzang // kun gzhi ye nas rtog med mnyam// gyi nang sdod bcud chos kyi sku// 'di las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas ni// bu gcig gzhan du mtshol cig/ rdo rje'i dbang nyid 'di longs la// skye med byang chub dran yar gyis// oM AHhUM/ badz+ra She ka badz+ra
61a3(rnying rgyud): hU~M ya/ shin tu lte ba'i mi dag gis// pho la gzhu mo chud bzang gi// mchog ma dag la dang lnga btags// de nas gzhu de rab tu bdub// de nas mda' yang dab btang la// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba des// gsang ba'i thabs kyi gu 'di blang /
61a4(rnying rgyud): mo nyid yin na 'phang nyid gsor// de nas 'di skad brjod par bye// hU~M stong pa nyid kyi klong dkyil du// pha rol phyin bcu'i shes rab dbyings// rtang shes 'phrul gyi tid 'dzin ga dz+ra// brgyan pa'i rin chen mchog ma gter// gsung ni ka la ping kang
61a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud spongs bzhin// mtha' gnyis bral ba'i ye she gnyug ma las// yi dam nang du sgo la ma'i mkha' 'gro zhabs// tshul 'dzin thugs las byung ba'i yang gsum ma// pad bdag tu ltos pa'i ngan song bcom// rgyad drug nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas bsgral
61a6(rnying rgyud): ti// byang chub snying bsgril yig drug byin rlabs/ sdug 'dra/ te/ yid bzhinan hU~M non mang yaM zhes grags/ ze ba yang byung // A l-i thim nas rgyal ba'i sras su gyur// ye shes mchog gi sa la gnas thod nas// rigs lja gsang ba'i gral du gzung bar bya// a
61a7(rnying rgyud): ma rigs kyi bu khyod nyon// khyod kyi rnam shes nr-ing gcas pa// bdag nyid bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// rnam shes hU~M du bsdus nas ni// phaTaHkyis gsang ba'i dbyings su 'phangs// oM AHhU~M swA hA hrIHsarba ta na sho d+hahUM hUM phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha lhan/ de nas phung
61b1(rnying rgyud): ba bstan pa 'o// ga byung ba btu gsungs// zlab dpa ting 'dod ldan pa des// rig pa'i la nas sbyisanupas// chas nyid ma yin chud nas// kyeg cag da can 'dangabya// dalas 'da' bras spangs rgyas dang // sras dang bcas pas rgyags cung
61b2(rnying rgyud): gang // zhing khams lus la brgyan pa bas pa// de nas rigs kyang byed byed pa'i// byung ba'i rtsa rkyen 'di gad de// oM bcom ldan rdul po dgas rdul// 'di yi phung po lnga ba stabs pas// gnyis med myong ba'i mkha' dadzangs ste// sa bon hU~M las babyed
61b3(rnying rgyud): gyur cig/ rigs kyi yab ldang bskyed gyur nas// thugs rje phyogs bcu lagyed par shog/ hU~M sumachen dbyings phyug ldarnams la// 'di yi 'byung ba lnga bstabs pas// gnyis med skyeng ba'i ma kha'i dbyings sa// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/
61b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings phyag ma dra bskyed nas kyang // thugs rje phyogs bcang 'gye dpang shog/ sems dpa' chen po brgyad rnams ma// 'di yin ma shes brgyad bsgrubs pas// gnyis med myong ba'i mi ba dbyings sa// sa bon d+hi las bskyed gyur cig/ sems

61b7(rnying rgyud): cig/ khro ma bzhi ru lces nas kyang // rang gsal 'od dang ldan gyur cig/ hUM bcom ldan kun bzang yab yum la// 'di mi yid chos gnyis bstabs pas// gnyis med sbyong ba'i mkha' dbyings su// sa bon hU~M las bskyed gyur cig/ kun bzang /
62a1(rnying rgyud): yab thar bgyud nas thag/ dgas ma dngas ga/ brtsam ldan thub ba drug rnams pa/ gnyis pag byang chubs la // sa brjod par // mas pa pa / ad+ya da k+Sha
62a2(rnying rgyud): ngan salam gnas marnam bstan// de rnas banas ldan mngan rdzogs des// sems can// dra ba wAl // rab tu brjod ce bka' stsal te// wa rnams sum byed cag ni// thams cad gnyis su med par 'phrul// mnyam med mdzad pa'
62a3(rnying rgyud): skadang // oM srin gyi thugs dam chen po ni// sems can 'byams kyus ma sras kun// sangs rgyas shing dru dag sbyangs pas// phyag na chen po ba slong cig/ gi sang kun la bung gnas pa la// lags dang zug rgyal byin gyis brlangs/
62a4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis byin brlabs da 'bru// g+ha ba tham gnas smra ba tags rgyas kyang // ba'i rnamams pan gyis 'ayongs// thugs// kris nas su med rtsibs// dza rnaM'is pa byung yum tsam par gnyis ma dbyings su gnas spang nas/
62a5(rnying rgyud): rnams stong pa ma mo nas/ 'di la thun gyis bcag sa sa rna ma ya swA don sa ma tho shes/ sa pa langs sgyu / 'dasa'i sgo rgya ba pas na
62a6(rnying rgyud): 'di 'bar ldan bsas// de nas gnyis med dpagasal ba'i// grwa can 'di skad rabatu badzod// hU~M swa ti ga dkar pa dri med dang // tsad ni dpyang ban med gnyis// phreng chub sems kyi thig legasu sa// rtags pa'i grong du 'dre pa la// ma shes
62a7(rnying rgyud): bsangs rgyas yin// sangs rgyas gzhan du mtshol cig/ btsal kyang rang gi dan mo rnyed// tog me mnyam m-i rig pa'i dang // de mi med stong gsal dang 'tshan sra// gsang ba'i dkyil 'bang 'di lnga gsal// rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lpags
62b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la ma yangs na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di la rdzogs// dper na kun la ldang byung bzhin// chas nyid dang spang 'di bltas pas// g+had drug sems can thams cad kyar// sangs mthus pa gcig kyang med// ma 'das sleb pa byang /
62b2(rnying rgyud): gyur nas// sangs rgyas mas su dbang bsrung ngo // oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha sa ma ya mudra NAM/ bo d+ha tsar+d+ha sid+d+ha ku ru e b+hi Shiny+tsahU~M/ sngags kyi 'phro du'i ting 'dzin brtan// de ltar ting 'dzin gsal gyur nas// rtogs pa'i klu chen 'di skad do// e ma byang chub sems
62b3(rnying rgyud): kyi klong brdal bas// kun bzang rig pa'i rang bzhin las// sangs rgyas med cing sems can mod// lnga dang lha min 'dra yang med// 'khor ba med cing myang 'das med// rig pa ye shes gcig pu nyid// 'khor 'das gnyis su btags pa med// nga dang
62b4(rnying rgyud): bdag med mngon sangs rgyas// de phyir sangs rgyas sras nyid do// tsi rta badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas chos nyid bu ma pa des// dri ma dag la dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas zhing las mi g.yo ba'i// dbang bsrur cho ga 'di skad do// oM gnyis med gsal ba'i
62b5(rnying rgyud): oM nyid de// gnyis med dbyings nas b+ha gang thim// yum gyi mkha' la gnas pa dang // bo d+hi tsaM d+has dbang bsrung nas// yi ge 'bru gsam byin gyis badz+ra paM// rigs nges rgyal ba'i sras su bya// phyin chad 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// bskul ba'i sa la
62b6(rnying rgyud): gnas par bya'o// yongs la dbang baspar dbang gi mchog/ gang la ma chags 'dod dgur bsgyur// gnyis su med pa'i pha brang du// spang len med par dbang bsgyur ro// bum pa zlum po'i pho brang du// snad bcud ma lus dbang du bsdus// thig le chen
62b7(rnying rgyud): po'i rgyas btab pas// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas yin// tshe 'das 'di ni rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song 'khor ba'i blta ba bsal// rnam par rtog pa'i 'dod pa bcom// rang gi ye shes lung gis gsal// sngar 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs pa
