64b2(rnying rgyud): mam mu NAM/ oM gdan bting lags so 'jom ldan 'das// kI zla rin chen sna lnga dang // pat+tA ba mdzes stobs ldan pa'i// glang chen rta dang ma bya'i khri// nam mkha' lding dang seng ge dang // ti zla gsal ba'i gdan bting // lce tshogs yid 'a gang
64b3(rnying rgyud): bting ngo // sa ma ya pra b+hAn tsakra tiSh+Tha lhan// hU~M shin tu mdzes pa'i gdan dang ni// rang snang 'od gsal gzhal yas 'di // bla ma sangs rgyas sras bcas dang // rigs lnga khro rgyal yab yum rnams// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// pad+ma karba
64b4(rnying rgyud): ya hA/ oM dmigs med mkha' mnyam snying po'i sra// bcom ldan mag na ba rdo rje ma zhes su// rje brjod med pas mthal rdo rje chos kyis// bya ba rdzogs pa'i dgyur ridas pa gnas// ya shes bcom ldan tog med chos kyisra// 'dzin pa
64b5(rnying rgyud): kyai spem phyag 'tshal ba stod// i 'gag/ mang rdorje 'don nyid 'dzin pa ste// A thAgs rje'i spyan ldan langs spyad rdzogs pa'i sra// b+h+rUM mra ldud bzang lnga ldan dkyil 'khod na// yul rtog mdam ma'i mtshan 'dzin pa// 'gung medadom ldan rigs ra /
64b6(rnying rgyud): she // tsam tha ma ldan// maba' dkyil 'a'ang sbyin// rab sa la mdun tham med// shes thugs rje'i spa lan langs sbyid // snang gas la mangs srung bral gyig 'tshal bstod// mthug pa thabs kyis 'ge ba'i ma stsal/
64b7(rnying rgyud): \u0f7fsra ma dag khrab mcha lugs gad chung can// hUM dbug sumathong tshugs gcig tu bcings pas 'khong rnams skrag/ phyag drug phyag mtshan tha da bsdams pas dgra bgegs 'dul// srul chas brgyad dgasal zheng ma mo dbang du spad// thugs rjes 'gro ba
65a1(rnying rgyud): 'dam nas 'dzin ma ngan banam ldan ldan gyi b+ha// pa la stabs kyis 'dul ba'i wA rga la thAs ma// ma rAg 'jams pa'i thugs ma nan ma \u0f7f// mchags sprul pa'i sgral phyag 'tshal ba snyad// i spags pa ngan ldanasangs su
65a2(rnying rgyud): kun gyi me sa// AHthugs rje'i stobs bdag gzhon nu nyid kyi lu// hU~M sra gsum ye shes rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM AHs+m+R+YuM/ bdag cag sdug bsngal chen pos zin pa la// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa skra drin che// bdag cag 'dod pa'i tshad
65a3(rnying rgyud): pas gdung pa la// thugs rje'i chu rgyan 'bebs pa lu drin che// bdag cag 'khor pa'i gtsong rong dog mor lhung ba la// thugs rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad pa// thabs ldan ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag cag ma rig mun pa'i dbang du 'khyams
65a4(rnying rgyud): pa la// rnam dag sgron me 'degs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa dpag tu med pa lam stod par// sa mkhan rdo rje'i srul phyag 'tshal bstod// dang po'i nor bu ma rnyed rtag tu stong// gzhal yas ston mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal ba stod// las dang nyon
65a5(rnying rgyud): mongs rgyud drug 'khor ba yi// chu bo sgrol mdzad gru la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje sems dpang sprul nas 'gro don mdzad// ye shes mnyam nyid sru la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa nas// thugs rjes 'dren mdzad khyad
65a6(rnying rgyud): ga 'tshal bstod// sku mchog 'bar ba'i ye shes rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// a ti sha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ho mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi mnga' bdag rnams dgongs su gsol/ tshe las 'das pa che ge mo 'di
65a7(rnying rgyud): nga chub kyi snying po la ma gnas pa'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi su bstan pa/ gsung bstan pa/ thugs bstan pa/ yon tan bstan pa/ phrin las bstan pa mi zad pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
65b1(rnying rgyud): mngan par snang ba dang / mi snang ba dang / gsang grags pa dang bcas pa dang / grags pa med pa dang / mad snga dang / 'dul ba dang / mngon pa dang / thugs rtag pa dang bcas pa dang / tag pa med pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
65b2(rnying rgyud): sems rab tu byung ba dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi sku thams cad dang / sprul pa'i sku thams cad dang / longs su thams cad dang / ngo bo nyid kyi sku thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor kyi lha tshigs thams cad la/ bdag rdo rje slob dpon dang /
65b3(rnying rgyud): las 'das shing 'phos pa'i che ge mo zhes bya bas/ gus pa'i tshul gsum gyis phyag 'tshal lo// skyabs su mchi'o// skye ba med pa rdo rje'i su thob par mdzad du gsol/ thabs kyis 'khor ba'i chu bo las bskal du gsol/ ye shes thogs pa med pa'i spyan lnga bstan dugasal/
65b4(rnying rgyud): lha'i sngathams cad mngon par snang bar mdzad du gsal// de nas slob dpon gsang ba'i dbang thob pa des/ ting 'dzin la gnas par byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga la sogs ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa 'bul lo// tshigs bcad gong mde bar par la gtang bar bya'o// da
65b5(rnying rgyud): nas slob dpon de nang gi phrin las gang yang rung ba gzhung bsrang ngo // dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar bsgom/ de nas gong gi mchod pa rnams dang rigs drug gnas nas drang ba'i cho ga yang bya'o// len chags gtor ma'i cho ga yang bya'o// tshe 'das pa'i rigs kyi bu la
65b6(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang / gnas spang ba'i cho ga yang bya'o// chos kyi sku'i gnas su brtan par bzhugs par bsam zhing / rigs drug gi gnas nas yang nas yang du drang ngo // mchod pa thams cad kyi sngags ni/ oM pra b+hany+tsa kra pra yA swA/ badz+ra pU dza haM/ ma ha ka ru Ni kI yA/
65b7(rnying rgyud): sam yA mu dra/ badz+ra d+ha pa d+hA/ badz+ra puSh+pe pu/ badz+ra gan+d+he gan/ badz+ra ni rti g+haM/ badz+ra gI tI hrIHbadz+ra ti sa dza ha/ badz+ra A lo ka hrIH/ badz+ra ha ha ha he hri hri/ badz+ra ma hA sarba kun la rag sha ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA/ ma hA mud A/ de ltar sngags chen dbadz+rad
66a1(rnying rgyud): nas/ mchod pa can sa bdang/ ba bar gshegs sa bas ldan 'das// bad 'a ga gags pa khartsal chags// rlurang ba gshegs pa ya 'o// rnam mtha' ma nas kyas// med pa rnam mtha
66a2(rnying rgyud): can// kun pa nang ma rgyad san ma chog tu // a a la la ta// rigs la khaga'aju bcas bral// pa'i chos rnams sa// gra ban pa 'i brjid pa 'as// 'ag 'an du gags gnal// tshalas 'das ma gsa'ang dang /
66a3(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rdo stob dpon dang / mtshang dang lus t+pal 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi sgrib pa gnyis sbyangs/ tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs nas/ thugs dam rgyamachi yongs sunas ga bur cig/ rnams chag thams cad mong chung bar gyur
66a4(rnying rgyud): byin dbang thams cad bzlog par gyur cig/ bdud kyi dpung rnams tshams shog/ tshe lnga 'das pa ga shad dang thal bar ltang cig/ chog de nags ni mchod pa kun gyi ban bar du shes par bya// dra ni rgyal sring sna bdun gyis mtshad pa ni// sbomadzad pa
66a5(rnying rgyud): rjen dzini// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin rdzogs gtig// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad do// mnyan ya tshig na bde ba gyis// \u0f7f/ tshogs rin pa Na yigs// mangs par kris ning snyas pa dang // kun 'byung na can phung po'i bar//
66a6(rnying rgyud): legs nga thung mchag bsal/ )/ rin chen rnam pa sna chags dang // rgyan dang dpag bas ma ston pa'i tshal// ni/ ska ky-i ma tshogs sa bcad pa ste// \u0f7f/ bla zi rgyal lamarnan bcu'agadags// de shal rje smin memed// 'a
66a7(rnying rgyud): chags rnams kyis// rang la mngon par btsun pa dang // lha dang lnga longal spyod pas// tho gang la sogs bas pa la sa gyis// phyogs brgyanam mkha' khams bkang nas// bapa dkyil 'amang chags la 'bral// 'gro mam ma mang ras mas sa /
66b1(rnying rgyud): ban 'bras/ don du bzhes su gsol// traM/ zhing 'dir ngan chen sna bdun gyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir// nyin ra shes rab can gyis mchod// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mdzag 'di
66b2(rnying rgyud): rnams// phyag rgya sbyar ba'i tshul bzhes la// tshul bzhin rgyas par dbul bar bya'o// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// trai rat+na pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ da ni dug lnga ye shes lnga'i mchod pa 'bul te/ hUM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum
66b3(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad kun// zhe sdang spod pa'i las gang rnams// rdo rje rigs kyi las spyod de// dmigs pa stsol ba'i mchod par bzhes// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags stong pa'i las ga' rnam
66b4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rigs kyi las spyod de// thams cad yab yum gnyis med sbyor// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// gti mug spyod pa'i las gang rnams// bde gshegs rigs kyi mdzad spyod
66b5(rnying rgyud): de// tshe 'das dan du pa zhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// nga rgyal skyed pa'i las rnam+ba kun// ngan chen rig kyi las spyod de// dmig pa'i dam tshig mnod par bzhis// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig
66b6(rnying rgyud): rten na// srid gsum sems can thams cad kun// phrag drog spyod pa'i las rnams gang // las kyi rigs kyi las spyod de// dmig pa'i dmachog mchod par bzhes// tshe 'das don du bzhes su gsol// 'dod chag zhe sdang gti mug Ne// nga rgyal phrag dog spyod pa rnam// rdo rje'i theg par rab rtogs te/
66b7(rnying rgyud): mchog gi mchod par bzhes su gsol// tshe 'das don byed pa zhes su gsol// yal la ho/ dug lnga ye shes lnga yi mchod pa 'di phul bas/ tshe las 'das pa cheg mo dang / bdag cag rdo rje slob dpon dang / mchod dang yu mngal 'khor dang bcas
67a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi sleb pa rnam pa gnyis byang / chags rnam pa gnyi rdzogs nas/ thugs dam yongs su bskung bar gyur cag// nyams chag por chud par gyur cig/ gyen rnams bzag par gyur cig/ bdud dbang choms shig
67a2(rnying rgyud): 'das gshed dang bral bar gyur cig/ da ni phyag rgya bzhi'i mchod pa dbul te// hUM nam mkha'i mtha' klas 'jig rten nas// srid gsum sems can ma lus kun// gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te// sku mchog phyag rgya'i
67a3(rnying rgyud): mchod par bzhes// sgra du grags pa ci snyed pa// thams cad ma lus sngags kyi tshig/ gsung mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// sems kyi rtog pa ci snyed pa// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag bsam yas pa// brags mchog phyag rgya'i mchod par ba zhes// dge dang
67a4(rnying rgyud): mi dge'i las gang rnams// thams cad sangs rgyas mdzad spyod de// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes// kun nas kun tu thams cad kun// dngos po la sogs brtan g.yo kun// thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bde gshegs phyag rgya'i mchod pa
67a5(rnying rgyud): bzhes// da ni bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dbul te/ hUM bde gshugs rigs kyi thugs dam pa skang ba ni// dri chen dang ldan spos kyi bsung mchog 'di// gti mug shes rab 'bar bar byin 'arlab mdzad skad du// kut+ta rigs kyi thugs dam bskad gyur cig/
67a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskad pa ni// mu tig dkar po de med byang chub sems// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu ste 'khor ba 'dzin// zhe sdang bdud kyi rigs rnams zhi bar mdzad skad du// rdo rje rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hUM pad+ma rigs kyi thugs
67a7(rnying rgyud): dar bskang ba ni// rak+Sha zla ga ma dri med byang chub sems// thams cad bskyed pa'i rgya ste 'khor ba 'dzin// 'dod chags len pa med pa'i rigs pa ste// sbyor ba rnam par dge pa mdzad sbed du// pad+ma rigs kyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ hUM rin can
67b1(rnying rgyud): gas kyi thugs dam paskang ban// sha chan shes rab 'bar ba'i phying rnangs kyis// khams gsums lus dbang du bsus nas kyang // dargyal bdud kyi rigs rnams 'i'ang mdza ska du// rin can rags kyi thugs dam pa sang gyur cag/ tu/
67b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi thugs dam pasang ba ni// rdo rje las kyi mu ste bad+ha ya mr-i ta// phrag dag chen po'i las kyi sbyang ste// las kyi rigs kyi thugs rnam bskang gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems kyi mchod pa 'bral te// oMd med rnam dag nas mkha'i dang bcwa
67b3(rnying rgyud): aHlog rtog mtshan ma mang po'i ston phung rnams// hUM ye shes nyi zer 'od kyis rab bsal te// dag pa'i don du rtags te ma chad para'i 'bral// stod ma rdzas bdud ce lnga dang ye shes lnga// AH lnga chos lnga'i rang bzhin dbyer med ci
67b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin dag pa nyid kyi dag pa nyid mchod nas// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim par 'bul// shes rab sems pa yum gyi gzhal yas su// rgyal pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod banyid de// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sdong mcho
67b5(rnying rgyud): kyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chags la mchod par 'bul// oM ldan dkar la 'tsher ba'i yon tan las// staHldan dmar la dngas pa'i byin dpas kyis// hUM ldan bde chen gar mdzad gar gyi dbang phyug che// bde chen sbal dbang gi mchod
67b6(rnying rgyud): ba 'bul// I dag cing gsal ba shel gyi dkyil 'khor du// AHpra zhing mnyan pa gser gyis lug rgyud bzhin// hU~M dbyer med dbyings su gcig pas na// byang chub sems su rtogs nas rig pa nyid la mtshang par 'bul// A bkra shis
67b7(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// AH'phrul gal yid 'ong mos brgyan pa 'di// hU~M 'ang dang ngu bsgra dang dri la sogs// dbyings nas btan nas dbyings su mchod par 'bral// tshe 'das don du mchod pa bzhes su gsal// thabs dang shes rab gsang ba
68a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sams nam dzad pa bral ba la mags pa'o// dan mad du d+hA pag ma macad pa tha 'di lta dang// na pa dag sgrib blangs phreng gsum sbyin thal da// stan ka'i thugs lang mnga'al yang 'azhing/
68a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan pade gshegs dkyil 'khor can// gi khro 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yum// shrIs rab lha mo rigs kyi yum la sogs// rnal 'byor sgrub dang rig 'dzin thams cad la// tshe 'das
68a3(rnying rgyud): don phyir mchod cing phyag 'tshal lo// mi mnyam mnyam pas nam mkha' khyab pa dang // bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyis rab brgyan pas// yid bzhin sku mchog yon tan mtha' yas gter// shes rab dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad dang /
68a4(rnying rgyud): gyaphyag brnyan 'du 'phro rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs// rnal 'byor chen pos mchod pa mang po 'tshal// dgyes pha rol mo'i mchod pa 'di bzhes lnga// oM gzhong pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// gtor ma ye shes phyag rgya'i tshogs// tshe dang gal gnyis
68a5(rnying rgyud): mthun pasdebs nas// rak+ta dmar gyis thig bkye zhing // mi bzung gtor ba'i gtor ma 'di// 'bul ni bla ma lha la 'bul// mchod ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod// sbyor ldan tshogs su bkram ste 'bul lags na// tshe 'das don du bzhes
68a6(rnying rgyud): su gsol// oM AHhUM ma hA ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho/ b+ha li d+ha kha kha khA hi/ a la la ho/ rmad du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// da ni gar gyi mchod pa dbul bar bya ste/ oM pad+mAn+ta krita hA ya grI ba hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ des ni ting 'dzin gsal ba dang / 'di skad
68a7(rnying rgyud): do// hUM bcom ldan pad+ma ha ru dang // pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri la// 'bar ba'i gar gyis bskor ba ni// srid gsum 'jom mdzad dbyings phyag gi ri ma// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tso rI ma// stong gsum rgyal mdzad rgyas byed pa mo ha// ma lus za byed rder
68b1(rnying rgyud): kyang sa// bad chan zhing nga'arnyan ma dbug ste// bskapa nas 'apa du rgya bas ma da hA// thags rje'i 'jig nyen grol myang dras sha ste// 'bang ma snang gsum spangs pa dang d+ha to// gang dang dbyangs kyi mchod pa'o// rje 'das snying bya d+hA na /
68b2(rnying rgyud): dpal gyi thugs dam paskang bur cig/ bdag cag g.yer dam bskang gyung cig// hU~M bcom ldan pad+ma he ru dang // pad+ma kro ny+tsi shwa rI la// phra men gar gyis bskor ba ni// 'dzi pa'i sdug bsngal ga cad byed sing ta na// 'che dag bdud 'dza
68b3(rnying rgyud): ma// nga gang bgags kyi tshogs brtsas sre ga lA// rdo rje bdud 'dub zazu shAn ma~M// mchogs mkhrag 'thung rtag byed kyi ta ma// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshe 'jigs k+She kam// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kA ka ma// 'ge ba'i don mdzod
68b4(rnying rgyud): thon 'brang u ma// gar dang dbyangs kyi mtshad pa 'das// tsha 'das sgrib pa byed myur nas// dpal gyi thugs dam bskangs gyur nas// bdag cig dbyar dam bskang gyur cig/ zas na thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ sdebacom ldan pa he R+Ya dang /
68b5(rnying rgyud): ma chen kr-iSh+NI sha ni mA// ske mgar gyis bskor ba ni// rta gdang dkar mi lpags kyu 'dren// phag gdang nag mo mche zhugs 'phen// se za dmar mi lcags sdig sdom// thal byed lding nag dril 'khal dgyes// gar dang dbyangs kyi mad
68b6(rnying rgyud): 'dres// tshe 'das sgrib pa byang gyur nas// dpal gyi thugs dam bskang gyur cig/ sgo ma'i thugs dam bskang gyur sdig/ bdag cag dbyar dam pakang gyur cig/ ya la la ho// gar dang ye shes mchod pa 'di phul pas/ tsha las 'das
68b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshig mo 'di dang / bdag cag rdo rdza skab dpon dang / mchad dang su mjal 'kha dang bcas pa rnams kyi/ sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis byung / tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs nas/ thugs dam rgyam ma yongs su bgang bar gyur ci/
69a1(rnying rgyud): na sun rgyu na ca na da sa da na su ma du na/
69a2(rnying rgyud): su na
69a3(rnying rgyud): chu smra ma
69a4(rnying rgyud): sa
69b1(rnying rgyud): shaya/ Ang na// da kyi / te/ dan chags bskal bar bya// mtshanga'i byag rgyagacas la 'disad do// rgyung ni byed can // 'ams gsums sa draska pa 'dang // ga gang du 'arung ba dang /
69b2(rnying rgyud): dus la gsang nang bya// da ni ge 'bung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra byar chags pa yi// dmar chen bsgyel ba'i rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi ma len rdzogs dang ro // ma rungs 'dod lam chags shing // dam ga ta sgra dang dgra chen po// hwag
69b3(rnying rgyud): byams dang ldan pa pos// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsla bar Ta/ ho/ ts+tshi t+te ru ka mad+ha sarba dudz+nyAn/ sa ma ya/ pudra mA ra Sha kha Sha hrI tshaM hraM dang / be p+na hrI phaT/ l-i hUM baM hoH/ shrIhi ruka/ mahA badz+ra sa ma ya m+bu d+ya/ mA hA mA sa/ sahA /
69b4(rnying rgyud): spyad/ mahA pa na an ta/ 'cha' 'o// b+h+yad+d+haH/ de ltar mame phyi'i bzhung jogs nas// reg pa bshags du gas la bag pa// rigs drug gnas sa rjor na// dkying khangs tu shing mthad rdzogs pa// gsum
69b5(rnying rgyud): sngags tshig dang dgongs pas bsdu// phyag rgya dang ni sngags tshig go// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po dbang bskur gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa tshe 'das pa'i bdun tshigs gnyis pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra tra
69b6(rnying rgyud): rmi ma hA su ka na mA/ bod skad du/ tshe las 'das pa rnams kyi bdun tshogs tha ma la rang rang gi zas gtad shid kyi lung chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma dbang chen nyi
69b7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyi bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis/ rnal 'byor pa tshe 'das pa rnams kyi bdun tshogs tha ma la/ rang rang gi zas gtad pa'i chog 'di gsungs so// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// ngas ni spang ba'i dkyil 'khor
70a1(rnying rgyud): rna cu tu ma du du tu rgyu ga tu sa na/ su du
70a2(rnying rgyud): sa sa
70a3(rnying rgyud): sunan dus sa
70a4(rnying rgyud): sa zhi na
70b1(rnying rgyud): yang dgod// drug pa dag la pha zang lam// thu pa chen po'i gzugs kyang bkod// mchod pa gang bzhin rdzogs par bya// rigs drug drangs shing dbang rdzogs bya// de nas dpa' bra nyid la// nye ba'i 'khor gyis dran zhus pa//
70b2(rnying rgyud): ldan dbang chen snga// maN+Dal rim pa de ltar na// lan chags zan gtod cho ga gsung // de nas dpa' bos bka' stsal pa// kye ma nye ba'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar bya rim rdzogs nas ni// sngags pa ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang ma'i gnas
70b3(rnying rgyud): su bder 'dug nas// dang po'i gnas nas rab bkug la// 'gugs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni// rab tu bstan pa 'di lta ste// sngags 'dis thams cad bkug par bsam/ oM badz+ra ang+ku sha da dza/ oM badz+ra kro Na hrI phaT/ do hUM s+pha ra Na
70b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya sngags kyu lta bus ni// ting 'dzin rab tu gsal ba yis// tshe 'das rab tu khugs nas ni// dri ma dag la thim par bsam// de nas sngags 'di rab 'arjod pa// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi nyid kyis// 'gugs dang 'ching dang 'dzin pa dang // rab
70b5(rnying rgyud): tu sdom pa'i sngags 'di'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa ma ya/ ang ku sha dza dza/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya stam/ sa ma ya lhan/ sngags de lan bdun bzlas pa dang // ting 'dzin rab tu gsal ba dang // phyag rgya rab tu bskur ba yis// bsdams nas 'jug
70b6(rnying rgyud): dbang med par bsam// de nas tshe 'das de nyid la// bu dang bu mo yod pa na// shA sta la sogs sgo nga dang // khur ba mang dang zas sna rnams// ci 'byor pa yis snod bkang la// gdung ba'i mchi ma rab 'byin cing // gdung ba'i skye sngags 'o dod 'bod//
70b7(rnying rgyud): ngag tu zas dang skom thogs la// sbyor ba ngu 'bod las byed cing // zas gtad cho ga 'di skad do// hU~M zas longs tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// nga ni dbang chen dpal gyi sku// sangs kyis sku dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// ye shes 'od zer rab 'phro bas// thams
71a1(rnying rgyud): cad 'dod pa tshon byed pa// bcud chen mchog stong ldan par// stong parang snang zad kyis brdzun// stong gsum bzud du mnyam sbyar nas// sku gsum yinas bdud rtsi ste// dag pa dri med mchog chen dade// rang byung rta
71a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings nyid nas// stong pa nyid la mchod pa 'bral// rig pa skye med dkyil yangs nas// yaM shes lnga la pa 'od 'gros shing // chos sgra nams b+ha'i lta bu la// longs su sprin zung lta bu ste// sum klu hi ma'i 'od bzhin sngar// sku gsum rtsal
71a3(rnying rgyud): khams nas// mchod chen rnam par dag pa yis// rig pa nyid la rig pa'i cho 'phrul mchod// dkon mchog gsum dang sku gsung thugs// mchod pa'i rten du gyur pa la// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mchod// rgyal ba rnams dang bdag slor phyer// dmachog
71a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs thams cad dang // phyogs kyang rigs kyi lha rnams dang // dam thog slong nga 'i phreng ma dang // dam tsun phung po khor bcas pa// bza' bca' longs su rdzas kyis mchod// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // 'thung po 'khor dang ba
71a5(rnying rgyud): pa la// rdo rje'i longs spyod rnam lnga 'bul// sa dang bar snang khams la gnas// gzugs med rigs rnams ci snyed par// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'bul// mngon par sdang dang mngon par grags// mngon par rgyu ba'i gzugs can la//
71a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i lan chags zas 'di longs// sngar srid 'gro ba rigs drug dang // tshe 'das rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// rang gi tshe rabs sun gyi brgyags// longs spyod tshe yi bcugs 'di longs// 'di ni sngon gyi dam tshig ste// de phyir khyod kyis zas 'di longs//
71a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes dag pa'i rang gis sbyangs// stong pa nyid kyi gzhong pa ru// tshe 'dzin zas dang ri mchog // mar dang khur ba zas sna dang // 'bru bcud zong dang bzung ba'i tshogs// sna tshogs yid ngong thams cad ni// tshe 'das khyod la gter du 'bul/
71b1(rnying rgyud): dgras bye na bas 'ad 'das// mnyam pa dal nas na nyid pa// gags pa'as mdu gnas su babyud// mod yA grangs 'du 'dus// sa nyid thabs la bzlas pa pas// song nyid nyam kyang nga// tshe 'das byed la rnas
71b2(rnying rgyud): gtad kyis// khor lo'i selus su ma byed par// rdzas 'di longs la rang sems ltos// stong pa nyid kyi grong dkyil nas// ye shes dag pa'i 'od 'dres pas// chos nyid lam du gnyis med pa sgram// rkyo gnyis po stong pa'i phyir// tshe 'das rigs
71b3(rnying rgyud): bu khyod kyang // phyi nas rgyu 'di malen par// sde med byang chub dran par gyis// chos nyid rang skad dbang thob shog/ yang dag nges pa'i ltung 'di nyon// rin chen rten dang phung po'i dkyil// rang rig gsal ba'i sgo phye bas// 'di ni sangs rgyas zhing khams
71b4(rnying rgyud): ste// 'di las zu gcig ma g.yo zhig/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu longs// snong nyid gsal ba'i sgo phye bas// rang rig ye shes rtogs pa mnyam// zas 'di longs la rang sdung ltos// 'di ni khyod kyi gtan sred yid// bu dang bu mo gnyis kyis
71b5(rnying rgyud): kyang // gdung ba'i shugs phyung zan 'di longs// gdong nas mchi ma bton nas ni// bu yis zas gtad zas 'di longs// brtse ba'i smre sngags 'di bton pas// ngag 'di nyon la gnas su dengs// 'khor ba 'di ni sdug bsngal che// byas pas
71b6(rnying rgyud): mi zin las yod pas// 'khor ba 'di ru ma gnas par// rang gi chos nyid 'od regasal// bde ba can gyi zhing khams na// stong pa chen po yul raM yangs// 'khor ba 'di na gcod ngo che// yangs pa can gyi zhing khams na// chos nyid 'od gsal
71b7(rnying rgyud): tu / nga/ pa/ na sa
72a1(rnying rgyud): ga sagapa ga 'a 'das pa/ na rgyas nga nga ga nga / saspru ba dang gan nga/ mangs na sa mas ca/ 'dag dan mapar da /
72a2(rnying rgyud): pa rnams la dgongs su gal la// 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum po dang / nyan thos dga'aphags pa rang rgyal dang / dgra bcom pa dang / kun du zhugs pa dang / sa la gnas pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams dang / rgyal
72a3(rnying rgyud): sras dang bzlas pa rnams dgongs sugs pa lo// ho 'byung ba'i tshogs stong phrag brgyang bu dang / mkha' la r+g+ha bi dA li dgas rnams sasu gsol/ gzhan 'a tshulas 'das ba'i rna pa 'byong che ga mo chod dang / rdo rje mched dang wam dral rnams da
72a4(rnying rgyud): su gsol lo// gzhan yang gas sngags la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dang drug chen po rnams dgongs su gsam po// do 'i tsha las 'das pa tshig ma da la phrin gyi zhes gtad cing / slob zeng ba'i lam snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das rig
72a5(rnying rgyud): s+ho
72a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus na/ yab rgyal po snang 'od tshe 'das pa las/ sras rgyal bu'i 'khor lo stong ldan gyis gdung ba'i mchi ma phyung / brta ba'i dgra bton/ gus pa'i shugs phyud/ 'dongs pa'i 'dod bos nas/ bu'i zas gtad pas yun gyi sring dang dge ba'i yul du
72a7(rnying rgyud): gyur pa de bzhin du/ do nub tshe 'das pa rdo rje cheg mo thod la/ bu che ge mo 'dis/ bu'i zas 'di gtad pas yun gyi sris su gyur nas/ dge ba'i phul du grwar ci// sngon byung ba'i dus na/ yul mag d+hA'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po gzugs can snying
72b1(rnying rgyud): byang 'das pa nga/ dum ldang ba thon sus/ gdung ba'i bas byung gang ba bya'o gagatan nas/ zlamang mas gtad pas sun \u0f7f/ smos sa gyur das/ dag bla bral na thur ba dang d+ha/ dran pa tham tshag sogs bya bdas/ las byu/
72b2(rnying rgyud): pa/ bu mos gdung ba'i ma'i ma byung / brtse ba dag gi sde sngags bton nas zas 'di gtad pas/ yun gyi sres su gyur nas/ dge ba'i phul du gyur cig/ sngon byung gi dus na/ byaM rgo dpung po'i ri'i lho phyogs su/ yang rtsal ro ma skyes dgra tshe 'das par/
72b3(rnying rgyud): dge slong kA ri'i bus zhang zas 'di gtad pas/ chags pa'i mdud pa grol ba de bzhin du/ do nub tsha 'das pa'i che ge moM b+h+r-i la/ zhang pa che ge myos zan 'di gtad pas/ 'jig rten 'di la chags pa lang tsha ba dang bral nas/ khyod bde ba lag
72b4(rnying rgyud): par gyur cig/ sngon byung gi dus na/ ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' bya rgod phung po'i re'i lho phyogs na bzhugs pa'i tshe/ yab rgyal po ka rma 'od bzang tshe 'das pa'i tshe na/ dge slong ma pad+ma spyan gyis gdung ba'i mchi ma byung nas/ bden
72b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos bshad/ ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa'i zas phul nas/ 'jam pa'i gtam gyis bkrol nas/ snga mo'i su zas gtad pas/ 'khor ba'i sgo tshad pa de bzhin du/ de nub tsha las 'das pa khyod la/ sra mo che ge mos spu zas 'di gtang
72b6(rnying rgyud): cing gdung ba'i mchi ma phyung nas/ byams pa'i gtam gyis bkrol nas/ brtse ba'i sgo sngags bton nas zas 'di gtad pas 'khor ba'i sku 'gags nas/ bde ba'i lam dang 'phrad par gyur cig/ sngon byung gi dus na/ ston pa 'od srungs chen po bzhugs pa
72b7(rnying rgyud): dus/ rgyal po sdang mdzad 'od ces bya ba/ tshe 'das pa'i dus na/ 'khor chen po brgyad kyis gdung ba'i mchi ma phyung nas/ brtse ba'i ngag bton cing / bden pa'i chos bshad cing / dkon pa'i zas bstabs nas/ zas gtad pa de bzhin du/
73a1(rnying rgyud): do rlab tse 'das pa khyod la 'khor cheg mo rnams kyis gdung ba'i mche ma phyung nas/ brtse ba dag bton/ gus pa'i shugs phyung dkon pa'i zas btsal nas/ sdug bsngal cher sprad nas/ tshe 'das che ge mo khyod la yun
73a2(rnying rgyud): gyi zas gtad pas/ 'di longs la snang ba 'di 'das pa'i pha rol na/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams yod kyis der song zhig/ sngon byung gi dus na/ ston pa shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i gdon na bzhugs tsam na/ bram ze'i ngogs kyi sras
73a3(rnying rgyud): 'od ldan chen po zhes bya ba de tshe 'das pa'i tshe/ yum blo gros rgyan bzang ma'i/ sras tshe 'das nas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig na/ ston pa nyid kyis bden pa'i chos bshad/ ma yis gdung ba'i mchi ma phyung nas/ brtse bya'i nga
73a4(rnying rgyud): bton/ gus pa'i shugs phyung / dkon pa'i zas btsal nas/ tshe 'das pa lA ma yi zas gtad pas/ yun gyi sris su gyur nas/ dge ba'i phul du gyur pa de bzhin du/ do nub sras tshe 'das che ge mo la/ yum che ge mo zhes bya bas gdung ba'i tsho che ma
73a5(rnying rgyud): phyung nas/ brtse ba'i dag bton wA ti/ gus pa'i shugs phyung nas/ dkon pa'i zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa sna tshogs gtad pas/ tshe 'das pa'i yun gyi sris dang / dge ba'i phul du gyur cig/ do nub tshe 'das pa'i che ge mo khyod zas 'di longs
73a6(rnying rgyud): la/ mi snang ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du song zhig/ gnas 'di dang khyod gnyis 'brel pa med pas 'di du mi 'dug par gzhan du dengs shig/ do nub tshe 'das khyod kyi don du/ dkon pa'i ro mchog dang zas sna tshogs tshad dang / sha dang / mar dang /
73a7(rnying rgyud): khur ba dang / sha ba'i sha la sog te ro mchog gi sha sA dgu dang / sgong dang / gang bu dang / shing tog la sogs te/ kha ma bye ba bcu gsum dang / ka ra dang / bur ma dang / sbrang rtsi la sogs te/ 'dod pa tshims byed kyi ngo mchog
73b1(rnying rgyud): drug dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / dar ba dang / mar la sogs ci thog sna dgu dang / gro thug dang / 'o thug dang / 'bras thug la sogs te/ bro ba'i ro mchog bzhi dang / de la sogs te ro mchog gi rnam pa khab dang / mdar pa dang / bska ba dang /
73b2(rnying rgyud): sreg pa dang / skyur ba la sogs ro mchog sna tshogs pa dang / zas sna tshogs 'byor tshad kyi zas 'di gtad kyis longs shig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs te/ dag cing 'byor pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo yis longs shig/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ lam
73b3(rnying rgyud): ba sta b+ha du la yA/ a li u li hA li ta pa li ar+g+haM pra tIn+na ho/ zhes brjod cing drangs/ de nas rigs drug gnas nas drangs shing dbang bskur/ zas sna dang skom nyid 'byor tshang dpral/ bden pa bdar/ chos bshad/ dge ba'i las ce nus bya/ spang skor
73b4(rnying rgyud): bklag/ nye'u 'don bya'o// mchod sbyin gyi gtor ma gtang / mchod pa ci nus bya/ bshags pa bya/ gsol ba gdab/ sku gdung ring bsrel mchod pa bya/ sangs rgyas drang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das/ pad+ma dbang gi
73b5(rnying rgyud): lha tshogs la phyag 'tshal zhing / gsol ba gad ba/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs kun nas/ dA ma sri mnan/ tshwa 'das pa la lam bstan/ gtor ma gtong / dkyil 'khor bsdu/ phyis ldang mi nus pa'i dbang gis gzing mnan bya/ dkyil 'khor
73b6(rnying rgyud): gyi zhal bsro/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyis rlog la/ gseg ma'i sa bon btab la/ 'di ma skyes kyi bar du ma ldangs shig/ ces gzir mnan bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor pa'i bdun tshig tha ma bstan pa'i le'u ste
73b7(rnying rgyud): lnga pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma lA sarba sra ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ lam ston bsgom pa'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gnyis med kyi rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
74a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das pa d+ha ba gas pa dag 'a sa/ nyab 'ang bar dmas kyis 'di skad ces gas pa hU~M// byathabacom ldan pa d+mad bdag bdag nyid can pa/ sems can pa 'ong ba las bskal nas 'dra ba can gyi zhib khams sulas
74a2(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i tshog bshad du gsol/ de nas dpal chen nyid kyis bka' stsal pa// kyim nyon cag de rje 'dzin// rlob po na gsang pa'i dbang thob des// maN+Da la jug pa'i gzhung rdzogs nas// lam bstan ldang ni ga sbyin par bya// mched dang/
74a3(rnying rgyud): chags ni rab rdzogs nas// gsang ba'i slob dpon na nyid kyis// rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa yi// cho ga 'di ni brtsam par bya// maN+Dal zlum po'i snying dag nas// thub pa'i b+hag ma nanaspangs nas na// chog 'dis sdug bsngal
74a4(rnying rgyud): gnas nas drangs// b+ha pa ga 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste// tsha 'das thab rigs kyi pa// 'dil chags par ma byed par// bdeb rgyan mo zhing rngu bzung // go srang 'di yis rje dang bzlas// zhe sdang blad kyi bdud yin pas// drang ma srid par 'thams pa yang //
74a5(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rang dgar spyod pas 'khor// da lha sdug bsngal spyod pa yang // zhe sdang bdag tu bzung bas nongs// nyan cig tshe 'dras rigs kyi bu// zhe sdang bdag tu ma 'dzin zhig/ zhe sdang bdag tu 'dzin pa na// zhe sdang chen po'i chu bsngags nas// 'gro
74a6(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gnas su 'gro// sdug bsngal sna tsho gas khyed kyis kyang // btsa ba sreg gnas nas thar thabs med// mtshon ma'i char dang mi rkyen 'ongs// 'ching dang chad pa'i las rnams dang // 'gugs 'ching 'asdam pa'i lus rnams kyis// yun ring zar ba
74a7(rnying rgyud): gnas med pas// nyam thag drug pas la spong bar 'gyur// rnalas nga byud/ na dmangs shig/ min dag kyis su thon spyang \u0f7fphaT// ma / rigs kyi za/ gyi 'das pa'i tshigs myod cad cig/ 'phem
74b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'di'i 'og na/ dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og rol na/ na rag dmyal ba'i 'jig rten bya ba shin tu sdug bsngal dang ldan pa tsha ba dang / grang ba'i sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig char spyod pa/ sems can nyon mongs pazhe sdang cher spyad pa lung ba'i gnas
74b2(rnying rgyud): yod de/ de ru ci srid lhung srid na/ bskal pa lnga brgya'i bar du thar pa'i thabs med pas/ der tshe 'das pa khyod kyis nyon mongs pa zhe sdang la sprad pa'i dbang gis/ dmyal ba'i gnas der lhung srid na/ zhing khams de 'dul ba'i thub pa gshin rje chos kyi
74b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i tshe khyod kyis sangs rgyas yid pa dran pa dang / chos yid la dran pa dang / ngage 'dun yid la dran pa dang / yid sa yid la dran pa dang / ting 'dzin yid la dran pa dang / rdo rje'i slob dpon yid la dran par gyes la/
74b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal ba 'dul ba'i thub pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhig/ de nas yi dwags kyi thub pa blangs nas 'di
74b5(rnying rgyud): skad do// hUM 'khor ba'i chu ni ma rig pa// ma rig sems kyi rtsad bcad na// 'khor bar 'dzin pa yod ma yin/ kA/ nyon cig cho 'das rigs kyi bu// 'jig rten 'di 'dra sdug bsngal che// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// 'dod chags 'di yis khyod ra
74b6(rnying rgyud): bkrus// 'dod cing chags pa'i las rnams ni// byang chub snying po sleb pa'i rgya// dang po 'khor bar lung ba yang // yid dang chos med snang ba la// med pa yod par spyad pas bslus// 'dod chags rang dgar spyad pas nongs// da lta'i chags pa chen po
74b7(rnying rgyud): yang // 'dod chags yul du bzung bas nongs// nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// 'dod cing chags par ma byed cig/ 'dod cing chags par byas pa na// 'dod chags yul snang dgrar langs nas// bkres skom sdug bsngal
75a1(rnying rgyud): snyan// dgas sul na drugs sa na sa ldan ga du sa chu/ nga pa nga / / smrag smra/

75a3(rnying rgyud): du ba dadag chengs 'azung zhing/ banas na can pa nas bya 'i ye dgus kyi nga tan yang / dani da dgas byas kying drupa las rgyags pa yirnapas rigs kyi ga nga dri du dang dang sadapas gangs pa'i 'o
75a4(rnying rgyud): da pang dgas pas lazhin mo// da kyis pa sring sridan/ bskal pas ma bcu 'ar drubyung ba'i banas mdzan/ ma'adas bakhyud kyas tan bangs pa 'dang 'gas la spyad pa'i dbang byis/ migatan pa sa dang shAng spri sa/ 'ang 'bas pa
75a5(rnying rgyud): na ba ba sa shes rnab/ 'das mi 'ab / na pa rdzung blo thub rnams pa/ shin tu sa pa nga chul can cig yad byam/ dal dubs su 'dang pa'i byer/ dang kyi sangs nas yod pa dran pa sa shinas yang la
75a6(rnying rgyud): dgas da 'du 'ad lanan pa sa pa shig/ na gyiskye pa 'dran par / ban ming lad pa mas nas/ 'a po na byed brgyan pa stsa la/ sasathas theg
75a7(rnying rgyud): pa// 'gas pa dig la na'i rkye kyi la// bdug pa 'dul bar bye pa'i rgyas // byas sum kyi 'gas bdas spangs thas shi// denas kyi sang gi thub bzangs par da // se bgasod cig na
75b1(rnying rgyud): na / na nga
75b2(rnying rgyud): shes rab sgring pa'i rgya mi nangs// gti stag 'di la ma smad cig/ dang bang kho bar ldar ba yang // gti ga myos pa'i dab gis nongs// das rang snang dngos med pa// ga ti phrag ring dag spyod pas nad/ nacig tshe 'das rigs kyi Ta/
75b3(rnying rgyud): myug krugs par ma byong cig/ rdugs shing thos pa med pa na// thos pasam shes rab mi shes pas// dz+wal song thugs pa'i gnas su 'gro// rmugs shing dran pa med par 'gyur// gcig la gcig za'i sdug bsngal ni// gcig la
75b4(rnying rgyud): khyod kyis myong // shin tu rmugs par byud ba yis// lus 'di yang yang 'pho bar 'gyur// de ru khyod nyid skyes gyur na// lhag bsngal nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// shes rab sgrom bu 'di phongs shig/ oM sa rbapra
75b5(rnying rgyud): a sun+di s+pha ra NA phaT/ oM ma ho/ tsha las 'das pa che ga mo khyod nyon cig/ 'di nas ri bo chen po'i mtshams bzhin gling chen po bzhi'i bar bar na mun pa'i 'jig rten dpag tu med pa yod pas/ da tsar byol song gi rigs stong phrag du ma yod pa/ de na
75b6(rnying rgyud): gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba'i skal pa las bde ba skad cig kyang med par gnas pas/ de ni sems can nyon mongs pa gti mug shas mer spyad pa 'ba' zhig skyes pa'o// den lung ba'i gnas yod pas/ zhing khams der ma chags par/ den
75b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal sang 'dul ba'i thub pa/ rba ru thugs pa zhes bya ba seng ge'i ngang tshul can/ phyag na shes rab kyi po ti bsdams pa gcig yod gyis/ da la sbubs su 'dod bar phyir/ sangs rgyas yid la dran par gyis shig/ dam pa'i chos yid ladran
76a1(rnying rgyud): par gyub na// 'phags pa'i dag 'dun yid la dran par gyis shig/ yedas kyi lha yid la dran par byas shig/ ting 'dzin med ladran pa rgyas na/ rnasmrab dpon pa la dran par bye du/ ma nga
76a2(rnying rgyud): 'dran par gyi sa la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal mo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal mo// byol song 'dul ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshas dring phyuma'o// zhes sa
76a3(rnying rgyud): song zhig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi thub pa blangs la 'di skad do// hrI tshwa 'das bya ba rigs kyi bu// tshul song yu khyen ga ti mug che// 'di dus kyang na pag tshad nyis brnyan// rgyab yin zhes bya ba yi// 'jig rten tesas dge 'du
76a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal song yul du ma 'jug par// lha ma yin gyi gnas su byon// ma rig lakhor ba'i rtsa ba ste// rang rig ye shes rtog med pas// lha ma yin gyi yul de na// gdas pa'i sa med drug bsngal ldan// de chags pa la sme bar// ba ba
76a5(rnying rgyud): zhang du bzhud// phrag dog 'di yis/ khyed de bskus// dang po 'khor bar ltung ba yang // phrag dog rung ltar 'tshabs nas dang sa// du lta sa mA la phrag dag pas// rtag tu rjod pa rgyun ma chang na cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu//
76a6(rnying rgyud): tsub par ma byed cig/ 'chub ma thag tu 'dzin pa na// rtsod ldan 'di la rab chags nas// yun ring lhag bsngal khyod kyis myong // sdug bsngal tam thag myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// bsam gtan
76a7(rnying rgyud): mtshon 'di longs shig/ oM sarba su ya dr-i s+pha raHpa su d+d+hi ma~M/ kye che 'das pa'i chog ma khyod nyon cig// gnas la chags pa chen pos/ sdug bsngal khyod kyis myong bar gyur // lha ma yin gyi gnas ma/ cod pa'i sdug sngal
76b1(rnying rgyud): sar gyis mi lta ba ste// de ni sems can nyon mongs pa phrag dog shas cher sdod pa 'bra' zhig las byung ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod der chags par ma byed cig/ de na chags pa cher skyes pa na/ de na lha ma yin dngul ba'i dang po chags papa 'is byang
76b2(rnying rgyud): la bsam gtan gyi go ston pa/ phyag na bsam gtan gyi mdung thogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi ngang tshul can yod kyis// de la skyabs su 'dong ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas yid la dran par gyis shig/ dam pa'i chos yid pa dran par gyis shing/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yid la dran
76b3(rnying rgyud): ra gyis shig/ yi dam gyi lha yid la dran par gyis shing // rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin 'dral ba
76b4(rnying rgyud): thub pa thags bzang ris la phyag 'tshal zhing sbubs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhig/ de nas lha'i thung ba thungs la 'di skad do// hUM gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// lha min yul na phrag dog
76b5(rnying rgyud): che// de na sdug bsngal bsam mi khyang // de yi skyeng na lha yi yul// nyams dga' dang spro yid 'ong dang // longs spyod sna tshogs 'di na yod// rkyen dang rol mo bsam gri khyab// lha min yul du ma 'jug par// lha yi yul du bde bar byed//
76b6(rnying rgyud): rnam rig 'dor ba'i rtsa ba ste// rang rig ye shes rtog med pas// lha yi gnas ni 'jugs med// longs spyod nyid la chags chags nas// ngan sang gsum gyi gnas su srung // de rna tshogs par ma byed par// bde ba can gyi zhing du
76b7(rnying rgyud): btsud// ngargyal 'di yis khyod re bsdus// sgra yi phul nang rgyal che// dang po 'khor bar srung ba yang // ngargya po ri bo brtsegs pas 'grer// dgra rgyal sprad pas na// dgang ldan phra lo yul du skyes// 'dres spyod 'khor la chags chags
77a1(rnying rgyud): nas// ngan song 'khor ba'i gnas su lhung / kra/ nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyi bu// nga rgyal rtog par ma 'dzin cig/ nga rgyal rtog par bzung ba na// longs spyod 'di la rab tu chags// phongs spyod 'di la chags pa'i mthus//
77a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba nyid kyi gnas su lung // yun ring thar pa'i gnas mi thob// sdug bsngal ham thag myong bar 'gyur// da las grol bar bya ba'i phyir// btsun+da 'grus pi zang 'di longs shig/ oM sar+tha a sunr-i s+pha ra Na phaT hUM yA/ oM maho// cha 'das
77a3(rnying rgyud): shing lus brjes pa'i che ge mi khyod nyon cig/ lha'i gnas 'di na longs spyod 'khor ba'i rgyu la chags pas/ tha ma ngan song gsum du lhung bar 'gyur bas/ rigs kyi bu der chags par ma byed par/ zhing khams de na lha 'dul ba'i thub pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya phyin
77a4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba lha'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ phyag na pi wang dang rol mo bsnyams pa gcig yod kyis/ de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas yid la dran pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang / rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/
77a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod cing skyabs su song zhig/ de nas mi'i thub pa blangs
77a6(rnying rgyud): la 'di skad do// hUM gson cig dgongs shig rigs kyi bu// tshe 'das bya ba'i rigs kyi bu// lha yi yul na nga rgyal che// nga rgyal rang dgar spyod pa'i phyir// 'di na cha mnyam byang chub nye// lha yi yul du ma chags par// cha mnyam mi yi
77a7(rnying rgyud): gnas 'dir byon// hU~M ma rig 'khor ba'i rgyu yin te// 'di la chags par ma byed par// bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud// khong khro 'di yis khyod re bslus// khong khro bdag tu ma 'dzin cig/ khong khro bdag pu 'dzin pa na// dang po 'khor bar lhung po
77b1(rnying rgyud): yang // khong po rang dgang spyad pas nongs// da lta khong lo nyid sbyad na// mi yi sdug bsngal chen par 'gyur// yun ring sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de las grol bar b+ha ba'i phyir// tshul khrims phyung ba 'di 'angs shig/ a sarba nr-i tri du pre su a s+pha raNA
77b2(rnying rgyud): hU~M phaTaHA/ e ma ho// tshe 'das shing lus brjes pa'i che ge mo nyan cig/ mi'i gnas 'di ni bde sdug gi ra ba chen po ste/ 'di la ma chags par bde ba can gyi zhing du bzhud cig/ mi'i gnas 'di 'dul ba'i shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom
77b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma las sprul pa'i mi'i cha byad can phyag na gseg shang dang par bu thogs pa de yid la dran par gyis la/ de la skyabs su 'gro ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang /
77b4(rnying rgyud): yi dam gyi lha dang / rdo rje slob dpon yid la dran par gyis la/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// mi'i thub pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skabs su mchi'o// zhes brjod
77b5(rnying rgyud): cing sbubs su song zhi// / de nas mi'i gnas nas dri ma dkyil 'khor gyi gyi khyams su khyud kyi steng du bzhag la/ rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor dbyi bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis lam bstan pa 'di skad do// hUM rigs kyi rgyal po pad+ma dbang gi sbrul
77b6(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tshe 'das pa 'di la gshed du byed pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byung bar mdzad du gsol/ ho cha 'das pa rgya ga ma byad nyon cig/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mngon par dka' ba'i zhing khams na/ sbyin pa rdo rje sems
77b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' zhes bya ba/ skus 'dul ba'i chos ston to// rigs kyi bu khyod de lu sus 'dul ba'i chos nyon la/ gyi nang gi sgo 'dogs tshad la/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su bzhud cig/ lho phyogs na dpal dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i zhing khams yod de/
78a1(rnying rgyud): chu du gag zhes sa sum dang na na ma dun ma du sa ga
78a2(rnying rgyud): sa zhi gyu pa
78a3(rnying rgyud): ga
78a4(rnying rgyud): gag TIg smra bye pa / par
78a5(rnying rgyud): sa ga sa sa
78a6(rnying rgyud): smra na sa
78a7(rnying rgyud): so du kyi ru pa
78b1(rnying rgyud): rlab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ zhing bams 'jam pa'i mgon ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de la rigs kyi khyod ma 'jigs par thos thams cad kyi sman yong du chud pa zhes du ba'i dbang 'as
78b2(rnying rgyud): laM/ snang srod kyi thos thams cad pashad cing ka dag gis rabazud cig/ nub byung gi 'jigarten gyi khams na/ zhing khams yid 'grugs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba med de/ de na bcom ldan 'dus pa lathugs pa zhes bya ba med kyis/ del
78b3(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi gri khyod ma 'jigs par chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bsten pa'i dab nos pa/ chos nyid dka dgu gA sang bkyad cigasteng gi phyogs gnanas mkha rnam par dge pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten yod de/ den bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rgyal /
78b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par de la smra ba'i gnas lugs rdzogs pa chen po bzhi'i dbang zhes bya ba yod kyis/ dbang de nas pa/ chos nyid kyi gzhi sdang la bzhud cig/ 'og gi phyogs na zhing khams ma ga sres pa zhes bya ba yod na/
78b5(rnying rgyud): de na bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba yid kyis/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'jigs par/ de la rang rig mngon par snang ba zhes bya ba'i dbang yod kyis/ de las dbang de nas la chos nyid rang snang gi rnam mkha' la bzud cig/ phyogs brgya
78b6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi dbus na/ dur khrod chen po mi ri 'bar ba zhes byu ba yod de/ de yang shin tu yangs pa 'jigs shing spyi bung gA/ skrag ci mas pa cig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das brda dbang gi rgyal po zhes bya ba yod kyisaM/ rigs kyi khyod
78b7(rnying rgyud): lam 'jigs par bcom ldan de la rig pa rang gnas kyi dbang zhes bya ba yod kyis/ dbang de nos la/ chos nyid rang snang gi nam mkha' la ma 'jigs ma spangs ma skrag par song zhig/ kye mtsho 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyod nyon cig
79a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa da ga sa rgyas na / blan sa byan/
79a2(rnying rgyud): dga' ba sa tha ba'i rtsalam/ ba ba ba phyug bskrun pa zhen pa/ gas padam sa pa 'dzo aHga/ ste cig pa phyis/ del su 'gas par meng do// dang pa byor
79a3(rnying rgyud): sangs tham sar ma mdzad bang ba zhes bya rtan dza kyi phung po dang rngan pa pyod nga/ dbyin ma hA bar gyur ro// rigs mi dza de mi thong dul sus sus 'dul byu sa spyo / yangs spyo rdzogs pa'i skam tshan dang dab pyang du ma dang ldan sa/ dang
79a4(rnying rgyud): sa sa med pa 'ang gyi ba rgyang s+yA da rab tu / rtse pa sa la pasem pa ba sa / gas kyi 'i sngon du nga ba ga pa rje 'dres pa'i dun 'dus pa ra ba bdu ma gyi mi thab pa de ste/ ri
79a5(rnying rgyud): na san/ pa'i rgyas pa'i bya bye bags ba ba gnas ngas gzhugs pa 'i phre gis zhe du pan
79a6(rnying rgyud): lA ma gas par bya gyu nam la bang rjed pa'i 'thos kyis bda'o// de'adas pa'i pa yin/ blonas sas skye da pe 'byong ba zhes bya ba med kyis/ dertsod pa dang bar 'dzu gyes/ deldang ba'i dus su srabs ma dkyang mi phung po chom gron
79a7(rnying rgyud): 8/ rjes kyi su sbyo gag tha sa med dang bral bar bstanapas/ drug sung thugs gnyis su med par yongs su mnganalas 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ kyirigs kyi khyud kyis sre brten par gyis shing // gsung brtan par gyis shi
79b1(rnying rgyud): thugs brtan par gyis shig/ rig pa brtan par gyis shig/ des ni skye ba med par thal lo// de skad ces lam bstan par bya'o// gzhan dag gi phung po sbyang yang / rigs drug gnas nas drangs pa dang / lam bstan 'di ltar shes par
79b2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ lam bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa ma yA tra du pu ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshe 'das kyi gdung sreg pa'i cho ga ro sreg bral ba'i lung
79b3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas pad+ma dbang gi sku la/ nye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi sku// sems can bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// rnam rtog spong ba'i thabs
79b4(rnying rgyud): chen gsung // zhes zhus so// de nas bka' stsal pa/ kye ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung // ra~M sreg mog byed pa na// ro yi khang pa legs byas la// ro ni spos chu 'o mas bcu// de nas ro de khang par gzhug/ khung pa de
79b5(rnying rgyud): yi mdun nyid du// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa gcig bya// chag chag gdab cing thig skud brlab// chag chag gdab pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM sho d+ha ya badz+re AHhUM/ thig srud byin brlab sngags 'di'o// oM badz+ra ka sa ra hU~M trAM/ sa tshon byin gyis brlab
79b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM AHhUM swA hA/ de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// thig gdab byin rlabs rdzogs pa dang // tshon ni rab tu dgye bar bya// dbus kyi pho brang zlum po bya// gru gsum mthing nag e ru bya// zla gam rnam gsum dbang chen dmar//
79b7(rnying rgyud): zlum po mu khrud par dag tu// yi ge hU~M nyid bri bar bya// zlum po de yi phyi rime du// pad+ma'i gro 'bur 'ad ba brgyad bya// kha dog dmar po dag tu gsungs// glo 'bur bar ni ljang gus dgang // de yi phyi rim mu khyud zum// mo dag na byi bar gsungs//
80a1(rnying rgyud): saH/ rnam gyi rim du ba de ste// sgo dang bcas pa rab tu'i// b+h+yaHda dkar ba'i sted dgaH// thang shar la rnams kyi ba chad la// rdo rgyatha 'a thob bya// sha ts+tsha dz+dza kyang nyud // ngan pa cha yu bri// gyo nub pa chan sted
80a2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'ongs pa 'dab brgyad bri// nub byang sa chad steng du yang // ral gre ljang bu zlo bar bya// sgro ni rigs dang 'dra ba ste// sgo yi kha gyer zlagam pa// bum pa rigs dang 'dra ba bri// de bai m+b+hi rim zlum po ste// bla ga ma bzhini de mang por bya// zlum pa de yi gyi
80a3(rnying rgyud): da// la // 9 bas pa ga s+ho// ga rgyam po / phyin// pa / des rje me shig// dadzupa
80a4(rnying rgyud): yang // sgrub pa'i rdzas ni tshogs chad bzhag/ pho brang bu gsum steng dag rtsa// dpal gyi gtor mag dag par bya// mu Sh+Ta gyi ma'i steng rnga pang // gtor mchags ma/ lung mngon pasham// dkyil 'khor nga yi shang phyogs su// rigs drug
80a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil la ba snyed pa dang // gsung ga she ga ma dang // degadun gags brtan padu gags na padang/ gagyis pa / da nga pa dang // bkra ga ca pas brgyan pa//
80a6(rnying rgyud): drang ba grong dang 'dra// phyi cho ga nad cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// de nas slob dpon gsang ba des// me yi lha dang mnyam sbyar nas// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas bsgom// me yi g+ha tshogs suni drangs pa'i// sngags 'di rab tu brjod pa dang // me yi lha
80a7(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis med bsam// de nas me lha bzhugs gsol dang // me yi dkyil 'khor gsal gad pa dang // me bi h+ye nyid bsdu ba dang // me yi lha tshogs bstim pa dang // me lha nyi dang dam tshig bsro// me lha spang ba'i cho ga dang // de nyid
80b1(rnying rgyud): sa gsasu // dag pas 'a gyud pa // rdzag 'dug kyabang gsus/ ma rnas pa bcwag na mas ma nga su du sas rasgru ba dang /

80b3(rnying rgyud): prar+Na kr-id+har/ han d+hanA~M/ da had d+he / btsamadza/ hUMra~Ms raH/ oM ri swA \u0f7f/ raSh+TA raH/ hUM stu \u0f7f/ oM sa ts+l-i b+h+yaH/ oM IT+TAr ra / dza par / oM baMd+d+haH
80b4(rnying rgyud): ngor/ mau d+ha rmA wA/ sho d+ha ye/ a b+h+r-i / b+h+rUM a a ma/ de ltar sngags rnams rdzogs nas cang // bdag nyid pad+ma dbang du bsgom// bdag gi mdun du skad mtha' yas// sku mdog/ dmar po 'od chags bsgom/
80b5(rnying rgyud): pad+mA n+tu kr-ita mra brjod pas// bdag nyid dab rten thugs ka nas// d+ha mgrin dmang po gcig zung ste// rta skad byed gsum brjod pa yis// srid gsum 'i ru 'bar bar bsgom// tshongangs sgri ba gnyis byung bar bsas// de nas dbang chen bdag
80b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi// rang bzhin brjod pa di na na/ ye shes rig pa nyid las skyes pa'i rtsa// rang byung thugs rdo dpalal phyag 'tshal bstong// chos dbyings mkha' bskang tshogs sprus pa // ga pa phyag pa'i pyod//
81a1(rnying rgyud): 6// gsus ga gagasas nas// dkar pa'i mdag la bshad pa// / zhal bsal phyag dug gas na ga// dbar ba mdag pa than na // 'gagasu pa rtsag drug dbyus drug/ dbar nag sa dag 'a thog
81a2(rnying rgyud): dbus na ta mgo lda thung ba// dz+ha mdzin na la brgya yad 'amar// lce na tso tsong phyogs bcu gas// kham sa gas ste lus dbang du da // kun dam ma mtshatsha po// shingasan po 'thor bu'i rlu chen sdang // gsus kyi nya mang
81a3(rnying rgyud): gcig gis// myang ngan 'das pa'i chos kyang ston// g.yon gyi tis dazeng gcig gis// gabar du bcan pa ra// dbus cin skad tha~Mng gdul gyis// srid gsum pa lus dbang du srung // su ma dag nam nig dung mod che /
81a4(rnying rgyud): bags ldan rnon par g.yang gzhi'i shas prabs cas/ skal nag stong gsu brgyan pa'i gdengs gcan// mongs pa chen po la sogs kyi chen gyi// sig bcad snol pas dgra'i byu du sa// thal cher ga dang drug gi mo ma thus smras// 'jigs tshigs med po ru
81a5(rnying rgyud): grod rgyan gyi gnas// dbang po chen po sreg chen 'jig so// khaSh+Ti rnge'u chung ral gri dbu s+ya dang // mda' gang+gA mdung 'ang gsor gyi nags brgyang zhing // dzod zeng rkyen du byas shing gtsun mo'i tshugs la 'khril// dpa' ba chen po 'bar chen po// lha chen
81a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad ni zhabs kyis mnan// klu chen brgyad ni gden du ba tid // g.yas kyi phyag brgyad byung ba pos// chen brgyad kyim gri bcad nas// n+d+ha brgyad ni rags bkapa// r-I rje brgyad kyis dkrugs shing gsol// g.yon gyi phyag brgyad byung bas ni// lha ched brgyad
81a7(rnying rgyud): kyi nyid byung nas// bcud thabs kyis rol// dge pa'i shid ldan ldam pa// tha~Md dus rlung du nyim po// byu mtsho rjo par sbyor mo// dbang phyug med pa paspyod cem na// 'tshor rgyu mtshogs pas la hU~M// gang kang num bu ma las pa
81b1(rnying rgyud): mdzar/ dbyung sa nam dzugs// dngasu na// bkya blangs pa tid nga drun// dus pag zugs bzlog par bas// byang na mangs pang gyur bas// ma da 'a na na da/
81b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'a dzer lta tshogs gsal bar bsgom// maM lha bdag deng dbyer med bskyed// rig po'i phyongs dang te 'dzin bskyed// rang rig ma ma la ma 'dres bsgom// me l+r-i g+ha ni spun drangs nas// me yi sgrib spong las 'di bya// sngags 'di brjod cing dbyung /
81b3(rnying rgyud): 'arjod // oM badz+ra sa dza rji da la/ badz+ra smr-i b+hA phaT/ de skad brjod cing lhag sum bskyed// 'argyas dbang dang mngon sdod pa'i// me mi mchod pa rdzogs phyur bya// zhi ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// sku sna srid nam mkha' stong pa'i hom ldang du// 'byung ba ste tshun
81b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i ma spang bas/ mtsho sa tshogs snang ba'i ma byeng ni// rnapo shes zung po chogs rnams pasregs sbyangs zin// da bus phyags rnam pa'i khyim grangs// bcom ldan rnam byar snang bded pas/ chos kyi ngas kyi'i byung bas// gnyi sus ga
81b5(rnying rgyud): thenapa snang bzhis// sha gis rnam ny-i mardzung nas// ba ma ma rngon mas dpabyams/ long bya ba'i bamyong bas// brjid nam tog sa sbyangs pas/ tshigs brel pa'i nye pa zungs// 'dus drin ri na du
81b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid kyim byung bas// dad+ha rtog bzigs su khrig// byigs rnam pa'ig na pa// bcos pan byeng ba ba la ngas lus// mam rtogs pa'i mabyung bas// 'ad rdzogs na ma rtog pasreg rlung ma/ thegs
81b7(rnying rgyud): nga na yang byu pal// bya rtsub ba'i ma byung sa// thag dganapa ga gra brags kyi ma rgyan pa'i dkar 'a ra// rnas shes dag pa sa/ 'das pam sas kyis
82a1(rnying rgyud): ma gangs bskal bas// chos nyid zhi pa don rtogs gog/ o badzaganas swA hA/ denas ting 'dren ba ldan pas/ mar la sogs par bsreg pang bu'i nang du thugs pa/ rgas pa'i mchog rdzogs par bya/ rlung
82a2(rnying rgyud): gsum yum gyi b+ha ga'i hom khung du// lhag pa byang chub sems kyi me sbar bas// skal pa ye shes gsal ba'i me byung nas// skye rga nA nga chi'i sdug bsngal bsregs sbyangs thim// hUM dbus phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen nam
82a3(rnying rgyud): mkha'i dbyings phyug las// de bzhin rigs kyi me byung bas// ma rig rtog pa bsregs sbyangs thim// shwar phyogs gru bzhi'i ho ma khung du// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan nyid las// rdo rje rigs kyi me byung bas// yid kyi rnam
82a4(rnying rgyud): rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// lho phyogs gru bzhi'i ho ma khung du// yum chen mA ma kI nyid las// rin chen rigs kyi me byung bas// sems kyi rnam rtog bsregs srungs zim// nub phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung ngu// yum chen gos dkar po nyid
82a5(rnying rgyud): las// pad+ma rigs kyi me byung bas// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog bsregs spangs thim// byang phyogs gru bzhi'i hom khung du// yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma las// las kyi rigs kyi me byung bas// zhen pa'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// hrI
82a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i me ni ser la 'chor// tshe 'das las la gnas pa 'di// skye med dbyings su stsol ba'i phyir// rgyas pa'i me yis rtog sbyangs nas// lce med byang chub gnas su bzhud// tshe 'das rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnams// ye shes chen po'i me brgyad kyis//
82a7(rnying rgyud): bsregs nas thal ba rdul du brlag/ sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dis// chos nyid rgyas pa'i don rtogs shog/ oM rat+na e pa ri/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// zas phud gtor ma'i phud bsags nas// dbang gi me yi mchod rdzogs bya// dbang
82b1(rnying rgyud): ye me chog 'di skad do// hUM snang srid rdo rje 'bar ba'i hom khung du// rtog med ye shesa'i gyis me sbar bas// skye med rtog pa'i klong nas me byung nas// rnam rtog mtshan ma'i bdud rnams bsregs sbyangs thim// steng phyogs zla ga ma hom khung du// bcom ldan gzi
82b2(rnying rgyud): brjid 'od 'phro las// ye shes chen po'i mi byung nas// ngar rtog mtshan me bsregs sbyangs thim// shar phyogs zla ga ma hom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma gsang ba las// kha dog lnga pi mi byung bas// tshigs sdang drag po bsregs spangs thim// lho phyog
82b3(rnying rgyud): rmu gas hom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma che mchog las// 'bar ma brgyad kyi ma byung bas// bdud dang mu stegs bsregs sbyangs thim// nub phyogs zla gram tom khung nas// bcom ldan pad+ma las sru las// stong pa nyid kyi me byung bus// dngos po'i rnam/
82b4(rnying rgyud): rtog bsregs sbyangs zim// byung phyogs zla gam ho ma khung nas// rnal 'byor bdag las me byung bas// mtshon ma'i rnam rtog bsregs sbyangs thim// dbang gi mo ni dmar la dengs// rnam shes bgyid la t+pa la re// phung po wa la dz+wa la raM// tshe 'das las ngan sdig
82b5(rnying rgyud): can khyod// dang po 'khor bar ci phyir 'khor// da lta gnas pa ci lag nas/ tha ma chags bcil chags// khyod ni de las ma grol na// 'khor ba'i gnas las mi thar te// nga yis rnam shes bsregs nas ni// chos nyid dbang gi pho brang du// phaT kyis 'phangs la
82b6(rnying rgyud): bstim par bya// tshe 'das rtog pas bcings pa spyod// chos nyid dbang gi don rtogs shog/ oM phaT ma e da du phaTaHraM/ de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// dmar gtor phud dang brdzem pa byug/ drag po'i me chog rdzogs
82b7(rnying rgyud): par bya// mchod pa rgyas pa 'di skad do// hU~M 'byung ba lnga yi hom khung du// gsang bsngags kyi me sbar bas// stong pa sna tshogs bsdus pa'i me byung bas// 'di yi phung po rnam lnga dz+wal raM// hUM ye shes klong yangs dkyi
83a1(rnying rgyud): pa / // drug pa ye shes chen pa'i yum zhing la// sbyin tsam sugan pa srung bas// sbyang ba cad pa mthung nang// 'drab drag tshul ngas// dab pa da sa byags zung // 'du du
83a2(rnying rgyud): da'i me skar bus// dag pa ye shes chen po'i 'i byung nas// 'di 'i yul brgyad du langs// snying srid dum d+he d+hag hon/ // gsang bzhi shes lam shing pa// lhagi pa byang chubasems kyi me bla bas// gsang ba po shes theg pa'i ma
83a3(rnying rgyud): byung nas// 'di yi 'dod chags dz+wal ram// chos nyi 'gyur ba med pa'i ho ma khang du// rig pa rtog pa med pa'i lam shing la// ye shes sgron me gsal ba'i me spang bas// snang srid chos smra'i me byung nas// 'di yi gti mug bsregs sbyangs thim/
83a4(rnying rgyud): rtag mad nam mkha' stong pa'i hom/ bu du// b+h+rUM 'gre N+DI shing nags tshal yam shing ba// sna tshogs ye shes chen po'i me sbar rabs// 'di la zhe sdang dz+wa la ram// chos nyid brdil ba chen po'i hom/ l+r-ing du// sna tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i yam shang la
83a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med rtog med rang byung me sba rabs// ye shes stong gsal chen po'i me byung nas// 'di yi phrag dog dz+wa la ram// sdang skyong gas pab bram gyi b+ha ga'i ho ma khung du// dag pa kha dog lnga yi yAmra shing la// ye shes chen po lnga yi me b+ha bas/
83a6(rnying rgyud): nyid phul lnga shes pa'i mi byung nas// 'di yi rgyal dz+wa la ram// hUM shar phyogs su gsum hom khung nas// bcom ldan pa dze hU~M ru las// saM d+hu brgyad kyi me byung nas// ma rig po ga rtog chen po 'di'i// glo steng nang khrol dz+wa la ra ma// phyogs bu
83a7(rnying rgyud): gsum nyo mthung du// oM rgyal raH he ru las// phra min brgyad kyi mthing nas// mgo dang yan lag dA la ram// rjeb phyogs zur gsum nyi khung nas// mo rgyal pad+ma ti dra las// yum chen lnga le mi byung nas// meg dang dbang 'a dz+wal ram/
83b1(rnying rgyud): sa thadags pa snyang thangs// mardul kA stongabs// ran pa du 'dus pa'i 'byung ngas// bar dugacad pa'i 'byung brjod do// gdang zhag pa du yang ma// dbus phyogs gas cos 'dungs// tu sa// byang/
83b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mad+ha shes// maung dang sa 'angapa rab// trA~M N+yal d+ha ma tsa gargyal po pos// b+h+yo bo lce dang mnyam ster nus// 'di yi mgo sas la ma// se la ram/ da la sa/ phyin pa/ 'byung ba dz+wa la dam/ ba dog cad pa'i nga
83b3(rnying rgyud): danas ldan pa s+ho/ na ta ma rba blugs sa/ nA m-i b+h+yog sa pa \u0f7f/ 'di sa N+Da brji par na// b+h+r-i nI seM shes ba skyed pa'i/ me'i sna gis sbyin 'ad kyis// gas di ba tu shegs
83b4(rnying rgyud): ma// d+hem yi mni gas dkar mo// maM ye m+b+ha ni s+yA mnu gas// ma yis tu bo dbang chen s+ya// maM bi mtshan nyid sreg par byed// mi pi la ba niHd+hiH// ma pI snang ba dmar la dngas// pe li rgya tshogs sprin 'dren gyis// gnas
83b5(rnying rgyud): shAshin nga gan ni smrag tab pa// 'ad ma pa 'ini na gyu// rgyab sa 'i min myed dag nga/ 'ad chags rgya'i m-i ni du sar dag 'byung// mag das rlung gi sa ni 'ang dga'adi
83b6(rnying rgyud): brnapa la pa sbyin ma sde la dus sa/ rnam pa'i nin rgyags rdu la// 'did chags ga snron pazhil par 'bar// ga dag kyil ma nga / mi mas
83b7(rnying rgyud): nangs pang // gahU~M ri ga cig gi sa rnaMs na na/ ma nu mo 'as ma pa ngam nyan// m-i gros ming phyogs ba rgya ba cu // 'di yi rnam shes tshogs 'dul sa// hU~M bo shes kyi pa nga kyil 'i /
84a1(rnying rgyud): ye shas 'ad lnga'i mazung nas// 'di'i byung pa sprul dA la dam// stong pa nyid kyi dkyig nas// ye shes rnamatha satha bas// 'di ba dbyung ba zhal dul dang // rdzas bye na pa da la lab gas// dam tha
84a2(rnying rgyud): nam lnga byung ba yis// 'di yi yul lnga dz+wa la ram// snang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// rigs kyi sku lnga byung ba yis// 'di yi chags sdang lha bo dz+wa la ram// dpal chen he ru ka li thugs ka nas// ko'u dri ma brgyad byung ba yis// 'di yi rnam shes btud
84a3(rnying rgyud): la tom ram// dpal chen he ru ka yI yan lag la// sgo skyong ma ba'i byung ba yis// 'jigs pa bzhi pa dz+wa la ram// dpal chen snang ba chen po las// rigs kyi yumu lha byung ba yis// 'byung ba lnga la dz+wA la ram// dz+wa la ra ma ste mchod par rol// dpal
84a4(rnying rgyud): chen gnas su mchod par rol// oM karma tI Sh+Tha ya ni ram phuT/ dz+wa laM ram phaTaHram/ e la ra ya/ de nas ting 'dzin nges par bsgom// de nas zan dang phud gtor de// nges pa'i gru tshon 'di skad do// hUM chos sku mkha' khyab dag pa'i byin rlabs
84a5(rnying rgyud): las// rig pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal dbang gi sgra// su mdag dmar drangs me yi 'od ldan 'gro// de yi zhwa phyas 'od zer rab 'gros pas// ma rig 'joms pa'i me ni sna tshogs 'bar// zhe sdang 'dzems pa'i me ni dkar nag 'bar// gti mug
84a6(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i me ni spug nag 'bar// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i me ni dmar nAg 'byar// phrag dog 'joms pa'i me ni ljang nag 'bar// da N+Dal 'joms pa'i me ni ser nag 'bar// me yi bskal pa mun na ka k+kog ltar 'jug/ rngar long
84a7(rnying rgyud): mar sna tshogs ban nga ba // nyon cig tshe 'das rigs kyis// sna tshogs ma yis kyang kyi sdug bsngal skyong // shes rab chen po yum gyi ma byung bas// 'khor ba'i theg bsngal ye shes chen por bgrad// sleb deng zhin mongs nang pa
84b1(rnying rgyud): ba // a am+b+ha ma ban \u0f7f/ a a rA sa pa smraH/ dwet+tA ban du rdzogs nas// byasanganas gnas pa / stong ba gsaH// blanas bsrung badrang lam nyid bstan// ga
84b2(rnying rgyud): bta zhing lha chags bzhim// oM skye kyis dang sngags nyid bzlas// rig pa phrul zhing song byung ba zhom// chos spangs pastanags maung bas s+ho// sngagasus pa rdzogs dis// rang ba'idags pa rji ga pa dang // mos nyid sa la dang
84b3(rnying rgyud): sar mdzan 'bod// ming nas 'dron zhing las grub bya// dkyi la la khor basmra 'ongs rnams rlo// gyis ni ldang med 'dre mnan gang ba// dkyil lnga bar gas zhing gseng sngags bzlas// rgyarnams sbyangs shing skye chun gtsang // gnas dus sngar
84b4(rnying rgyud): sgru/ she nga rdzogs pasgri/ nga snang ba ga sa gas sa sa pa nga sa brjin dag // rje ni
84b5(rnying rgyud): gtsun// rang bzhin nyid dang ngo bo bstan// snang po gsal zhing sgrib pa sbyang // gnyis med lha dang dbyer med bsam// dus dang gnas dang ye shes bstan// sa lam sbyar ba rab tu bshad pa'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i chud pas/
84b6(rnying rgyud): ra bsreg thal ba'i lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ra g+he g+he nA ma/ bod skad du/ dur gdab tsha tsha'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang ba'i
84b7(rnying rgyud): bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang gi sku// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gdung rten ni gang la bgyi// nye ba'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas dbang chen de nyid kyis// gos sngon
85a1(rnying rgyud): can la bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag pa nyon// rdul 'gyur ting 'dzin ldan pa yas// dben pa'i gnas su bder 'dug la// sugadung na dang mdzad rten gdab// bdag dang gzhan gyi ngan yang drang /
85a2(rnying rgyud): yang byin nges pa'i thabs 'di brnam// dbang chen sna dang gnyis med cig// spyan sa gzigs ting 'dzin pasgom// sgra mdog dkar po 'ad chag stsa pa// g.yas pas mr-it+pa la phyog ma // ga yan pas skabs sgyid phyi rgya // dod zeng
85a3(rnying rgyud): na po rnams rgyas ni// sa rnams byin rlabs ldan par badz+rag / spyanA ras gzigs dbang bskyed pa'i snying po ni// 'di yis sku mdog gas lnga bar 'gyur// oM e bad+hA twA Not+t+wa shAn+da ya/ oM wa log tuhU~M/ dris ni kyu rnamaso gas pa bor bsgom// sa
85a4(rnying rgyud): na brgyad brjod pa dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang skas la ba'o// de ltar lha dang ldan gyur nas// mchod rten gdab pa'i las 'di brtsam// shin tu gtsang mdzes phyogs nas// sa blang mchod rten rgyu nyid btsal// sa nyid rko ba'i sngags 'di'o//
85a5(rnying rgyud): oM bai ro tsa na hUM/ sngags dbargya rtsa brjod pa dang // oM las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// sa yi skyon rnams ci yod pa// oM las 'od byung zhu bar bsam// de nas 'dag pa brdzi ba'i sngags// 'di ni lan grangs brgya rtsa brjod// oM badz+ra bI ra hU~M phaT
85a6(rnying rgyud): sngags de la nI brgya brjod pa dang // hU~M las 'od du 'phros par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// 'dag pa'i dngos po hUM du bsam// bsam gyis mi khyab hU~M de yis// 'dug pa'i rtog pa sbyangs nas ni// rtog med 'od du rnam par bsam// nas
85a7(rnying rgyud): 'bre bi bye ba'i sngags// pa d+hU ting 'dzin lda par gsungs// oM AHhU~M/ yo ga de dag 'od 'bar bas ma// de bden gshegs pa thams cang // s+phu yi yi ge ya~M du 'dod// gsung gi le ge A chags pa// 'gas kyi yin nu
85b1(rnying rgyud): m+b+ha lag banas// danas sa ma gas// nga sa tu snad pa \u0f7f// shA.A/ na // ra ng+gA nas pang gsang mags panas//
85b2(rnying rgyud): 'dis bciganas pa'o// mo sir+d+had+ha ga tu rAgA/ 'on rtsib depa'i ba gnas pa dang / chog badzin par batshugs par bsam/ dbyeng ngasur phyog tu 'dzin+dan// gshegs kyang/
85b3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur brtan par bzhugs sugs / ya da pa// de kar byin pa cwa brdzogs nas ni// rtse bo dgal tshetsha brgyal// zhes rdzogs pa dang byung chen po'i rgyud pas/ dur gad ba dz+ra m+bu'i lung bstan pa'i lerje sa brgyad pa'o// rdzogs so//
85b4(rnying rgyud): rad du/ yedu ba mtha ri la ma ldan su ba nAm/ bod ga dang / ro sangs gsar du grub pa'i phung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang chen dang gnas srul phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang chen gyi grwa'i ldan sngar/ @
85b5(rnying rgyud): heru ka ste/ ro langs giser nga bslab pa 'di sbas so// a gyi// phyogs bcu'i sta dang blarnams to// rnalnga 'byor gang zhig stobs ldan pas// dben pa'i gnas su ba sang la// ro langs gser gyi sgrub pa ba rtsam// shin tu dben pa
85b6(rnying rgyud): gnas der yang // dkyil 'khor 'ad ba gang grwa bzhi bya// de nas zag chag rab btab la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams nyid bcad // phyi mtshams gcad par bya ba ni// gnas kyi phyogs bzhi dag tu yang // rgyal chen dag la mtho bzhi
85b7(rnying rgyud): gtor mam nges rab // shig so ban par ma// rgyal pag ma sngags rang nga phyogs phyogs dge ga // dan kyil tshams su bstan/ dang mtshams dadzad pa 'jig s+ho/ phre bdu ma ga
86a1(rnying rgyud): ces bcad// bsad pa bar lom byo byas pa // gtud mcha gsus ba gyung// gang sachab su 'byod ba// gser byams dag byas par bdang / chab tu ting dus ma dadag tha
86a2(rnying rgyud): de ltar mtshams pa cang rdzogs pa dang // 'bru lnga'i rdzog rdzogs par bya// brgyang ni gad ba cu 'od// bshegs pa rji dzeg // depe dron 'grong 'jogs nas// denas nang ngu rdzo ba dang // dkyil dzor chen yod nyid /
86a3(rnying rgyud): ni ba rtag dag par bya// rdul 'byor chen po gsu mgyis badz+ran/ ba po dag sang dag la po sa mchog // TIg 'i ma// ba nang dag 'dzi y-i ban gsun rje bya// sa da
86a4(rnying rgyud): bltas las// theg pacig pa ga pa par bya// dum lugs cig rnams pa ga na nyid gcang ma // la nga rgyu rnams pasre// la kr-i dang zla ba'i mang// dang dag pa la
86a5(rnying rgyud): kya bya// dpal gyi gtor ma byang phyogs su// lho ru ma mang gtor ba gzhi // shu byung po'i gti ma pa // nub tu phrad dang n+d+ha'o// de kyil la khor bstan pa'o// de yang ngo len pa'oH// ro la sA la sogs gdul bya'i phyir/
86a6(rnying rgyud): bdag gshin rdzaganas pa'i sar// thags dang ldan pa'i mtshan na bdag/ den so ba med pa/ myos pa ma / de nas de bslab pa na/ dekyil mo thang dngas dgaH// btung zhing dag galdan pa so//
86a7(rnying rgyud): zong drugs rnas gdag sa// rang can pa dag gis brgyan// nga po gros tshu mas pakra/ de kyil la 'i byer ba do mo// 'i ba'i ba mi la s+ho// 'das da byed pa na pa 'ad // pa 'i byung kyang bsgral ba dang /
86b1(rnying rgyud): drug yang nga bsal bar/ dkar 'askal bur bya ba gyur/ bslab par nga ze gsu mdun/ cha bdas don gyur bsgrus pas// dbang bsung phyin zla ba dang // dbus du drang sa dang phram brgyan na// 'a byags pata macan du nyung
86b2(rnying rgyud): gas dang mchod pa dran mi gcad// dus di'i tshogs na sna chags btang // mamus par dung byir bsngal ban// bsrub pa 'ag gsum byung ngu ra// dag gnyid khro ba'i then los bya// de da kyil khor skyed nyid de// drod da dag
86b3(rnying rgyud): grubathol pa// dz+nyAn dang dul gri mtshan tsha bsdams// rdo rje'i lus po nyid la yang // g.yeng gde myod rgyan gyis brtson// phag tu mtsho rgya dab lda pa// skyel rang thaM rab btabya pa// gang la dmigs pa'i gling bris lnga// dmigs
86b4(rnying rgyud): byabs pa par gyi// mnyes rab sa rnams deg pa // dernam pa ni nyid rtsod pa dang / ga nas 'i ba cing // bstan pa 'arig pa pa sad pa'o// legs so zhes bur dab na 'dzud// byed 'thab pa sogs 'dal ba kyi
86b5(rnying rgyud): hU~M dzuhrIH/ hrIg d+hA d+hi/ sngags de la grangs ba rnam brjod// sngags rnams padzad cing dang ben pasam// dbang zin gyi tid grasal pa dang // darje'i shid ro mdzad sad des// brtso rje 'tshogs rnams rdzogs pa dag// khro bo 'thong ba'i sa
86b6(rnying rgyud): deH nga pa pA nga // bsgrub pa'i las rnams rgyags par bya// legs par 'arjod pa slong ldazhinan// rgyud bzung ba'i thabs 'di dzo // me bad+ma tu la gre brnam/ gsang pa'i sngags mang dzod// dang
86b7(rnying rgyud): phrar dang bcas pasgo// den du gang po das// slob dpon dgal man cad dbupa// rdzob na gas bed da du tu'o// bangag sha na semapa dang tho drugs des bstod / nganapa da byung ba'i sngags// 'di gang drag tu rji byedang// slong po'i kyi nga da/
