87b7(rnying rgyud): dngos gru bablangs shing gse radu bas ma// de lta te 'dzin ldan pa yis// lo gnyis bsgrub rgyas pan// kyi nyi gisir du 'gyur bar sa kyai nyid gser nga gyur pan// srin lagatid 'dzin ldan pas zung // blangs pa thung ci'i rje dang sbyar// rdib par btags
88a1(rnying rgyud): shing gsang sngags bzlas// de nas kun gyis bgos la bza'// zos na skye med byang chub thob// thun mong dngos grub thams cad thob// zas ni yid la dran pas tshim// lus la gos med gcer bur khrogang // gnyer ma
88a2(rnying rgyud): med cing gzhon nur 'gyur// lo ni lnga brgya gzhon nur gnas// de nas tshe 'phos phyir mi ldog/ yon tan de ltar 'byung ba'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ thal byed ro langs gser du bsrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// rdzogs so//
88a3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ oM sarba pa na re ka d+harma su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ chos nyid cha ba gtor gyi lung rnam par bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpang chen de la/ 'phags pa 'jam
88a4(rnying rgyud): dpal gyis bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ rgyu bsod nams kyi tshogs la brten nas/ 'bras bu ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa 'di skad gsungs so// kye kye 'khor gyi lha klu ton// gang zhig bsod nams 'phel 'dod pas// nga yi bstan pa'i lung 'di
88a5(rnying rgyud): nyon// stong nyid rig pa'i stobs ldan pas// dben pa'i gnas su bder 'dug pa// rig pa'i ye shes dang sdud kyang // tshogs 'di bsags pas byang chub nye// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // stong nyid gsal bar rab bsgoms te// nges
88a6(rnying rgyud): don chos spyod 'di bstan bya// rdzogs chen man ngag lung ldan pas// snod bstan pa dang bcud nyid bstan// mgron dang yon tan rgyas par bstan// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin bstan// rnam pa bdun ldan rnal 'byor pas// 'jam
88a7(rnying rgyud): dpal snying po bsdus pa 'di// nyams dga' ba yi phyogs dag tu// rin po rtse yi sdod dag gam// rab tu gtsang ba'i snod dag tu// chu gtsang 'o ma sbyar la blug/ rin po che dang tsan dan brdar// me tog 'bu dang ldan gyis brgyan// gtsang ma'i sman dang
88b1(rnying rgyud): gas// kata dang nidus dang // dbang dang dag sman bya chags// c-i byong ba pang snang dgang // de ltar sdong nyid rab gtams pa// 'phags pa stan drungs ma chad pa 'bul// byang chub sems bslang byams pa ban // 'grel ba na gdam
88b2(rnying rgyud): rabasgom// brta bags pa gdab dga' ba bskyed// phyogs med dngags pa btang snyoms te// 'bras bu dadi la dmigs med do// de ltar sngon 'am rdzogs nas ni// bdag nyi na lnga 'byor thugs kanas// mig mag rgyad pa las/
88b3(rnying rgyud): bdag la sogs pa'i snod bcud ni// stong zhing bdag med chen por bsgom// de nas a de slar gyur pas// rin chen snod du phog par bsam// de rnams 'od du zhu ba las// snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang // tor sdod dri ma sbyar bar bya/
88b4(rnying rgyud): de nas A de ltar 'dus nas// gtor ma'i snod la thim gyur pas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten khams// bdud rtsi dag gi ring bzhin du// med gyis bu nas gang bar bsam// de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// a yi rang bzhin de nyid lam// rang rang yed
88b5(rnying rgyud): nyid kye// sa bon gang yin gyur par bsam// de nas yid ma med pa na// A gI shwa rar gyur par bsam// de nyid 'ong du zhu ba las// 'jam dpal lha mdog gsal bar bsgom// bdag dang gnyis med gnas pa la// sangs rgyas khring khams
88b6(rnying rgyud): rab 'byams su// 'jas dpal sku ni grangs med bsam// yi dam snying po gang yin pa// bdag gi thugs gang pom gyur nas// bdag nyid yi dam lha ru bskyed// bdag nyid ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // yi dam snying po gang yin pa// yi ge
88b7(rnying rgyud): gyur par bsam// de nyid 'od du ba las// ngo yis stong gsum gang bar bsgom// de dag rab tu 'thos pa las// 'phags pa spun drangs 'gro drug ba cug/ mgron rnams rab tu bcug pa dang // 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum po dang //
89a1(rnying rgyud): du gagags dang sa rnams// rnas pa lhags ngas pa// mam nga ma du dus// ba snang bams ngas par byas na// ga dag sapas kyad yas// su gsong
89a2(rnying rgyud): khengs par bsam// de ltar mgron rnams spyan drangs pa// sngags 'dis mgron rnams tshim par bsam// rigs kyi bu de ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ma hA A be sha ya a/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ d+hi sa li/ dz+wa la ya/ sarba a mr-i ta kun+d+ha li ha na ha na hUM/
89a3(rnying rgyud): sarba pre ta mudad+ya t+ta sau hUM/ sngags de len bdun brjod par bya// rdzogs chen phrag rgya gcig par 'bul// yongs su ngag dang ma dag pa'i// thams cad 'dod pa bskang bar bsam// dang po 'phags pa dkon mchog mchod// gnyis pa
89a4(rnying rgyud): dpal dang ma mo dang // chos skyong srung ma la sogs mchod// gsum pa 'jig rten 'gro lha mchod// bzhi pa rgyal chen bzhi rnams dang // tshangs pa brda byin lha rnams dang // gza' dang rtswa skar thams cad mchod// lnga pa len chags mgron
89a5(rnying rgyud): la'o// drug pa yi dwags mgron rnams mchod// bdun pas thams cad tshim par byed pa'o// de ltar bsngo ba rnams rdzogs nas// bsngo dang chos kyi sbyin pa bting // ye shes lnga yi 'od zer ni// dbang po lnga pa 'phro 'du las// 'dod pa'i
89a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan lnga ldan pas// lha yi longs spyod lhung ldan zhing // thams cad tshims byed bdud rtsi 'das// dkon mchog yon tan thams cad dang // rigs lnga khrus dang yul du bcas// dbang chen lha tshogs thams cad dang // yi dam lha dang slob dpon dang /
89a7(rnying rgyud): dpal dang me ma mkha' 'gro dang // chos spyod srung ma 'khor bcas dang // dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kun la bsngo// srid pa'i mgron du gyur pa yi// rgyal med bzhi dang gtsar rigs lha// tshangs pa brgya byin 'khor dang bcas// nye ba'i lha dang gza' rnams
89b1(rnying rgyud): nga// sbed med bu dang rgya skar dang // phyogs skyong 'khor dang bcas la 'bul// len chags mgron la bsngo ba ni// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang rgya// ri rab gnas dang rjes la gnas// rgya mtshor gnas dang gling la gnas// sa dang chu la gnas
89b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // yid kyis 'gro dang gzugs kyis 'gro// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // 'byung po'i tshogs dang sha za dang // gzugs can dang ni gzugs med dang // lto 'gro dang ni rkang 'gro dang // mi 'am ci dang yi dwags dang // byol song rigs dang na dag
89b3(rnying rgyud): dang // yi dwags rnams la zas dang skom// thogs pa med par 'byung 'gyur sho// de dag rnams la ci rigs pa// rang rang 'dod pa tshim gyur cig/ kun kyang gnod pa ma byed par// longs spyod lnga dang ldan gyur cig/ ces rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud
89b4(rnying rgyud): las/ chu ba gtor gyi man ngag mchod pa longs spyod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba man ya su ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ thams cad zlog byed mtshon che'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das stobs kyis rnam par
89b5(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mchog gis/ bar chad thams cad zlog pa'i 'di gsungs so// kye kyi gsang sngags 'tshang ba'i rigs// legs par nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// bar chad thams cad bzlog 'dod na//
89b6(rnying rgyud): yi gsang sngags 'di la zhugs// gsung sngags bzlas pa brtson 'dod na// dben pa'i gnas su rab phyin la// rang nyid yi dam lhar bskyed la// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom// nyi zla gsal ba'i dal bskyed cing // rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka'i
89b7(rnying rgyud): dal// oM badz+ra sa~Md+d+hi hU~M/ sngags de ba tu gsal bar bskyed// thugs ka'i dal gyi steng dag du// yi ge hrIH'bar bzhi paspyod de// de ltar rab tu gsel bar bskyed// de nas bskyed pa'i sngags 'di bzlas/ oM bad+hU d+hakr-ita badz+ra ma hA kro ta ha ya bI
90a1(rnying rgyud): gsang drugs bzlas pa dun// rnam da nas// rigags na la gasta sa// na du // gsas na ya rjo pas nal// rdza ngag
90a2(rnying rgyud): rta mgo ljang gu gsum dubs ma// rtagang drug cung 'tshong bar bas ma// g.yas g.yod dang po lpags zlog 'dod// g.yas kyi bar pa ral shrI la// dpra d+ha dag ni b+ha ba'o// g.yon gyi bar mas gzhol lam gtan// zhems ze ba rab tu bad+hims// nabs bzhis pa
90a3(rnying rgyud): bdag klu dbang gnon// srul dang thor ba'i rgyan cha ldan// dur khrod rkun chas rnam pa'o// de ltar gsal bar bsgom pa'o// shin tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ngo // oM pad+hA d+ha kr-i ha b+hI baT lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags de nyid bzlas pa yis// nA ma grin bas ma
90a4(rnying rgyud): gyis ma khyab pas// sa gzhi bar snang gang bar bsam// stong gsum 'jig rten khengs pa'o// de ltar rab tu bas mjog senas// dbang chen gsang ba'i thugs kar+ya// phyakan rdo rje gsal ba bsgom// sku mdog sdong po zhal gcig pa'o//
90a5(rnying rgyud): lhung lha gsum bsgom byas la// klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams bskrad// mchod pa'i las rnams ci nus bya// shin tu dben zhing nyams dga' bar// rnal 'gyod dge sbyong don la brtson// gang dag yi yi rigs rnams la// sa bdag la sogs
90a6(rnying rgyud): gdon zhugs na// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// brtag padag dang bcas 'di'o// kha dang sna dang mig dag dang // dbang po lnga nas zhugs pa dang // mgo dang rkang pa lag pa dang // yan lag lnga la 'jug pa'i sa// gsang ba'i gnas dang snying gdang /
90a7(rnying rgyud): pho kha sprin phrag pus mo ni// gru rnams 'jug pa'i gnas su bshad// dbang po lnga la zhugs pa dang // 'bras bu snga rtser 'byung bar nges// rang ma gzhan dag gang zhugs kyang // de nyid rab tu bcos pa'i thabs// sngags snying chos dang rdzas kyis
90b1(rnying rgyud): sa// sngags byas gas pa 'ang sa su// gas dasngags gang la 'a rdzas // drag sngags 'di nyid btags la brnyas// mang du bcwa pa da// Ta/ sngags de ba tu ban bya gang // dang bzhibs thar bya zhing // dpes drang dang
90b2(rnying rgyud): ma byung ra// bgegs rnams bskyeskud pa'i byung ba bya// bag nan bzeng po dkA nga // sel ma dag d+ha gang byung ba'o// gzugs brnyan skyes par hU~M / rdzi dang dang gin rnams kyang //
90b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis pas ma 'das phyir// bdag rnam gzhan dgo bsrung ba yi// gang yang rung ba'i yid la// glang ba'i rlud dang ldan pa la// gzugs rdo s+t+r-i smr-i dag gis byug/ b.lA nag sgra tshugs zung du'o// mnga'i nad nyid shas chen// gzugs kyi
90b4(rnying rgyud): dgo dmar ser te// ral pa skra tshugs gyen la bsgreng // bdag nyid bsrung ba byed pa na// bdag gi mal gyi 'og tu yang // gru gsum dag ni gting du brko// khru gang gting la thur du bya// chur la khru gang tshad du bya// khru yi ngos la khru phyed tshad//
90b5(rnying rgyud): dur khrid ma la bas nag por thug/ dang gi dang du gzugs brtan gzhag/ dur khrod bral bas byugs la shing gis kha yang bcad// shing la ri rab 'khor yug bri// de yi steng du mal bcos la// rdal 'byor lha dang ldan pa yis// gas
90b6(rnying rgyud): sngags bzlas shing gnang bar bya// gzhan gyi lus bsrung byed pa ni// dkyil 'khor snyeng du gzugs de bzhag/ phyag na rdo rje'i gzi brjid kyis// nad pa'i lus kyi gdon bsdus nas// rma bya mdongs dang ldan pa'i spos// nad pe'i lus la byab bya zhing //
90b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs brtan de la bstim par bya// ba la nag srungad po sum po sril gyis// dad pa'i lus la skor du shing // gzugs brtan dag gi lus la bcangs// de nas lha yi dkyil 'khor sogs// zhag dgu bsgrub pa byas nas ni// lhong ma chub tu sbyin bsreg /
91a1(rnying rgyud): gas sngags bzlas pa rdus tshad byang // phung ba dag dang rdo rje les// gzugs dbu ma bu dag rngub byizhig// bcom ldan mo lha tshogs la 'bul// de nyid la ni baN+Da rdza b+ha// ngas ni gdon las zang bar 'gyur// rdzas ni gu gul bu ji dang /
91a2(rnying rgyud): sre chu dag gnyis su srur // rang gi dri chus chu byas la// lus 'khrugs pas 'byung po 'phros// des ni 'byung po'i gdon las zar// yan lag dag la zhugs pa la// 'bras bu ni log sha ro 'thung // gdon de nyid las zang ba'i thangs// gsang rdzog
91a3(rnying rgyud): nga 'dra ba las// mu zi tshel chen sha chen dang // gla rtsi ba l+la ti tsha dang // yungs ker dur khrod thal babyung // de la gsang sngags gdab bya zhing // dus bzhing lus la byugs bya zhing // chu gtsang sngags btab ltong btang zhing // mu bri su gul dud pa yis//
91a4(rnying rgyud): sna bu ga dag nas bdug par bya// sbal dang sbal ba ldong mo dag/ kha dang snga nas thon par bsam// de ltar sbyor ba rab byas ni// zla ba gsum gyis gdon las thang // gnas lnga dag tu zhugs pa na// 'bras bu smin mabyi bar nges// de las thar bar
91a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs// gsang sngags dag ni sbyor ba brtsam// gdon rnams thams cad 'joms byed pa'i// brag sngags gsang ba 'di nyid bstan// oM badz+ra wo ta h+ye grI ba nI li/ badz+ra pA Ni mA ra la phyogs phyogs/ mA ra ya sod sod/ mA nga ya gtogs shig/ chung zha
91a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu song/ mA ra ya sod mA ra ya dza dza/ drag sngags de ni rgyun du bgrang // lha gsum yid la gsal ba yis// sngags de rgyun du bzlas na ni// 'byung ngo thams cad skrag yang nges// bdun 'bum dag gis rab tu 'grub// dag bsags gang yang rung ba
91a7(rnying rgyud): rnams// zla ba gsum gyis tsher gcod 'gyur// rma ni gang du byung ba der// sngags gdab mchil ma byugs par bya// de ltar rtag tu byas pa na// gnas lnga'i gdon las zar bar 'gyur// de ni gdon gyi gnas srung ste// gdon rnams 'jug pa'i
91b1(rnying rgyud): gnas rnams na// rnam pa bcwa lnga dag gis bshad// de dag gong du smos pa bzhin// 'jug sgo'i gdon las thang ba'o// pi dwag sa gdon 'di bsam yas kyang // rigs ni rnam pa gsum du 'dus// klu la sogs pa'i sa gdon dang // sha wag
91b2(rnying rgyud): mchod par 'dod pa'i rigs// 'byung po dur khrod gnas pa'i rigs// rnam pa gsum du nga yis bshad// 'jug pa'i gnas ni rnam pa gsum// rtsa dang khrag la 'jug pa dang // pags pa rus la 'jug pa dang // snying dang mgo la 'jug pa ste// de rnams gdom
91b3(rnying rgyud): nI zhugs pa'i rtags// mdag kam gzhan bstad skyes bu re// snga ma'i bzhin dang mdog dag las// bzhin mdangs med cing bsam pa chung // spyod pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ni// gang dag mdzes par spyod kyang drung// mi mngos pa po spyod kyang rung / dge dang me dge'i sbyong phu la //
91b4(rnying rgyud): gyis rkyen dbang ma yin na// gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan mar bstan// de ltar gyur pa'i mi de la// zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod par za// de nas bgegs de ma brjod na// nad de 'phel nas ma rungs byid// de yang rang rang brtags pa ni// klu yi rigs kyis zin pa
91b5(rnying rgyud): na// nad rnams zang bar 'gyur bar nges// lus dang yan lag sbrid cing rengs// nad rnams lji zhing lus sems g.yengs// da ltar zhugs pa'i rtags rnams ni// klu yi gdon gyis zin par nges// ma mo'i gdon gyis zin pa na// tsha ba'i nad du 'byung bar
91b6(rnying rgyud): nges/ sems dang lus ni ljobs zin// dran pa nyams shing shed kyang thugs// de ltar nad kyis zin pa na// ma mo'i gdon gyis zin par nges// 'byung po ro langs gdon rnams dang // rgyal po la sogs gdon rnams ni// sna tshogs gdon gyis zin gyur na/
91b7(rnying rgyud): glo bur nad ni sna tshogs 'byung // de ltar nad kyis zin gyur na// 'byung po'i gdon rnams yin par nges// de ltar rnam gsum gdon dag ni// rang rang gnas su zhi ba'i thabs// klu yi gdon gyis zin pa la// cheng gtor gtsang ma'i gtor mas
92a1(rnying rgyud): mang / na/ // gas su// rnam sa/ sa na das /
92a2(rnying rgyud): sa pa / sa padi // da dpa pa byu/ sa sa // rdzu nga 'a ga /
92a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ ga nga/ / rnaMm pal d+ha ma sa/ dus pa'i da sa nga ga
92a4(rnying rgyud): sa degs pa 'i swA/ ga du/ pa sa brtug pa shAn ga nga ma dag / rlung sa brtags pa'i di // rnams ldan pa da / la
92a5(rnying rgyud): btsunahUMg ga zigs pa'i dgasu rnams ni// gsang gA gnas su 'byung ba // gnas pa'i grin pa'i// gas pa'i ba de dag ni// rgya mdzinas rdzosas sbyin padu// ni mi dga' nga ng+ge/
92a6(rnying rgyud): da pa'o// yangs ga sangs su ga // rgyam gas r+b+ba pa d+h-ig rnams byung ba// da nga byung zhing te mnas// ma ga rgyags dag / gangag nyig sbyi byung baH// gus dngas ma 'i
92a7(rnying rgyud): sazhun pas pa sa byu gyi ga ming shing ga sa kyi bye/ ci'i'i mi bu lungang don ga kyab ti yu dang chub ba zhes su
92b1(rnying rgyud): pang sa/ dag bya/ ba da ga san ga// pa smra
92b2(rnying rgyud): lha byung ba'i mid yang // je rigs kyu yis zin par nges// choga'i sbyong ba 'bad par bya// rgyal rigs mi la cing gleng na// phrin dang bar du mi rbang bas// dbang dang bsgrub pa chen po dang // reshes sngags rgyun du bzlas pas zang // dmangs
92b3(rnying rgyud): la grags pa na// zhi ba'i las rnams dkyims pa 'asgrub// je rigs mi la zhugs pa na// drag po'i sngags dang sprin sreg gis// myung du 'gegs las thar bar hr-I // bram ze'i ma rtags par// gsang sngags bzlas zhing rtswa bsgom
92b4(rnying rgyud): myang du gdon las thar bar 'gyur// gdol pa rigs la zhugs pan// rdza li hU~M ma dang de ta rims 'thag// deb ni rdo rje dgas gdon las rbang // bram ze'i rigs kyi tha rnams de// thugs pa'i brtag pa 'o lding ngo // 'jug pa'i
92b5(rnying rgyud): gsang po'i gnas// 'bras bu smin pa'i sa nyid ni// lus la sha bkra shur 'byung // badzin par gnas shing khrag laT// bab pa'i sa de shi mthong bas// bram ze'i rigs kyi rtags rnams ni// kha snga skam zhing rngu dang rje// pA nas khrag
92b6(rnying rgyud): du 'byung // gzhogs ni grayas parda ba dang // rtsis gang lag zhabar nges// mig gi bkrag dpa shA khrag shod// shes pa nyams pa'i rtags rnams ni// bram ze'i rigs kyis zid par bas/ kyal rigs pi la zin ster na// rab
92b7(rnying rgyud): thang bar dka' bar nges// dam gi ni pa bri gyur // slo dang du dr-i pa dang // drug cang dru pis srung byas la// dza pa'i lus rnams kru byas par// Ta duganas zang ba nge ste// de 'i rigs mi pa ni byung na// drag po'i las rnams pa yangs 'brug// blang po'i rigs rnams zin gyur du/
93a1(rnying rgyud): than / sa na/ ga sa// nga drang ba rdza sa / sa / yang gsasas sa ma/ nga na pa shA / ga ga la gas sa// mangs byang du ShA/
93a2(rnying rgyud): rtsal za// gab pa'i sa ni tshogs pa'o// mig rtsa dmar zhing gsus pa che// smin pa'i sa ni rkang mthil lo// tshogs pan zhing dran pa nyams// tshig pa za zhing nyams mi dga'// phyis ni tsog por 'gro bar nges// ngo bklag 'tshong yang lo yang
93a3(rnying rgyud): dkar// phyis ni mdze ru 'gro bar nges// de rnams rtags dang ldan pa la// dmangs rigs gdon du rig par bya// rgyal rigs mi la zin pa na// sna tshogs sbyor ba byas pa yis// myur du gdon lam thar par 'gyur// rje'u rigs mi la zid pa na/
93a4(rnying rgyud): bdag nyer dbang chen 'bar bar bsgom// shin tu khros pa'i ngang du gsal// dbu gsum phyag brgyad zhabs bzhi 'jigs// d+ha mgo gsum ni drag tu 'tshor// sku mdog sngon ga rab tu 'jigs// dur khrod rgyan gyis srul brgyan pa'o//
93a5(rnying rgyud): kyi dang po khe T+wA~M ga/ par mdze'u chung rab tu 'dzin// de yi 'og mas ral gri phyar// nam gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gang // g.yon rje dang po mdung rdung ngo // 'og mas gser gyi zhags pa brgyad // de yi 'og ma btson bsdams// g.yas kyi zhabs
93a6(rnying rgyud): brgyad lha chen mnan// g.yon gyi zhabs brgyad klu brgyad brdzis// de ltar gsal pang bskems nas ni// rigs gsum khro bo mdun du bsam// gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzogs pa yis// dmangs rigs gdon las thar bar 'gyur// gdong
93a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rigs kyi rtags rnams ni// 'jug pa'i sgrani rkang mthil nas// gnas ni mdzar par gnas pa pa// \u0f7frnapas la yang za bar byed// gab pa'i sa ni chu r+b+hes na// 'bras bu srinas mdzel khung ste// na tsha rab tu che ba dang // lus la khya
93b1(rnying rgyud): gas mangs 'ang // sos na na 'khrug pa dang // skabs su kA lpag mag pa na// gas pa 'thob cing nyal la dgang // kha zlas dgar skyugs par zad// pus do tshogs sgra chad par ngas// rtags na dang ldan pa da// gad 'jogs na/
93b2(rnying rgyud): yis zin par nges// nad kyang glo bur drug gis 'ong // de la bcos 'ang bskyed pa'i thabs// 'di ltar rab tu brtsam par bya// rgyang rigs la sogs mi rnams la// gnod par byed pa'i bgegs bskrad la// khri rgyas dbang drag rdzogs par bya// de lta
93b3(rnying rgyud): b.rab byas na// gdos rigs klu bas thang bar 'gyur // klu rigs snga la gdon rnams ni// rgyal rigs ngag gis zin byung na// thar bar dka' zhing nad zung 'ong // drag po'i stong bas bsdad par bya// drag po'i las kyis mthar na// zhi rgyas spyod pa'i la
93b4(rnying rgyud): kyis bskrad// rje'u rigs klu ya~Ms zin gyur na// nad kyi dpyad ni gsum 'ong s+ye// de dag dang po bcos pa'i thabs// dang po bden pa dang zlas kyis mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyung na// drug po'i las la nan cher gyi// bram ze
93b5(rnying rgyud): rigs kyis zin ster na// dang po khrus dang gtsang smras mchod// des kyang phan par ma khyud na// zhi ba'i las la phal cher 'bad// dmangs rigs gnon gyis zin pa na// zas dang gtor mas mchod par bya// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// rgyas
93b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid la 'bad par bya// gdel pa'i rigs kyis zin gyung na// dang po chu la ho ma khung du// de yis phran par ma gyur na// dbang gi sbyin skyeg rdzogs par bya// rigs lha k+ShuM pis zin gyur ni// dang pon pa'i myu rab bya// chab gtor drang ni rloms
93b7(rnying rgyud): mchod// chab gtor rgyas par bya ba ni// mtsho ye chu dang lteng ka'i rgya// yu ba'i chu dang rdzing bu'i chu// khron pa'i chu dang 'bab pa'i chu// nr-i sna tshogs chod blangs la yang // shin tu gtsang ba'i snod du brug/ ba dmar dag gi 'o ma dang // me tog mdzes
94a1(rnying rgyud): na // shAn / sa du/ dag gdun/ na r+m+ma/ sa / //
94a2(rnying rgyud): ga ga// ma gnas shi nga rdzogs 'a ga// ngas pa na sa/
94a3(rnying rgyud): rgyu sbyi du// jug nga / pa mas
94a4(rnying rgyud): sa da nas ma pa ba gnas su nga// 'i na / slong rnam da pa sa sa sa

95a1(rnying rgyud): chen// nad pa'i lus kyi dang rnams kun// phyag rnardo rje mthu rtsal dang // gshin rdeg shid kye brtul shug dang // rta mgrin rgyal po/ drag shul dang // phog yo ba yi drug sngags dang // rten 'brel rdzas kyi bdad pa yis/
95a2(rnying rgyud): nad pa'i lus kyi nad rnams kun// thon nas 'byung po'i ling gang bstim// de nas me sbar drag sngags bzlas// de nas sbyin sreg zin pa dang // bag zan dag gis gzugs byas la// bsreg pa'i thal ba dag dang bcas// kham sa'i blug ma'i
95a3(rnying rgyud): nang du gzhug/ thun gyis thabs la lcug mas brab// chu mig shar du bltas pa yi// 'gram du 'dom gsum tshad du sba// de lhur sbyor ba chen po ni// nyi shu rtsa brgyad byas gyur na// rgyal rigs gdon las zar par 'gyur// gang dag mi yi
95a4(rnying rgyud): rigs rnams la// rje rigs klu yis zin gyur na// drag po'i las kyis gso byed pa'i// sbyor ba 'di la brtson par bya// de gnyis sbyor ba chen po ni// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yi// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// 'bub khung gong dang
95a5(rnying rgyud): 'dra ba las// drag po'i thun dang sbyor ba ni// ra phag tshil dang pong tshil dang // ba tshel khri tshil la sogs pa// sbyin sreg rdzas su rgyas par gsunga?// ling ga rnam pa gsum bya ste// ming byang gong dang 'dra ba'o// rma bya mdzes pas lus la bya ba//
95a6(rnying rgyud): nyid la bstim zhing bzlas// seng lding phur pa sor brgyad la// dbang chen gsang sngags bris pa yang // bdag nyid thong ga g.yas pa la// le brgan dang gyis dril la gdags// lcags kyi phur bu song bzhi la// rdo rje gtum po'i
95a7(rnying rgyud): sngags bris la// bdag gi thong gagayon pa la// dar sngon dag gis dril la gdags// de nas ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rma byas byab cing ling gar bstim// ling ga gcig la thun gyis zab// gcig la nad pa'i nad rnams bstim/
95b1(rnying rgyud): gcig la tshil bu'i dud pas bdug/ de ltar gas ba rab ldan pas// bsgrub pa'i tshad ni gang dang mthun// ling ga dongs dag gis gtum// skyed pa'i shing gi me snang shid// ling ga gnyis ni bsag par bya// das ni stong ba zin pa dang // mu mig
95b2(rnying rgyud): nub tu blta ba'i sang // ling ga gcig dang bcas pa ni// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// de ltar sbyor ba nyid byas na// rje'u rigs gdon las thar bar 'gyur// bram ze'i rigs kyi rtags byung na// bdag nyid rnal 'byor chen po nyid// gshin rje gshed
95b3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// sber pa'i phur pa sor bzhi la// gshin rje gshed kyi sngags bris la// bdag nyid tho rig g.yon pa na// dang ser dag gis dril la btag/ dbang chen phung pa gong dang mtshungs// ber dug btsan dug la sogs te// dug gi rnam pa
95b4(rnying rgyud): snyed dang // khrag sna ci snyed yod pa dang // khyi lud dri chen mngal khrag dang // yugs sa mo ye zhabs ma ni// thun dang brab pa'i rdzas su bstan// phag pa dag gi sna rtse la// gsang sngags bzla' zhing lus la bya ba// ling ga nyid la bstim par bya//
95b5(rnying rgyud): de nas bsgrub pa tha ma la// dug shing sbyar ba'i me spang zhing // rdzas rnams thab tu bsreg bar bya// khrag gis gtor zhing ling ga bsreg/ de la sbyor ba zin pa dang // thal ba ling gang bcas pa ni// chu mig lho ngos blta
95b6(rnying rgyud): ba ru// gong dang 'dra bar sba bar bya// bram ze'i rigs las thar bar 'gyur// dmangs rigs rtags ni byung ba na// bcom ldan rta mgrin dmar po bsgom// dbang chen phur pa gong dang 'dra// nga gan phur ba sor bzhi la//
95b7(rnying rgyud): rta mgrin dag gi sngags bris la// bdag nyid tho ga g.yon pa la// dar sna tshogs kyis dril la gdags// shog bu'i leng ga brgya rtsa bsreg/ bca' lug gong dang 'dra ba la// dbus kyi chu mig dag tu yang // gong dang 'dra bar sba bar

99a1(rnying rgyud): mag kyang ma mtha chags// nab nanas smras mas// rkang ga'adang na go ting drugs// das bu s+ho gas da // / ma mang dra'ag pa dngas// dunas padabang ba// dal 'jug pa tha ba'i thabs// nga/

99a3(rnying rgyud): sngags dus da 'ang nyung bzlas/ hU~M phung phre / yas ga dag ga drug ni nga/ hU~M thag gagis ga/ bter ni ni nyid khrag la sa de/ sngags pacom brgya bad pa yis// b+hU mos gdon ni sa par na// sngags rgyu /

99b1(rnying rgyud): bong dag brgya drug dang // ngasha nas rtad ma pa dang // dakhrag tu thag mkhrag dang // rta khrug la mags zag pa rnams// sra ba lci lu bu gul pa// bu dag pa tham gcang ngas/ drim can kyings pam// nga rang dag gis sathu pa // ma nga tha kyi za

100a7(rnying rgyud): snying rtsa 'dang zhing sbrid pa rtsang // dran pa nyams shing 'a dad 'tshod// dben pa'i phyogs su song nas ni// klu lang len steng 'dod pa 'jung // dgong mo nyi ma~M nug kha rba// snying yang mi dga' gla len cing // la'alo ba mang po'i gtam pa
100b1(rnying rgyud): dgang // me dang dus gsum 'grogs par byed// snying dang slob nang rol grang // gzhogs ni g.yon pa na ba na// snying yang sang seng byed par ngas// lus la nag po'i thig le 'byung // rtags de rnams dang ldan pa na// rlung la dbang /
100b2(rnying rgyud): gdon yin no// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// dang po zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyong ba 'di dag brtsam// 'brung khung gang dang 'dra ba las// bdag nyid dpal chen thugs
100b3(rnying rgyud): ka nas// yi ge yi zhes chad pa las// grub khung nang du 'od du bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam// rlung gi dkyil 'khor de nyid du// ma mo'i gzugs nyid bsam par bya// grub khung
100b4(rnying rgyud): nang du ling ga gzhung // thun gyis zab cing gzugs dang byas me// tshor ma can gyi me sbar la// drog sngags 'di ni rab tu brjod/ hri ta sa ma mthi/ ya zad hrI/ snying bu dur ling dza dza/ drag sngags lan ni nyi shu gcig/ pazlas pas ma mo bskrad
100b5(rnying rgyud): par nges// me sngar phun dang sngags kyis gzir// sbyor ba lan ni nyi shu gcig/ byas shing gzugs la bstim byas na// rlung la dbang ba'i nad las thar// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// nam mkha' ma mos zin pa yi// rtags ni 'di
100b6(rnying rgyud): ltar 'byung bar nges// lus sems lji zhing mig kyang ser// mgo bo zing 'od byed pa dang // mig kyang zing long sna rtsa dmar// shes pa 'thib cing nyal la dga'// smad tshigs na zhing mdzad pa reng// shes pa 'khyam nas na ba ni// nam mkha'i mo gdon yin/
100b7(rnying rgyud): par nges// de dag bcos shing bskrad pa'i thabs// dang po zhi ba'i gtor mas mchod// des kyang phan zer ma gyur na// drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// bdag nyid dpal chen thugs ka nas// yi ge e nyid chad pa las// brub khung de
101a1(rnying rgyud): yi nang du yang // ma gnas nam mkha' gru gsum bsam// da yi kyil dum mo bsam// gzugs dang lang gnyid kyang // thun gyis thab cing dag grags bkram/ thog ma'i gsang sngags rdzas tid dra// drag sngags
101a2(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid btags pas 'grub// ma tri nA ga ma shA ma na la swA hA/ gsang sngags de nyid bcwa bya zhing // gang du dgos pa'i lhor ba rnams// skabs 'dir thams cad rdzogs par byed// lan ni brgya rtsa byas pa na// nam mkha'i mamo'i gdon la mthar/
101a3(rnying rgyud): gdon las ma shes na// tshogs sbyor rdzogs pa'i gyi// ngas ni ma ma'i gdon pas par// 'byung po'i gdon gyi nang rnam pa ni/ o Tang dag tu 'byung bar ngas// de dag rnams las thar ba'i thabs// bdun nyid dbang man dzad par bsgom
101a4(rnying rgyud): ni ri rab brjid pa tsam// stong gsum 'jig rten khyab par bsgom// phyag na rdo rje thugs kar bsgom// de yis bgegs rnams 'joms par bsam// dpral bar 'phags pa mi g.yo bas ma// mgrin par rta mgrin rgyal po bsam// lte bar gshin
101a5(rnying rgyud): gshed so bsam// de ltar bskyed rim rdzogs nas ni// bgegs rnams gang yin mdun na bsam// bdag nyid lha yi thugs kan// phyag na rdo rje gtum po bsam// de yis bgags ni brdud pa bas ma// thams cad 'joms par byed pa yi// gsang sngags
101a6(rnying rgyud): dam pa 'di rnams so// oM bad+ha kr-ita ha ya gr-I bahu lu hu wa/ badz+ra tsat+ta ma hA ro/ NaN hU~M phaT/ ya mAn+ta ka thing rdzing / badz+ra tsan+da ma raM li hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags bzla zhing lha tshogs bsgom// sngags de zlas shing mi dang / brab// da ltar sman du brgya bya zhing /
101a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs mnyes pa'i gtor ma ngo ga sa ga na ma pa'o// dang // thugs dam bskul zhing bstod pa bya// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba nges// des ni lnga tshogs gdon 'joms pa'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// rgyal po'i gdon gyi sung rtse byed/
101b1(rnying rgyud): de dag bslad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// rgyag pos zin pa'i me de la// rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung bar nges// snying mi dga' zhing glu chung len// don med 'gro snying 'dod pa ste// mgo dang mjing ba stod mi bad// blo snying 'dar zhing mig rtsa reg/ snying ga mi brda
101b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan pa 'phangs// yang na gsus bskal la 'byar bar byed// rmi lam stag dang seng ge dang // 'bag dang rol mo rgyu rta'i tshogs// btsun pa me chen rmib rnams// lha khang gsung rab mchod rten rnams// mchod pa rgyas par rmi ba dang // rnying
101b3(rnying rgyud): srog rtsa drar zhing na// so 'thab dbugs kyang rgod par byed// yang na kha yang 'dzum pa ste// mjid pa yo zhing rgod kha sti// de lta bu yi rtags rnams ni// rgyal po'i gdon gyis zin par nges// de dag bcos shing bskrad thabs ni// bdag nyid
101b4(rnying rgyud): sngags pa'i mdun nyid du// drub khung gru gsum gru gang ste// nang du rgyal po'i ling gzung de// gzugs kyi rgyu ni 'di lta ste// shel la sogs te rin chen lnga// sa bzang dag dang sbyar ba ni// gru gang dag gi tshad du bya// de nas brub khung nang dugazhug/
101b5(rnying rgyud): khyi lung bong tshe la ra tshil dang // khyi tshil mi tshol ba tshol dang // rta bon dang ni mu zi dang // lcags phye zangs phye yungs kar dang // phra ljang long du dug sna tshogs// mi khrag dang nr-i rta khyi'i khrag/ khrag snga dag ni sna tshogs dang // bran dang zor gyi rdzas
101b6(rnying rgyud): mas bsag/ lcags kyi phur pa sor brgyad pa// sngags 'di bzlas shing gzug pa'o// oM pad+ma hrIHbadz+ra pA Ni sar/ rA tsa'i snying khrag la tshal pa mA ra yadza/ sngags de lan ni brgya rtsa brgyad// phur ba dag la bzla' bya zhing // thun gyis
101b7(rnying rgyud): brang cing phur pas badzag/ tsher ma'i shing gis me sbar zhing // dar dang za 'og stag gzig ras// ljags ras spyang ras g.yi ras rnams// ser bsreg gzugs la me yang sbar// de ltar lan bdun byas ngan// rgyal po'i gdon
102a1(rnying rgyud): rnams smad par ngas// gang zhig dam sra'i gdon rnams na// mi yi lus la zhugs gyur na// rtags ni 'di ltar 'byung bar ngas// kha sha srab cing mig kyang 'chag/ chu zhabs na zheng sa yang na// mkhal ma 'phrig cing na bar
102a2(rnying rgyud): byed// skad kyang 'gags la snying mi dga'// rmi lam na yang bud med 'byung // chas bzang byung na zhen pa'i rtags// gos ngarda byung na 'jug pa'i rtags// rtags de rnams dang ldan gyur na// dam srig don phran gnod par nges// de dag bsad
102a3(rnying rgyud): cing bsrad pa'i thabs// sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsam par bya// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gru gsum dod ni gting du bgos// nang du dam gri'i ming byang bcug/ bong bug pa'i 'bras bral// sngags 'di bzlas shing nyal khar brdung // dbang
102a4(rnying rgyud): chen ting 'dzin ldan par bsgom// klu 'dul dbang chen sku la bstod// sngags 'di brgya rtsa brjod cing brdang / shan tri pu sha ma/ da ma sri mA ra ya tI nan/ mA ra ya rbad du mang dzA dza/ sngags de bzlas shing mtshan mo brdung // phyag na rdo rjes bkug par
102a5(rnying rgyud): bsam// rta mgrin dmar pos bzung bar bsam// gshin rje gshed kyis bsdam par bsam// mi g.yo bas ni gtub par bsam// des ni dem sri'i gdon las thar// gang dag mi yi rigra na m+ba la// gdon rnam gnod pa'i rmi lam ni// bye brag bshad pa 'di lta
102a6(rnying rgyud): ste// gdon phran gdon dang sred pa'i 'dre// srid pa'i 'dre rnams mi ltas ni// rang gi sha yang zab dang // rgya gram dag tu nyal ba dang // dud 'gro'i tshogs ni mang po dang // lus la srog chags zhugs pa dang // 'dam rdzab nyal dang mtshol bying //
102a7(rnying rgyud): gis rnams med dang brtson du bzung // rgyas brgyad dang skra ba kri lus la mabyung dang// bu rnams shal gzhing lding // de zul rtags rnams ni// sred pa'i 'dra du shes par bya// 'phral gyigadzin du gyur pa'i rtags// dri lam tags ni 'di ra
102b1(rnying rgyud): dbyung // slob dpan phyogs kyi 'drag don na// slob dpon lta bur sprul nas 'ang // zhang bar phyogs kyi 'dra gdon na// gang ba lta bur brdzunas rjong // rdzu phyogs kyi 'dra gdan// / sum 'khrung snyal nas dang // brgya phyogs nas drug nad
102b2(rnying rgyud): na ba dag tu ngong// pha mas dag tu zhugs pa na// pha mes dag tu bcas nas 'ong // rang gi tshol zhugs pa na// nA mnya ma dang / tu t+pal nas 'ong // ma yi rigs su zhugs pa na// ma yi phyogs kyi cho 'phrul 'od // zhang po rje chen la 'jigadon na// bdag
102b3(rnying rgyud): da mi skar smal na mdzad// de ltar gdon gyi rnam pa ni// la na gsum brgyad nas byung ba da// nges par de yi phyogs nas gdon// de dag las ni bar ba'i thabs// gong gi gas sngags bzlas pa'o// des ni brjod brarnams las par/
102b4(rnying rgyud): rtags de rnams ni byung ba na// gsang sngags bzlas pa brtson par bya'o// de ltar gsang sngags rab bzlas na// 'byung po'i gdon las thar bar nges// gang dag mI lI rigs rnams la// rmibam sum cu rtsa gnyis mi ngan// sngags 'di
102b5(rnying rgyud): lan bdun brjod pa yis// rmi la ma dang pa bzlog par nges// oM sarba prab+hASh+Tak+Sha duSh+Ta ya bzlog/ de ltar sngags de bzlas pa na// rmi lam nges par bzlog pa'o// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// 'gong po khyim du zhugs kyang na// bsam pa
102b6(rnying rgyud): 'grub par mi byed cing // 'khor dang longs spyod nyams pa ni// 'gong po yi dwags gnod par byed// 'gong po thams cad kha 'ching ba// drag sngags 'di yis kha 'ching ba'o// 'gong po ha pa sha tri ga nan/ tha tri myags thum ri la rbad/ de ltar
102b7(rnying rgyud): gnod pa'i mi de yis// bong bug pa'i rna mchog tu// 'gong po'i gzugs dang ming bcug la// zangs kyi sho dang rdo sho dang // rus pa'i sho yang nang du byug// yungs kar dag la sngags bzlas shing // ra ye skang stog dag gis 'dra ba// de ltar/
103a1(rnying rgyud): drag sngags bzlas byas na// 'gong po thams cad kha 'a ching \u0f7f// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// lcog 'bras phol dang sdungs pa'i nad rnams dang // sbrul gyis zin dang gag pa'i nad rnams dang // rma rnams 'cham
103a2(rnying rgyud): spangs par gyur pa la// gsang sngags bzlas shing sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrongs dang tsha tshas sna dang // mi yi d+hi chen rlung ki dang // la dang khye dang bag pa dang // lugs dang zangs dang dug sde dang // dri chu dang ni dri chen sbyar// 'dag
103a3(rnying rgyud): ba srung bye byug par bya// drug sngags 'di yis gdab par \u0f7f/ sa zlugs rten rnam pa'adasas/ gas byugs spyong pa'i ngas dag cu// drag zug sa 'di ni bcu shA/ mad 'ing mang mi / da tid gad cing 'dig rdzogs/
103a4(rnying rgyud): ltar rgyun du byas pa na// gong gi nad rnams zhi bar gsungs// gang dag mi yi rigs rnams la// dug la sogs pa'i nad kyi rigs// sha dug sbyang dug rtsi dug ni// de dag zhi bar bya ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen mgrin pa ru// rma bya mdangs ldan
103a5(rnying rgyud): 'arlom par gyi// chugatsang dakhang por nang du // rang la tsha ba 'dus myur bas// mchil ma chu 'i nang du por// sha drug mo drug na drug dang // spyir po'i dreg rnams rngub pa ba skangs// gzhan dgra bzung bar byed pa na// thugs kya sngags bsdus maN+Dal
103a6(rnying rgyud): mtsho// de dag rgyan du byas shing gdab// dug gi ro rnam 'drong bar bsam// sngags 'di 'bum gyis 'grub par dpe// oM sang ha ka li ta satwA~M/ ka btsa re/ ma hA de ba'i gling srung / oM can 'dis/ he b+hi sa/ ma hA d+his/ ka ra tsi b+his pa/ zhes pa'i sngags
103a7(rnying rgyud): de bzlas shing spang bar bya// des ni drug rnams 'joms dang // mdze drug pa sogs kyi drug la// gsung bzang po zhagacig dang // chu gtsang dag tu sbyar bus nas// sngags 'di bcu rtsa gdab par bya// des ni lus kun khrus byas nas// baspa bug
103b1(rnying rgyud): sam du gajug/ da na ngas thams cad thub// del sngags ni 'dis s+ho// ga ta la das sa/ sngags brtsam brgyad 'bras dang // gsung byung bdag byas na// d+hATI cag ga dub gsangs// na// sas
103b2(rnying rgyud): banug bri// drug gi sbyong rgya mar 'byung // de dag sngags kyis 'asrung can// sbyor dug sha dug gyi drug ni// gong drugasang sngags bstan pa'o// btsan drug dag gi sngags 'di'o// dzaM sring bring song // khrag 'i dzi/ sngags 'di brgya rtsa bzlas byas nas/
103b3(rnying rgyud): nalag ga nyis kyi bar dag tu// btsan dug blangs te zos gyur kyang // sngags kyi nus pas thub par thos// dus ni snyigs ma'i dus de ru// sangs rgyas bstan pa rngub pa'i rtags// drug gi sbyor ba 'byung bar nges// mtsho nyid la sogs nad rnams so//
103b4(rnying rgyud): bzhig tu rtsa bzhi 'byung // de dag 'byung ba'i dul nyid du// rdzogs pa rang byung rgyud 'di gsungs// le'u 'di dag 'byung ba yis// sems can kun gyi mgan du gyur// 'di ltar spyod pa rdzogs byas nas// nang rnams zhi bar ngas bshad do// gang /
103b5(rnying rgyud): nga rig rnams // d+hadang gdon gyis gad byed na/ na rnaM lnga mi sna pa la// na ba la khong te// ba gas rdzogs brdzun bac+doMs// rdzas sus ma na tegs gyur na// gdoni de rnyed 'as tha sa
103b6(rnying rgyud): la// lcags nad sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// de dag zhi bar byed pa'i thabs// lung ba mtshams kyi 'khor lo las// sde brgyad drag sngags tha mar bri// dar ram ras ni ser pos sgril// sbyor ba'i phur ba song bzhi la// gsang sngags nus tshad bcwa
103b7(rnying rgyud): ni// mi bul dri btigs pas byugs nad chad// gang dag me yi rigs rnams la// rims nad dag gis btang gyur na// de dag rnams la thar pa'i thabs// sbyo ba 'di nyid byas pas thub// khrus ni sna tshogs byas nas ni// nam lang
104a1(rnying rgyud): yi dri rtsa yis// dang po tha ma pho nas bar mas khrus byas shing // lhor yang bag tsam gtong bar bya// sna bug nang du bag tsam blugs// rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas bya zhing // de ltar rgyan du byas pa na// 'gos nad rims las
104a2(rnying rgyud): thar bar nges// de ltar sbyor ba byas pa yis// nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur// lnga brgya dus kyi tham pa// nad kyi sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab// de rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// dbang chen gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs// de nas gsang sngags
104a3(rnying rgyud): bstan pa gnas// de nas gdon rnams 'joms byed pa'o// gsang sngags 'di ni rgyas par 'gyur// lo ni lnga brgya bar du gnas// de nas gsang sngags bstan pa ni// yun ring gnas par bas ma bshad// gsang sngags 'di ni shin tu gsapa//
104a4(rnying rgyud): de phyir bgegs rnams 'joms pa'o// de nas dbang chen 'khor bcas pa/ bstod pa'i glu chen 'di skad do// hrIH/ rig pa ye shes nyid las bskyed pa'i lha// dbang chen kun 'dus dbang gi rgyal po khyod// dbang gi mdog de yang bskal pa'i
104a5(rnying rgyud): me ltar 'bar// zhal gsum phyag drug khyo rgyal rta skad mtsher// shin tu brjid dang dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// zhabs bzhi bgrad cing rgya mtsho'i klu rnams brdzes// zhal nas tshems brdar klu yi gshed mar mdzad// spyan rtsa rig cing
104a6(rnying rgyud): ma mo pho nyar 'gyed// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad ste// zhabs brgyad khro rgyal klu brgyad brdzis// dmar nag sku ni sna tshogs ston// dregs pa can rnams zhal du rngub// dbang gi sku mdog dmar 'phrog// sring po gsum nyid dbang du srung // rta skang phyog ba cur stsog
104a7(rnying rgyud): ba yis// dus gsum khro bo das ba sdud// rta bro zang gsum brjid pa yis// srid gsum 'byung po'i snying la brdung // phyag mtshan mang po bsdams pa yis// klu rnams thams cad thal bar rdzogs// kun la byams pa'i khro rgyal klu 'dul khyor// nga
104b1(rnying rgyud): rkye la gnyis med yid phyag bstod/ hUM// khro po'i rgyal po rta mgrin dbang gi sku// hrIH dang phaTaHkyis klu rnams za bar byed// mig nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i bla rnams bsreg/ shangs nas rlung 'tshu bas 'jig rten khams kun 'khrugs// lcags kyi
104b2(rnying rgyud): rmig pas klu yi snying nas 'dren// muM ye snying 'byin klu rnams bsreg par byed// gsod byed khro rgyal chen po yis// dgra bgegs snying khrag rngam pa'i zhal gyis gsol// dbang chen khyed kyi thugs ka nas// gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can// zhal gcig
104b3(rnying rgyud): phyag gnyis sku mdog sde// g.yas pa'i phyag na bstims pa ni// klu 'dul gser gyis rdo rje bsnams// zung zhig gtogs shig rnam par chings// g.yon pa'i phyag na bsdams pa ni// sgal zhags phur bu phyogs bcur 'debs// drongs shig khug cig snying
104b4(rnying rgyud): la ya// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// sna tshogs mchog gi su 'bar zhing // sku ni ri rab lta bur brjid// gsung sgras skong gsum zil gyis gnon// thugs ni chos nyid byams par ldan// ral pa kha ma nag byin du brdzes// gsus pa che la srul yang za// klu
104b5(rnying rgyud): rnams za ba'i mche ba gtsig// ral pa gyen du brdzes pa yis// klu yi 'jig rten dbang du bsdu// ag tshom me lhur 'bar ba yis// mi yi 'jig rten skyob par byed// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul bstan pas// gru rnams skrod par byed pa'o// bcom
104b6(rnying rgyud): ldan phyag na rdo rje ni// lha chen brgyad ni phyag gis sgrol// klu chen brgyad ni zhabs kyis mnan// bdud dang ma mo'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ rgyal 'gong kun gyi don snying 'byin// ma bdud thams cad gsod par byed// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// ri rab rdzing bzhir
104b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa ni// khyod kyi lag pa g.yas pa yis// 'phangs pas 'jig rten 'gug par byed// rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas pa yi// klu rnams khyod kyis zas su za// ri rab ngos kyi klu rnams ni// dpag tshad brgyad khrir 'phen par byed// klu 'dul rtsod la
105a1(rnying rgyud): sdug 'tshal ba stod// zla ba'i rnal pa tas da'agyur// dbang min byed kyi thugs ka nas// phyag na rdo gau nyi sapa// dbang cad kyang sa dpral ba na/ dz+ra// brtsal 'phags pa mig yob// yum gnas pa/
105a2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa che// g.yas pas ral gri bsnams pa yis// khams gsum sems can skyes rdza dgacod // g.yon pas sngags mdzub zhags pa bsnams// thams cad chings shig rnam par sdoms//
105a3(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// rdungs shig khro bo'i rgyal po khyod// da gra dang bgegs rnams rdul du rlogs// khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo mgon// klu 'dul 'jigs pa'i sku la bstod/ g+hu/ bcom ldan dbang chen mgrin pa nas// sprul pa'i
105a4(rnying rgyud): mgrin dmar po byung // zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar// g.yas pas be con bsnams pa yis// srid pa'i 'byung po rdul du brlag/ g.yon pas sdigs mdzub bsgrengs pa yis// thams cad ma lus sgrol bar byed// D+ha mgrin rta rmad
105a5(rnying rgyud): 'tsher ba yis// klu la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams 'joms// su ni me yi tsha tsha 'jo// gdon bgegs thams cad zil bar brlag/ sprul cig rol tig tu mgrin rgyal// 'byung po 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan dpal chen ste ba nas/
105a6(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // ka ma ka ma tshig tshig ral pa me ltar 'bar// g.yas na 'khor lo rtsi bas stong bskor// srid gsum ma mo gsod par byed// dbang du lus shig gshin rje gshed// g.yon
105a7(rnying rgyud): pas sbrul zhags sdigs mdzub bsgrengs// dam tshig nyams pa'i gshed ma mdzad// ma mo'i lce'u bak+Sha rgyal gshin rje gshed// mthing nag 'jigs byed khro kyal dgra po'i gshed// thams cad 'ching byed zhags pa klad la bskor// la mo'i
105b1(rnying rgyud): gshed byed khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed// sku mdog gsal 'gyur ma mo gcer bur 'gyur// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i khro rgyal tshogs dang bcas// blo snying zhal du gsol zhing skyeng khrag rlon mo 'jibs// mi mgo glar khrag nyid kyi zhal du gsol// khro rgyal
105b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig byed ha la ha la'i sku// ljags 'dril tsam gyis rdo rje'i thog chen 'bebs// kun gyi gshed byed ma mo 'dul// ma mo dbang du bsdu la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma dbang gi sku ni brjid pa che// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje klu 'dil brjid// mi g.yo mgon
105b3(rnying rgyud): pos bdud dang srin po 'dul// gshin rje gshed kyis dgra go ma rungs 'joms// rta mgrin nyid kyis thams cad 'gugs par byed// khro rgyal bgegs rnams 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// d+h+ri ta ya pad+ma kro ha hUM hU~M mA ra ya dza dza/ gsang sngags dbang
105b4(rnying rgyud): pos bskul byas la// bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin ldan// de ltar las rnams rdzogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba rdzogs par bya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbang rdzogs bya// bcom ldan dbang chen sgo nyid la// 'khor gyi lha dang khrus
105b5(rnying rgyud): bstod nas// rang rang stan la mngon par 'dug/ yi dwags rnams ni phrad cing sngangs// 'byung po sha za'i gdon las thar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// chen po las ni shin tu che// dbang chen gsad pa'i rgyud 'di ni// rab tu 'byung bar
105b6(rnying rgyud): dka' ba ste// lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la// rgyud 'di 'byung zhing las rnams 'grub// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang mnyam par sbyor// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud rgyal gsang ba 'di nyid ni// thams cad 'dul byed gnyen po ste/
105b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad rang rang bde la 'god pa'o// e ma ho// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i bkod pa 'di// 'di ltar rab tu bya bar gsang // dbus su dmar nag gru gsum mdzes// zlag ma gsum ni ljo nag bri// de yi phyi rim dag tu yang
106a1(rnying rgyud): gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa bri// phyi rim zlum po phu khyung bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris byas la// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma dang // dbang chen bsgrub pa'i rdzas ni bzhag/ zla gam gsum gyi steng dag tu// lcags
106a2(rnying rgyud): kyi phur pa re re la// dar dmar gdugs ni phub pa'o// sgo bzhing dgram po'i rdzas rnams ni// shar du shel gyi phur pa la// dar dkar gdugs dang bcas pa'o// lho ru sbyar ba'i phrer pa la// dar ser gtsang ma'i gdugs kyis phub/
106a3(rnying rgyud): nub tu sing ldeng phur pa la// dAr dmar dag gi gdugs kyis phub// byang du ljags kyi phur pa la// dur ldang dag gi gdugs kyis phub// byang shar mtshams kyi zla chad steng // lcags kyi phung ba dag btsugs la// drar tshon dag gi cod pan
106a4(rnying rgyud): btags// shar lho mtshams kyi gu chad sbreng // dug rnams byugs pa'i phur pa ste// dar nag drug gi cod pan btags pa'o// lho nub mtshams su bzhag pa ni// seng ldeng phrar pa khrag gis byugs// dar na gcod pan btags pa'o//
106a5(rnying rgyud): chub byang mtshams snga mchog phur ni// mthing nag dar gyi cod pa ni btags// gri chad phyi ma bzhi po la// gtor ma re re gzhag par bya// de ltar rdzas rnams bshams pa'o// bsrub pa'i skabs su shes par bya// bsnyen pa'i skabs su
106a6(rnying rgyud): dpal gtor dag gis so// las la sbyor ba'i dus tsam nas// khrag dang dug thun thun rdzas bsag/ rang rang thun dang 'dra bar bshad// des ni las rnams 'grub par gsungs// gang zhig longs spyod nyams pa yis// 'di ltar spyad na dngos
106a7(rnying rgyud): grub 'byung // tshe dang bsod nams rgyas par 'phel// skye dang mi skye'i sdug bsngal bral// 'dis ni bsam pa nye bar 'grub pa'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ thams cad zlog byed mchod cha'i le'u ste bcu gcig
106b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgyag skad du/ sarba mA bas sa s+yA ba kAm+b+ha n+na ma~M/ bad ska dra/ bad+mad mi bral ba'i nang du thams cad sbyar ba 'a lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan cha mchog tu dra ka la phyag 'tshal lo// da na
106b2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de nyid tshe mchog he ru ka zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bdud rtsi thal ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// kye mako Ta rI 'khor rnams nyon// khams gsum rnam rgyal yum nyid kyis// b+haga'i dbyings nas bka' stsal pa
106b3(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi ston bu 'di nyid las// stong ba ngan pa 'di gaste// su y-i stor ba bad+mad di// zung gis zung ba bad dang // rnamam pa dgra las byung ba dang // de bzhid rang la byung ba dang // snachags dag de rdzas pa pag /
106b4(rnying rgyud): sman ni rnam po ci snyed dang // de bzhin dug kyang rab tu gsungs// dug lnga bdud rtsis sel ba'i phyir// rtsa ba lnga yi sbyor ba las// yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// sbyor ba'i rdzas kyi them las ni// i dang AHdang hUM dag gis// spo ba kyi
106b5(rnying rgyud): sa brlabs nas ni// bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub pa 'dre// shin tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i// gnas ni rab tu btsal nas kyang // gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtags pa nas// 'jug pa'i dus nyid bstan pa'o// gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtag/
106b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// nags tshal rab tu mang ba'o// bya skad sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang // brag ri ma tho bar 'dug pa dang // me tog sna tshogs 'khrungs pa dang // gtsang ma'i chu 'bab nyi ma rtag/ bcud dang 'bras bu spen pa ru// gnas ni rtag ma dbyibs
106b7(rnying rgyud): dgatu// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal gyi ste// dkyil 'khor mda' gang tshad duH// dreg gis ma phags dpangs mthob// shin tu byugs pas legs pa la// dri rgyas chag chag legs btab pa// de nas chag de bskam pa dang /
107a1(rnying rgyud): na myong pa dag slong na// gsus pa/ nga kyi bgags rgyams// gzhung dang mthun par bgyus pa// phyis rnams pa sogs bzhin na// dungs dang nangs sa s+ho// rlung marnam sa gas pa' ma rnams nga /
107a2(rnying rgyud): bgags / pa la / sas nga / ga pa ma / yu
107a3(rnying rgyud): sa/ sa sa su // ga
107a4(rnying rgyud): pa / / 'di / ba dag dpang sa / ma sa
107a5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas bzla/ po nyid kyi// brgyad pa'i na dag/ hrI pa skye gzhin pa / rjes 'dub pa'i byu shing bsta/ den rdzu sugasas gnas ma/ dang gyu bang /
107a6(rnying rgyud): dang gas// sta pa di nga ga
107a7(rnying rgyud): bab mis zung // nye 'a pa pa'ing dru bams padags pani/ deng ga su kyis shing nga// rigs papang nirnam cad ldan da /
107b1(rnying rgyud): dbang sa rags mo la rgan na gnyis// kha dog rags dang ram gnyis// phal 'khor lo dpag bsam shing // yi ge lta bu rlom rnams// bu la thung da pa bang dbang bsha// byang gA dum pa res// mdzun ma wa ba byung bar// dang /
107b2(rnying rgyud): rigs la bzang bar bshad// dbyibs dpa 'a dog rab btags la// dbus su rab tu gzhag par bya// 'khor po rtsi bas ma rer la// bum pa mdzes pa de reg zhag/ bum pa de dge re raM lo// rtsa rtsa phur pA re re ye// bat+tA yi lpags
107b3(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// rir drag la bris la bkod// phur pa bcu po dag la gdags// dAr da mAr cod pan re re btags// de yi phyi rim grwa chad la// mda' dang me long dang snga dang // ral gri gtor ma re re bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de la sgo bzhi pa// tham
107b4(rnying rgyud): pa rigs dang mthun pa de// ras dkar mgul chings dag dang bcas// shar du mdzes pa'i spyan bye la// lho yi bum pa de nyid las// mdzes pa'i zhal nyid kri bar bya// nub kyang gnyis lam dang hUM// legs par bris la dgod par bya// de nas
107b5(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis// gtso bo yab la don zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ dam rdzas mtshan nyid de ltar na// snyan gyi rigs rnams gsang rgya gastsol// de nas rnam grol he ru kaMs// nye ba'i 'khor la bka' stsal ba// kye
107b6(rnying rgyud): nyon cig sum gyi tshogs// sman gyi rigs rnams 'di lta ste// rigs ni lnga rung gis bshad// rtsub 'bras bu lha chu bshad// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi// dbus kyi thod pa dag tu yang // ji chen mam po srung gcig
107b7(rnying rgyud): bzhag/ shar gyi bum pa'i rang dag tu// byang chub sems ni srang byed bzhag/ lho na bskal ba'i mAM sa nyid// meg dang lnga la gzhi blangs pa// de bzhin snying dang mkhal ma dang // mtsho dpa la sogs sang gsum bdag/ ru tu tshogs rag
108a1(rnying rgyud): da// bsgral ban+d+ha / suchags na// yadags rgyung dang mnyan par bsha// b+hu gi byun pa'i na dgaH// dzA mA chogs sa smra na// rga'athag ga ga madrang bya// dan sna shar duthang chu gnan// ram pa sa
108a2(rnying rgyud): sogs te// cung kar gu kul dag dang ni// rdo rje phur ba drug dang ni// nor tsan chen po dang // dak+ta la sags gzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lho phyogs su// bsgrub pa'i yum nyid bzhag nas ni// rgyun chu sna tshogs rab tu brgyan/
108a3(rnying rgyud): dbul bar thal chen mtshan ma btab// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi phyogs dag tu// grub po yab yum 'dug nas ni// dkI la 'khor byang gri phyogs dag tu// dgra bgegs zlog pa'i mtshon chu bzhag/ dbus kyi pho thong rig pa yang // rgong gi
108a4(rnying rgyud): ri mo med pa na// rdo rje nyid dang bri dang tha// dmangs rigs mo yi b+han+ta la// gang gi ri mo med pa na// pad+ma dang ni oM zhes bris// de yi nang du thug pa'i spun// sha chen dang ni thag chen dang // de bzhin ni chen byang chub sems// dri chul sogs gtso ba lnga/
108a5(rnying rgyud): de yi 'bras bu chen ma ni// mig dang snang nab lce// tsat+pa la so rjes che mnyam ste// srang ni byed dang gsum dag bzhag/ de yi 'grong de bstan pa ni// gur bum dang ni tsan dan dang // wang thos dang ni n+ya thos dang // de bzhin lngal marnam lnga yang /
108a6(rnying rgyud): cha mnyam grang byed tshud du bzhag/ de yi 'bras bu sbyar ba ni// mi dang rdza dang kyi dang ni// de bzhin gleng dang lug la sogs// mchis pa lnga dang grang ba la// byung pa lnga dang dri chen lnga// cha mnyam srang gi phyed dang gnyis// de yi 'phrong nyid sngan
108a7(rnying rgyud): pa// ga pur dang ni mu tig dang // lan tshwa dang ni n+ya skrag dang // zhing tsha ga dang cha mnyam la// zhogacig dag gi tshad duH// de rnams tshad du bsnyen pa y-in// de mangs rigs dri chen dag dang ni// ta dkar dang ni 'a cha/
108b1(rnying rgyud): shar dag dang shang shang gi// dri men dag ni cha mnyam la// zho phyed dag gi tshad du bya// de yi 'grong du bstan pa ni// khyi sha dang ni kham bu dang // snying ni zho sha dag dang a rung // sug gle nyid dang cha mnyam la// zha gcig dag gi tshad du bya// 'bras
108b2(rnying rgyud): dang til deng gur gum dang // dri chu cha mnya ma sbyar bar bya// tshad ni gsum ma ma gcig tu btang // shing thog a 'bras lha ru ra// ba ru ra dang lig dur// thal dkar rdo rje dag dang ni// cha mnyam sbyar de zho phyed tsam// rta ga ge sar klu sman dang /
108b3(rnying rgyud): gla rtsi dang ni tsan dan dang // kha ru tshe dang rgya sdes dang // dza ti pha la shu mo za// cha snyoms sbrad rtsi dag tu sbyar// gser dang dngul dang zongs dang lcags// ga yu dang dung dang ra gan dang // zhib tu brdar la cha snyoms la// drod la phrib nas zho gcig btang //
108b4(rnying rgyud): des ni 'od rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// dkar po'i rus dang byi lA'i snying // dra ba'i khu ba dag dang sbyar// sran ma gsum gyi tshad du btar// zhag bdun bsgrub pa byas pa na// dri ni sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// gla rtsi dang ni tsan da na dang // seng ge'i
108b5(rnying rgyud): lci bgro shi Sha// gur bum chu dang sbyar byas nas// nam gnyis dag ni btang gyur nas// zhag lnga lon pa dag drang ni// dri zhim pa dang du ba 'byung // de ltar rang dang snod dag tu// dkyil 'khor mtha' mar bshams nas ni// tshes ni brgyad la
108b6(rnying rgyud): zhugs pa dang // zhag gcig dbang gi bro bdUr zhing // dkyil 'khor de la byin brlab bya// de nas sbyin gyi rigs rnams kun// kha dog rigs rnam mig gis dbye// kha dog dkar ba thams cad kun// rdo rje rigs kyi sman du bshad//
108b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin ser dang dmar ba dang // ljang dang mthing ga la sogs rnams// rigs ni so sor bye ba rnams// dkyil 'khor shar gyi phyogs nyid du// khrig kyeg tu bris ngag du btag/ me dang rdo rje rgyal pos btag// shin tu zhi par btag bya zhing // sngags
109a1(rnying rgyud): 'dis rab tu btag par bya// oM oM mr-i ta badz+ra han han d+ha/ de skad brjod cing sman rnams btags// de nas stan rnams thogs pa dang // gsang ba rdo rje skyob dpon gyis// byin brlab bya zhing spyan rnams bsre// bsrung ba
109a2(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di kun gyis bzlas// oM a mr-i ta mu sa le swA hA// de skad brjod cing zhib tu bskams// de dag sman gyi rigs rnams kun// glang po che las byung ba lnga// 'o ma skrag sgong dag gis dgang // dri chu ngo kon tsam du sbyar// dmangs
109a3(rnying rgyud): rigs mo yi b+han+ta ru// shong tshad blugs la pho yis dgeb// 'phe ma nas gnyis ka khengs pa dang // dngos grub chen po thob par gsungs// gAng yang rung ba'i thod pa lngar// lhag na blugs la grwa bzhir bzhag/ sna tshogs dur gyis bya bcad
109a4(rnying rgyud): de// dbus kyi b+h+r-i nr-i kha sbyar la// dar dmar dag gis thum bur g.yogs// mched lham du yod gzungs thag btag/ de nas ras dkar gtsang ma yis// yol ba dag ni rab tu bya// 'dzeb tu bgrang ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM AHhUM/
109a5(rnying rgyud): sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIH/ dbyangs dang bcas pas rab tu bgrang // phrin las gang yang rung ba bsrang // de nas rtags rnams byung ba dang // dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga bya// de nas bdag nyid ting 'dzin gyis// dpal chen che mchog he
109a6(rnying rgyud): ru kAr// rab tu gsal bar bsgom pa ni// dbu mang phyag kyang mang po la// skyug nag sku ni rab tu 'bar// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// phyag kyang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// dkyil 'khor dus gcig bsgom pa'o// bdag nyid gtso bo bskye
109a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka raM dz+wa la hUM/ bdag nyid gtso bo rigs ma par bsgom// gsang ba'i yum kyang yab dang 'dra// sngags 'dis yum nyid gsal bar bskyed// oM ma hA kro d+d+hi tA rI sarba ta thA ga ta mur a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de ltar
109b1(rnying rgyud): bskyed de mardzogs nas ni// grub po yab yum nyid du sbyar// yab yum spos chu'o ma skya bcu// gur kum sran ma'i ril bu tsam// pad+ma'i nang du dril te gzhug/ de nas sbyor ba rab byas nas// byang chub sems dang rak+ta sbyar// de nyid dbus su gzhag
109b2(rnying rgyud): par bya// de nas nub ni gnyis pa nas// gu gyi'i sngags 'di rab tu bgrang // oM badz+ra Ni t+ta swa ma ya hUM/ rab 'bring tha ma gsum du bgrang // de nas dekyil 'khor de nyid phyogs// dbus su byang sems rnam snang ste// shar gyi 'khor po'i sngags se tra/
109b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dri chu sna tshags te// lho ru byang g.yag sha chen dang // sha ba'i sha rnams dgod ba'o// nud kyi 'khor lo de nyid pa// 'byung ba lA lI rak+Sha dang // mAng sa dang ni rak+Sha la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs sti gzhag par bya// byang du bskal ba'i dra
109b4(rnying rgyud): chu gzhag/ sman gyi rigs rnams gsal ba dang // sngags 'dis thams cad byin gyis brlob// oM swa hUM hrIHhA/ rtsa ba'i snying por shes par bya// zho sha sting dang mkhal zho sha// ko ro zho sha dag dang ni// shu dang ku re rta dang shu dag sre
109b5(rnying rgyud): me dang // nab se shu dag dgA dang a ru ra// ra mo sha gdang ster pI la N+Da dag dang ni// skyes pa'i chu dang sbyar ba ni// srang phyed dag gi tshad du bya// sman gyi sbyor bde dgra kun// dkyil 'khor byang du kha dog dbye// shar du sman nyid btag par
109b6(rnying rgyud): bya// lho ru 'khar gzhong nang du ni// sman sna tshogs tshad bsag par bya// sna tshogs sbyar ba nus pa che// sman gyi rigs ni sna tshogs kun// bsre ba'i sngags ni 'di dag brjod// am+b+hi bi sho d+ha ya/ bsre dang ba
109b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sngags su brjod// de nas rab 'bring rtags byung nas// dngos grub dbab pa'i sngags 'di'o// oM ma hA sarba pa lhas mr-i ta suM Sha hri phem pham// g.yang dor la sogs sna tshogs bya// sman gyi rang bzhin de dag kun// mchog
110a1(rnying rgyud): chen lag pa g.yon gyis dang sa// mchog chen gling tha 'brungad pas g.yab// dung dang rnga dang zil bu dang // cang te'u bi wang la sogs sku// s+thA ni sna tshogs dkrol zhing 'brang // de nas dkyil 'khor ngas
110a2(rnying rgyud): zhi nas// mched lham rnams kyis dbyangs 'di blang // rang byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong pa sbyar ba'i sman// ra sA yan la sogs rdzas// rtsa ba 'bum phrag yongs kyi btud// gnyis med bde chen las byung ba'i// byang chub
110a3(rnying rgyud): sems ni rdo rje skye// shwa chen mchod pa rin po che// zas mchog tsho yi rin po che// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// rdo rje chu ste dri chu mchog/ ga pur shel gyi spos phor grasu ma// rin chen me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog/ rin chen 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud//
110a4(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rnal 'byor che// ma lus 'dus pa'i bdud rtsi che// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor
110a5(rnying rgyud): phyir// gcig tu dpa' bo'i ro rnams dang // gnyis su med par dang spyad nas// dus gsun bud+d+ha thams cad dang // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod// dbyangs de blangs shing dngos grub blang // de nas yum g+ni sa snyan bla pa// gsung bzhin dag gi chog
110a6(rnying rgyud): brjod// de nas nub ni lnga pa na// bdud rtsi byin brlabs sngags 'di brjod/ badz+ra a mr-it+ta/ oM AHhrI hrIb+h+yaH/ de ltar byin brlabs rdzogs nas ni// dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di brjod// oMHsu badz+rarma kA yai na/ AM a mr-i ti sid+d+hi hrI na sngag+sa kyi yi ge de dag kun/
110a7(rnying rgyud): 'dadu zhwa nas dngos grub breng // yi ge de dag re re les// lha yi su ni re re ste// yi ge mthunas dngos grub blang // de nas dngos su ba rdzogs nas ni// slob pa de la dngos grub dbang nyid 'gyur// dbang sheg nas sde bstan pa ni// spyi gtsug
110b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi dkyil 'khor der// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya bong kha sgrub tsam// de yi steng du oM nyid bsam// lce nyid pad+mar gyur steng du// yi ge At+manyid 'od 'bar bsam// thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi steng du hUM nyid bsal/
110b2(rnying rgyud): he kar rat+na zur brgyad steng dag te// rin chen 'od 'bar steng du yang // yi ge swA nyid rab tu bsam// gsang ba'i gnas su hA nyid bsam// yi ge 'bru ni lnga po las// rigs lnga'i sku ni 'od 'bar te// 'od zer lnga lnga rab tu 'bar// phyag rgya 'khor lo rtse
110b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad 'bar// de nas dngos grub dbang rdzogs nas// 'od zer katso bo'i dbang nyid bskur/ oM dkar ldi bor bsam par bya// lce la AHdmar 'od 'bar bsam// snying gar hUM nyid mthing ga'o// lte bar yi ge lA ser bsam// gsang ba'i yi ge
110b4(rnying rgyud): nyid ljang bu'o// dkar dmar 'od ni mdang sa dang ldan// rang nyid bsam zhing bu pa sgo// de nas bu la 'dus gyur pas// phyag mtshan yi ge dag tu gyur// oM las 'kho rol rtsibs brgyad 'bar// 'bar nas dri chen bdud rtsir zhu// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar/
110b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar nas byang chub semra su zhu// ske las rin chen 'od 'bar te// 'bad na sA mA ngas bdud rtsir zhu// hrIHlas 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros// 'phros nas rak+ta'i thig le zhu// hA las skra ni 'od 'bar bsam// 'bar nas dri chu bdud rtsir zhu// bu ya
110b6(rnying rgyud): nyid rdzogs nas ni// slob dpon gsang ba'i yum ldan des// dbang bsrur tshig ni 'di skad brjod// ho gdod nas rnam dag ma skyes chos kyi dbyings// dag dang ma dag rnam rtog mtha' las 'das// dug gsum gcig la skye bstan spyi shol med// dngos
110b7(rnying rgyud): grub brlan chen sna tshogs 'bar ba can// su 'dod sbyin gyis 'di pa da tshur phongs// skam par 'brengs pa'i gti mug mun pa la// sprin mthong khud par nyi shar dro ba ltar// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po dbang chen 'di sbyin pas// rig 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo'i
111a1(rnying rgyud): 'phang 'thob// tshe dang skad dang yid du 'ong ba dang // bgegs rnams zhi la sogs pa ste// nad dang bral nas ci 'dod pa// yon tan brgya rtsa 'dri yis 'thob// de skad rab tu brjod par bya// de nas slob pa 'dra
111a2(rnying rgyud): briskur rnams// thams cad rim par rdzogs par bya// bdud rtsi gtso bo'i dbang bskur te// gtso bo gsang gnas spyi bor bsgyur// kha ni mi dbye gtso bor bsrung // sngags 'dis thams cad kun la bskur// oM A hUM/ ra sa ya ta dza na d+ha nas
111a3(rnying rgyud): hrIHdz+dza/ zhes pas kun la dbang du bskur// bum pa la sogs sman sna rnams// rim de bskur zhing rim re bsgom// spyi gtsug dadang rten ral pa la// dang gyi cod pan re re la// sngags 'di lan bcud brjod cing gi dgas// ras pa /
111a4(rnying rgyud): oM shrI pa Ta a b+hi Sheny+tsa hUM/ de skad brjod cing dbang de bsur// nas ni 'bras bu bdun nyid la// gong ma'i sngags ni bdun brjod la// kun la zhag grangs tsam re gdags// gsang ba'i mtshan yang gdags par bya// dbang gi dngos
111a5(rnying rgyud): gub di dag kun// gzhan gyis mi 'phrog zil gnon phyir// sbyin sreg cho ga rgyas par bya// dbang dang spyan gyi sbyor ba rnams// shin tu rgyas pa nyid du bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phral dang // sman gyi byin brlabs nus ma thus ni//
111a6(rnying rgyud): nad dang 'byung po thams cad sel// skye med byang chub 'bras bu thob// rig 'dzin gsum gyi 'bras bu thob// de yang bsgrub pa chen po'i tshe// lha yi sku ni bsgom par bstan// de bzhin snying po dag kyang bstan// gsang sngags gsung gi
111a7(rnying rgyud): nu ba ni// thams cad 'grub par gdon me za// bdud rtsi chen po thal ba'i lung // lung 'di bdag gis rab bshad pas// bsrub pa chen po thams cad kyi// mig dang dbang po lta bur 'gyur// me mnyon cig ye shes 'khor che nyid//
111b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dris tshig 'di// thams cad nges par lung 'di bstan// rnam grol he ru ka yis kyang // bdud rtsi'i nges tshig 'di dag gsungs// bdud kyis 'khor ba'i gcod dong 'don// rtse yis ye shes thabs la smon// bdud ni dakhor ba chen po la
111b2(rnying rgyud): rtse yis chos nyid don la spel// bdud rtsa'i don dgra gad rgyangs che// bdud ni bar chod bgegs chen la// rtsi yis che mchog lta bur 'gyur// bdud ni khu rlangs sprin lta bur// nyi ma lta bu'i rtsi btab nas// ye shes don pa thogs
111b3(rnying rgyud): pa med// bdud ni mun khung lci bra la// ma me lta bu'i rtsi btab nas// snang ba thams cad thogs med 'gyur// kyem che mchog rte/ nam mkha' lta bu'i rje chen la/ sprin phung lnga ba'i bdud rtsis bsgri bla// shel slong lta ba'i ci 'dal/
111b4(rnying rgyud): dri ma lta bu'i bdud kyis bslabs// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung // 'di ni snang bgo 'byed pa'o// ma rig bdud la rig pa myi'i// rgyu yis bkab cing 'gyur ba med// de bzhin bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba 'di// hi ru ka yis rab tu gsungs// zhes
111b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ dbang thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i rgyud/ bdud rtsi thal byor gyi lung bstan pa'i le'u // cu gnyis pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ du pa sarba g+ha na lu ka nAH/ po
111b6(rnying rgyud): skad du/ thams cad sgrol byed tshogs kyi lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de na/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi spyan sngar rigs lha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/ btud de thal mo
111b7(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas/ rang rang gi 'khor laphos te/ tshogs chen po'i mchod pa 'di smras so// kye sems dpa' chen po nyon/ gang dag/ yi rigs rnams kun// 'khor dang longs spyod nyams pa dang // longs spyod chung bar gyur pa dang /
112a1(rnying rgyud): yi tshogs la brten 'dod na// bsod nams skye bar 'dod pa yis// tshogs kyi mchod pa bsham par bya// gyi mtshams lcib shags rdzogs byas la// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol// rdzas dang yo byad
112a2(rnying rgyud): ci 'byor bshams// kha zas 'byor bshams sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus dag tu// zangs chen nang du tshogs kyis bkang // ka ra 'u ram la sogs pa'i// dkar dang gtsang ma'i gtor ma dang // bshos zan brgya dang rtsa brgyad
112a3(rnying rgyud): dang // zhi ba'i lha tshogs mnyes pa yi// rdzas ni sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// de ltar sngon 'gro rdzogs nas ni// zhi ba'i phrin las rdzogs bya zhing // mchod pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya// bskyab pa'i rdzas de thams cad la// yi ge 'bru gsum byin gyis
112a4(rnying rgyud): brlabs// bdag nyid ting 'dzin ldan byas la// zhag gsum tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// dus bzhir tshogs kyi rgyun mi gcad// de ltar ting 'dzin byin brlabs nas// tshogs rnams spyan drang 'di skad do// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya thugs kar bca'//
112a5(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu'i bar nas dzaH'phros pas// zhi ba'i lha tshogs spyan drangs bsam// de nas spyan drangs 'di skad do// hUM/ bar bar gshegs so rigs lnga'i tshogs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // thub drug kun bzang
112a6(rnying rgyud): yab yum dang // sgo ba yab yum 'khor bcas dang // zhi ba'i pho brang 'khor btsam rnams// tshogs kyi gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// tshogs mchog dkyil 'khor spyan 'dren gyis// rin chen gang dang gzi mdangs 'phro ba'i tshul// tshogs
112a7(rnying rgyud): kyi mchod parab 'byams ma lus kun// longs spyod tshogs kyi gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// gnyis med 'khril sbyor yum bcas gshegs su gsol// de nas tshogs bskal ba ni// ral gri'i phyag rgya bca' la/ tshogs ni du mthar gtung /
112b1(rnying rgyud): byed la// bskal ba'i mchod pa 'di skad do// b+h+rUM/ tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// slob dpon 'a bar brnyas dgongs su gsol// gnyis med dbyings las bgyid pa yi// zhi ba 'i / tshogs dgongs su gsol// bdag nyid dbang
112b2(rnying rgyud): stobs dag gis// thabs mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs las// bza' ba tung rgyu 'di bska bar bya// tshogs kyi rgyuni byang chub sems// byang chub rgya ni stong bdag med// rig pa med pas rig lus 'das// mtshan ma'i yul med mngon
112b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas// bsgral ba'i rgyu med dbyings su bskal// sarba pra pA na hUM khA hi khA hi/ de nas mchod pa ni 'di skad do// hUM/ rnam pAr snang mdzad bkra shis 'byung ba'i gter// yid bzhin 'dzum pa'i sems kyis tshogs de bsngo// bza' bca' dang
112b4(rnying rgyud): ni longs spyod thams cad bsngo// ye shes klong yangs 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rgyal ba'i sku la bzhengs bzhugs mi mdo' yang // 'gro ba'i don la dgongs pas tshogs 'di bzhes// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsi byas steng na// bcom
112b5(rnying rgyud): ldan me bskyed rdo rje la// byang chub sems dang gnyis med phyir// dag pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// rin chen 'byung ldan sna tshogs rjer yang sbal//
112b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang longs spyod bcas te 'bul lags na// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su k+ka so la// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs skyed na// snang ba mtha' yas sprul sku byang chub sems// sems can don la dgongs pa'i thugs rdza
112b7(rnying rgyud): can// reg pa gnyis med tshul gyis khyab mdzad pa// mAng saM dang ni ro mchog tshogs 'di ni// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhes su gsol// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// don yod grub pa gnyis med gar btu zhe
113a1(rnying rgyud): 'dung bral med pa'i tshul du yab yum sbyor// ljongs spyod ma lus 'dus pa'i rdzas chen 'di// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshul 'dis 'bral lags na// yab yum gnyis med tshul gyis bzhem sa
113a2(rnying rgyud): gsol/ byung shar 'khor lo'i rtsibs sted na// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis mdo gyur pa'i tshul// phyag na rdo rje dpa' bo'i tshul gyis bstan// spun ras gzigs dbang 'gro ba stobs kyis 'dul// lha mdog 'od zer lnga yi mar
113a3(rnying rgyud): na// dkris te 'dzum pa'i tshul gyis blangs pas// sems dpa'i tshigs la gnyis med mu chod par 'bral// pi phreng sku dang phreng ba'i sgra 'dzid pa// lha tshogs sgra yi mdzod pad ma pa 'phrul// rdzas dang longs stod rnams cad mchod pa
113a4(rnying rgyud): mthus// sems dpa' sems ma rnams la mchod par 'bul// rin chen sems dpa' pad ma'i sems dpa' dang // chos kyi sems dpa' las kyi sems dpa' la// gnyis med mthun skyor tshogs mchod dam pa 'bul// phyogs slong yab
113a5(rnying rgyud): yu ma dang ni thub pa drug/ zhi ba'i lha tshogs kun la mchod par 'bul// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// 'dod yon lnga ldan mchod par 'bral// a li u li hA l-i ta pa li/ zhes thogs pa rang byang chen po'i rgyad las/ zhi ba'i tshigs bskal pa'i
113a6(rnying rgyud): lceng+ga steng na gsum po'o// rdzogs so// rgyu gar skad du/ prar+d+ha li kro ta s+sa kA nA ma/ bod skad du// khro ba'i rang bzhin na tshogs bsgral ba'i lung zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad ma dpang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang khro ba'i lha
113a7(rnying rgyud): chogs 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces sbas so// kyai kye rang rang 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyin// gang zhig lo ring spyod 'phel 'dod pas// spyod sgrol tshogs kyi mchod pa bsham// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol/
113b1(rnying rgyud): ma da sa yang dgas// ma mapod las lus pa jug// ga sa na bas/ da r+m+ma/ ga da // bas 'du
113b2(rnying rgyud): ba skabs nis gar byas papa// bslab ba'i lha rnams dbyings su bak+kul// bskal ba'i rgyal bas ma yis kyang // srog cad deng ni ga me n+d+ha// 'di ni srog mi napas/ shing chen gis bababs ldan pas// gzung 'dzin na pa bal
113b3(rnying rgyud): nas ni// gnyis med byang chub sems su bsgral/ bre be sha ya hU~M A pe sha ya A be sha phaT phaT/ de ltar tshogs de bskal byas la// chags mngag tugacad par bya// rdo rje mal pos las kyi dri chab kyis// tshegs de bsangs shing mchong bar bya/
113b4(rnying rgyud): dang po dpa' bo skegs pas mchod// gnyis pu d+hi med 'khor los mchog/ gsum pa gnyis med bshags pas mchod// de ltar khro bo'i mchod rdzogs bya'o// zhes rdzogs parang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ khro bo rang bzhin gyi tshogs kyi le'u
113b5(rnying rgyud): brlab / rdzogs so// gang sa dang / sa rba kA la nAs/ ba da dang/ su tshags bska ba'i phreng zhes byab dus na la phyag chan ma// de nas rang la 'bras pa
113b6(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sde kye bcom ldan dbang zhi lha// 'das pa'i 'khor rnams khro gnyer la// sgo tshogs bskal ba bsnyen du gsol// de skad zhu 'a phul kyang nas// rang rang stan la nye bar 'jug/ de nas nyid kyis rab tu bshad//
113b7(rnying rgyud): kyem 'dus pa tshon ponyan// tshogs kyi srang 'dir bsgral 'dod pas// bskal dang ldan 'dren mchod rdzogs bya// dpa' bste/ nga bshags pa dang // bskab pa gsum gyi chod pa rtsa// de nas gi chen sun ldan des// sngags da
114a1(rnying rgyud): du sun na na
114a2(rnying rgyud): byas dang sems dpa' la// gnyis med ga phyir mchod pa 'bral// chas dang sems dang yid kyis mchod// sem sangs rgyas kun spyong ba'o// mnyam pa'i mchod pa chen pos mdzod// sbyin pas 'thod pa'i nye 'thos pa// gzugs kyi khyod
114a3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs 'byung // lag gnyis gar balngar drum 'dzin mas// rgyal ba mnyes nas spyan la thim// sbabs mchod pa'i lhar gyur pas// yi mchod pa sna tshogs 'byung // lag gnyis gar bslar rol choms// rgyal ba mchod byas snyan la dzis
114a4(rnying rgyud): shings pas mtshad pa'i ltar gyungar nas// dri sa mchod pa sna tshogs 'jung // spros pas rgyal ba'i su mchod nas// lag gnyis par bskur tu be mas// rgyal ba mnyes byas shangs la zes// sngags pas mchod pa'i ltang drur pas// rol mchod pa
114a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs drung // spros pas rgyal ba'i sku mchod nas// lag gnyis par ngaskar ni wi tis// rgyal ba'i phra mchod ljags la thim// mchod pa'i lha mo de dag cang // phag pas gang blta shid pas skabs// gnyis zed mtsho nga rol mo dang /
114a6(rnying rgyud): wang 'dzin dang sbos por 'dzin// zhwang zas sna tshogs 'dzin byed cing // chad pa'i bla dang snrubs deng d+he// gang ces pams cad ches par mchod// yang drug phra dang chos kyi ste// sangs kyis zh-i dris rab 'byams pa/
114a7(rnying rgyud): seMs zengs gyur te// thams cad mchod pas mashes byas la// blo rgyang khrag 'thung thams cad dang // zhe ba rnams la yang mchod par 'bul// sal la ste mchod par bzhes// yo ga na gas/ badz+ra d+ha be d+ha/ ba sa/ e ba
114b1(rnying rgyud): oM dz+ra Ar+ya ti dza tid hUM dza/ hUM/ rgyal bzhi blo kun la mchod pa ni// rang bzhin mang skyed rdzogs pa yi// ye shes lha tshogs rol cig dgongs su gsol// rnga dang gling bu dang ni dung mchog gis// rgyal ba rna blo tshogs pa mchod pa dbul/
114b2(rnying rgyud): lang dang na po wang sgra mchog dang // mchog chen la sogs sgra yi rol mo yis// rgyal bzhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul/ hUM/ bu ram dang ni ka ra sbrang rtse yis// rgyal ba zhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// chang dang mes ke'u 'bras
114b3(rnying rgyud): gang la sogs ro mchog brgya rnams ni// rgyal bzhi blo'i tshogs pa mchod pa 'bul/ hUM spos dang rgya spos dang ni tsan+dan dang // dri mchog la sogs dri sna tshogs rnams kyis// rgyal bzhi khro tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// d+h+ri ngas mchog
114b4(rnying rgyud): dang ni dang mchog dam pa dang // 'jam zhing dro ba'i reg bya sna tshogs kyis// rgyal bzhi sgo'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// sems mchog dang ni yid kyi mchod pa yis// rtsal bzhi rdo'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rnam shes la sogs
114b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi mchod pa yis// rgyal bzhi zo'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// rta dang glang chen la sogs gser dang dngul// bai DUr+ya dang man shel gyi ru yis// rgyal bzhi dro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// dung dang je yid byig dang zangs lcags dang
114b6(rnying rgyud): g.yud nga nor dang 'bru dang bang mdzod kyis// rgyal bzhi khro'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul// gos dang stan dang mal cha la sogs te// sna tshogs gzugs kyi mchod pa dam pa bzhes/ hUM/ bcom ldan rgyal ba rdo khro'i lha chags la// rnal 'byor
115a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs mchad 'phrul la bags sugs pa// yo brad sa tshogs pa la mchod pa 'das// rgyal man 'thugs dam pashang sbyang // oM chags sa pa bar la pa san tan byas/ chang bsu bya me pa 'tha pa rnams/ bzungasas dang /
115a2(rnying rgyud): cig tsam gyis byung // tshe rabs phye ma gnas ni gar lces kyang // yo byad chung ba dag tu mi 'gro zhing // rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rin po che dang 'phrul longs spyod cing // rdzas dang longs spyod ldan pa'i skyes bur 'gyur// de bas lhag pa'i yon tan 'di ltar
115a3(rnying rgyud): 'thob// ye shes par dor rang snang dag pa mthong // de la goms nas mi 'gyur sa la gnas// sprul pa stong gsum gang bar 'gyed par 'gyur// de ltar bu yi yon tan thob par 'gyur// yon tan tshogs kyi mchod pa dam pa 'dis// rgyal bzhi khro tshogs la mchod par
115a4(rnying rgyud): 'bul// a la la ste mchod par bzhes// a la la ho thugs rjes dgongs su gsol// oM la la ste thugs nges dgyes pas bzhes// rnal 'byor bdag la dngos bus sbrul du gsol// bdag la dbang bskur tshogs mchod 'akres par rol// a'i u li tA
115a5(rnying rgyud): li ta pa li/ khA ti ShA hi/ mangs/ raH/ tsat+ta/ ma hA bsa? ta/ go ro tsan pa li d+ha ShA hi/ des ni tshogs kyi las thams cad shes par bya'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud las/ sgo tshogs bskal ba'i phreng bstan pa'i le'u bre btsa lnga pa'o// rdzogs so//
115a6(rnying rgyud): rgya gang sad du/ sarba shAn ting po d+hi satwa a d+hi Shi T+TanA ma/ bod skad du/ zhi ba byang chung sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i sprul phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dbang thams cad kyi bdag nyid
115a7(rnying rgyud): gi sgra nges/ phyi nang sdod bcud thams cad dbang gis rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhing byang chub sems kyi ngang du dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba 'di rnam par bshad do// gsal bar bya'o// mngon par bstan no// rgyas par bkral lo// rig par yongs
115b1(rnying rgyud): ldang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das des/ 'khor gyi sras mchog rnams la bos te/ 'di skad gsungs so// kye ma kye ma 'khor nyon cig/ ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs byed pa'i// dngang gi rgyal po 'de bstan pas// ma smin pa rnams ldan par 'gyur/
115b2(rnying rgyud): dbang gi ngo bo 'di bstan pas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa ste// byang chub nyid du nye bar bstan// rig pa'i ye shes mi gsal ba// dbang 'di bskur bas gsal bar 'gyur// de rnams gsal bar 'dod pa na// dbang bkur dam pa 'di nyid bstan//
115b3(rnying rgyud): bong rdal chen po'i dbus dag tu// rnal 'byor pa yis don mi 'grub// grong dang grong khyer zad mtha' dang // nags sam ri brag lung stong du// rnal 'byor bdag gi don la 'jug/ bsgrub pa la brtson rigs snang brtag/ rdzogs pa chen po do ni bstan pa'o//
115b4(rnying rgyud): theg pa kyi nang thams cad kyi// dbang rnams 'di la/ pang bshadang // de la dbang bskur byed tsam na// skye mtshams pa sogs rdzogs par bya// stanan chog gang rdzogs pa// khrus dang rdo rje tshwa yang thung // dmachod/ man rgya dam mna'ang sbrul/
115b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bring grwa bzhi'am/ 'dom gang gru bzhi gnas dang sbyar// thig dang tshon rnams byin gyis brlab// mu chud zlum po pho brang mdzes// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rigs dang spyang // mu khyud dmar po rdo rje'ing// phyi rim gu bzhi gu chad ldang //
115b6(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag gi gyi rim du// mu cung ljang bu zlum por bshad// sla ga ma bzhi ni kha dog ser// gyi rim gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// grwa chad rigs dang 'dra bar bshad// gyi rim bar du zad tshag/ skyon rigs dang 'dra ba la// mu khyud zlum po sgo khyud bcas//
115b7(rnying rgyud): ba na pa gyu'o// dongs cang rgyags pa / dang gas med/ rgyabs kyi phyog ca rgyags / mthangalas ses kyir bang nga/ mthong byed pa du/
116a1(rnying rgyud): dang ni brten pa can// las rnams rdzogs phyir gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i rtags nyid bstan pa yi// rdzas kyi rnam pa 'di lta ste// dbus su maN+Dal steng dag tu// zangs kyi nang du gtor ma'o// gtor ma 'khan
116a2(rnying rgyud): dar dkar mdzes// 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang lte ba la// rma bya'i mdangs ni re re gzung / rtsibs mtshan gtor ma'i kha ru yang // me long skyon med re re bzhag/ gru tshad ldeng gu'i steng dag tu// snying po dang bcas ral gri bzhag/ bla gam ser po'i steng dag
116a3(rnying rgyud): tu// nas kyi gdan ni 'dab ma brgyad// steng du dram pa re re bzhag/ dar dkar mdos pa'i mgul chings dang // nang du chu gtsad 'o ma ste// tsan dan chu dang spos tshwa dang // byang phyogs dag tu bur gum chu// kha kun dag dang bcas pa'o// sgo bzhud
116a4(rnying rgyud): mda' ni mdzes pa la// me long dar sna bcas pa'o// kha tshar ma nyams ras dag gis/ dkyil 'khor dag gi phyi yol bya// steng na lnga tshogs dad gyi gdugs// de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyan bkram zhing // bu rnams spos kyi chu yis bkru// rdo rje'i
