116a5(rnying rgyud): gral phyag byas nas ni// rdo rje'i gral la 'khod par bya// de nas slob dpon dbang ldan des// sta gon cho ga rdzogs par bya// dkyil 'khor gnas par bya ba dang // bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// slob ma sta gon gnas bya dang // sta gon
116a6(rnying rgyud): cho ga'i ting 'dzin pa sar// de nas rigs kyi slob ma rnams// gral du snang bas go bar bya// grol du bkod pa'i skul ldan la// dbang rdzogs byas la man ngag byin// phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs kyi// dbang bsrung rdzogs par byed pa na// dang
116a7(rnying rgyud): po zhi ba'i dbang rdzogs bya// rten 'brel rdzas kyi don mtshon nas// sku gsum 'bras bu thob pa'o// de rnams mtshon byang gsang dbang ni// phrin las rdzogs par 'dod pas na// slob dpon dbang dang ldan pa des// dbang bsrung rgyan rnams pon
116b1(rnying rgyud): pas ni// zin las 'di rnams rdzogs par bya// stobs ldan pa d+ma dbang gi sgra// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ye shes lnga ldan 'di// bu yi dbang rnams rdzogs par bgyid tshal na// bdag la dbang sgrol bu la gnang bar mdzod/ dkyil 'khor zhal
116b2(rnying rgyud): blta man ngag thob bya'i phyir// 'dir mchis zhal ston dpa' bos gnang bar mdzod// 'dod chags spangs nas dag pa'i lam du 'jug/ zhe sdang spangs nas dal gyi sku dang sbyor// gti mug spangs nas shes rab yul la 'jug/ 'khor ba spangs nas ye shes
116b3(rnying rgyud): blta ba'i phyir// 'dir rig dkyil 'khor bu la snang ba'i phyir// rdo rje che ge mo 'khor dang bcas pa rig pa'i yul blta bas// slob ma dkyil 'khor 'dir chug las rnams khyab par gyis// ho rdo rje slob dpon gnyen gyi dbu bzung nas// yi dam
116b4(rnying rgyud): lha dang mkha' 'gro dmatshig can// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// dam tshig nod kyis bdag la gnang par mdzod// dkyil 'khor 'dir chug bdag la dbang bsrud gsol// rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba bdag la slar// hUM rdo rje dam tshig lo
116b5(rnying rgyud): mkhol ma 'di// khyod la gtad kyis thub par gyis// nyams na dmyal ba'i rgyu yin te// thub na yon tan brgya rtsa 'thob// de bas khyed kyis gus pas longs/ sa ma yu stam/ ba ga sha ni ho// rdo rje'i dam tshig bdag gis glang bar bya// bskal pa
116b6(rnying rgyud): zhig kyang mi gtang gzung bar bgyid// dngos grub chu bos bdag gi dri ma 'khru// myur du dam tshig chu bo bdag la stsol// rdo rje dri chu bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha lhan/ chos nyid dang rtags srog gi 'khor lo yi// rdo rje dril du khyod kyis
116b7(rnying rgyud): yang dag zung // chos nyid gsung sgras thams cad zil mnan phyir// dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje yang dag gsor// chos nyid stong pa ye shes dag pa yi// rnam dag don lnga ye shes bum pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// stong rig
117a1(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i don ldan shong// e badz+ra tsit+ta yA tiSh+Tha badz+ra yA ma s+thA/ d+hU slong nyid ye shes pas byung ba'o// chos sgra dag pa'i rang bzhin pas// ye shes dag pa'i pho brang 'dir// bkra shis dag pa'i bum pa
117a2(rnying rgyud): 'dis// sbrul ldan 'dril dbang bslar gsol// oM rat+na e wa ti dza hA/ hUM rtog pa'i dri ma sel ba'i bum pa 'di// dag pa'i ye shes gnyis dang sbyor// ye shes ston pa'i bum pa rab mdzes pas// skal ldan 'di la dbang bsrur
117a3(rnying rgyud): gsol// oM pad+ma dr-i ti shri hUM ba ga tam/ hUM byang chub las byung bdud rtsi'i sdod// nyon mongs sel ba'i byam pa 'dis// skal ldan skyes bu 'di pa dbang bskur gsol// oM karma dz+nyA na ta ma ba ga sha hUM/ ye shes gsal ba'i sgo bzhir ldan/
117a4(rnying rgyud): shes rab bskyed pa'i mda' bzhi yis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// sdang ba bzhi dang 'phrad par shog/ oM dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kha gad ta dza ya/ shes rab don ston dal gri bzhis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bsrung bas// mnyam pa nyid kyi
117a5(rnying rgyud): don rtogs shog/ oM badz+ra prad d+ho ma hA tam pa ga sha hUM/ chos nyid rnam dag smod pa'i rgyu// yi ge hUM las 'od zer 'gros// thams cad de yi don la gnas// chos dbyings ye shes mtshon pa'i dpe// me long 'di la brten pa yis/
117a6(rnying rgyud): yul ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM d+harma d+hA tra dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ nyon mongs dag pa ye shes rgyu// gsal 'grib med pa'i don bstan pa// rdzas kyi me long dam pa 'dis// skal ldan
117a7(rnying rgyud): 'di la dbang bskur ro// me long ye shes don rtogs shog/ oM Ad d+ha dz+nyA na badz+ra sar+b+ba rba It+ma ko&haM/ yab yum gnyis med dkyil 'khor ldan// ye shes stong gas la nyam pa'i me long 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// mnyam
117b1(rnying rgyud): na na na su sa tu da/ na shA na/ ga na tuste/
117b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad gnyis med gcig tu 'dus pa'i ye shes te// chus rnams bya bar rdzogs par ma pa y-i// skal ldan 'di la dab bsgyur ro// zlab ye shes don bas shok+Sha/ m-i n+dan pangs la dag
117b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ston mdang pa'i// sman phreng dkrol 'khor thams cad skyes// su klung dbu stan mdzad pa'i// 'od can rnam lce'i me tog 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bsrung // rin chen srubs su sangs ces shog/ e pra bi sha ya tra ga rje/
117b4(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa yaM rdzas chen 'dis// 'di dang kyi ma gnyis kaR+sha// longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur// byin brlabs drag po'i gtor ma 'dis// la ldan 'di la dbang bskur ro// pad mad thams cad bsal ba dang // sangs rgyas kyin rlabs sdeng
117b5(rnying rgyud): nga // mr-ing k+She d+ha shU naM tAM/ d+ham dag dri mad chos kyi stan// do d+habarjod pa gsal 'gyur shog/ skye dang dang she don shes pa// gang yang ma 'gags shes rab stan// da brag spyod lags la bar gyis// kyai dang nang med gnags las
117b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin sa g.yos rig pa'i spyan// do drug kyong lags la gyur nas// rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar ltos// dngos dang dngos med spang ba dang // bdag gzhan thams cad don gsal ba'o// thams cad mkhyen nyid gzhi yi spyan// do rngub
117b7(rnying rgyud): khyod la gsal byung nas// rang rig rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ltos// thogs pa med pa'i spyan lnga yis// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams kun pa nyis// shad kye sgo ni rigs pa gas pa// rig pa'i ye shes mtshon pa'i phyir// ye shes dag pa'i
118a1(rnying rgyud): na/ snang ba'abyung // nabye shung sh+ya d+h+r-i gas bya// de yang khyod la bstan par bya// mthod ma spangs myur du ltos// nags med ldan ces bzlas byas na// 'gyur med ye shes dag pa mthong // ts+tshaT+wA~M ye shes pa sred dang
118a2(rnying rgyud): sdang ba lhag par 'char ba'i rtags// ye shes nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs// de phyir lho yi sgo zhes bya// sdang ba bstan gyis legs par ltos// dul 'dir khyod kyis ma bltas na// gyis nas rnyed par ba la 'gyur// ye shes mig gis ma chags
118a3(rnying rgyud): ltos// nub sgo bag chags nub pa'i sgo// dug lnga ye shes lnga ldan 'od// 'od lnga ma 'dres rdzogs pa'i sa// shes rab mig gis bltas byas nas// khyod kyis dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mthong // byang sgo sa la ma byang ba'i sgo// sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i sgo//
118a4(rnying rgyud): las rab rdzogs pa'i sgo chen 'di// mkhyen gsal mig gis myur du ltos// rdo rje rang rtags chen po ni// sems can kun gyi lam rgyud la// dkyil 'khor de bzhin gnas pa yin// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor 'di bzhin du// rang gi lus la yod pa yin// de bzhin
118a5(rnying rgyud): ho drang dkyil 'khor ltos// dang lus gzhal yas khang gi tshul// lha rnams ma bskyed lhun gyis rdzogs// de phyir dbang gi dkyil 'khor ltos// myur du bltas na dngos grub 'thob// oM sarba ta thA ga ta maN+Da la satwa hUM/ de ltar rim pa rdzogs par bya// dbang
118a6(rnying rgyud): kaM mdzad spyod ting 'dzin brtan// las rnams rdzogs par byed pa'o// bu rnams dngos grub 'dod pa la// stagon lnga pa rdol ting 'dzin te// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// yid la sogs pa thams cad la// mda' gsol byin brlabs mthu brtan
118a7(rnying rgyud): pas// dbang po lnga yi dbang thob nas// dngos grub sna tshogs 'thob par des// de ltar phyi yi dbang rdzogs nas// longs spyod thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// chos nyid sku yang bag gis mthong // phung po lnga las dbang bskur bas// ye
118b1(rnying rgyud): gas na/ na nga nga ca pa nga da / sas nga na du ga nga// // zla da /
118b2(rnying rgyud): cad rang bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i wang zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+mad bang gi sba la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rnal pos 'di skad rjes gsungs so// tsa~M b+he 'das pa'i phyogs satod// chu tshe 'dang nga
118b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byed na// mchod pa'i gzhung rnams rdzogs byas la// dkyil 'khor nyid dang chen ldan phyir// shin tu dben pa'i nyams dga' bar// gnas kyi mtshan nyid brtag paraH// thod rdal zad pa'i mdza' dag dang // ci shing nags tshal
118b4(rnying rgyud): smin pa'i sar // me tog sna tshogs 'khrungs pa dang // nub phyogs mthal shar nyid gdang // byang nyid sbyor ba 'dra ba dang // lho phyogs brdal ba 'dra ba'i gnas// bdag nyid mngon pa'i phyogs dag tu// thob pa sa la sul med pa dang //
118b5(rnying rgyud): rje gzugs po med pa dang // sems can lta bu'i gzugs med dang // rgyab ni thag la gtad pa dang // gas na shing tog sna chags 'bad// mdun na ne sing chu bo 'bab// yang na tshe zan lta bu'i gnas// bcung rnams ni ma dzad par// h+yaMn
118b6(rnying rgyud): tshigs sregs pa ni// de sta bya yi gnas dag za// dkyil 'khor 'dam gang grubazhi la// dza gad drud kyis rgyag drug gdag/ de lta bu yid dkyil 'khong la// thig ni ba N+Da gdab par gsungs// nub nas shar dri ba wA pa// tshangs pa'i 'od
118b7(rnying rgyud): 'byur med gdab// de nas sbyinas bya du'o// shang klongs ni rba 'byang sa// rlu nas ni thung gang // sgo ma tshangs thig steng dag nas// rlung kyi tshangs pag snying du'o// shar byed nas rgya mi byeng // thang shar dru thob ma gdag//
119a1(rnying rgyud): bya 'du de bzhin no// nub nas byed mang gnyis pa la// shar phyogs dag tu zangs kyi gdug// lho nas byang du de bzhin shes// de dag la ni thub la gajug/ de nas gyad byed nas nang// de ltar yeng ni smras pa 'dra// de ltar rdzag
119a2(rnying rgyud): nyid rab rdzogs bya'o// de nas sa tshon byin gyis brlab// dkyil 'khor dag la tshon gyis dbye// dbus kyi thig ni cha gsum la// zlum po su khrung ljang gu'o// nang du gru gsum mthing nag mdzes// blags rnam gsum dbang gi tshul// tshangs theg
119a3(rnying rgyud): nas btsal bzhi pa le// mu zung zlum pa dag tu bri// de yi nang du 'khor lo brgyad// kha dog ser po dag caH// rtsibs mtshan dag ni ma chos man na// tshangs thig dag nas lnga pa la// srung zhe sgo dang bcas pazi// rgya cad ltar bu mdzes par bya/
119a4(rnying rgyud): nas thig gcig sgro la'o// ji ltar grub la sgo mi gyi// sgo ni rigs dang 'dra bar bshad// de nas jig ni bcu pa la// hrI rim thum po dag tu bri// zlum po ba ni nag pos dgang // rdo rje'i rabar bcas pa'o// phyogs bzhi zlab ma rigs dang 'dra// zhod
119a5(rnying rgyud): sgo rgyan rab tu mdzes pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor ra babris la// mngon pa'i rdzas ni 'di ltar dgram// rdzas rnams kyid kyis brlings nas // dkyil 'khor steng du rdzas dgra ma ste/ dbus kyi sgra bya sum steng dag du// skyes pabud med d+harta gnyis// yang
119a6(rnying rgyud): rabs chad nag po'am// snrel gri mo yi thod pa ste// nal bu yod na mchog tu gsungs// yang na longs spyod ldan pa yi// pho thod dag la maM ge b+h+rUM// mo thod dag la ma zhes bri// gang yang thung ba'i thod pa gcig/ yi ge ya dang ldan pa'o// ma thod nang du
119a7(rnying rgyud): thug pa'i rjes// bud med du mi skyes par rtsol// ba zod nang du thug pa'i ngas// byang chung sems ni dkar dang dmar// rbad pa gcig gi dang du 'ong // sha khrags tshogs gtong ma'o// po thod dang dkar dag gis gtum/
119b1(rnying rgyud): dzad dang dmar dag gis dgab// zlag ma gsum gyi steng du yang // rin chen bum pa gsum bzhag ste// rin po che yi snying po gsal// sman ni sna tshogs nang du'o// kha dag dmar po dag gis byugs// dang dmar dag gis mgul chi 'o// 2
119b2(rnying rgyud): lo'i steng du sku brgyad do// gru chang steng du dzAs brgyad do// gu tshod dag ni re re la// me long re dang ma bya'o// phyi rim zla ba ma steng dag tu// shar phyogs zla ga ma steng dag tu// g+hur+g+ha bzhi gling mtshan ldan du// gtor mar bdud rtsi dran pa'o// mthing nag
119b3(rnying rgyud): dad gyis kha bcad do// lho phyogs tshil gyi mar me ste// dar ser dag gi yol ba ste// nub tu seng lding phur bu la// le brgan dar gyi gdugs kyis dgab// byang du mar me lnga nyid bltam// dar ljang dag gis yol ba bya// de ltar rdzas rnams
119b4(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa dang // de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid la// dang dkar dag gis zhal nyid dgab// ras ser kha tshar ma nyams pas// dkyil 'khor de nyid phyi yol bya// de nas rdzas rnams bkod pa dang // dpang dang rim pa rdzogs par bya// de na
119b5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon dbang ldan des// dbang bskur man ngag lung bstan pas// tshi ga 'di rnams kyis dbang rdzogs bya'o// dbang gi chas kyis rab brgyan pa'i// las kyi rdo rje rgyal po la// dpral bar thal chen mtshon pa bri// lce la ra b+ha'i thig le'o// snying gang zhag
119b6(rnying rgyud): gi zo dris te// mgo la dbang zhu legs par brgyan// lag na rdo rje dril bu 'am// kha T+wAM de'u chung gis mtshan pa'o// de nas bu la dbang rdzogs bya'o// de nas dbang rnams rdzogs bya yi// mtshan ma rtags kyi thig le bya// de ltar mtshan ma bstan
119b7(rnying rgyud): nas ni// 'di ltar tshig dbang bstan pa'o// khro rgyal yab dang yum du bcas// thams cad gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kun// khro bo'i mtshan pas tsam gyis kyang // thams cad btul zhing
120a1(rnying rgyud): // ro dod 'bod// sdug bsngal rnon pos zin pas na// gnas 'dir ma 'dug gzhan du dengs// haM dgongs shig ral cag khro rgyal rnams// slob ma chug cig gnas par mdzad du gsol// dug gsum chud
120a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba dbyings nas thon// nga ni khro rgyal pad+ma ste// nga ni dkyil 'khor rdzas ston gyis// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab du dengs// khyed la dbang gi skal ba med// dpang mchog thob par mi 'gyur gyis// phyi ma dus kyi tha ma la//
120a3(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas// khyed la dbang gis brda skyon gyis// 'di la skal med der dengs shig/ yo dbang gi skal ba dang mi ldan pa rnams ni/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'di yang // satshon gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig pa dang bcas par mthong ba yin no// rdzas rnams kyang dpa' brtul dang mi ldan pa
120a4(rnying rgyud): yin no// gsang ba'i dbang gi dkyil mkhor 'di la yid mi ches pa dang / de lta bu yi 'du shes dang ldan pa rnams la/ rin po che 'di yi skal ba med pas/ dbang bskur yang dbang gi nus pa mi 'byung bas/ rigs kyi bu rnams de ltar ma byed cig/ thugs rje'i 'od dang
120a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam par gyur pa yis// snang srid thams cad ye shes lnga yi 'od// 'byung ba lnga la ye shes lnga yis khyab// ye shes lnga las byung ba'i 'od lnga 'dis// gnyis med sbyor ba gzhal yas khang // yab lnga'i dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// 'gyung pa
120a6(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i mar me dam pa 'dis// sems can 'di la dbang bskur pas// rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams su// rgal ba yangab dang mnyam par shog/ aM pra ti sha stom sha ni/ ye shes lnga dang 'od lnga dang // yab lnga dang ni yum la yi// dbang bsrung dam pa
120a7(rnying rgyud): nod pa'i phyir// ye shes rang lus dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje'i don dang gnyis med brjid pa'i 'od// dbang gi ye shes 'od mchog dam pa dang // rang gi tsa ta'i dkyil na gnas pa'i 'od// ngas bstan khyed kyis nye bar yongs// 'di bstan pa yi yon
120b1(rnying rgyud): gris// dang snang dag pa mthong bar shog/ oM ma hA su gad sha s+tham b+hag sha hUM/ dbyung chen rnam lnga ye shes lnga las byung // reg pa nyid mtshon ye shes rdzas// kun dang mi mnyam ye shes lnga 'od kyi// 'gyur med pho brang bas kyis nye bar phongs/
120b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba ye shes dag pa'i rdzas chen 'dis// sems can khyod la dbang dayung bas// ye shes gcig mod 'amar bar shog/ oM 'du ka sha ti ta ma bka sha hUM/ 'byung ba thams cad dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// dri med dbang gi ye shes rol pa yi// dbang
120b3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i 'od// 'od lnga nyid pa rig pa'i su lpags la// ye shes dus dang ldan pa'i rdzas chen 'dis// sems can 'di la dbang bskur bas// ngo bo'i sdang ba mthong bar shog/ oM rten sngam bag sha hUM/ rdo rje'i rigs dang
120b4(rnying rgyud): rigs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs kyis// bdag chag yang dag mthong grol shog/ oMd du sha s+t+wam bag sha hUM/ thAs na ye shes rnam par dag/ lung po dbyings dang 'dra
120b5(rnying rgyud): med// rnam dag ye shes gzhal yas khang // sems can 'di la dbang bskur bya// 'di la bskur ba'i yon tan gyis// 'di yi bar chad bsal ba dang // phyin da ga zhal yas khang ldan shog/ oM b+han+da sid+d+hi hUM/ dgra dang bgegs bzlog phur pa 'dis//
120b6(rnying rgyud): gang la btab pa/ rlag par byed// thal ba bzhin du brlags nas kyang // bgegs zhes bya ba'i ming yang med// rig pa 'di dang dbyer med tshul// rang la yod pa'i ye shes de// bar chad bsal nas mthong bar 'gyur// des na phrar pa'i dbang ba slar longs
120b7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ta kI li kI la ya ka sa ya ni hUM/ rgyal ba kun gyi dbang bskur mdzad pa yi// thod pa mar me tshal chen rnam gsum gyis// grwa gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// dbang bskur bdag la rdzogs par mdzod// oM a g+ne ts+yai/ reg pa dang
121a1(rnying rgyud): yA shes kyi// snang ba dam pa 'di yin pas// rnyogs/ bu ldir du dadrugs// bya ma dbyings dang rig pa gnyis// 'du thal mod pa de bzhin no// ras kyi tungs dang dag pa 'das// danas cad pa dang da spang ngas/
121a2(rnying rgyud): rlung dgang dbyings dang panas kyi// dbang ba skyer das pa thob par zhig shes dag pa dkyil nas// thugs pa'i ny-i san yod la snang // drim du 'thal med pa 'das// mtshad la dbang 'ardzur gyu// / dmang
121a3(rnying rgyud): dag pas shes rab thabs ltar snang // dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med shes rab zabs// rdo rje'i don nyid rnam sbyar rig par ldan// rtogs pa'i doni ldan shes rab dbyings dang ldan// de rug rtsod la dbang bskur bar bya'o// / thabs
121a4(rnying rgyud): kun la dkon pa'i thabs// shes rab kun la khyab pa'i rtags// nga yis thabs bstan khyed kyis longs// gsang sngags rgyal po'i thabs 'di dag/ do nub khyod la dbang bsrung bar bya'o// hA/ dbyings dang rig pa gcig gyur nas/
121a5(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga rgyal ba yab yum bcur// dbang bskur rdo rje rdzogs// dang ni dang ring gyiste'i dkyil// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan gyis sras phyag 'tsho lA// a/ yang dag ba ba'i sal mi 'gyur 'khor lo bskor//
121a6(rnying rgyud): rang tugs te// don pa dpyis bstan par bya// ma \u0f7fgas ti dz+dza/ zag pra dgu dang ye shes dag// sa dbul ma da ston pa'i rtsa// ma rigs pa las thar pa'i ye shes te// 'gro ba 'dul bye yul ba'i sgra thob ste// dran kyim
121a7(rnying rgyud): mchod rten dam pa 'dis// do nug khyod la dbang ngasru bas// sprul ba sku pi mthob shog/ oM pra ti sha dza/ sprul pa'i sbu las thugs rje 'byung ba'i phyir// sbrul sbar gyur nas 'gro ba dran pa dang // ye shes thabs kyi pho la
121b1(rnying rgyud): cig/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ni sha ya na hUM/ ye shes bskyed pa'i shes rab me zhen 'dis// 'gro ba ma rig sgron mar gsal// skye med dbyings su sgrol byed me chen 'dis// dro nub khyod la dbang bskur bas// skye med ye shes don rtogs
121b2(rnying rgyud): shog/ oM ag+ne ke la sha a/ rig pa'i ye shes dgos 'dod skong mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'gag med shes rab don ldan zhing // sna tshogs cing yang ston pa rig pa'i dbang // dgos 'dod skongs mdzod rin chen dbang bsrung bas//
121b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa ngo bo nyid dang ldan gyur cig/ oM rat+na e ba ma hUM/ dri med skyon brag ye shes dag pa'i rdzas// rig pa chags med sems las grol ba skye// rnam rtog med pa'i rig pa chos kyi chu// dri med skyon bral pad+ma'i sdong po 'dis// skal
121b4(rnying rgyud): ldan khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM pad+ma kro ti ni hU~M/ shes rab dang ni gnyis med skrod ba mdzad// dkyil 'khor nyid dang ye shes rdul rol// gnyis med mtshon pa'i shes rab ral gri 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// shes rab
121b5(rnying rgyud): chen pos rang chung grol bar gyis// oM pra dz+nyA kA ya sad+d+ha hUM/ dkyil 'khor dang ni dbyings kyi ye shes dang // dbyings dang ye shes don sbyar bas// phyi dbyings dang ni drang ye shes// gsang ba'i ye shes chos nyid dbang du 'dus// dbyer spyod tshul gyi
121b6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gnas pa rnams// nga yis bstan gyis nga la legs par nyon// ye shes dag pa'i rdzas kyi sprin chen 'dis// do drung khyod la dbang bskur bas// dbyings dang ye shes rtogs nas kyang // blugs rje phyogs bcung mdzad par shog/ oM r+m+mA hu dz+nyA na hI
121b7(rnying rgyud): stong pa nyid dang ye shes sgra// sna tshogs dbyung 'a rol pa'i sku// chos sna mtshan ma'i spu chog 'dis// sems can byed pa dbang bskur bas// mthar byin 'bras bu thob par shog// oM dz+ra kA ya hUM/ skye dang 'chi med rdo rngarje'i sgra/
122a1(rnying rgyud): ba na// gapa migs rgyan par rdzog// ba dang gzugs phu zlas// sa dam sa dag pa'i lagasas // shAm du smra dus// rgyu shA nan nam
122a2(rnying rgyud): gshas ni tAM/ rdorje 'gyur med rig pa'i dus// rang rtags mtshan pa dbang shrI pra// 'gyur ni dkun rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi// sa lam mthar phyin grol bar shog/ e badz+ra zas ma hA/ snying po'i don nyid napa sbyar phyir// ye shes dag pa'i lam can dang /
122a3(rnying rgyud): derang nas rdo rje 'di ni// sangs rgyas bzhi pa snying por bcas// de bzhin kun la gnas pa yin// steng po'i don nyid 'di bstan pas// rtogs pargya la gyi 'gyur shog/ oM ba TaH D+hakA sa hrI/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang dpur te// bum pa 'ang pa rjo
122a4(rnying rgyud): ba yin// dbang bcur 'di la byin gyis bzab// tshe 'phrul byas par ston pa'o// bum pa 'di la byin las rdzogs// ye shes dag pa'i dbang bskur 'das// mngag 'khor ba'i rgyun gcang phyir// do nub khyod la dbang babyung ngo // oM badz+ra sha hUM/ zang sa
122a5(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rgyal ba yab lnga yum lngar gsal// thabs dang shes rab don ldan pas// lo rdzas spyan rdzogs d+ma snang ba gsal// rnam dgu sangs rgyas mdzad spyad de// de gnas brtan pa rdo bya ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa
122a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dag pa'i tsham bu 'dis// de nabartsod pa dbang bskur bas// rang snang bar dor brtan par shog/ oM tre si te ka hU~M/ ye shes rang rtags rdo rje'i don nyid ldan// 'jig bral ba'i sku yang 'od gsal bzhugs// 'chi dang bral
122a7(rnying rgyud): gsung gi zer la rol// skr-i dang med rdi dus tshon phra// bye brjo pa mig sa dkar de// sems can rnams la rtag par yod pa ste// dam don ni mtshan pa'i 'od rdzogs la// yang dag pa dang dbyer med mnyem pa yin// don kyi/
122b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang rtags mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas kun dang dgangs pa mnyam pa pan// darnga sde mad rang rtags mnyam pa 'das// mams can khyod la dbyung ba skur bas/ smra mad ma shas tags nas sangs rgyas shog/ oM ba rjo
122b2(rnying rgyud): tan ma ka ra hUM/ chos nyid stong pa ye shes dag pa'i rgyu// gsang sngags la ma la sbyor ba ste// stong nyid bum pa sman gyis gtams// bdud rtsir dbang rdzogs dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// 'jig rten 'di na nad med 'tsho ba dang //
122b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rtog sa nas grol gyur cig/ bdud rtsi dag pa'i bkra shis bum pa 'das// sbrul ldan 'di la dbang bskur bas// rnam dag bdud rtsi ye shes don ldan shog/ oM dz+nyA na At+mako&haM/ stong pa nyid dang ye shes kyi// dbang bskur bdag gis
122b4(rnying rgyud): blang ba'i phyir// ngas mtshig dam pa bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'di// skyo med dkyings nas ye shes mtshan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas lam dang ye shes dag pa'i lam// lam mchog snangs ni ye shes lnga dang sbyar// 'du 'bral med pa'i rig pa rtog
122b5(rnying rgyud): rmed par// dbang bsu rung khang ba'i sa las mthar phyin nas// ye shid rtogs pa'i don chen de thob nas// rin chen ldan gyis grub bya'i sa chen der// sprul pa 'gags med phyogs bcur gsal bar mdzad// de la gnas nas sems can
122b6(rnying rgyud): sprin la rjor// sbyar po tan gan ldan rnam pa 'das/ dan ba khyod la dbang 'asrung bas/ b+h+rid snying po mthar byin cig oMbadz+ra zhi traM/ ye shes rgyu mtshon dag pa'i rig pa dang // gsang sngags sun gyi ye shes mamyod pa'i
122b7(rnying rgyud): nga// rjes kyi kyim pa sa dag pa sa// gzhan nubs pa'i sprul mthar sbyin pa // rang bzhin pa 'gags kyi ma'i 'di bzhinags pa// rdzogs cas nas 'grub mangs la gyu// byang gsam lda pas sa nyid dag badzadan/
123a1(rnying rgyud): rang gi de bzhin nyid kyi bum pa 'di// dag pa'i lam mtshon bkra shis bum pa dang // dag pa'i don nyid ye shes rnam lngar sbyar// rgyu mtshan dag pa'i bkra shis bum pa 'dis// kun gyi don nyid ye shes mtshon pa'i rtser// dag par
123a2(rnying rgyud): lam dang ye shes gsang lam dang // lam chen 'bras bu'i dus 'dis mtshon pa'i phyir// do nub khyod la dbang bskur ro// oM AHhU~MhrIHrnam dag ye shes thod pa'i gzhal yas khang // rigs lnga rdzun grub ye shes rjod pa 'di// gang zab
123a3(rnying rgyud): dag pa'i zhing du yi gis spyod// yi ge yi ldan rdo rje thod pa ste// yi gyis de bzhin mkha' la rab bskyod nas// 'gro ba dbyings su'i dren mdzad dbyings kyi ye shes thod pa 'di// dag pa'i don ldan gzhal yas khang gi tshul// rnam dag don spyod rin
123a4(rnying rgyud): thod pa 'di// dgos 'dod reb thams gang du yang byung / cad skong mdzad pa'i// rin chen zur brgyad bkra shis thod pa 'dis// sems dang ye shes so sor 'gyed// rab tu gsang byed bkra shis rgod pa 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// gan
123a5(rnying rgyud): yas khang du yi gis bskyod gyur shog/ oM badz+ra b+hAn+da hUM yAMHbskyed pa'i ye shes ma yin te// rdzogs pa kun la khyab pa'i don// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyar bas// yi ge 'bru bstan dbyings su 'khyil// hU~M kyis ma bskyod
123a6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid mkha'// ye shes dag pa'i thod pa 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bsrur bas// dbyings las phyir mi ldog par shog/ oM b+han+da dz+nyA na du yaM ni hUM/ shes rab dang ni sku gsung thugs// ngo bo 'gyur med chos kyi don/
123a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin 'gag med longs su'i don// thugs rje'i sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gro// gru gsum don ldan yi ge e/ sna tshogs e yis gzha la yis khang // e dang ldan pa'i thod pa 'dis// skal ldan 'di la dbang bsrung bas/
123b1(rnying rgyud): phrugasum du byas bu mthar rgyan zhog/ oM A dz+dzadz+dzadz+nyA phaT/ shes rang dan byad la shas don// rang drig smon pa 'od chen ldan// shes rab bskyed par po te 'dis// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// shes rab rtags pa 'don ldan
123b2(rnying rgyud): shog/ oM pradz+nyA ka yAd+d+he/ hUM snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams la// ma rmongs ci bzhin shes gyur pa'i// b+hi nang ldang ba'i chos rnams la// gang la thogs med shes gyur nas// bsam gtam ldan zhing srung bAr dang // 'gyu
123b3(rnying rgyud): sgrol bar shog/ oM badz+ra ga~M da ma hU~M/ shar nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi sgo// tshom bu bstan 'di ltos shig/ myo sgo longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sgo// ye shes bldan 'dir ltos shig/ nub sgo sgra lnga mthar byin no// rigs nyid bstan 'dir ltos shig
123b4(rnying rgyud): byang sgo rdo rje snying po'i sgo// rigs lnga bltan 'dir ltos shig/ pho brang pad+ma rnam dag gru// rang lus bltan 'dir ltos shig/ oM maN+Da la a hUM/ rang rtags rdo rje'i don nyid de// dar dang 'bru yi rang rtags kyis// 'jig rten 'di yi bar chad bsal ba'i
123b5(rnying rgyud): phyir// dbang rtags rdo rje nyid dang 'du 'bral med// 'jig rten lha drang mkha'i 'gro rnams// 'di la bsrung zhing bsgrub pa dang // dbang rtags 'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // bgegs rnams brgyal zhing gzhan du 'bros// yams dang rims nad kun las
123b6(rnying rgyud): thar pa dang // dbang rtags 'di yis rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin rnams dang g.yeng ba'i rigs rnams dang // de bzhin mkha' 'gro'i rigs dang ni// pad+ma dang ni de bzhin las kyi rigs// sa dang bar snang gnas pa dang // ri rab dang ni mtsho la gnas// mkha' 'gro dang ni
123b7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa yis// 'di la sku yi bsrung bar gyis// nad dang yams las thar bar mdzod// dbang rtags 'di nyid btags pa yis// lam chen lnga po bsnyen par gyis// rdo rje don dang 'bral ba med pa dang // yang dag sa la de bzhin gnas pa dang // gsang

124b1(rnying rgyud): klu rnams gzung dang mngan pa n+de/ man rnams zin gyis brlab bya ste// sngon rnams rab tu dazab bya// dbus su gru zhilam pa ste// b+hI ra ma dag ni zlum bdun// rdo la hU~M rimatha ba zhi ste// sgo dang bcas par btu bshad// hU~M mthum
124b2(rnying rgyud): po rdor bcas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bris la// dgod pa'i rdzas ni 'di lta ste// bum pa mdzes par dkar gsum ste// dar dmar dag gis mgul chings te// sna tshogs 'bru yi gdan la bzhag/ 'bras chang dag ni nang du'o//
124b3(rnying rgyud): sha dang mar dang bur ma dang // kha zas ro zhem sna tshogs gzhugs/ de yi steng du bzhag pa'i rdzas// tshe yi 'brang chus mdzes pa la// kha zas ro zhim rnams kyis brgyan// bya rgong sgro yang gzug pa ste// dar snga me long mda' la btag
124b4(rnying rgyud): mda' di nyid la btag pa'i rngas// skud pa dmang po sum bsgril la// sna tshogs da kyi 'phur lci gdugs// srid lag bzung lagasang sngags bzlas// gra bzhi phyogs dang mtshams nyid du// tshe yi 'brang rjes mdzes pa re// mdal
124b5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa gdags par bya// sgo bzhir mda' dang ma long ste// gru bzhi ral gyi re re'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzas bkod la// ras dkar gtsang ma'i yol ba bya// steng na gdugs kyang rab tu bshad// mchod pa'i rdzas ni rdzogs par bya/
124b6(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dbang chen nying 'dzin brtan// yi ge dri ni 'od 'bar bas// slob ma tshe dpag med par bsam// bdag nyid dbang chen byin brlabs las// sangs rgyas su ni grangs med bsam// sgra de 'od du gsal ba dang // bdag dang slob
124b7(rnying rgyud): ma'i ba nyid du// yi ge ya dkar dang / yang bsam// rgyun chad med pa 'angang dag bsam// de lta wA zhed gnas pa las// AHk+Sha zhes ni ba badza pas// 'od byed dbang po'ang na/ slob ma'i lus la brim par bsam
125a1(rnying rgyud): des ni tshe dbang thob par bsam// gsang sngags tshe yi dbang thab kyar// yi ge AHdmar 'ad 'thos bsam// yi ga de dag re de las// tshe dpag med pa re re bsam// tshe dpag med pa'i sra mdog
125a2(rnying rgyud): nI// dmar sgra mdzes pa rgyan ldan te// dper na mtshal zhi bzang po la// kha bdag ni bab pa ltar// dmur sgra 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// g.yas na tshe yi bum pa ste// g.yon na rin chen 'od 'bar ro// yang na sra mdog 'dis
125a3(rnying rgyud): ste// sku snod seng la 'od zer 'bar// lteb man chad lnga dgu ste// phyag mtshan gong dang mthun pa'o// de ltar gsal bar rnam par bsgom// tshe la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyang // 'od dang kha dog dkar la dmar// sngags pa
125a4(rnying rgyud): dbang chen dag gis kyang // dkyil 'khor de yi shar nyi daH// gos ni dmang po gron byas te// kha ne nub phyogs dag tubawa// mthod rnams kun gyi sngags 'di'o// oM A mr-i/ a pa ri mi ta A yA mAn badz+ra tri ka d+hI swAH/ sngags du sun
125a5(rnying rgyud): kyis brjod par ba// sngags kyi 'od zer dmar por bsam// chos kyi sku dang dbyed med phyir// lha dang dbyer med ting 'don te// aHdang dbyer med gnas par bsgom// chos nyid 'od dang sku lngar 'phro// skye ba me la 'chi med ste// 'chi med rdo rje thob pa
125a6(rnying rgyud): phyir// tshe dbang rin chen rgyas par bstan// tshe dbang rin chen rab rdzogs te// tshe yi rang bzhin yi ge yuM// su yi rang bzhin yi ge AH// AHdang yuHyi mngon gsal bas// tshe dbang chen po rdzogs pang bshad// de ltar ting 'dzin ma yengs
125a7(rnying rgyud): na// tshe dbang dngos grub thob pa ste// tshe dang ye shes rab gsal bas// cho dbang dkyil 'khor nyid kyang 'thob// de skad tsho yi las rdzogs nas// tshe nyid 'gugs pa'i phrin las bya// rje shar gyi phyog nas tshe 'gugs ma// rdo rje yid mthag chen mo ste// tshe dbang dkyil
125b1(rnying rgyud): 'gra ldan pad dam// shar sa phyogs nas khrug la// la 'thong ba dag la cha dbang thub// m+b+ha la thogs nas tshwa 'thags pa// rdorje yid 'brog chen mos// tshu la dbang ba na 'a gyi// ma khragaganas 'du gshegs pags pa// sgom mam/
125b2(rnying rgyud): na mo lag la// rdul 'byor bdag la cho dbang stsol// hU~M nub kyi phyogs nas cho 'bugs ma// rdo rje yid 'phrog chen mo ste// tshe dang bzag la dbang bsrud ma// nub kyi phyogs nas cho khrag la// rnal 'byor ba // la rdo dbang sgrol/ hU~M khyung gi phyoms na
125b3(rnying rgyud): tshe bragasu ma// rdo rje yid bsgrod chen mo ste// tshe dang rdzas pa dbang bsgyung ma// byang gi tshogs nas cho khrag la// rnal 'thong bdag la rjo bang stsol// rje dbus sde thogs nas rlo grags ma// rdorje sna tshogs 'byung ma ste// phyogs skyong brgya yi lag
125b4(rnying rgyud): nas// mo thag rdul 'gror bdag la stsol// de ltang brjod cing nying 'dzin gas la// rdo rnams 'brel bar byed pa yi// cho ga 'di ni rab tu brjod// d+hi shar phyogs rdo yi mnga' bdag mo// sgyu mdog dkar ser 'od rjer 'tsho// rtsibs su 'byung bas la brdebs//
125b5(rnying rgyud): gnang rje tshe bu ma 'dzin// shar phyogs tshe yi dkyil 'khor sgo skyes la// tshel dkyil 'khor dang zhing byas par mdzod// rdo rje'i dngos grub bdag la grol// b+h+rUM lho phyogs tshe yi mnga' bdag mo// sra mdog dmar skyed 'od zer 'bar// chibs su 'byung brgya
125b6(rnying rgyud): bcibs// phyag na rin chen rje yi tham pa bsnams// khro phyogs tshe yi dkyilang khor s+ho sres lA// cho ye kyil 'kho da pazhing rgyas par mdzod// rin cherje tshe yi dngos grub bdag la stsol// nub phyogs tshe yi mnga' bdag s+ho// phra ma dag dmar
125b7(rnying rgyud): dbang gi // chibs su 'byung ba mel bcings// phyag na pad+ma tshe tham bsdams// rub phyogs tshe yi dkyil 'khor gro phyis la// pad+ma tshe yi dkyil 'bor rgyas par mdzod// pad+ma tshe yi dngos grub pa dag la stsol// byang phyogs tshe yi mnga' bdag ma/
126a1(rnying rgyud): u mdog ldang nag 'bar ba'i sra// chibs su 'gyur ba rgyang la bcibs// myog na las grub tshe yi bum pa bsdams// byang phyogs tshe yi dkyil 'khangs phyes la// las grub tsha yi dngos grub bdag la stsol// dbus kyi phyogs

128a7(rnying rgyud): mahA/ zhes rdzogs par gyur chen pa byed las/ bka dgas cag tsa'i dab nyi bang // rdzogs sa// rtseg ga \u0f7f/ tha ma tam mtha ga ta pa/ ba ga dang / gas pas shes theg pa dbang /
128b1(rnying rgyud): byings bum pa ltar bsrung ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs thig le'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyi nang nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po nyid langs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan dbang chen
128b2(rnying rgyud): sa kyis bcidus po'i 'khor ba las// gsang ba dbang gi bdag nyid kyis// thabs ni gang gis grol bar 'gyur// 'dir 'dus 'khor la bka' stsol cig/ de nas gsang dbang don gsungs pa// kye ma nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// gsang sngags gas
128b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang rtags ni// ci ltar rdzogs par byed pa ste// slob ma dam ldan gsang ba thub// dam tshig ldan pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba'i dbang ni rdzogs byed na// gsang ba dbang gi rdzas bsags te// slob ma rigs ldan gsum mam lha// bdun las
128b4(rnying rgyud): 'das na gsang sngags 'tshal// de ltar gsang thub bu rnams la// gsang ba'i dbang nyid byed 'dod na// gzung mchog yid dang 'bad pa btsal// de yang mtshan nyid brtag pa gces// de yi mtshan nyid brtag pa ni// rigs

128b6(rnying rgyud): ninide ltar brtag pa gces// kha dog 'bros dang skad kyis btag/ kha dog brtag pa 'di lta ste// pad+ma'i rigs su gang 'dod pa// kha dog 'gros dang skad kyis brtag/ byed ni zlum zhing la rog skrag/ skad phra yid du
128b7(rnying rgyud): 'od smra zhing // gzugs dang bo ni thang zhing sbom// yid du 'ong zhing chags pa skye// skra ni mdog ser li la 'jam// sen mo'i mdog kyang dmar la dngas// smi ne ma chems par yang ma chang dang // lo ni bco lnga nyid lon pa// pad+ma'i
129a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid yin par 'dod// dung chen dgag mtshan nyid ni// byang nyid che rngang snyoms pa ste// kha dog dkar zhing so yang dkar// lus po rags shing dpa' brtul rgya// gzugs bzang yod grang ba po// mag
129a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa yid tsam dmar ba la// sgra yang nag cing 'dzum kha sti// sor mo phra zhing mnyen lcug legs// seng ge lta bu'i 'gros dang ldan// skad ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang mtshungs// bcu drug lo dang ldan pa na// dung chen yin par rab tu bshad//
129a3(rnying rgyud): ri mo can gyi mtshan nyid ni// kha nyid chung gling sha yang sa da// byad kyi dkyus kyang ri shA ste// gzugs nyid phra zhing smrabacang // smig gi 'bras b+hU dkar nag 'byed// s+yAd ning da zung ba ste// shAswab mtshan sgra gsal ba ste// yid du 'ong
129a4(rnying rgyud): zheng glang chen 'gros// dpa' btul che zhing zhum pa ltar// bcu bzhi po dang ldan pa ste// ri mo can du yang dag 'dod// ha sti ma yi mtshan nyid ni// byang dkyus dag ni ring ba ste// sha yi mdog ni yid tsam sngo// so dkar mig gi 'bras bu
129a5(rnying rgyud): nag/ gzugs che sked skabs phyed pa ste// sta rgyud bzang zhing sprin ma bzang // skabs skabs skad kyang 'jod par byed// spyod pa de lal tshig 'jam smra// ba glang 'gros 'dra ba rdul shugs ldan// sum cu man chad lo rnams so// de ltar mtshan dang
129a6(rnying rgyud): ldan pa ste// ha ste'i rigs su yang dag 'dod// gsang ba'i yum de de de yi// 'bra swa pra re re thob pa ste// ri mo can dang ha sti mchog/ yang na bu mang longs spyod ldan// lo tshad nges pa med par bstan// yang na yid 'ong gzhon nu ma// skyes pas ma
129a7(rnying rgyud): gtses brtul shugs can// bcu bzhi'i lo dang ldan pa'o// de ltar bsten pa'i yum la yang // sbyor bas 'grub dang brten pas 'grub// bsam pas 'grib dang mthong ba'o// ri mo can la sbyor bas te// dung chen bsten pa'i stobs kyis 'grub//
129b1(rnying rgyud): bdudag na sum par cu/ mtho zhing dgapas so// dbang shid byas par byed pan// degs ni bzhig tshang brnyabya// de med na yangs song bshad// blor shAzas nad ma thub ba// dgrod pa sa dang blang blang // bsam pas dngos tha' du
129b2(rnying rgyud): ma'o// mthong bas gsumaka'i tshogs su bstan// de ltar gzungs dang ldan par bya// de skar yum dang ldan byas ni// dbang bsrung don la 'jug par bya// shin tu dben pa'i gnas dbu tu// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gu bzhi bcig/ chag chag zig
129b3(rnying rgyud): gdab tshan sbed de// mtshad rdzas gang dang 'jab la// dkyil 'khor dag ni thub ste/ pho thung bram po 'od zer zan// pang+ga la dbA ma baN+Da ldan bya// bum pa'i gzugs dang mong bcas// rgya ljang b+h+yor cings 'khor brgyad// phyogs sa kyings
129b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan par dag du// sgo ni rigs dang ldan pa bkod// mu khyad kyi rim thu bzhi 'bar// de yi phye mthun por bkod// bar khram+ba dag ni bum bsngo te// de ltar dkyil 'khor zes byas te// de la rdzas ni dgram par bya// dbus kyi lte pa'i dkyil dag tu// rnam spang mngon byang su
129b5(rnying rgyud): nyid bzhag/ de yi steng du snang mtha' yas// sdang ba mtha' yas spyi gtsug tu// bcom ldan dbang chen de nyid do// de yi steng du rma bya'i gzugs// sna tshogs dar gyis brtan pa bzhag/ rdzas de rnams dang ldan pa ni// dbang ni chu bo bzhi nyid thob/
129b6(rnying rgyud): spu ye rnam pa de rnams kyang // shar nas nub tu ba yang bstan// gsang ba dbang byed slob dpon yang // chub nas shar du kha bltas so// dbus kyi lha tshogs mdun du yang // bkra shis mdzes pa'i tham pa gzhag/ kha rgyan sring por bcas pa'o// dar dmar
129b7(rnying rgyud): mabral chengs rab tu bshad// lha de nyid kyi mdun du yang // me bong gas la mangs dgra' par za// shar phyogs nyid kyi tsha la yang // rabs chad thod pa mtshan ldan // byang chub sems ni dmang pos gzhams// dkyil 'bar byang gi chal yang //
130a1(rnying rgyud): pong sra pa can du yang // byang chub sems ni dkar po sa// dkyil 'khar / yan pa yang // bu ma skyes pa'i bud med tshol// sha dang mar med ga dang ni// dzas ni bzhi yang de ltar dgod// de ltar rdzas nichogs
130a2(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ sbub pos yum rnams rgyas su gzhug/ pad+ma'i rigs la dAr dmar gos// gyi rwa'i rkyen dang ldan pa'o// wa~Ms rmas legs par bzlas nas ni// dbu sran dar gyi cod pan gdags/ la'agying ba'i bag ldan gang skabs bya/
130a3(rnying rgyud): du su
130a4(rnying rgyud): ha ste la ni dar ston brgyan// utra la sngon po'i rgyan dang ldan// tsan dan chu yis was bkrus te// dbu rgyan dang sngon cod pan can// rdo dza dra la za lag bzung ste// 'gying ba'i stobs ldan thung ngu'o// ri mo can la dang se dgos// 'bras zag sum gyi rgya
130a5(rnying rgyud): bkrus te// me tog gser gyi rgyan ldan pa'o// dbu rgyan dang sar cod panab cing // rdo rdo rje la tha lag bzung te// 'gying bag ldan pa sgo dri dgod// de nas ting 'dzin rab ldan pas// sbyor der sgrol ba'i las brtsams te// dbang bskur byas par byed 'dod
130a6(rnying rgyud): na// dbang gi dus dang bsrung thabs dang // 'brag pa'i dus dang bskur smras so// phyi nang dbang nyid rdzogs byas nas// gsang ba'i dbang pa 'jug par bya// dbang gi dus ni 'di sbyar te// 'bras bu sbyin pa'i nas yin no// 'jug pa'i dus ni chos
130a7(rnying rgyud): ste// baspang ba'i dus ni nam byed do// gtong ma nam longs dag pa'o// de ltar bya ba sngon song nas// gsang ba'i don la 'jug par bya// de nas slob tha dang ldan des// rang gi yum dang bcas pa yang // spos chu 'o mas bkrus byas la// rgyan dang
130b1(rnying rgyud): lhags ldan pas te// dkyis bar ba nang shang dbang ba bad// gaskyengs drang zhing dbang bsgyur gsal// mang gsang gnyis sbyor dbang bgra gas pa// shes rab babasapan srung grol dbang // raba' badzin pas bka / gsung ba
130b2(rnying rgyud): dzin rgyal su// ma rig rmongs pa'i yid ldan pas// shes rab mig gi dbang bskur gsol// rmugs shing myos pas sgra mi thos// gnyis med snyan gyi dbang bslang gsal// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// ram dag 'odwags la hUM mtshar/
130b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes shangs kyi dbang bskur gsol// 'khor 'das gnyis 'dzin spyod pa yis// chos nyid dag pa'i ro mthong // rang dgi brgyad ldan dbang bskur gsol// phyi na phral la chags gyur pas// dbyings dang rig pa'i yul ma mthong // 'od gsal
130b4(rnying rgyud): grus de dbang bskang gsol// dra pas can du mtshan thar pa'o// ngang skad snying ba'i don matortogs// dakha rig pa'i dbyung ba skyed gsol// de ltar thob tha dag ldan des// degang rjod cing gas dbang grwa// don so nga thob dben das// byas
130b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyung nyid bsrung bra yi// tha rnams bral du 'khod nas kyang // myong ba bde yis bskul bar bya// bsgrub pa'i sgram gcig ga yon bzhig la// bdag nyid chas dang rgyan pagros la// dang po rjes kyi dbang bsrung gyi// ye shes rnam ngag 'ad gas la dzam
130b6(rnying rgyud): sku'i darlings// lce med rang gsal thugs rje'i dbyings las byang chub sems// dri med skyon bral rig pazhi pa'i yab// stong pa nyid mtshon rgyal byang chub sems// 'khor bar me gnas ye shes rang snang sbal sna tshogs 'phros// dag pa'i rta mtshan
130b7(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i thig le ste// chags la chags med dga' bde'i dbang bskur ngo ro// sarba d+harma ra dzA tsan tra A/ stong nyid dmar dang shes rab dbang gi sku// chos nyid mkha' mnyam sdang sred shes rab yum// gseng sngags las byung thig le 'dren mdzad ma// paT+Ta'e
131a1(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin pag le 'dren mdzad ma// shes rab rna la nas m+b+ha y-i snang bar chung// blaga'i dbyings nas sprul pa dus gsum byung // chags med rnamanyam bad bskyed par byed// mug rtse ldan gsung ba ngags tha snar//
131a2(rnying rgyud): 'od zer le brgan 'phros// rtog med shes rab dbyings las dbang bsrung ngo // oM muM su ra g+ha ya hUM/ skye med ro ldan mAM sa tshil chen bcas// rgyal ba kun dang skye med snying por mnyam// rig pa'i sku dang so so tha mi dang // dbyings dang mi 'bral shes
131a3(rnying rgyud): rab pad+mar ldan// sgo lnga ma 'gags zhig nas lhag mthong ste// bskyed pa ma yin rang byung rdzogs pa me// sna tshogs 'od 'phro longs sgra nyid kyi lus// ma bsgribs dri med shes rab ye shes spyan// gsang ba'i mdzod 'dzin thugs ni tsat+ta'i ngang // mi dmigs
131a4(rnying rgyud): gsapa dran stong gnyis las 'das// gnyis 'dzin yul dag chos nyid dag pa'i sman// 'khor ba'i sgron spong ye shes dri med shangs// the tshom gnyis bsal pad+ma dag pa'i ljags// skye ba rgyun bcad ye nas spa gsung zhugs// ma skyes thig po'i
131a5(rnying rgyud): dang du dbang bskung ngo ro// a yaM so ti ta a hUM AHstong pa nyid dang nam mkha'i skur mtshon te// stong zhing bdag med mtha' gnyis rnam par gsal// rgya mi chad pa'i ye shes bum pa'i sku// stong nyid dbyibs zlum ye shes thig le'o dang /
131a6(rnying rgyud): rgyad gsar rma dpung skra ni du mar ston// mtha' drang dbus med yangs pa snying po'i don// rang skad chos nyid ye nas gzung 'dzin bral// chos nyid las ni sgra nyid so sor gsal// yang gsang don ston brgyan snying por bcas// dag pa nyid kyis dag pa'i
131a7(rnying rgyud): por ston// bum pa'i gzugs pa sku bzhi ye shes gsal// sku gsum stong pa'i mtha' gnyis dang snang ste// thabs mkhas ye shes sbal pa phyogs bcur 'gyed// tshig dang brjod bya gnyis las rab du 'das// sangs rgyas dang ni rig pa sgo
131b1(rnying rgyud): nyid gsal// ye shes dang ni sra yang ma bsgribs gsal// chos nyid drang byung tog med pas// mkhar grong dbyings su dbang bskur ro// oM la du yang hrita hUM/ de ltar rdzas kyi dpung rdzogs nas// yang dag dbang la 'jug par bya// yang dag dang
131b2(rnying rgyud): la 'dun tshon// g.yon gyi lham la dmigs byas te// byang chub sems nyid 'dren pa'i phyir// b+ha ga'i nang du ri lug zhug/ phyed 'dren na ni na gcig ste// lhag ma med par rdzogs byed na// che chung sran ma'i tshad du mnyam// des ni gnyis ka
131b3(rnying rgyud): 'dren par byed// thig le zlog par byed pa na// yi ge 'bru bzhi dran par bya// dmar po rang la stim byed na// 'bru gnyis dgu dang bcas pa'o// de ltar dran zhing gsal byas nas// rdo rje chu 'thung zhes byar 'gyur// ril bu bcug la sbyar
131b4(rnying rgyud): smras// hrI la 'du ma
131b5(rnying rgyud): 'od du zhu// 'od 'phros myong ba'i brdas bskul lo// sa ma~M ya/ mnyam par sbyor cig rdo rje rgyal/ muM a/ bde gsal longs spyod chos kyi sku// gnyis med dbyings su brda sbyor 'khud/ mAM AHbde ldan phun sum tshogs pa'i sa// rdo rje la
131b6(rnying rgyud): ni ti pa ste// pad+ma lA ni badz+ra ny+dza// sdoms shig stong nyid mu dra ste// bste m+ba sh+log byang chub dbyings su bstim/ pra ta ma hUM lam/ do nas slob ma dang ldan gyis// me long mchags mgus par// byang chub sems ni lce yis blangs// blangs te slob dpon nyid la 'phrul
131b7(rnying rgyud): thob dpon gsang ba nyid// 'gying bag chas su zhugs nas ni// bu la gnang po'i skabs phye ste// sta gon cho ga rdzogs byas la// dang po spyi gtsug dbang bskur te// ting 'dzin rim pa 'di lta ste// bu yi steng du bzhag pa'i tshe// rdzas de yi ge hUM ru
132a1(rnying rgyud): bsam// dzA nyid dmar rtswa dag tu byas pa// de nas 'od zer rab 'phros pas// yi ga de nyid la bzlag te// da rnam phyogs bcur 'thos par bsam// de nas tshangs pa'i bra gang bas// drung 'ang 'bar bang babs par
132a2(rnying rgyud): bsam// gr-I de'i 'od zar 'phros pa las// khro bo'i da kyil 'khor mgo la bsam// de nas chos nyid rtsar brim pas// hrI de 'di mi thig le dgas ma// de nas tsat+ta thim par bsam// hrI de sna tshogs 'od du bsam/ de nyid las ma zhi srung bsar/
132a3(rnying rgyud): thugs la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// de nas yi ge swA de yang // skal tshigs nyid kyi rta btud nas// po mo gang yin gsang gnas su// yi ge de nyid babs par bsam/ brgyad pa'i dbang nyid ma rdzogs par// ye shes de nyid brtan par bsam//
132a4(rnying rgyud): khabs lugs rnam pazhi bsgom// de ltar ting 'dzin gsal byas la// byang chub sems kyi sbeng du yang // grub mchog dag dang ldan pa yis// gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag bya ste// byang chub sems ni skye nga sa// de nyid 'ong du 'gros pa las// byang chub sems ni 'ong
132a5(rnying rgyud): bsam// muM dang a yis phul lhur nas// gsang ba'i mkha' la thim par bsam// hUM dang gnyis med 'khril bar bsam// gnyis med yi ge de dag ni// yi shes spangs dag sngar bstod nas// lto ba'i rtsa la thim par bsam// de nyid 'od du zhu ba las// gang dag tu
132a6(rnying rgyud): med 'dod pa rnams// yi ge de yi byin brlabs las// skye ba'i sgo yang bcad par bsam// gang dag pu dang tshe 'dod pas// de yi 'od dang zer ldan pas// dbang po dwangs ma mig tu bsam/ de la sha gzugs dad par bsam// de nas yan lag rgyas par bsam//
132a7(rnying rgyud): srid pa'i sha gzugs dong pa'o// de nas kyi t+tar brgyad bar bsam// zhi ba'i sku la thim gyur pas// lha rnams 'od dang ldan gyur pas// yab yum sbyor ba byas par bsam/ mkha' la sems dang 'od 'phros pas// lte ba'i sras la dbang bsrung bsam// den
132b1(rnying rgyud): ma na smon tu su / saman/ na na na
132b2(rnying rgyud): dgas// 'ag pa sa/ rkyen ngas sa/ na 'du / /
132b3(rnying rgyud): 'di // lagapa bsas/ ngas tha ma sa// mtshungs pa'i thugs da 'a dang brtsam par bas shes sung blagan/ ga nyis napa ga yis ga na/ mig she
132b4(rnying rgyud): sa / tha pa rnas ma mad na ste/ 'am bcas par ga 'ibagyu'o// dbye can pa gas kyang bar byasas+ho// den sa pa'adu las/ ga
132b5(rnying rgyud): nying nga rje bar bas pa// nam ma kyang byed na myung bsas// rnaMs sa'i gas su yang dag bsam// srog sa ma nyid yangs spang sa// brnam ldan snang ba ma bya yas bsam// yab sa grangs mda' thas pasams
132b6(rnying rgyud): na
132b7(rnying rgyud): 'angs kyangasasas gyur pal/ dang hU~M la dmigs thas / na 'dadu bapas// klul dun rje dzin du bas sa// data nga thub / 'a pa dkyang ra tha ma// 'i bad 'phra sa/ ky-i ma mam nas/
133a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ sbyor bar bsas// mkha' las sems par 'ang 'jos pas// bu yalus pa nim gyur nas// lus na dang / ldanas nA// dbang rtags mngan shes drug ldan pa'i// sbrul sa nyid kyi // la na /
133a2(rnying rgyud): sras dbang thob// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang chos su thob// de ltar dbang nyid rab rdzogs nas// rgyu ni rnam pa bzhi yin no// de nas srugasum rdzogs pa'i dbang // rang byung dbang nyid rab tu rdzogs// sku gsum dbyer mod thob pa'o/ dbang bskur
133a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rdzogs byed na// dang po sbyor ba byed che nas// bdag dang bsgrub pa'i yum nyid kyi// spyi gtsug bde ba'i gnas su yang // yi ge 'di ltar bsgom par bya// yum la muM nyid dmar po ste// yab la a dkar 'od 'phro'o//
133a4(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'od 'bar 'phro 'du las// tshangs pa'i bu gar thim par bas ma// de nyid 'od du bsdus pa las// sa ma ya zhes sgra byung nas// dam tshig phyag rgyas 'khyud nas ni// yab yum gnyis med sbyar bar bsam// mkha' las bya
133a5(rnying rgyud): chub sems babs pas// rtsa bzhi'i nang du thig le stong // de las gzi ldan 'od 'phros pas// thig le drangs snyigs phyed nas ni// dngas ma 'od zer rnam lnga ste// stegs ma dkar po'i thig le'o// dang sa ma tsed+ha'i nang du babs/
133a6(rnying rgyud): de las 'od zer rab 'bros pas// dwangs ma sing ta'i sbas bung bas// sgri ba yab yum brdas bskul bas// chos kyi phyag rgyas 'khrud nas ni// yab yum gnyis med spong bar bsam// byang chub sems nyid babs pa las// 'od zer sna tshogs
133a7(rnying rgyud): 'phros pa yis// cha shas 'od zer thams cad kyang // sgal tshigs thig le dag la thim// las kyi rlung gis ded nas ni// sbal tshigs nyid kyis bcud nas// gsod pa'i mkha' la babs gyur nas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i brdas bskul te/
133b1(rnying rgyud): ga sa dngas te// blan gyi slad pazhis pa babarjod// pa bsam ga nyis sang ldan pa // bdag par rgyam gang dbang bskur // rtswang ba'i sgra nga rbab pa// dang ba'i sabs su shes par bya// de spyod da gastan /
133b2(rnying rgyud): la ba da su 'dzid// rags ngas pa na pam ma ga da ba dang // 'a gas makyil mas/ Tad+ha/ rgya byan 'ang / din sangs rgyas sa par shAs// thugasas bras nga byungs// dz+nyAn gis ga
133b3(rnying rgyud): nas// sangs rgyas kun nga'ang tha mang mnyam// rdzogs sangs rgyas pad thob pas// phyir mi ldog pangs yang zlog// gdod nas ma chags snang ba ngam/ sa mkhyod kyis mthab ste// dus 'di nyid du zab pasen// de rang pan na rdzogs
133b4(rnying rgyud): / rlog pa sag nga
133b5(rnying rgyud): nasas+ho// ngas cas shing dang nyam bya// rabargya mas pa dang bang pa/ lda byung rgyab mi skyes nga ba dadaka pa dang / thang mamam nga dang da
133b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thig la ste// sra gsum yon tan byang chubs mas mnyam pas// byang chub snying bsam ldan grub ste// tha dad mi 'thad chos su spong bdag med// dkar dang dmar dang gis rab thabasam pas sgra// tshwas nyid stong pa ma tha' thab 'a
133b7(rnying rgyud): rol// chags med chags pa'i tshul bstan byang chub nyid kyi lnga// mtshan ma sbas thal gsang ba'i yum gyi dbang / thabs sa khas thags rje chen pa yin pas na/ deng nas bzung gA rgyal ba sras su'o// aupra d+ha tsiti i ba ka la yA//
134a1(rnying rgyud): mangs na blta ba' dam pa 'khor sa// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil 'khor nyid bstan pas// sngon chad ma 'am sadung nas bdag gsugs// dang girar ngazhan yin par de shes pas// gzhan nas ma bca/
134a2(rnying rgyud): gyi nang dbang thob pas// gsang ba'i dbang dang yongs rdzogs dus 'dir thob// dpa' bos gnang bas bka' drin rab tu tshe'o// ha ha he he rig nges so// a a i i ngo mtshar ro// dbang rdzogs yon yang 'bul bar bya'o// slob dpon
134a3(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis ngal bsu'o// zhes rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i chud las/ gsang ba mkha' dbyings bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ dang sa ya sang a nu bran+d+ha
134a4(rnying rgyud): ma/ bod skad du/ rdzogs pa chen po rang snang gi dbang zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i snying po'i sbrul phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe/ drar khrod chen po'i gnas su/ 'khor bas margyas ma khya'i pa'i chags 'dus te/ gsang ba
134a5(rnying rgyud): bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // blo 'das rdzogs pa chen po'i dbang // gang gis 'thob par 'gyur ba lags// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ de nas snying po byang chub sras// nye ba'i 'khor
134a6(rnying rgyud): la bka' stsal pa// kye ma nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin// yang dag nges pa'i lung 'di yis// rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs ston// kye ma ngo mtshar bstan pa yis// rdzogs chen sku yang 'dir bstan gyis// 'dir ni nges pa'i rgyal po thob//
134a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par dbang rdzogs byed pa na// shin tu dben pa'i gnas nyid du// dkyil 'khor 'do mgang tshad du bya// dri sna lnga yis chag chag gad pa// thig gdab tshon ni dkye bar bya'o// pho brang zlum po dag tu bya'o// de nas phyi rim 'khor lor bskor bya ste// mthing ga la sogs rim
134b1(rnying rgyud): na// 'as pa tham pa sa// bum pa ra rgyags pa zhi tham pa 'o// zlum po de yang bum pa za// dgra gyur sna ngag tu yang // 'khor lo sngar ma dag tuH// 'khor yang lda byas sa yang // phyogs su bum par dbri// dag ngas /
134b2(rnying rgyud): nyid bris te// steng du mas nyid dgram par bya// tham pa'i steng du bum pa ro// mgul chings rgyan dang bcas pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor nyid phub skye// de yi steng du dar gyi gzugs// sna tshogs mdzes pa dag gis 'bub// nges pa'i
134b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po thob bya'i phyir// mnga' dang me long dar snang // de ltar rdzas rnams rdzogs bya sA la// dbang bsgyur las sna rdzogs par bya// de nas chos nyid stong pa yi// rdzogs chen bzhi yi dbang rdzogs bya// sra gsung thugs dang mi 'byed par/
134b4(rnying rgyud): yang dag gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs nas// rdzogs pa nyid kyang dbang bsrur gyur// bu nying dad dang ldan pa des// dri sna lnga yis lus bkrus te// rgyan dang chu lpags mdzes brgyan te// zhu ba'i chog rnams rdzogs par bya// de nas slob dpon gsang ba
134b5(rnying rgyud): yiya// rang gi rgyan cha mdzes gon la/ 'bring ba'i skabs kyis gang byas te// dam tshig chu ba byin nas ni// ye shes dag pa'i dbang bskur bya// 'di yis thams cad grol bar gsungs// yang dag gsang ba'i rdo rje rigs ldan pas/
134b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i skyon pal ye shes chen thar sbyor// shing nyid nas kyang shar med yang dag rig pa che// mas kyi sbrulas chos su'i snying ba yang bsangs// bslab mad bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khar zhal gyis te// bal med lta ba'i 'das
134b7(rnying rgyud): blar bstan// chas mang chas kyi sku dang mnyas par gyur// thabs pa mang dag ca yang mngad// cham su phye med rda da nga dbang 'phreng // oM lang srin pa she la/ yang dab klos padadag can grang ba ltar// rdzogs sangs rgyas de gas
135a1(rnying rgyud): mang yul las 'das// 'od gas la spos thal skal las 'das// chos myod pag chags thams cad sreg byed pa'o// byang chung snying por sprul pas dbang bsrung // sa ta dza thar mang // yang drag tu nga sa las snang mtha' lasan/
135a2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i sbal mdun dang rnab med dang // shes rab dang zung su ni tha me // sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od 'dis dbang bskur ro// tra thar rdzas b+he laH// dri med rang gsal don nyid grub pa ste// yangs sa dazugs kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer stong // byang chub
135a3(rnying rgyud): sems ni bya ba ye nas rdzogs// rnam dag med yang dang du dbang bskur ro// a bu so tri ya hUM/ de ltar yang dag dbang rdzogs nas// bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// shar phyogs chu yi bum pa blang byas te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu bskyer byas la// 'bras bu
135a4(rnying rgyud): grol lam dbang thob ste// rdzogs sangs chas dang dbyer med mnyam// mnyam pa 'di yi dbang thob ste// 'di ltar bsam rdzogs dbang bskrad bya/ bum pa nyid la hU~M bsam ste// hUM nyid 'od du zhu ba las// bum pa nyid la khro skar bsgom// de yos dbang bsrud las
135a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bsam// lho gyogs bum pa mgrin pa ru// AH nyid 'od 'amos thig le'i su// de las gong ltar dbang bskur bsam// nub kyi lte ba'i gnas su baspang // yi ge sgra nyid 'od zhabs// skye ba med pa'i dbang bskur bsam// byang phyogs gsang ba'i gnas su'o//
135a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs// rang gsal yid 'ong 'od 'phros chos sku'i ngang // mkha' mnyam snying po ye shes chos su kun 'byung klong // mu gsum ma bsrung chos nyid dbyings su rdzogs// rgya med rgyan bral rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rjes 'dzin blo gros mtha' yas shing // rdo rje sba 'bar ye shes
135b1(rnying rgyud): dngas pang ba pa// dngos da pa 'du // smras // sa phyong ga sa
135b2(rnying rgyud): thad na zhing ba nga/ ya yang na bang 'am// yang gas pa nga sa/ ngas byung chu // des kyad pa dod pa/ nga she benan pas// de da gas she mtshan sa// me da pa 'ad
135b3(rnying rgyud): bzung namad rda'i sgra// dzags sangs rgyas pa rdo rje'i gsang // dud nas bskal pa stong su nga / mi ga brtan pa dzag// rang rig brtan pa don sa// rtswa dang ldan par ma g+har bar// sngags sa bas pa'i dbang nab das// pa bar ba na thugs/
135b4(rnying rgyud): 'phrulang babuM yang dang rdugs// rdzas kyi b+h+rUM dang yang gsang nga// mkha' gas cig gnang sas// tshab dang chos pas rab 'dus pa/ mas nyid bang yang dang tha~M ba// nisardzogs par nga blang dran pa'i rdung pas/ rdzogs cang ga
135b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i len+d+ra ge hUM shu gnyis pa'o// rdzogs so// / rgyag srung du/ kA la dzakra rdzas sha na ma/ bod srad du/ ngaSha ma rin po che swa wA bsrang ba zhes zlab/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snad mdzad la phyog 'tshal lo// de nas 'das pa'i
135b6(rnying rgyud): 'a bas ma gyis mi khyab pas/ bcom ldan 'das dag pa dri sa ces rdzas so// skyes bcom ldan na mgal bdag/ 'khor ba'i sems can de dug rnams// 'joganyid pas brtul ba'i phyir/ dkyipa 'khor 'tshogs thams cang /
135b7(rnying rgyud): phra re dpa mabyung kyang 'gas/ chung ngonapas pa tshu gdun rjes nga dag pa ba dun pas bka'aphrul pa// em ni rdzogs ba na nyon/ nga mas thegs par bstan par bya// bas dang ldan pa
136a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ chos tan/ swa yi dbang bltar byeng chen// shin du dben pa'i gnas dag ca// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang klu bzhi la// dr-is lnga yi chag chag gdab// rdzogags chen yang dang n+ta// da byas pa'o dang
136a2(rnying rgyud): dbus su rin chen tham pa zlum// khargyan gal chings bcings pa bzhag/ nas kyi steng du bzhag ste/ rigs lnga sgra yang de bzhin paltas// shang nyid du yang bum pa ste// rigs gsum thu dang gos dkar can// legs pa
136a3(rnying rgyud): gas gas / tshig gser thang dang med pa ma/ la shin sa sa/ na thags spyo ba ga // da ma na 'am ste// rigs khas nas byu ba
136a4(rnying rgyud): su bum pa ste// sra ba bzhin phyogs phyags bzhag/ grang shar mtshams su zum pa ste// rigs gsum tho dang rnam 'jams ma// shar sngam tshams su bum pa sa// nam 'dzim zhal dang stobs drug dang // gshon+do zhugs pa thugs
136a5(rnying rgyud): kun bzang nga // lho rbab mtshams su bram pas// rigs lnga'i yum ni de bzhin bzhag/ rngub byung ma tshams su zlum pa ste// kr-i ti shwa re lnga nyi dang // phyogs bzhi mthalas dang brgyang dra // de yang bag shis nas nir ri ro// bum pa da
136a6(rnying rgyud): re'i car// phung dang bcas pa'i gter mar// mkhas pas rag tu gzhag par bya// than mtshan ldan de bzhin no// de ltar rdzas rnams pa shams nas ni// dbang bsgyur cha ga rdzogs par bya// de nas 'di skad badzad pa ding // gamang
136a7(rnying rgyud): ba gsum dang ldan pa'o// ting 'dzin rgyal pa bsgom bya zhing // tshig dang bcas pas sku de dang // rang rang gnas su bskur bar bya// hrI lnga ldan rdo rje 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'du 'bral med pa'i srang gsal las// gsang bad
136b1(rnying rgyud): nga rigs kyi dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje 'jas pa'i sras su dbang bskur ngo // dkyil 'khor 'a sa ye nas dang // dus dang gnas dang chog dang rdo rje yi// gsang dab bde lanang rnga gar gyi bdag/ bdag dang gzhan dang sbrul mthar phyin
136b2(rnying rgyud): nas// mi 'gyur gsang mchog dgyes pa'i gad mo che// rig dang stong dang bya dang byed pa'i stobs// chos dang gnas dang sems dang yid la bsrul// a la la ho rdo rnga mas pa rtsal// rigs dang sa dang rdo rje drog po rtsal/
136b3(rnying rgyud): na na dngag sa/ sa gas / sa na 'thab da sa
136b4(rnying rgyud): rtsal// dkyil 'khor rgyas mdzad dkyil 'khor dag 'dzin rtsal// e ma ho// he he ti sta rdo rje gsang mchog khyod// dbang ldan dbang gi rigs ldan rigs mchog ste// 'bar ba 'od 'phro 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// bde ldan dbyings
136b5(rnying rgyud): mchog su ldas dbang bsrung ngo ro// chos nyid dbyings la rig pa'i dbyings shar bas// mthong ba nyid dang ye shes thabs kyi // tsi// rin chen 'khor mo gzhal yas su// bad mchog thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang bsgrer ngo // ba
136b6(rnying rgyud): ldan dbyings shar shes rab dbyings kyi dang // gsal 'tshar ldan sdug rdo rje dbagasang 'bar// gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings b+ha ga'i gzhal yas su// chos nyid spos bral bde chen dbang bskur ro// rdo rje gsang ba pad mchog dbyings su sla
136b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab thabs ldan ka dag yangs pa'i ngang // sems dpa' dacis 'khor sems pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ chos rnams dasogs med rdo rje sems dpa'i wa// nam mkha'i mtha' las chos dbyings ra gcig pu// las rnams/
137a1(rnying rgyud): su / dun na la dang / pa gyu gnas nga du dung/ gsu ba ba shas
137a2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i dang // shes rab 'ang banan mongs kyil gyis gnos// rdo rnga mda' 'phen shes rab dbyes su 'phan// dkyil 'khar mtha' spyad la shes gsang ba'i bdag/ sangs cas yang ldan zugs kyi cod pan rdzun// rin rgyug
137a3(rnying rgyud): byung rtsa ba'i gzhas yas su// mnya ma nying 'a kyi chos su'i dbang bskung // rdo byad ldan thugs cigasang mtshig sa// yang gags bzugs kyi dkyi la bar bdag/ gas pa than de cings dang ye shes 'di 'jug /
137a4(rnying rgyud): maud kyi chom su'i dkyil 'khor ba dag/ bde lan chos dbying sa gas ba dbang bskyed // / gsang sngags sna dang yang dag mtha' 'das dang // sa rnams mthar phyin la shes rnam par dag/ nas nyid snang stong ka dag ti nga snang //

137b1(rnying rgyud): Abasam du dang / rgan nas pa'as byung nan pas/ gnas pa gnas// la la 'dun du nas sun/ dus na na rnam/ ladu gnyis ma

137b4(rnying rgyud): sa sbyin tshul du bzed// g.yon pa brkyangs te de bzhin no// snying ga dag tu gzhag par bya// lag g.yas kAr kye tshul byas la// skye gtsug nyid du gzhag par bya// oM A Sh+Te swA hA/ bI shed swA hA hU~M/ g.yas pas brdeg pa ltar byas la// skye

137b7(rnying rgyud): mthi la du gzhag par bya// oM mr-i dzA srA hA/ mgror stA ma s+t+rai ny+tsa yA swA/ g.yas pas se gau la~M phyag rgya ni// lci ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ oM a k+Shi swA p+pa ta ba sgribs sa sulan po ny-i'aM/ lag gnyis khyeng gshog ltar byas la// sbyin cag nyid drugazhag byas la// oM A ng+ge swAhA/

138a5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ltar byas pa// spyi gtsug dag tu gzhag par bya/ oM AHhUM swA hA tsan badz+ra na yI yA ts+yai ts+yai phaT phaT swA hA// lag gnyis gzhu 'gengs tshul du bya// g.yon gyi mdzub mo sna rtser bzhag/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ badz+ra ku ni ser ser wA swA hA/ lag g.yon lag kya'i phyag rgya

139a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyam mthar gyu 'a ga gangan// g+sashes rnam pa nanas// da rgyag sa la gnas sa// swA hAsakAn+dan du smra gyu/ rdzas mamam na dan/ sa na

139a5(rnying rgyud): tsakrardul byin su a b+hi Shi Sh+Ti AM/ dbang dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dbang mchog rdzas byin byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs byas te// dad ldan 'khor la rdzogs bya ste// bde ldan gsang mchog bde ba'i dbyings// yang gis thugs
139a6(rnying rgyud): kyai rdo rje mchog/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam myong bas// mkha' la dbyings ldan thams cad du// bdag gis dbang mchog bskur ba bzhin// deng nas bzung sti thob par shog/ thob nas 'gyur med brtan par shog/ yang dag gsang ba'i don ldan das// 'jig rten pa yi sku gsung grags
139a7(rnying rgyud): deng nas bzung ste ma btang zhig/ e ma sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje 'chang chen ma btang bar// thugs kyi dkyil du legs pa zung // a bal to rdzogs sangs rgyas// bdag gis deng nas bzung nas ni// bskal pa brgya stong bar du yang // bdag gi stong pa nyid kyi sku// nam du ya
139b1(rnying rgyud): ni mi btang ngo // de ltar dbang rdzogs byas nas ni// phyag rgya sngags dang bcas pa rnams// sku yi bar du bskur nas ni// gsang sngags ldan pas rdzogs par bya// cho gsang chen po 'di bshad pas// thams cad rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sku nyid thob// de ltar gnyis med lam
139b2(rnying rgyud): mchog ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes thugs// 'di ni nges pa'i yul yin pas// thabs dang ldan pa'i yul yang yin// yi dam sems kyi dkyil 'khor nas// chos kyi sku dang dbyer med pas// gnyis su med pa thob bya'i phyir// 'di ni nges pa'i rgyud
139b3(rnying rgyud): chen gas pa// bde mchog nges pa'i rgyal pos bshad// gsang ba'i gsang mchog nges pa'i lung // dbang dang ldan pa'i dbang nyid ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di'o//
