200a1(rnying rgyud): bya/ dadag nas mi shes dang na go// wa lamed pa leshes pabags ga sa so// trang chub med pa ste ba nga na ti zhi spod pazed pa'i mishes so/ bu gnyis cig char phar nyi ma can du thos nas/ 'di ni nyamasas sa pa gan te ga pa thon pa dang du na po dab 'thor pas te/ ben la sa das dan nas
200a2(rnying rgyud): mang dang rang bzhin gyi 'odon dang 'a zhug so// de yang pe na tis ga bu la 'i gag ni smon ze nyis kyi 'o gron pa gnyis bzhugs so// de yar nam pa' ga bar nga ding be zhes kyi ngo 'dzin no dang slad du nyams su len pa'i skyes pa rnams de la 'dris par bya zhing / de'i 'od las yid gakun dus yangs pa bar/ 'bad la dpya bsdus nas/ sngo ma des kyang thal can gyi snang bco ma mongs pa zangs cad
200a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi rnang ba gar nas de la rab tu sdod pa'i rig pargyal po'i tshul/ rdo lnga 'garas kyi tshu'i rigs pa'i ngo bos zho lnga'i 'od kyi skang ba zil gyis mnan nas ye shes rang yul du gang nas dA ra ba gzhan dang dur sor bar 'od du ltung ba'o// ye shes kyi snang ba la mjal 'od nang nas sgo lnga mam la bab pa'o// btsun mo nyi shu rtsa gcig gis gros byas nas de ltar ngo sngon nyi ma sa gcig gis
200a4(rnying rgyud): nyams su grangs dgos te de yang don la skye ba med kyang tshad sa skyed byed yod pas dpe rnams kyis mtshon dgos te de la bu dang 'od du bstan pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang phyar nas snang ba de las ye shes kyis yid 'gro 'du zad de snang ba dang sdang ba yin no// 'on dang 'ong / su ni rang gi rig pa'o// de yang rang gi gis rab kyis chod par byas nas rkyen gyis dab du rig pa ma sor ba'o// bas ma rdugs kyi lnga
200a5(rnying rgyud): khang du bros te/ de la yang ngo sprod gi bu rtsa gcig gis rang gi snang bang gis ro zhes nas chos kyi sbu bsam pa dang bras pa'i snang ba de ga dag ched po'i sku gzhon du sa ba spu'i snang ba phags sa smad pa med pa'i rang ljang chen po sbal la wAng shing yul la longs spyod pa de pang ma dag pa'i yul sa bu ma yin te lo zhes dag pa'i rnang ba 'bang zhig tu snang ngo // mi lngas phub gon nas do
200a6(rnying rgyud): pu lA ye nas pa ldang ga ye zhes pa 'od la nang ba 'od la dbyings su snang ba dbyings mtha' la mi gnas rgya ma chad cing kun tu mtha' yas pa dbus dang mtha' med pa ma 'gags pa rang gis rig pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa ge zer phyogs bcur 'phro ba ska ba phyogs med du 'chang ba nga ba rin da po po mi 'gyur ba'o// sgo bsungs nas sus kyang 'od ma nus zer te ya cha/ de yang 'od ska rang da kyi
200a7(rnying rgyud): tshal duganas pas phye shi'i gnas med par rnang ba ma 'gags par ldang ba'o// de yang bar do'i dus bstan te bang dopa ye zhes ma par du bu 'jug pa lta bu nye ye shes kyi 'od phyogs med du zha bas yul la bkad med ye shes la gzhal du med na yang la dpe gos med dbyings pa che chur med do// de nas mi bzhis me long bzhir khyad bltas pas/ de yang ye shes kyi snang ba zhes bya ste de la me
200b1(rnying rgyud): minapa yon nang pa/ kyang ya satha mam gang su shes rnam 'i sram panapa cigs sa ma lag ma mad khanas de ba nga bdas sas tshang dag dadas tha // rang de rang gi shes zer te yacha/ de bang gan las dang ba dang pozhes gan pa yo du sas da sem sa ci / sa pa'i dang chog ldan zhes cang lag sa
200b2(rnying rgyud): kyi mi sa pa sa ya sa byar ba// dbang ba'i mi shes da yangs nas 'a rtse nga mgyi so// de nas khang pa gcig la rdo brgyad dang gam yin pa se sa nang pa ga nga ga ga 'dzin pa gags pa par / bag gas yo la da 'bog 'og na sa 'o tobs nyed / byas na ga'adzin pa shes
200b3(rnying rgyud): ga zho ba no thong mas/ yang sa nyag pa nas sa pas lag lani rtsogs yar byi pa/ bad sho pag de gags po/ yod pa mthong bas/ rang la rang gad mo shor zer te yang ya cha/ de 'ang ba zhes kyigan dpa ga pa yang la la ga ga bam ma can par 'a papa// de ya gang pa pa da/
200b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung gis chos dang la/ mtshan pa'i dpo log pa yang gnyung du med/ thal cadang tog pa gang yang de pag rtog pa'i sa bod kyang / tshe zhes ga yang the bamed pa'i rdang dang la gang/ de yang bya ba legs kyi lam bsang // don po nyid thugs cas du/ yeshe rtong pa'i bral du rna nor ba nyid kyi dkyis kris// de bzhin brda' yi rnam pa kun// mtshon nas ye shes don la
200b5(rnying rgyud): sor// zhes bka' stsal pas/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngo mtshar mchog tu skyes so// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul tshul dang 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// / thAH/ thA thAH!g+ha g+har+YaHde nas yang
200b6(rnying rgyud): mkhya' 'gro ma dkar ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e maho// brda'i chos kyis sems can gyi rtog pa sol cig/ bdag cag mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mig phyes shig/ sems can kun gyis go bar gyis shig/ ces
200b7(rnying rgyud): khrus so// de nas par ston pas legs pa gsungasas// ngas ni 'ardal yis sems can rnams kyi rtog sa bsal la// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khod rnams rab cu gan/ yang yul 'kho za nan na smin na mas ga shegs mas /
201a1(rnying rgyud): chen mo zhes bya ba na/ 'dam rdzab chen po ton mongs pa stong phrag brgyang du nyon mongs pabasam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil na/ gcig gi nang na mar me gcig/ mig pa'i ye zhes byas gyi dbang du song bar blang ba/ ma shi bar 'dug pas/ yul ma dngas dang ldan rig pa'i yo zhes pa tshig
201a2(rnying rgyud): ni zhugs nas 'khrul 'go ba zung / de yang bag chags kyi phung po ye shes kyi snang ba lnga rig pa dang bcas pa yod pa de yang yul gyi dbang du 'gro 'dod de/ de la shes rab rang byung gi smon mas lung bstan pa nyams su blang ba'i don du gsungs pa'o// pa zhes bya ba na/ ston pa me long can sngon ma la ye shes lnga'i lus ma 'gags par yod pas snar da gzhan la rag ma lus te rang
201a3(rnying rgyud): rang garabs ye shes kyi gnas pal secas su 'od wa phul go lnga la ldang / lams mig la dang / ngo bo la nyid la sngang nags sgron mal snang ye zhes la 'ba' mi byed yul la ldang bar dang / zhes bya bas mthong ste/ de la 'di skad ces byas so// kye ma sems can mdangs seshes kyi gnas phyogs ni 'i gdod pa nas dang skan du
201a4(rnying rgyud): gzhan byung gi chos med/ stor pa'i yul med/ ye shes kyi gnas med/ dag pa'i yul med/ stong pa'i lam wa sbyar ba ma dgags so// dang ldan pa khyod nyon cing // ngas khyod la lung bstan no// khyod ma yengs par nyon cig/ ri bo chen po ma la ya zhes bya pa'i rtse mo na/ rang gi sa la bu stod 'a nyid gan na
201a5(rnying rgyud): rtswa ga le klang pa na ye shes/ mig la sron ma gnas par/ mgo bo'i nang shas mig tu lam zur ster yang khron ma rnam pa gnyis nam mkha' la ye shes kyi 'od du gas la lo de yang rig pa'i zer du lgang ba zang bzhin ye shes kyi dbang du 'char ro// chu mtsho mu khyur can zhes bya ba na/ de'i nang na yang 'od srung zhes bya pa dang / rig pa'i bu 'od du gnas te 'od de la yang drag
201a6(rnying rgyud): pamed cing bri ba med pa ye shes kyi dang 'od dang bcas te lam la dos dazung gi mtha' dang bral ba'o// yum de yang yum chos nyid kun du babang mo rang la shar cing 'jos pa'o// thabs kyi cha 'dzin pas 'od du dang / shes rab kyis 'dzin pas ye shes su dang / de yang chos kyi du bde ba chen po'i yul shar pa'o// rdo rje phag mo gnyis pa shos pa las/ mir sring gnyis
201a7(rnying rgyud): byung ste/ tha da ba 'anas/ denas pa ma sa she nas dang sanal 'ar/ gnyis kyis ming srid rje ta/ gnyis la 'di skad ces par // gyis da sa dag yadas 'das lag/ dang sa sa ga pa / mas pa 'a me
201b1(rnying rgyud): ra labya ba de yar byal da yang nas sung byeng pa dang ra ta kun kya ba sha mabyed pa / khyod song la bdud nag ma gag po'i yul nas me long la shog cig/ bu mo than pa rta so na rgya pa 'thung 'i/ khyod song la sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i yul rnam par byal dzin pa las zin
201b2(rnying rgyud): ma mi no// de nams pam than pa zhes kyi na yo macang / ba'i khang bzang nas me tog/ rang gi dosas cang/ pus la shog cig byas pas/ bu na reng mi 'gro sgon pasas ci bang du'i so 'o// zer ro// de ma rig ga su jug sa/ nas pham gnyis na re/ bu khyod mi 'gro ba ci ste byas pas/ bu
201b3(rnying rgyud): na re bdud nyon pongs pazhid tha gas pas/ kyi yul na bdun mjigs / ha li ka nag po zhes bya ba gcig yod pas/ bdag btson du rig di 'ang ga ba/ bzung nas 'gro zer bas/ yang pha ma gnyis stan ci skyes dzin yongs pa/ na re 'di skad zer ro// bu de skad ma zer bar
201b4(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi yul na/ a gyi lim nyon mongs pa sa las rig pa/ tog can zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de khyod kyi ming ga nyan ci/ kyis pa sa dge ba/ a gyi yin gyis de la me slong la shog byas pas/ bu na re 'di skad zer ro// kye yab yum bdag tshig pa'i nang pa gaH/ gis yul de ma lags te/
201b5(rnying rgyud): yul der bdag mchi yis/ la rig pa dang rig par 'dres/ bdag la g.yog po mi yi nas la/ lnga thong zhig/ til mar gyis ngan rgol byer shes nga gyi rje ze rdzo nga 'i gas pa/ blud pa'i ral gri gcig skur cig/ me lor 'od 'di rnas/ lnga lur cig byas pas/ pha ma gnyis dga'
201b6(rnying rgyud): ga ces pa dganyis dus mtshungs pas/ nas de ka ltar bya'o zer nas/ mi lnga g.yog/ ye shes rba/ tu brdzangs/ 'o me long lnga bskur ro// yang bu na dbyings rig pa'i sngon ma/ re 'di skad zer ro// kye ma yab yum dang // bdag ni bdud kyi yul 'bor ba nas/ nas ma thon na/ ci lta ba gyi zhes
201b7(rnying rgyud): dris pas/ pham gnyis nare/ yul rin po che'i me/ phung po zhes bya ba na/ gdol pa can gyi ming zhi shes padi/ yad kyis/ de tshod mag tu smon la/ mig / gis dmag dus shig/ mi gcig da ga la/ gis lcags khol ci/
202a1(rnying rgyud): gta blo cud can cigs pa/ kyis sgo chog cig/ de skad ces pha ma gnyis rkan gyis kyis lung bstan nas/ bu na re de lur bkyi'o phreng nas rig pa kho bar song ba rig pa'i byabs tha / song ba las/ de nas bdud bu nam ma ba/ ha li ka nag yos mnong
202a2(rnying rgyud): te/ 'o mi 'jom ga pa/ sha po byung bas/ 'khor to mags naH/ rnams kyis 'dir btang bar cung zhig byas pas/ bdud kyi mi ldam chags / bzung ngo // a phyi ling tog can ma rigs/ gyis/ sgo lpags bcug nas/ 'khor rnams la sngon 'dis nga'i bu bas
202a3(rnying rgyud): khrag gi lus par ro/ ba yin pas 'di 'khor las/ ma btang zhig byas pas/ 'khor rnams na re/ de ka ltar bgyi 'o zar nas/ 'gro ba'i dbang ma byung ngo // de nas yang bu des 'di skad ces byas so// kye a mA rigag/ phyir dag gi rig pa/ pha ma thabs te/ gnyis kyi zhal
202a4(rnying rgyud): nas/ khyod kyi aHma rig pa/ phyi ling tog rkobakri ba can/ can bya ba de bdud kyi yul na 'khor ba'i su lan pong/ yod kyis/ de nas me long la shog zer ba lags kyis/ bdag ma bzung bar thor byas pas/ rgan mos na re khyod mi btang ba yin/ nga'i za 'khor b.ras pa zhes su ga pa tshor/ khyod
202a5(rnying rgyud): kyis bsad pa yin pas mi btang ngo zer ro// de nas bu des 'di skad ces byas so// bdag mi btang na shes rab kyis/ dmag 'dren byas pas/ mo na re/ khyod dang dmag drongs zer nas ma byar ro// lus yod pas// de nas khos mgron mdo rje 'bab pa mngon pa gsum/ po mi gsum la than
202a6(rnying rgyud): btang ba/ kye grogs po dag/ yul rin chen srungs pa zhes te/ bya ba na/ la ni ma gdol pa'i rigs kyi mi gzhi thonas pa ni/ yod kyis/ der khyod kyi khye'u rig/ rigasapa/ byed btson du bzung bas/ dmag/ shes ba rtsed / dpung mang po chesang ga to la/ la
202a7(rnying rgyud): shog cig byas pas kho na re tha na chung ba sa brtan no// bgyi'o zer nas song ngo // de nas zhag gsum togs pa ska / sa gsus pa/ gyi nang par nyi ma shar tsam na/ dmag mar shes rabacu dpa gyes/ po byung nas sgo bcag/ lun por nas shes pang rba/ nas/ btson gyi lugs sus pa/
202b1(rnying rgyud): bcag/ san mo yul ba sa/ nas bton/ mA~M ma thag pa pa/ ha dang phral/ a gyi'i bubartson ga gas / dra bzung / 'khor rnams na sadasas/ ral gris mgo bcad du bsad du// de nas dang na ga / yul du 'os/ de nas
202b2(rnying rgyud): rang gi yul du phyin pas/ sring mos sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i yul nas/ yos nyam tha/ rnam par rgyal pa'i lang bzang nas d+he/ / tog mang po khyer nas byung ba dang 'phrad do// de nas pha ma gnyis kyis ngo zhes pa dzaT/ nas rab tu dga' nas/ ming
202b3(rnying rgyud): sring ti/ gnyis la ming btags pa/ ming po rdo rje lu kyim ge dzin pa/ gu chud 'dren pa zhes bya ba ban bla so// sring mo'i ming ni mu khAr rig po to ma dzin pa/ 'dzin zhes bya bar btags so// de nas ming 'thas rna gas/ sring gnyis gros byas pa/ ston pa
202b4(rnying rgyud): me ma yong sa/ can bya ba de mthong nas/ de gnyis la la 'ang na/ bsnyen pa/ kye rigs kyi bu nyin cig/ yul ma bkod par du ba da/ pan/ rin chen shAl rnaM / kyi mchod rten/ khri 'phang la sa/ pa gcig la/ logs rol ma
202b5(rnying rgyud): mdun ma byed pas shes kyi mchod rten mang/ de'i 'khor lo la/ dngul dag phyi pa/ gyi me long bzhi btags nas yod pa/ de la ri bo ma la ya'i rtsom m-ig+sa/ nas byar gyis la/ lu khAr dam sa/ kyi rabar chug ceg// de la
202b6(rnying rgyud): rin po che / skas tshugs la/ lag sa pos/ rin po che'i snod pa byud kyis bka ba cig thogs la 'dzegs shig/ don seMmamod rten kyi rtse nas/ / ston pa 'od mi chung shi pa/ 'gyur ba zhis thub cig yod kyis/ de la 'od zeng kyi nya
202b7(rnying rgyud): thag cig zhabs sha gan/ g.yas pa nas 'ong gis de la khyod ma 'jigs par rde ga gis/ la 'dus la song zhig/ de ni myod rang gi spang ba'i ya gas/ yin gyis der rna gcig/ de 'das pa'i gong na rin po che shel gyi / khang pa gcig la so
203a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad yod kyis/ de na khyod kyi ma sna tshogs su snang ba bya ba yod kyis/ de nas khyod kyis mdo shes par 'gyur ro// de'i gong na gdag pa glang gi snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i khang pa yod kyis/ de khyod kyi gnas yin pas deras
203a2(rnying rgyud): mi rjog/ zung zhig/ de skad ces ston pas lung bstan pas/ khye'u lu gu rgyud 'dren pas dbyings rig pa'i sgon ma/ 'di skad ces bya'o// kye ston pa chen po de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o// zer nas sring mo sngon mas yul snyed pa/ la 'di skad ces zer ro// ston pas lung bstan phyir ma
203a3(rnying rgyud): rdzosdogapa/ pa bzhin du bya'o// zer nas/ nyi ma'i zer la rta ru thugs / 'i cir zag pa/ zhon nas/ 'ja' tshon grod kyis/ gyi skra bsnyad nas/ mu tig gi phreng bas glo shog pa lam bu cher/ bsdams nas lag tu shel gyi shes rab kyi/ mdung thung thogs nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil du nam snang ga nam mkha'/
203a4(rnying rgyud): lam phyung nas/ rin po ka dang bin dpa zin/ che'i khang pa'i nang na thog rdug med par song zer te la cha/ de nas dkar mo'i tshogs rnams kyis ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad ces brjod do// a hUM thugs rjes nyi shar stor khams khyab mdzad pa// 'od zer stong ldan pa rig mun
203a5(rnying rgyud): khang 'joms// chos nyid mi 'gyur u mdog mthing gar ldan// thugs rje drug ldan phyag drug mtshon cha bskur// dri med ye shes mche ba dkar po gtsigs// ru lu'i sra ldan gdug pa thabs kyis 'dul// thugs rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad pa'i// ye
203a6(rnying rgyud): shes spyan ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// thugs rje'i stobs ldan rdo rje ye shes su// 'gro ba 'dam nas 'dren mdzad thugs rje'i zhags pa can// ngo bo mi 'gyur rdo rje'i don dang ldan// ye shes rnam dag su la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam rtog sgrib med ye shes
203a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i sku// ye shes tshog rdzogs rnam dgas la gnas// rdo rje'i lus nyid rnam dag spyan ldan pa'i// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer thugs rje can// rang rig rdo rje'i yul phyag 'tshal bstod// 'od zer phreng bas 'gro ba'i snang ba ston// shel sgong lta bu skyon med
203b1(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ skyon med yi shes chos sna'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// ngo bo mi 'gyur thugs rje'i lur shar bas// thugs rjes pha rol sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma 'gags sa so'i mtshan 'dzin ye shes don// mtshan dang dpe bung ldan zhing rnam dag sba// 'gag med longs
203b2(rnying rgyud): spyod rdzogs la phyag 'tshal brjod// ya shes l+h+wa mtshag 'bas kyis su do// bsam pa pa ngas kyis nyid ming dang bral/ nAm dag ye shes sbrul phrag 'tshal bskod// zhi ba'i skul khro ba'i nathad can// 'phro ga zis gyis gnon mdzang slobs pa che// dza N+ya mdzis/
203b3(rnying rgyud): can la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod nas/ rang la rang ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad ces brjod do// e ma ho don chen po rnyed do// e ma ho klong gcig tu 'dus so// e ma ho mtha' slong du 'dus so// e ma rtogs pa skad cig mal
203b4(rnying rgyud): grub po/ a la la ho// sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyid do// rang las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i don thugs su chud do// zhes brjod cing glu dang rol mo sna tshogs pa dang / sba sna tshogs kyis mchod pa cher byas so// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/
203b5(rnying rgyud): yongs su bskyod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / d+harmA na mtha3\u0f7fde nas yang mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol no// kye bcom ldani thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bdag cag rnams la thabs dam pa bsan du gsol/
203b6(rnying rgyud): zhes lus so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye 'byung ba'i bdag mo rnams nyon cig/ ras don ma nor bar khyed la bstan gyis legs par nyon/ ngas ni sangs rgyas ma mthong ngo // de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa
203b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i phyir/ thabs zhes bya ba med de// de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje'i gtsug phud ces bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa srab chud gyi brda' chen gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa
204a1(rnying rgyud): rang gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin las bkangs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od gyis khong zhig/ ma rig pa'i ldan pa
204a2(rnying rgyud): choms shig/ ye shes kyi snang ba ston cig/ ces zhus so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ 'od zer gyi phung pos 'jig rten gyi khams stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad khengs so// de nas ston pa thugs rje chen po des/ mkha'
204a3(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor rnams nyon cig/ sngon yul rnam par dag pa rig pa'i zhing khams zhes bya ba na/ mkhar sgo brgyad dang kun thub/ ldan pa'i mkhar zhig yod do// mkhar de'i rtser khye'u rig pa/ snang ba'i
204a4(rnying rgyud): rig byed bya ba yod/ de la ma rgan de rig pa dang dus mnyam/ mo lir tog can zhes bya ba yod/ yul de'i mda' na 'khor ba/ sdig sgod nyon mongs pa/ pa'i rgyal po grags pa dbang phyug bya ba de la bu rgyal bu lnga chags grang pa/ yod pas/ sras po lngas phul sgo la yan/ sU rtsed la songs pa/
204a5(rnying rgyud): rgyan mo ling ma'i ga ba dang dus ma sa/ tog can mdon mar skyo ba sangs sgotra pa/ la byung bas/ sras rgyal bu lngas btson du bzung yul dang zang/ zer ba de yang ya cha ang byas pas mkha' 'gro rnams ngo mtshar mchog tu skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i
204a6(rnying rgyud): pa nas ni bdag cag rnams kyi rtog pa sel bar gyur to// e ma ngo mtshar shin tu che'o// ston pas lung bstan du gsol/ e ma ho// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal ba/ de nas bum rig pa/ bsnyegs ma la song ba yang bzung nas lcags su bcugra 'kho zung / zer ba de
204a7(rnying rgyud): ya tsha/ de nas mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ye shes kyi mdangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho ston pa chen po/ sems can gyi rtog pa gang gis sel bar 'bur/ zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ sngon yul rin // po che spungs pa
204b1(rnying rgyud): zhes za bar/ rgan bzhig mo gcig la nas/ nor bu rin po che gcig yong pa/ kun ma mi lus thabs nga khyer nas/ rgan mo sdug bsngal gyis zin zer ba de rnam pa'i nga chags ya / de nas mkhang 'gro mardo rje gyis can zhes bya bas 'di ces gsol te/
204b2(rnying rgyud): kye ston pa chen pos thabs bstan du gsol// zhes lus so// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ rgan mo de'i rjes shes bge bcad pas/ yul tsher ma ras / can du song nas/ chun ma mi chag sa wa bkug pas/ rgan mo bahral dngos so// zeng ba
204b3(rnying rgyud): de la cha/ de nas yang 'joms byed dmag gi rgyal mos 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams la 'khrul ma tshang ga pa'i bzlog tshul bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ de nas rkun mo yul chor ma can bal nas rjes tshoms/
204b4(rnying rgyud): rgan mo brgyal bu mi / sangs thar ba de ya cha/ de nas yang rdo rje mkha' 'gom rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa chen po grol lugs gsung du gsol/ zhes lus so// de nas yang bka' phul ba/ de nas yang rgan mo 'i'i bu me ska dkar shin nyi/
204b5(rnying rgyud): zhes nyu ga des 'di skad ces zer ro// ha'i tshig sa/ nor bum brlag gam byas pas/ mi sa na cho sa po na re/ nor bu ma brlag gis/ ljod rang gis a ma rgan ma / mo sa cig/ ma rgan mo ma bas dpas pa ya byed/ nor bu mi ste dza yi mo/ zeng bas/
204b6(rnying rgyud): pa/ kho rang gi ma rba oM/ bsad nas la nga ston mong pang/ sha zos khrag 'thung rus pa mur/ dngos po med par byas nas/ nor bu rkun mos byin bzhi da 'dus so la/ pa de ya cha/ de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'i tshogs kyis ston pa la pastod pa/ a trahU~M bcom ldan gnas
204b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ye shes sra// brjod med pasamathal rdo rje chos kyi sku// gru ba rdzogs pas 'brang med pa la gnangs // ye shes mchog ldan tog ma chos kyi lu// 'dzin med rtsos kyi sbrul phyag tsha la bskod// ma 'gags rdo rje'i don nyid 'dzin pa ste// mu chud 'od kyi dkyil 'a
205a1(rnying rgyud): pho brang nas// sra lnga rtog med sa sa'i mtshan 'angan pa// me gyur don ldan rigs la ye shas sgra// chom bu rtsa ldan gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor ston// yab lnga yum lnga mdun chub med pa yi// ye shes thugs rje'i spyan ldan pong ltar rdzogs pa
205a2(rnying rgyud): su// stong gsal longs spyod stsal phyag 'tshal bstod// brags rje'i stobs kyis 'gro ba pha rol slob// spra mchog khro bo'i chu lugs gdazungs spogs// dbug sum por tshugs gcig tu bcings pas 'khor rnams phrag// phyag drug phyag mtshan pa dang bcwa
205a3(rnying rgyud): pas bgegs rnams 'dul// sbal chas brgyad gsol zhing ma mo dbang du spyad// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dam nas 'dren mdzad bcom ldan sman gyi bla// pha rol stobs kyis sgrol pa'i khro rgyal hU~M s+pha can// ma rig 'joms pa'i sngags rje 'od po che// sna tshogs sprul
205a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra gsumangon ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi mes// thugs rje'i stobs bdag gzhon nu nyid kyi sku// sku gsum ye shes rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas/ rang rang gi don rnyed nas ngo mtshar skyes so// a la la to/
205a5(rnying rgyud): don chen po rnyed do// gsang sngags thams cad rang gi thugs su chud de// sangs rgyas kyi sku sems can la byung ngo // e ma ho// tha dad gcig tu 'dus so// klong gcig tu 'dril lo// a ho klong thams cad sgron ma la 'dus so// sgron ma thams cad 'od la 'dus
205a6(rnying rgyud): so// skye ma ho 'od thams cad su la 'dus so// su thams cad rig pa la 'dus so// aHhUM rig pa thams cad mi gnas pa'i klong du bim mo// de bzhin du rang shi ma / rang rang gis rtogs nas/ the tshom gyi rtog pa byasal lo// zhes rig pa rang
205a7(rnying rgyud): shar chen po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin gyi ba de'i le'u ge zhe gcig pa'o// / bAn+dan+da thA TaHde nas yang mkha' 'gro ma dmar mo'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa chen po bdag cag rnams la thabs dam
205b1(rnying rgyud): bkan du gas pa/ gsung dugs la/ lung bstan dugs pa/ zhes thus sa// de nas ston pa chen pos bka' stsal pa/ nan cig kyang rnams langs bstan gyis gus par nyon ci// thon gan stsu / yul mag tu nga nga yin pa zhes ban
205b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal ras/ po mdzes ldan nyid pa zhes byab la/ wA kha yo / yid du 'ong bzhig yod pa las 'bangs nan mangs rnams kyis kheng log byas te/ 'khang la me phyogs bcu nas shi gas/ btang bas la khang ma tshig zer ba de maH/ ga ba / de nas
205b3(rnying rgyud): dmar mo khrag 'jib mas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa chen po khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams thabs gang gis 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ zhes lus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ yul na ma ma ga / 'dus pa rnam par bkod pa zhes bya
205b4(rnying rgyud): ban/ rgya nag gi rgyal po mi tha ga / kar ta zhes bya bas/ gab chu su nga na ma sa/ tshe chen po gcig bting nas/ gshin gyis mam ya pa pa'i sa 'dan/ byas pas gto chog tu btsun mo nyi bu rtsa gcig ngo bo she she sa/ mdzes pa'i chas su bcug nas/
205b5(rnying rgyud): lam kha dang / po che'i bzhi mdor bskyal bas shi kha bcad pa de la cha/ sa/ de nas yang dmar mo dbang gi skus 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa chen po zabs bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ de nas rgya nag gi/ rgyal po'i shaka
205b6(rnying rgyud): gar ta 'phrul gyi rgyal po das/ btsun mo nyi shu ma tha ga ga 9/ rtsa gci pA la mdzes ra // nga'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ mgyogs pa'i shes pa/ rta ba skyon/ gsal ba'i mig tho sa gyes/ brdeg pa'i mtshon zla sa/ bskur nas/ gcod camag/ pa'i so btags/ go
205b7(rnying rgyud): sa shes bzhin/ 'dug sas pa'i yul ba / gnam sa las pa'i kyis btsang/ 'grob zhems lam btsal nas/ btang bas gaslo cad thams pag zer ba de laH/ de nas yang 'jig rten dung byed mas 'di skad ces gsapa to// the skon pa chen po
206a1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kyi bstan pa 'jug pa'i dus ci tsam na lags/ zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ gra ma mkha' 'gro ma rnams rgan cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di 'jig pa'i rtags su/ 'jig tan ma khams sumA ga dang nan sna tshogs pa
206a2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin skar mda' gdong zhes bya ba dang / bdud he le khyab pa zhes bya ba gnyis 'thab pas 'khrug pa 'byung ba yin no// ma mo srid pa kun gyi mnga' bdag mo zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten phung byed ma gnyis la 'bru sna tshogs kyi bang ba gcig yod de/ de
206a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'thab pa'i rtags su mu ge 'byung ba yin/ nag mo sder 'dzing ma bya ba dang / srid pa bde 'gro ma bya ba gnyis 'thab pa'i rtags su nad mang po 'byung ba yin/ dus lnga brgya snyigs ma'i dus ni/ skyes pa thams cad srir shi ba'i dus 'byung ngo // btsun pa rnams kyis khrims
206a4(rnying rgyud): mi phub pa'i dus 'byung ngo // bud med rnams kyis slad mi thub pa'i dus 'byung ngo // pha dang bu brda' mi 'phrod pa'i dus 'byung ngo // gzhon pa rnams rtsod pa la dga' ba'i dus 'byung ngo // mkha' 'gro ma mi yul du 'byung ba'i dus 'gyur/ kha tshig phra mo la brten nas/ spyod pabapa
206a5(rnying rgyud): tshol du byed pa'i dus 'byung ngo // gsang sngags bon du gyur ba'i dus 'byung ngo // gsang sngags ston pa'i slob dpon mi bkur bar gnyen dang nye ba'i kha do blta ba'i dus 'byung ngo // sngags pas gsang mi thub pa'i dus 'byung ngo // skyes pas chos mi thub pa'i dus
206a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ngo // mi rnams kyis gos nag po gon pa'i dus 'ong ngo // grub pa po rnams grong yul du 'bab pa'i dus 'byung ngo // gsang sngags kyi zab chos la mi spyod par log pa'i chos la spyod pa'i dus 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyams su mi len par/ gru
206a7(rnying rgyud): shar dang rol mo dang rtsed mo la dga' ba'i dus 'byung ngo // grub pa po rang gcig pur mi 'dug par/ mi mang po tshogs nas kha tshig la spyod pa'i dus 'byung ngo // srin po gsod byed nag po bya ba dang / srin mo nag mo rag sham bya ba gnyis sngags pa kun gyi ming du zhugs
206b1(rnying rgyud): nas/ dgon pa mi 'dzin par grang yul du 'bab cang gca ba pyad cing phud pa'i las drag pa skyed pa 'byung ngo // tshangs pa dung gzer tshugs can dang / yum phud byed ma nag mo gnyis kyis bu dge bstan dkar po rgya ba gcag btsun pa kun gyi snying du grags nas/ rang rga
206b2(rnying rgyud): khar me myong bar sde pa 'dzin pa'i dus 'byung ngo // de la sogs pa'i tagrA mi sdug pa dang / mi legs pa babyung ste/ de'i dus tsam na bstan pa nub pa'i rtags yin no// gsang sngags gsang ba 'dis la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gis spang nas dar zhing rgyas
206b3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ngo // de nas po lnga brtan mun pa'i bskal ba po drug cu 'thu ga// de nas sangs kyis rnam pa bkod pa rin po che'i byam zhes bya ba 'jig rten nu 'byung ngo // des mtshan nyid kyi chos lo bcathas pa gnas par byed do// de nas yang mun pa'i bskus pa yo
206b4(rnying rgyud): bzung ngo // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs chen po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // me dang 'khor rnams kyang 'ad 'dom dang bcas nas 'ong ngo // rdzogs pa chen po lo drug tu gnas par byed do// zhi khams de na sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i ga
206b5(rnying rgyud): sum du 'grang // de nas mur pa'i bskal pa lo snga btu 'thung ngo // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phu darin po mtha pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de nas yang dam pa'i chos 'dul ba lo ba cu tham pa gnus par byed do// de nas kyang rang sangs rgyas lnga bcu 'a
206b6(rnying rgyud): de nas bskul ba chen po bzhi 'byung ngo // de yang dang po su ge'i bskal pa 'byung ngo // de nas mtshon gyi bskal ba 'byung ro// de nas nad kyi bskal ba 'byung ngo // de nas me bdun gyi bskal pa 'gyur ngo ro// de nas 'thung ba cu'i bskal pa'aglang ngo // denas
206b7(rnying rgyud): nam rlung gis 'jig par 'gyur ro// de nas sos bca' bar du blangs pa gnas so// den pa ming stongs pa dang / chags pa dang / 'jig pagasu ma dul ma ma ste/ yad dpag bsam kyi shing rgyas pa chen po zhes tha bcags so// 'dab ma'i steng du
207a1(rnying rgyud): blang ba yod du 'dugag ci yod / dgra mas ca dmakhyen pa'i ldanachags pas/ 'dag rten khams mam daces bya brtags sa// da nas ston pa thams pa nu nas bya ba ba gtan gyi khams dang 'byung // de yang dam dang /
207a2(rnying rgyud): chos dang zhing rgyas par byed do// skye dgu'i tshe lo yang drug khri thub bo// de bzhin du rim par chags shing rim pas stongs pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma rnams skad cig tu yid 'khrugs nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas yang
207a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ba rnams brgya' sangs nas 'di skad ces gsapa ti// khyim gyi cud shes pa ba rlag par sbyar to// khyi ma dung bsgral pa las thar pa'i thabs med do// kye bud de las zung ba thabs bstan drug stsol// zhes brjod cing gdong nas mchi ma 'don ning
207a4(rnying rgyud): po dod chen po 'bod cing bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byed cing de skad brjod pas/ ston pas bka' stsal ba/ kye nyon cig/ de rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gro ba'i rig pa ni/ cung chen po 'di yis grol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal pas/ mkha' 'grom
207a5(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// aHhUM bdag cag sdug bsngal chen pos gzing ba la// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che// bdag cag 'dod pa'i chad pas gdung ba la// thugs rje'i rgyun gyi chu rgyan 'bas pa sgra drin che// bdag cag 'khor ba'i
207a6(rnying rgyud): gcong rong dog mor ltung ba las// thugs rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad pa// thabs ldan ye shes spru la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag cag ma rig mun pa'i 'dam dung khyams pa la// rnam dag sgron ma 'dogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bskal pa dpag
207a7(rnying rgyud): tu med par lam ster ba'i// sa mkhan rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dang po'i nor bu ma rnyed rtag tu stor// gzhal yas nyon mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i chu bo bskal par ma gyur pa'i// pha rol sgrol mdzad gra la phyag 'tshal bstod//
207b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar skul zhing 'gro don byed// ye shes mnyam nyid su la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas nas// thugs rje'i 'dren mdzad de la phyag 'tshal bstod// sku mchog 'bar ba'i ye shes rnam par dag/ sangs chas thugs
207b2(rnying rgyud): rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod nas/ dga' ba'i sems skyes so// de nas yang 'di skad ces brjod do// a ho klong gcig tu 'khyil lo// snang ba rnam par dag go// e ma ho// rang gis rig pa mthong ngo // de nyid
207b3(rnying rgyud): stobs su gyur to// rjes brjod nas mi snang ga'i ngang du gshegs so// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/ dus bstan pa'i le'u ge zhi gnyis pa'o// / bAm+ba grI ba rma rma b+h+yaHde nas yang mkha' 'grom ldang mo'i tshogs rnams kyis
207b4(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// ston pa chen po khyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa tshad bzung bar nus sam/ zhes zhus pas/ ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye 'byung ba'i bdag mo rnams nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la tshad med do// thu na med do//
207b5(rnying rgyud): mtshams med do// zhes bka' stsal pas/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ston pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa tshad med pa'i lung bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ kye 'gyur
207b6(rnying rgyud): papa'i bdag mo rnams nyon cig/ ngas chos thams cad sgra dang brda' la bskus te bstan gyis legs par nyon cig/ a/ kyi bzed pa/ g+ha ta/ bgags pa med pa/ saM/ dgag/ b+hud ta ya/ mi grar bas sargyas kyi wa/ a d+hu/ bram rtse ba med pa 'char ba'i thugs re/ dpag bsam gyi shing la
207b7(rnying rgyud): skyes pa brgyad khris sta re rnon po thogs nas bcad pas/ sus kyang mi chod pa bstan pa'i man ngag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// gcig dang du ma'i phyogs dag dang // tha snyad brtsams pa'i chos dang bral// tog med 'dzin pa med pa'i chos// gzung ba'i
208a1(rnying rgyud): yul med 'dzin pa'i sems las grol// sangs rgyas dgongs pa rgyas pa chen po'o// shes pa gcig tu bsdus pa ga la yod// spos med bslus mdo ngang la rig pa byar ma gsal// rang byung rang grol dang du dbyer med mnyam// sna
208a2(rnying rgyud): 'gags med pa'i me lang 'od po che// kun gyi snying po yin par sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs/ hwA tra/ kok+Sha ya ra hAH/ lA ma/ bu dang chen pa/ pra sa na/ thang ba/ du pa yA/ pa bdi pa/ a/ smon pa'i sems gas tu ma zhes rang rung ba/ brag phug stong pa gcig gi na
208a3(rnying rgyud): na mar me gcig la mi gnyis rtsod pa'i man ngag bstan pa/ 'dzin pa med pa'i rang gsal ni// bcos pa med pa'i ngang du zhog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// rang nyid tset+ta'i dkyil du zhog/ rtog pa med pa'i rang skang ni// nam mkha' stong pa'i dkyil du zhog/ rang rig
208a4(rnying rgyud): bcos pa med pa ni// sgron ma rnam gnyis yul la zhog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mes po ni// rang byung shes rig yul la zhog/ gsang sngags kun gyi lta shugs ni// sgron ma'i yul la ma yengs ltas/ hUM/ ye shes dbyings phu dpa/ a/ phye ba med pa'i ye shes/ pran/ chos can gyi spang pa//
208a5(rnying rgyud): titetimi 'gyur ba rdo ji'i grwa/ sarba/ chos thams cad las 'das pa'i ye zhes/ a/ stong pa phye ba med par rtogs pa/ g+ha/ ye shes byar rnang ba brtan pa/ d+hu/ dus med par snang ba/ khe rga/ dag pa'i don du/ a shi/ lce med du 'angam/ ha/ dag pa'i ye zhes dri ma med pa/ rin po che'i mig gnyis nam mkha' stong pa'i dkyil du/ ga yu'i khu gyug la zhon nas
208a6(rnying rgyud): yul drug 'joms pa'i man ngag bstan pa// e ma ho sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// btsal ba med par dang las rnyed// pho brang rnam dag dkyil 'khor ni// 'gyur ba med par rang la btab// rtog pa med pa'i chos nyid ni// 'gyur ba med par rang sar grol// rnam dag 'o/
208a7(rnying rgyud): gsal chen po'i dbyings// phyin pa med par yul dang 'phrad// byas pa med par dkyil 'khor ni// 'dzin pa med par rang lus rnyed// yang dag yul med spyod pa ni// bcos pa med pa'i klong du grol// rgyun chad med pa'i dgongs pa ni// rang byung sgron ma'i dang du
208b1(rnying rgyud): shes/ sangs rgyas ye shes dngos med la// 'dzin pa'i bsam pa spang ba'o// ma dag ye shes 'bar ba las// nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'o// tAg/ shes nga ga yan/ sA/ gyo lang 'das / ri/ dgapa nga 'a na/ ad/ b+ha stong babya ra rjedapa/
208b2(rnying rgyud): maHmnyam pa'i don/ b+ha/ ye shes phul du dang / g+ha 'thung ba lnga/ lA/ banya ba don/ e d+hu/ masbom du med pa'i rishes/ a/ yen gnas pa'i don no// chu bo chen po hub kyis 'debs pa'i man ngag/ rgyun chad med pa'i dgongs pa ni// nam mkha'i ngang du shes par bya// stong pa chen po'i ye shes
208b3(rnying rgyud): rtog med dang du shes par bya// bsam dang bral ba'i rig pa ni// tsit+ta'i dkyiladu shes par bya// rang byung rig pa'i dngos po ni// lu gu rgyud du shes par bya// rang grol chen po'i lta stangs ni// seng ge lta bur shes par bya// rang grol rang sangs chen po ni// bsam
208b4(rnying rgyud): 'am pa medapa // brjod pa'i tshig dang bral ba/ ti'i nang dugs par bya// padi thong dgran sa #
208b5(rnying rgyud): yo shes dus dang mthar med par ldang ba'o/ d+hA/ rnam pa'i den dbyings 'thes/ ma/ gdi' 'gyung ba med/ sang / 'bal 'thar thag med/ ka u seM ni khanas pa'i don/ ri/ rnaM tha'i cho sa/ ya/ yang dgapa'i 'am/ snga ro'i dra/ hA/ dag pa'i gas/ ga song drug/ a/ me dpa das/ thung / sa ga sa ca na dang/
208b6(rnying rgyud): d+ha a/ e thog ma nas skye ba med/ rin po che shel gyi mchod rten la gser gyi skus btsugs nas 'jigs pa'i man ngag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi lam chen ni// pad do rnam pa gsum du gsungs// de yang rig pa'i ye shes sku// ma bskyed pa yi tshom bu lnga// rang las byung zhing rang
208b7(rnying rgyud): las 'gro// reg pa rnam dag ye shes ni// ma 'gags pa yi me long bzhin// skye dang 'bri ba med par snang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan du gsungs// rig pa sna tshogs ye shes ni// rang byung sgo brgyad dkyil 'khor ldan// rig pa 'gyur med gnas pa ni//
209a1(rnying rgyud): rang mal migs gcig sa/ sam nas sa na pa // sangs rgyam sems na ban// gcag rlung drugs sna \u0f7f// thams nga mags ngas/ sa pa spang bar// bgatug 'dan ngan
209a2(rnying rgyud): rang nyid yul la btag par bya/ de phyir rang lus rnyed pa'o// ma/ thos chen pogasang mang medapa/ ha/ 'o rtse nga kyang bang med/ lang / 'dzin pa la 'ad sogs med/ kaM/ bangs cid to pa'i migs pa/ sarba/ bad rton na tho med/ ya/ yang gabral gyis tong / tA/ ling gis stong /
209a3(rnying rgyud): ha ta/ rtag bstong pa'i lha ba/ ya/ yang dag pa'i ltab/ rgya mtsho chen po gcig gi nang du chu bo 'du ba'i man ngag/ ka dag rig pa'i klong dkyil du// phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams 'dus// skye med ye shes dkyil 'khor du// gsang sngags rgyal po rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje
209a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i ye shes ni// gsang sngags kun gyi rig pa dngos// yang dag sa la mi g.yo zhing // 'od gsal dang du gnyis med thim// gsang sngags rgyal po mi mnyam rdo rje'i lu// ye shes kun gyi gter du gsungs// yang dag lam dang brjod med dang du 'jug
209a5(rnying rgyud): lce med rdo rje'i sgra ni 'jigs pa kun dang bral// rnam dag ye shes chen po'i sku// brjod med tshig dang bral bas rig pa ye shes ste// rnam dag lam las rdo rje'i wa 'byung zhing // ye shes nam dag bdal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di// ma bkyed rdzogs pa'i tshul du 'grub
209a6(rnying rgyud): yongs la khyab// rdo rje'i sku nyid dang las yang dag 'byung // rig pa'i spu nyid nga yi ngang du yang dag thi ma// yang dag sku nyid rdo rje'i don du gsung // nga med pa las thams cad byung // nga med pa la thams cad rdzogs// nga yi ngang du thams cad 'du// sangs kyis kun gyi mes
209a7(rnying rgyud): po ni// nga yi rig par shes par bya// gsang sngags thams cad reg pa'i klong // lce med ngang du shes par bya// a/ bye me 'i shes/ I/ byim gyi nang/ a/ l+r-i kyi ba/ sas/ bas dang lam da la sa/ kA ya/ cho ma pa yod sa dang / ma hA/
209b1(rnying rgyud): dzin pa las dang / sa ts+tshe/ tha 'dra nga byang da drug na/ dar ya/ mas nga tung sa nga / ga tu/ tan mal pa dang / zhu ba ya/ man padapa rna bas med dadzo pa dpa ga sa / dru \u0f7f/ 'ang 'ad sangs pa nga gas/ a/ k+Sha sa dang nas/ nam mkha' gcig gi ngang du
209b2(rnying rgyud): dajang tshon lnga thim pa'i man ngag/ rang gi ye shes da nga / sdang ba ni// nam mkha' 188/ stong pa'i ngang du thim// rig pa rtog med chen po ni// yang dag brjod med ngang du dri ma/ heska nga/ 'dzin med rang ngag ngo bo ni// rtog med chen po'i ngang du thim// 'a
209b3(rnying rgyud): med rang sangs chen po ni// mkha' khyab stong pa'i ngang du thim// 'byung ba med pa'i chos nyid ni// 'ong ba med pa'i ngang du thim// chu med sangs rgyas dang nyung ni// rkyen med rnam dag dang du thim// phyogs dang ris su 'dzin pa yang // phyogs lung med pa'i ngang du tham/
209b4(rnying rgyud): rang gsal rnam dag chen po ni// ye shes 'gyur med dang du thim// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs pa ni// sgron ma nyid kyi ngang du thim// zag med dang la rab gnas pa// skad cig ye shes klong du 'dus// rdo rje'i lam la rab gnas pa// brjod med la mal de
209b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs// sku lnga'i lam la rab gnas pa// mi bskyod mkha' la de bzhin gshegs// dus med ye shes rang ldang ngo // zhes bka' stsal to// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/
209b6(rnying rgyud): don de lta bu gsung ba po mtshar che lags so// zhes brjod nas yang bstod pa/ bcom ldan mgon po rdo rje ye shes skye// rnam dag rdo rje'i su la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje snying po'i su// rdo rje 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal 'byor/
209b7(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags bdag pa rdo rje po zhes te// rtog med chos kyi sprul phyag 'tshal bstod// marig dbyings su spong mdzad thams cad mkhyen// thugs rjes dbyings su grol la phyag 'tshal ba sted// sangs rgyas sa dang lam la bzod mod ston// yang da
210a1(rnying rgyud): med don la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i don ldan 'du 'bral med par ston// mdzes pa'i 'od ldan byed la phyag 'tshal bstad// ya shas dag pa'i yul dri med rnam par dag/ stobs kyis pha rol rgol la phyag 'tsha la bsnyad/
210a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes dri med 'od wa'i dkyil 'kho na// lha lnga ma 'dres rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod do// de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs rnams kyi 'di skad ces brjod do// e ma ho// glong rnam par dag go// skye gnas thams cad rnam par dag /
210a3(rnying rgyud): AHhUM don gcig tu bsdus so// de shes pa nas kyi slong du thim mo// a la ya ho/ rig pa rig pa'i mkha' la bgyod do// don rang gis de nyid du 'dus so// a ho// rtags mngon du sdang ngo // rtogs so// shes so// go'o// zhes brjod de mi snang ba'i ngang du gnags
210a4(rnying rgyud): so// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/ brda' lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa rdzogs so// dpal sngags kyi srung mas dam tshig nyams pa'i snying thon cig/ rgya chu rgya// t+ya rbar+thak+Sh+NarmAHde nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces
210a5(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // brda' yi rnam pa de ltar na// don gyi ye shes gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma gsang ba dag rdo rje 'dzin// ma yengs tshul gyis gus par nyon// rang
210a6(rnying rgyud): snang chos nyid nam mkha' la// ma bgyod pa ni rtogs pa'i mchog/ dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i klong yangs nas// bsgom du med pa'i don byung ba// yang dag nges pa'i lung 'byung chen po 'di// gang las ma byung rig pa nyid las shar// bsgom du med pa'i don ni gang
210a7(rnying rgyud): yang ma spangs te// 'dzin chags med na tha med rnyed pa yin / namachod pa med na lha rnams 'grub pa yini// zlas su med na snying po rdzogs pa yin// bsgra tu med na dngos grub rnyed pa yin// bsam pa med na chos su chen po yin// 'byung ba lnga dang sangs rgyas lnga// dbyer med
210b1(rnying rgyud): gcon gong bar rtags// dag pags pa 'bring ma pa dang // mdog chags snang bganyis// dbyang mdagacigago ba rtogs// tha dang 'chab mad pa dag panas na/ gamadang dun ma cu tu tags// sangasas ban ngas da /
210b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas// skang srid kun la khyab pas kun gzhi slong yangs na// rig pa rang la khyab pas ye shes rol par snang// mtha' la thug pa med par ye shes rang la yod pa'o// de nas yang zhus pa/ k+She kye thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ bdag cag rnams la
210b3(rnying rgyud): thabs dam pa bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ kye nyon cig/ ngas bstan gyis sogs par zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa ye nas skye ba med pa'i ngang la gsal ba yin no// rgya rang byung
210b4(rnying rgyud): gsul yin ga pa zhes pa ba rjid byung med ga sa yin pastan/ 'thu sa m+b+ha sa nga gag yang rnab pas // su gnas dang migs pag smra/ ngas rgyas kyis 'ad
210b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin kun la shes par gyis shig/ ces rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/ don bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// / thA thAthAHAHde nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye thugs rdo chen po dang ldan pa/ gsang rdzogs
210b6(rnying rgyud): sgra don gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ ngas chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid bstan gyis legs par nyon cig/ de yang chos kyi sku'i sgra ni/ d+harmA ka yA/ chos bu'i rnar ba ma gags pa'o/ g+ha tsa ka yA/ sangs chu'i rigs
210b7(rnying rgyud): b+ha badzi ka yA/ phral tha~Mng ga rje/ bye ta ta/ stes nyid kyi ta/ dz+nyA na/ 9me dang na la'i/ badz+ra/ rdodzo \u0f7f/ ma nu/ 'ad ga / hi bye// me nyis/ a d+yaH/ m-i / thAng+ga mas mchi zhes/ ba~M d+hi mahA/ bya nga pa sa/ ta thag ta/ de shi gin nga shag tA tra/
211a1(rnying rgyud): mdag/ sa / sa / na / ba// ma
211a2(rnying rgyud): ma chab/ aH/ dzu pan me/ a ga man/ rnams ma / zog+sa gas sa/ zaza / thog gi / san/ ni sing nam sa/ na pa/ e pa lhagasanyas
211a3(rnying rgyud): tipa A/ ta sa mdo pa rnam/ a he/ go ba thal/ ku ta/ ma ba ga pa/ kha cig sin b+ha/ gas pa'i dab// 'ang sa pra sar/ bya pa \u0f7f/ rU pa ya/ las ta / san ti ti d+ya pa/ ngos la yongs pa/ g+ha ta brang/ rnam lal/ e kar/ brkyang 'dzad pa/ b+ha ga b+han/ ba nyi cing ma na dang /
211a4(rnying rgyud): pradz+nyA b+hi/ shes pa dag sa pa/ 'bru sdug ga/ du gas/ thA ya/ gang migs/ mad/ na cis / sa ma la/ pa / thab rab sam gyi/ nga ngo pa / ya ma / kha tam yang/ sa man ta/ dag bzhagapa/ AH/ na/ a~M ka so 'an
211a5(rnying rgyud): la ma/ brtse thas yangs/ dzub 'chad/ brgya'aphal la nan/ gapa / na mam// ta/ #/ gan/ de bzhin su mi rnam pa thun// ci ltar mthun
211a6(rnying rgyud): ngan mtshon pa'o// de ni grangs kyi go dka' bdag bstan pa'o// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las// grangs yig bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / kaNan praH! \u0f89\u0fa4 paHde nas yang mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs rnams kyis 'di skad ces
211a7(rnying rgyud): smras so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsgom du med do// skom byed ni ma 'gags pa'o// bsgom gyu ni mi dmigs pa'o// dgongs pa'i tshad ni nam mkha' la gzung ngo // zhes brjod do// de nas 'dod chags kyi gtso mo aka tsata mas 'di
211b1(rnying rgyud): gang mas brjodzod// rkang cig nga las chos rnams thams cad byung // a ma hi rin chen byang chub sa pas// kun ma yang dkun gyis mthong ba med// rang thung badrad cu'i thogs pad// brdal thu byang byed med par ra lal gang// sangs kyis dag
211b2(rnying rgyud): skye ba med// gnas dang 'gro 'ong med pa'i rang byung chen po yin// 'dzin chags med pa'i rang grol chen po 'di// sems med kyi med dang du shes par bya/ dus med ldang ba'i rang byung chen po ni// nam mkha'i dngags ti nye'i cho 'phrul 'grub ba bzhin// med
211b3(rnying rgyud): las 'gag med cho 'phrul byung // de bzhin cho 'phrul chen po dka' ba med// gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid ni// rang byung gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor du// yang dag don chen 'byung bar 'gyur// skye med don tos ngang du grol// de phyir rdo rje'i blta par 'jod// ces
211b4(rnying rgyud): brjod nas mi sdang ba'i ngang du gshegs so// de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma 'dod chags kyi gtso mo khro gdong mas 'di skad ces brjod do// e ma ho/ rang byung bde ba'i klong nas dkyil 'khor rnam war shar/ shes rab bde chen klo nas spu lnga ma 'gags gsel// skye med
211b5(rnying rgyud): rnam dag klong nas ye shes 'od ljags la// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i klod nas rig pa'i lha la mdun rgyab med// ye shes rdzogs pa'i klong nas shes rab gtsug phud lngar snang zhing // skye dang 'gag/ med ngang du rtogs shing rab tu grol bar 'gyur// stong pa tshig med dang las
211b6(rnying rgyud): rnam dag brjod med ngang du rtogs shing thim// skye dang 'gag med gsang sdigs kun gyi bcud ni rang gi tshugs la 'chang // stong nyid ye shes klong nas lha yi cho 'phrul ma bskyed rdzogs// gnyis med klong nas kun gyi ngo bo 'gyur med chen por rtogs// gsang sngags
211b7(rnying rgyud): bzud dang sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i tshad// rnam dag smon ma phye med glong du yang dag sangs rgyas so// 'gyur med 'gag med tshe 'phrul cing yang sdang zhing spyod// 'dzin chags med pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems la nyon mongs ga la yod// rdo rje snying po'i yul rtsa
212a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig med cing yul la rnam par sdung // skye 'gag med cing thig le tag gcig rang byung dbyings la spyod/ sa dang lam la bgrod cing byung du rjed pa'i skul 'dzin pa'i bsam pa med// 'dzin pa med cing chags zhen med na sangs rgyas chos su 'dod// rdzas brjod
212a2(rnying rgyud): mi snang ba'i ngang du gshegs so// de nas yang 'dod chags kyi gtso mo me long gdong gis 'di skad smras so// e ma ho sku gcig kun la khyab pa'i sku// mthong zhing rtogs par dka' zhing brjod pa'i tshig dang bral// khyab brdal dung chub kun gyi snying po yin// rang
212a3(rnying rgyud): byung 'gag med dkyil 'khor chen po ni// dbang tsi d+ha'i dkyil gang dog 'bar// dkar 'dam stong pa'i rtsa dag dang // thig le 'gro ba'i rtsa nims dang // rnam par grol byed rtsa rnams dang // shal dkar chu ba'i rtsa dag nas// nam shes rlung la zhen nas ni//
212a4(rnying rgyud): gu ta yi sgo chen nas// lam byung stong pa'i ngang du thim// brim byed med par sa ler gsal// tshem bu lngar ldan ye shes gsal// bus med rang sar grol ba'o// skye med dbyings las ye shes byung // 'gag med ngang du gnyis med thim// rdzogs dang ma rdzog
212a5(rnying rgyud): tha snyad bral// 'gro dang 'od med gnas su dag/ skye dang 'chi med dbyings su rdzogs// gnas pa med par rang grol rtogs// ye shes 'dzin med chos dang bral// yang dgas la de bzhin gshegs// zhes brjod nas mi sdang ba'i ngang du gshegs so// de nas
212a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten phung byed 'dod chags kyi gtso mos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho lta dang ni sgom pa dang // de bzhin spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dang // de rnams gsang sngags don du 'dod// de yang bstan pa 'di lta ste// rang thung bcos pa med na spyod pa chen po
212a7(rnying rgyud): yin// gsal la 'dzin pa med na sgom pa chen po yin// rgya chad phyogs lhung med na lta ba chen po yin// de bzhin lta ba sgom pa yang // rang byung 'dzin med rnam dag ni// gcig dang du ma med par rtogs// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang sdang ni// rang grol
212b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin med dngang du rtogs// rang byung rtags kyi sangs rgyas ni// rang nyid sangs rgyas dngos yin pas// ye zhes dag pa'i chos dra la// rang nyid lha yi dkyil 'khong nyid// ya shes lam la dgag spab med// 'dzin pa'i rdul la bdag 'dzin med// sangs rgya
212b2(rnying rgyud): sa la bdag tog med// yang dag lam la zhe 'dod med// yang dag sul lha dang bral// nyid las mi gzhan 'khor nyid kyang // rang las byung zhing rang la thim// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzador ni// ye shes rang la rol par mdzad pa'i ste// rnam dpa
212b3(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i ye shes mkha' la gsal// rang byung 'dzin pa med pa'i chos// ye shes 'dzin pa dngos dang bral// lam shis nyid la ltos pa min// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du shes pa'o// zhes brjod nas mi sdang ba'i drang du gshegs so// de nas pa
212b4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags kyi gtso mo mabya'i mthen gyis 'di da ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// rang gi dang dA yang dag gnas// de yi gong nagazhan med ye shes dngos// rang blang sangs rgyas chen po yin// kye med de rje'i bdag nyid ni//
212b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por rtogs// rnam par dag pa'i sku mchog ni// pho brang 'gyur med dang du rtogs// skye 'jig med pa'i bde chen ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yi// 'du 'bral med pa'i ka dag ni// rang rang thugs kyi dkyil na rdzogs// rtogs
212b6(rnying rgyud): dang ma rtogs gnyis su med// 'dzin dang grol ba'i chos rnams med// dge dang sdig pa ga la yod// gsang ba yongs tshogs dkyil du 'dus// dper na bang mdzod rgyas pa bzhin// dgos 'dod de bskyod pa ltar// rig pa gsang ba'i bang mdzod ni//
212b7(rnying rgyud): ji ltad snang ba klong du thim// thim pa dmigs pa med pa'i chos// 'gag med klong du de bzhin gshegs// yang dag rdo rje'i lu la rdzogs// gsal 'grib med pa'i rang snang ni// skyon med yul la mngon par snang// mdzad pa med pa'i phrin las
213a1(rnying rgyud): yang mdzad/ rtogs pa'i sna ba rnam par dag pa'o// zhes brjod nas/ mi sdang ba'i dang du gshegs so// de nas yang 'dod chags kyi natso mthong ba'i phreng ba can gyis/ de skad ces gsol to// gyi drang nang med gsal ba
213a2(rnying rgyud): bde chen che// kun gyi gzhi mar gyur pa theg pa che// brjod pas thog tu mi pheb stobs po che// 'gyur med rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// sna tshogs cir snang snang bas cho 'phrul che// yang dag sa la bgrod pas mchongs pa che// srid pa rgya thegs byas pas
213a3(rnying rgyud): stobs po che// ma bskyod mkha' la gshegs pa'i gom po che// rnam dag gcig tu sdud pas yangs pa che// phyi rgya rlabs kyis ched pas shes rab che// ma 'gags gcig tu bsdus pas ye shes che// gsal ba dang ldang yin pas rig pa che// kun gyi gor mar/
213a4(rnying rgyud): gyur pas gtso bo che// stong pa'i tshig dang bral bas gsal ba che// byar med rnam par dag pas rdzogs pa che// 'dzin med rang sar grol bas stong pa che// thams cad zil gyis gnon pas brjid pa che// yul med rnam par dag pas bkod pa che// yang dag
213a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings la bstod pas 'dzin pa 'o// dge dang sdig pa med pa'i lam tsho// rtag nang srul mi gnas rtogs partse// 'don tog la ma la mi gnas pasam gtan na// snor pags sa bas brgyan pa'i bdag che// yang dag che brnams dang ldan pa 'di/
213a6(rnying rgyud): na sa 'ang
213a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rin chen bang mdzod nas// rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'bar// 'dzin rtog g.yeng bsam brlags sam// rang gyur rtog med sangs rgyas la// chags pa'i rang bdud ma zhugs sam// btang snyoms chen po'i ting 'dzin la// mtshan ma'i chos kyis/
213b1(rnying rgyud): mgos sam// rtog med ye shes rang grol ba// 'khor ba'i nyes pas mgos sam// rang sdang dag pa'i rig pa la// gzhan byung chos kyi ma bsgribs sam// rang shung gsal ba'i mar me la// rnam tog rlung gas ma bgyod dam// rig pa sems dang bral pa
213b2(rnying rgyud): la// rnam tog sems kyis ma bslad dam// de ni gsang sngags tshad ma ste// rtog med ngang du shes par bya// gsal yangs 'dzin pa med pa la// rang sar grol ba'i chos nyid rtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes ni// nga nyid yin par shes par bya/
213b3(rnying rgyud): sa 'i na sa ma sa
213b4(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod nas/ mi ldang ba'i ngang du gshegs so// de nas yang 'dod chags kyi gtso mo nam mkha'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// kun gyis rtogs par dka' ba'i rig pa 'di// phra zhing shes par dka' bas kun gyis mthong ba med// 'don med
213b5(rnying rgyud): kun la snyoms pas rang byung bde ba'i klong // 'gag med rnam dag klong du de bzhin rnam par rol// klong las yang dag lha mo'i skur sdang ba// rnam rtog bag chags lus la lha mo'i cho 'phrul 'byung // zhen med stong pa'i ngang la rig pa'i nyi shar bas// nub pa
213b6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i gter chen dkyil 'khor nas// 'gyur ba med pa'i sku lnga shar gyis byung // rtog pa med pa'i ngang bu gnyis med thim// yang dgas lam bkod phung po lnga// snang ba'i cho 'phrul cing snang ston par mdzad// rig dang ma rig gnyis kyang 'dzin pa'i rtog
213b7(rnying rgyud): pa yin// gsang sngags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'phor rol pa'i ye shes su// sa lam med pas sa chen 'das pa stong // yul med rnam par dag pa'i reg pa mkha' la gsal// ngas ni byas pa ma yin byang ba'i chos nyid do// chos la ngos bzung yod na 'dzin
214a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i ni 'dod yan// gang ba dang rdegs pa dngos ma yin// yang dag dkyil 'bong nga byang rdzogs par sla// sa dang lam gyi tha rkang bral ba mchog nyid do// rang ga rang dag ngasang krol bang bdang // dmigs pa med pa'i ting 'a
214a2(rnying rgyud): bzhag thal// grub pa med pa'i yang dag yo brang nyid// deng gi zugs lags sngags rgyal ba spyod// ces brjod na/ mi sbar ba'i rang du gshegs so// zhes reg pa dang zhang chen po gyud pas/ mkha' 'goms nang dus
214a3(rnying rgyud): tram+bu d+hAn ldan/ de nas yang mkhang 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi ma bcom ldan ye shes pa// thog ma med pa'i dus // ston brtsod pa gang du don// su yi 'grangs ten ga nga bkyis// 'dral ba'i mdzin pa da
214a4(rnying rgyud): btsugs// nye ba'i 'khor ni gang gang lags// gyud kyi rgyal po gang gang gsung // sprul pa ci ltar mdzad de skyon// mos pa'i 'khor la bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ kye kye yi shes rdzam nyon// nas bas migs par/
214a5(rnying rgyud): yid la zung // da ni rdo rje sra mkhregs ldan// thog ma med pa'i dus kyi'o// nga yin bu rin chen skor// rno du stor ba'i rang bzhin gyis// mun sdod gnyis kyi mtshams nas 'o// / rkyen bzhi'i dmigs pa med sems// dga' ldan brtsegs pa'i yul
214a6(rnying rgyud): 'ongs// nga yi rten ni pad+ma dag pa yin// gsang sngags rgyad chen bstan pa btsugs// nye ba'i 'khor ni mi 'phags pa'o// chud kyi rgyal po zil 'gyur bshad// lo brgyad mdzes pa'i tshul du sprul// ngas ni 'dul ba'i bstan par rdzogs/
214a7(rnying rgyud): kha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// ston pa'i byon lugs de ltar na// ston pa'i pha ma gang gis bgyis// rus ji ci skad bya par grags// ston pa'in ci skad btags// stod pa'i lus ni gang ltar lags
214b1(rnying rgyud): yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ pha ni rang byur chen po yin// ma ni mkha' mnyam rig pa'i klong // yul ni ma bkod mdangs ldan yin// dus ni rdo rje 'gyur med dus// snang stong yang dgang yi mtshan// yul ni 'od gsal lnga po yin// man+ta ngag rang byung
214b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes yin// 'das pa nga yi ye shes yin// ma 'ongs ra yi yul lung bstan// da ltar nga yi rig pa yin// de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye ston pa ye shes sku// de nas gnas ni gang du byon// yul ni ci skad bya ba yin// gsang
214b3(rnying rgyud): sngags gang dang gang dag gsungs// 'khor ni gang dang gang gi 'khor// su yi gsol zas ci yis bgyis// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ de nas gnas ni lha yul dga' ldan te// sum cu rtsa gsum khang bzang der// sbyin po dang ni tshul khrims dang // bzod pa dang ni
214b4(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus dang // de bzhin bsam gtan shes rab dang // 'khor lo rnam pa drug ldan no// 'khor ni rnam pa bdun gyis bskor// 'bras bu rnam gsum 'tsho ba'i zas// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku nyid do// de nas yang ston pas 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
214b5(rnying rgyud): pa/ kye 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyon cig/ dus med par ye shes kyi snang ba dang shar ro// gnas med par gsang sngags kyi rig pa rang grol lo// stobs med par skur srid kyi chos thams cad la bzla'o// de nas yang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis 'di skad
214b6(rnying rgyud): rtsesna gsol to// rtse kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi la// rnam rtog 'dzin pas ma brlags sam// zhes zhus so// yang bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho// nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi 'di// thog ma med pa'i dus kyi tshe// nga yi nor bu rin chen sgor//
214b7(rnying rgyud): de yis sdug bsngal log par 'khyams// nor bu rin chen bdud rtse de// btsa' bas rnyed pa'i gnas med do// rang las rang byung rig par rtogs// nor bu rin chen bdud cing de// stong pa mtshor rnyed pa tshod// stor bas dngos po mtshan ma med// rnyed pas dga' ba'i
215a1(rnying rgyud): mdangs dang ldan// rnyed pa'i dus dang sbyor ba'i dus// khyad med gcig gi ngang du rtogs// nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi la// byas shing bsgoms pas rnyed mi 'gyur// sgron ma dbyings kyi sbyang ba la// ma yengs gsal la 'dzin pa med par
215a2(rnying rgyud): brtags// de ltar don las ma yengs nas// rin chen bdud rtsi'i sngon ma rnyed pa yin// nor bu rin chen bdud rtsi 'di// gtang bzhag med de rnyed pa'i mchog/ 'dzin pa med na rang ser grol// nor bu rnam par bkod pa'i don// rang las byung zhing dang la sim// de laco
215a3(rnying rgyud): bam zhugs na// rdo rje rin chen zhes byar grags// spang bya spang byed rnam gnyis med// srang 'dzin byed na bdud rtsi med// gsal 'dzin med na bdud rtsi rnyed// rang byung bdud rtsi'i sman chen 'di// 'dzin med rnam dag rang du yang dag grol// nor bu rin chen gsang
215a4(rnying rgyud): ba 'di// gang gi phyogs su ma lhung ba// sangs rgyas bdud rtsi dam pa yin// dmigs pa med par rang nyid mthong // mthong ba nyid na dgag bsrub med// mthong dang shes dang rtogs pa gsum// khyad med gcig gi rang bzhin yin// rtogs dang klong du gyur pa dang //
215a5(rnying rgyud): goms pa mthar phyin grol ba gsum// sangs rgyas 'bras bu chen por bshad// e ma ho// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // mi 'gyur klong du sangs rgyas rnyed// yang dag sa la mngon sangs rgyas// mnyam nyid dbyings su rig pa 'khyil// rtog med dang
215a6(rnying rgyud): nas sgron me gsal// zag med lam la rab gnas pas// 'gyur med klong du gnyis med thim// byas med dang nas byung ba rnyed pa yin// byas pa rang sangs dang du shes pa rnyed pa yin// gsal ba 'dzin pa med par nor bu rnyed pa yin// ngan song
215a7(rnying rgyud): brang du med par nor bu rnyed pa yin// bde chen sangs rgyas 'gag med gsal// yang dag lam rnyed rdo rje'i sku// skye med rdo rje'i snying po'i sku// dus dang thabs med rang sar grol// gsang ba'i bdag tu lce med thim// yang dag nyid kyi su
215b1(rnying rgyud): dgapa// don su yangang du bzhin gshegs// mtha' thanas dkyil 'khor chan pan// yang dag lam la ra ba gnas pa// gsangang rgya sa zhes su// rgyal 'kho yas da/ theg pa'o
215b2(rnying rgyud): dragrol// gsang sngags kun gyi blta ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhugs pa rdzogs// 'jig rten blangs pa'i rin po che// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i rgyud las/ ston pa byon tshul gyi le zhe na pa/
215b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye rgya ston pa kun tu bzang po lags// ston pa byon pa de ltar na// kye med dang du ci ltar grol// rnam dag mkha' la gang ltar gshegs// ga le'i bye brag ci ltar lags// zhes lus so// de nas
215b4(rnying rgyud): yang bka' stsal pa// kye kye gsang ba'i dradag po nyon// ngas bstan legs par yid la zung // skye med rig pa sangs rgyas ni// mtshan ma'i tshig med drung du grol// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i phrin pasate// bya dang byed pa med par grol// sangs rgyas
215b5(rnying rgyud): mu nyid rnam dag ste// 'gyung med ye shes snying po nyid// nga nyid klong yangs dang bu zhong // sangs rgyas rtog snyed thugs ldan pas// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes thugs// yang dbu sem su med dang du grol// nga mi gros rdo rje 'gag med gsungs/
215b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i rol pa sna tshogs ston// ngo bo nyid ni don las grol// sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten lams ni rab 'byams su// sku'i sprul pa bsam mi gyur// rdo rje yeshes ched po ston// bdag ye shes dang bu grol// 'gyur med
215b7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas dgongs pa yang // lce med gas la 'grib 'dzin rtog med// ye shes ma bar khyab rnam par stor// rdo rje sems dnga'i du nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas dpe dang ye shes cad// smon ma rnam ga nga du thol// e maho// rnam dag mkha' la yan
216a1(rnying rgyud): sa sa du / na sa sa sa /
216a2(rnying rgyud): ma bstod gshegs// del gam tus dag 'gabs dang mtshungs// bezhes stong pa'i nga blang sa pa// bral ma pa stong gshegs/ nin// bzhi nam mkha' pa/ pa'i sa nyings brji gshegs/
216a3(rnying rgyud): khrung chen rnam ma par ljongs dang mtshungs// nam mthu' stong pa'i dge dag \u0f7f// sman nyid mi 'gyur mkhang sa gshegs// pAng chen po lawA k+Sha/ sangs mAdz+dza sa// chags med sa le gnas pa na// rdo rgyal pos thol bar gsungs// ma
216a4(rnying rgyud): bzhid dra gsangs// semasangs rgyas thig po ni// sems can tu kyi tsatan// nam dag sus cig le gnas// sems can kun gyi d+ha d+hini// snying ting rtags ci ga sa gnas// sems can kun gyi shel dag na// gas lang ba rdzog gnas// sems
216a5(rnying rgyud): can kun me dar dkar na// lam gyi thig le bzang po gnas// sems can thar gyi stong laman// de dgas la gnyis med mig segang // sems can can gyi zla tshigs na/ 'du 'bral med pa'i ben leg nas// sems can kun gyi rung 'ang na// la shes
216a6(rnying rgyud): gdangs kyi thig le gnas// sems can kun gyi mig na yang // rnam ngag 'od kyi thig leg nas// sems can kun gyi yul zhi ngan// mtshogs 'chang ba'i thig me panas// de bzhin sems tham pa 'a// dbyer med tshul gyis gnas pa yin/ dza
216a7(rnying rgyud): rjesams dpa'i bu nyid kyang // ye shes dag pa'i mkha' gshegs// sangs kyis rnams kyi ye shes ni// sems can rnams pa byed song // rko 'i rangs zhes chol cas byar// dnga'i nga sa cho 'jal byung / dzadza'i lam las @
216b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas nyid gshegs pa// yang dag mkha' la rig pa nyid gshegs pa// gnyis med dngang khyab med mnyam// skye dang 'chi med rdo rje'i bdag/ yang dag yul gyi dang 'chi ba med// sems dang bag chags sangs rgyas dngos ma yan/ jig du
216b2(rnying rgyud): shes sems dang bag chags bral// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnam 'phrul cing yang ston// togs dang ma rtogs tshig gi dpyod pa yin// 'dzin pa med na sangs kyis gsang ba yin// chags pa med na rdo rje'i don nyid thob// zhen pa med na rig pa'i rang
216b3(rnying rgyud): lus rnyed// tshig dang bral na ye shes dbyings su stsol// bsam pa brlag na sgron ma nyams su lon// de ltar rtog dang blta ba dang // mi rtog bsgoms na sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// yengs pa med pa'i bsgom pa chen po 'di// gsal
216b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzin pa'i ngang du ma ltung ba'o// yang dag tshig dang bral ba'i bsgom pa chen po 'di// gang la bltas kyang chu bo'i gzhung dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas dgongs pa kun gyis go ba med// rdo rje'i sku nyid kun gyis mthong ba med// rig pa'i sku nyid 'du
216b5(rnying rgyud): 'bral med par spyod// sems dpa'i don nyid su phyed yod par grags// mi zad gter la rin chen longs spyod pa'o// rdo rje'i lam la nor bu'i phung po bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin nyid du gsungs// zhes rig pa rang shar chen po'i
216b6(rnying rgyud): rgyud pas/ thig le phyes te bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // thig le'i rnam grangs de ltar na// rgyud kyi sgra chen gsung
216b7(rnying rgyud): dri gsol// zhes zhus nas 'di skad ces brjod do// badz+ra/ byed pa gnas pa do/ man/ gog me ma/ e/ gnapa ni dang la'i don rtson pa/ b+has/ dam mdong ba ga skong pa'i thal lachi gnas pa // d+ha/ dgang / dr-i/ dngu la/ yang

219a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs shing theg le'i sgra// thrig le rnam dag ye shes bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba'ig ky-i// las klod ri po ma yis la skyed pa'i sem me nga rol gyis// gsang sngags kun gyi ye shes chog gis dpag tu med par dbyings papa da phrul pa mdzad/

219a5(rnying rgyud): sngags dgongs pa yin par gsungs// gsang sngags kun gyi lam ni sgron ma rnam dag ngo por 'dus par gsungs// e ma he// gsung dang ma gsungs thams cad rang gi de nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad// rig pa'i ngang las 'das pa med cing ma 'ongs med par kun byed

219b1(rnying rgyud): mdag med par mkhyen cing reg/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i snying po ye shes su nyid gnas dang bral ba'i tshe// rang gi de nyid mthong nas de nyid la yang dran pa skyes nas bde chen sa lathim// yengs dang ma yengs med par don nyid rang la shar cing dngal skar
219b2(rnying rgyud): bar na// zag pa med la chos rnams kun gyi bden pa mthong ba'i dus su bstan pa yin// yang dag sangs rgyas gzhi la bzang ngan med par gnyis med mnyam pa yin// dang rgyal rnams dang theg pa dman pa'i rigs rnams la// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i don mi bshad/
219b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang gsang sngags don chen ni// spyod man shes pa chung ba dang // kha gsags g.yo sgyu'i sems dag dang // lam dang sel zhen pa yi// rigs dang rgyud med dag la ni// gsang sngags gsang ba bsgrag mi bya// chos nyid rtogs pa'i na la

219b5(rnying rgyud): man chod theg dman zil gyis gnon// sangs rgyas mdzad pas thams cad skrag par byed// yang dag sangs rgyas pade chen thugs las byung // gzhi dang lam la mi ltos sangs rgyas mnyam med yin// yang dag sprul pas yang dag nyid du sgrol// gzhi lang ba
219b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin thugs rje rdzogs// lam la sra lnga ye shes lam lha rdzogs// 'bras bu su gsum ye shes 'od snang rdzogs// de phyir gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum// 'du 'bral med pa'i tshul du'o// 'bras bum g.yos chos kyi su// lam ni rnam

220a1(rnying rgyud): lam byang ban// 'dzin pa med pas rang dag go// sna tshogs lam gyu ba la// chag sa ngadu 'dzin pa ma grags na// lam byed nyid mthong ba yin// gzhi lam bdag nyid blo dang mnam// rang byang thabs kyi rgyal po pa// ngoms

220b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// sbru la zhen pa med pa'i phyir// gang dag rtog pa'i sems yod na// rang gi de nyid mthong mi 'gyur// skyon ma rtog pa med pa'i phyir// gang dgas lam rtsol 'dod na// bar de'i sdang brtogs mi 'gyur// sa lam sbyang du med pa'i phyir/
