334a5(rnying rgyud): 'og dge slong dbapa dang ldan// de nas blo gros mchog gi 'don// de nas mkha' 'gro dpal 'dzin mas// bstan pa 'di nyid bzung nas ni// tshe lo bcu pa'i dus la dar// de nas mi gnas ngo bo'o// lanas sheb// bstan pa'i spyir thig gas
334a6(rnying rgyud): ba 'di// de ltar bstan pa bdun 'das nas// zhing khams gnyis pa nges sud nas// de ltar bdun po thal nas kyang // rdo rje gdan gyi spo la ni// bstan pa kun gyi gsung gi badz+ras// rang byung chen po'i yi ge nyid// skra dang bcas te babs pa ni/
334a7(rnying rgyud): 'di nas bskal pa byeb ni// 'khor la klog gi phreng ba yi// bcom ldan 'das la snang bar 'gyur// de nas po ni brgya phrag gsum// de ltar gsum po tha' ba'i dzin// bstad pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje yang // ston pa de la sdang bar 'gyur// denas
334b1(rnying rgyud): ni lnga ban nas// bstan pa'i sku yang dang babs te// de ltar bstan pa dngos babs nas// yang ni bstan pa'i mar ldang // ston pa de yi 'khor du yang // 'phags pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces pa// rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan rdzogs pa la// rab tu dang cing
334b2(rnying rgyud): 'dun pa nyid// nges par bzung ste mngon par snang // de la sogs te ston pa'i 'khor// 'phags pa nyan thos khri phrag gnyis// 'dul ba'i bstan pa bskal pa gcig/ dgra bcom 'dras bu nyid la bkod// de nas mun pa'i bskal pa dz+rag/ de nas
334b3(rnying rgyud): dgra bcom 'bum phrag gnyis// nyid kyi 'khor du 'dus nas ni// mdo sde'i bstan pa bskal pa brgyad// drang nges las kyi mtha' la dgod// rdzu 'phrul stobs ldan dbang bskur nas// nges par 'phen te bstan pa rdzogs// yang ni mya ngan
334b4(rnying rgyud): 'ad tshul stod// de nas ldan pa'i bskal pa gnyis// de nas sbyin pa sgyu 'khung sa zhes// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor// stong phrag bstani 'dus pa las// mchog tu 'dris parab 'jigs dpral// rab tu stod pa'i bstan baspyad/
334b5(rnying rgyud): mngon pa'i bstan pa bskal pa brgyad// thams cad cho gcig 'bras bu thob// 'di dus 'khor ba dong sprugs te// sems can rnams kyis/ bad pa yang / sangs rgyas 'thob// 'gro ba drug ces snga mi srid// bskab pa stong phrag nyi shur no//
334b6(rnying rgyud): sems can 'khor ba rgyun/ 'am kyang / chad nas// lus can rnam par mi snang ngo // de nas las kyi bye brag las// sems can nyon mongs mngon med kyang // bzhi pa nyal ba langs pa'i dbang // shin tu phra ba blangs pa'i gzugs// grangs ma
334b7(rnying rgyud): rab tu phra ba las// gzugs can sems can lus 'phel 'gyur// de ltar 'dzod kyis mi langs pa'i// bstan pa'i tha ma bsam mi khyab// re zhig tshig gis mtshon pa'o// ji lan bdun pa'o// hud kyi lus dang yan lag ni// lus la bkod pa brgya
335a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ zag / gnyes dang rdza bcams par// dang ngas pa gsal ba yis// lngatshogs bkad pa ldan pasmram// thas pa bdud rnams pa la// yung lag bkod pa brnyan ga/ te ngags par byas pad/
335a2(rnying rgyud): nga la yan la gnyis brgya brtsa// shing lnga'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// lus rdzogs yan lag gsang byed pa'i// gnyis pa'i lus ni nyid bstan pa// gan rnams 'dus pa'i bkod pa la/ @ nga // nus pa nyi tu N+Da brgya pas/
335a3(rnying rgyud): gan 'dus bkod pa bum cu gcig/ de yis rdum nyid rdzogs pa lnga// yan lag pacwa phrag gnyis dang brgyad// des ni gnyis pa'i lus dang ne// yan lag dag ni rdzogs pa'o// gsum pa'i rdzas ni nyer bstan pa// zhus pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis la/
335a4(rnying rgyud): bkod pa lnga bcu rgyad// yan pag nyid la brgya phrag gnyis// gsum pa'i lus la yin lag rdzogs// 'dri pa'i lus dang yan yas ni// khrus pa nyer gcig nyid yin no// chos nyid bkod pa sum du gnyis// yan lag sa ba
335a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad do// lnga pa'i lus dang yan lag nI// zhus pa bcu gcig dag yin te// bstab sgom bkod pa bum cu gnyis// de yi yan lag drug rngu ba'i// lnga pa'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// drug pa'i lus dang yan lag ni// zhus pa bachung drangs pa
335a6(rnying rgyud): las// snga rnams bkod pa bcu drug yin// de yi yan lag sum cu gnyis// drug pa'i lus dang yan lag rdzogs// jis 'ad ro// 'byung ba'i 'dod pa 'di lta ste// sde mthun pas kyi byes ga las// sems can las kyi brtan mo yis/
335a7(rnying rgyud): phyi yi 'thung ba la brten nas// las dang gos dang dbang po dang // 'khor dang skye ba rdzogs par 'dod// nang 'thung las kyi rim pa ni// mas ni lus kyi gzhi byas te// bskyod pas sha ni spen par 'dod// mus ni lus kun bsdus nas ni// bskyed pas wa
335b1(rnying rgyud): smin par 'dod// mes ni lus kun smin byas te// bskyed pas drod du sbyin par 'dod// rlung gis lus kun 'degs pa la// bskyed pas dbugs su sbyin par byed// de'i sgra don bye brag gis// d+hi yi rnam pa des bstan pa// gzugs la bslabs pas/
335b2(rnying rgyud): lus zad 'gyur// sgra yis skad rnams shes par 'gyur// dris ni bcud kyis len pa 'grub// ros ni dngos po bdud rtsir bsgyur// tshig chad sod/ rtsi ni sems can gzhan don dang // rang gi don yang rte/ gas pa'o// ris ngan wu ru pa/ sems can dus ni rnam
335b3(rnying rgyud): pa brgyad// nad dang rlung dang tsha ba ni// shes pa nyon mongs byang sems dang // ye shes nyid dang 'byung ba'o// dbyar dku ston dpyid dus bzhi la// rlung mkhris bad kun 'das pa bzhi// so so'i gnas nas 'phos pa yis// sems can rlung sems
335b4(rnying rgyud): 'pho ba'i dus// 'di dus rlung ni brtseg ma'am// yang nadal zhing bar chad pa// yang na phra zhing che bar 'gyur// 'di yis tshe rnams thung bar byed// shes pa 'phrog cing myos pa'o// skabs su g.yeng zhing 'pho bar 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga po 'dus
335b5(rnying rgyud): pa yis// ngan song gnas su 'phen par byed// byang chub sems ni 'jil ba dang // rab tu 'phrigs shing phra bar 'gyur// ye shes gsal ba ma yin no// 'byung ba byer zug las 'bros nas// sems can gcig gi dus yin no// sems can sbyi
335b6(rnying rgyud): dus dag ni// dang po dpag tu med pa nas// tha ma tsho laM bcu pa'i bar// dus kyi rim pa drug rngu 'byung // nyon mongs las dbang gzhan 'gyur phyir// rang mthun spyi don las kyi yang // che bo nyid ni stong pa las// 'dzam bu gling ba rnams la yang /
335b7(rnying rgyud): brgya yi ba la dus rim ni// sum cu dag tu 'gyur ba yin// de nas bcanas te bcu yi bar// dus kyi rim pa sum cung byung // goms pa'i 'pho dus brgyad rim gyis// spyod pa phyi nas ngan par 'gyur// dus kyi gdon dang mu ge dang // mtshon dang nad kyis dus 'jung
336a1(rnying rgyud): nga spod du sa nga rgyu nga// su mas du sbya pas/ na / sa su ga ma// dadus
336a2(rnying rgyud): ga dzis pa da// thad rnams pa da dpa ba dang // dngag sum ga dag / na ma rdzun pas da// mthutshan po'i ngan gyis pa // dem ma smram dang /
336a3(rnying rgyud): da kyi bas ba dol// gan kyi sems ta dru ga ro// byim pas 'ad pa'i khamasas pang // zla nga/ ma ba tu byed stsu/ nyi khamasa'i nga// gzhan la sa
336a4(rnying rgyud): phyi byu sa na // pa nin/ shA smi
336a5(rnying rgyud): 'i mi ba du / / sa da/ yang// sa pa
336a6(rnying rgyud): mi N+DI nga sa/ sa bu dag smras/ ya byis pa dang mar // bu ba 'du ma gdun gyi mams sna s+ho// sa rlung pa sa sapa/ malab pa
336a7(rnying rgyud): na 'asum/ ga byung ba'i pa sa// de sa ma ngas / sa pa // desang su
336b1(rnying rgyud): bslab pa dang ba 'dod// daltar bkya dang brgyad rdul// bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa'o// de ltar lpags pa dacom las// bskal pa rgyan po gcig yin no// sre shid 9 ya// zhag ni brtagag gsum pa yang // zla bdag ni gcig yin te/
336b2(rnying rgyud): de ltar bcu gnyis rdzogs pa las// lo ni gcig tu 'dod pa'o// nang dang dgong mo bdun pa gan di tongs pa/ dang // nyi shu dag ni rdzogs pa las// zhag ni sum brgya drug cur 'dod// de rnams rdzogs pas lo ni gcig/ zhag zhi pho mo la
336b3(rnying rgyud): dbye// zla ba ston dbyed dbyar dang dgun// re de dag la gsum gsum gyis// 'dug cing 'byung ba'i rnam lhu byed// byi ba blang dang stag nyid dang // rna ring sbrul dang 'brug dang yang // rta dang lug dang spre'u dang // bya dang khyi phag bcu gnyis kyis//
336b4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i rtsis rnams spel ba'o// rjes lan nyed gsum pa// tshe ni spel dang gso ba dang // bsgrub dang rgyas pa'i cho ga nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis sbyor shes na// nyi zla dag dang mnyam par 'gyur// gzhan ni mnyam dang gdig pa las// dgug dang bcings
336b5(rnying rgyud): dang gshed la dbab// sbyor zhing bsad pa'i las rnams kyang // rnal 'byor pa yis bklag shes na// 'gro ba rnams ni dbang du 'dus// dbang thang spel dang gso ba dang // gnas shing chags par byed pa nyid// gzhan ni mnyam pa'i sbyor ba nyid// rnal
336b6(rnying rgyud): 'byod pa yis brtsam par bya'o// jis pa nyer bzhi po'o// byed zug snyoms pa bcu gnyis te/ dag ca// sa chu me rlung bzhi la yang // gsum gsum nyid de bcu gnyis la/ chu yi zug pas dbang po srung // byer ba yis ni 'khrugs par byed// snyoms pa yis ni
336b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu 'byin// sa yi zug pas rdul rnams 'byin// byed pa yis ni yan lag 'byin// snyoms pas lus 'byung rdzogs pa'o// mo be thug pas nad du byed// byer ba dag gis pus gi nas 'gyur// snyoms pas 'byung ba gnas par byed// rlung
337a1(rnying rgyud): \u0f7f/ zag pas 'byung brdzob// byer bas pas gzhan 'jig pa las// snyoms pas drung sems gcig du kyang // gsum kyis byed pa'i mtha' 'da'o// mu le zug pas sa 'dus la// ma grol 'di lad// zag pa zag pa 'thad pa yis/
337a2(rnying rgyud): gang mi 'grub cing 'jig par 'gyur// byir ba nyid kyis na du 'gyur// snyoms pas kyi sgor sman rnams 'grub// me dang rlung gi nyis phung po 'jig/ byer bas las kun 'grub pa la// snyoms pas 'khrug pa'i las mthar 'gyur// chu dang me las bon rab
337a3(rnying rgyud): 'grub// byer bas gzhan la 'jug par 'gyur// snyoms pas tshe ring bang byung 'grub// sa deng rlung gis zhi bya 'grub// byer bas rgyas dang dbyang byed// snyoms pas mngon spyod las rnams 'grub// rlung dang rtswa'i bye ba nyid// byer bas dkang
337a4(rnying rgyud): las kun 'grub// snyoms pas dmag las rgyal ba'o// sa dang mes ni spel ba 'grub// byer bas 'byung ba spro ba 'grub// snyoms pas gshed kyi cho ga 'grub// zug phyir las kyi mtha' lo yang // nges par 'gyur ro dbang po'i lha// dris la dke nga la// 'khor
337a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i las rgyud gcang 'dod na// bya ba bral bar rdzogs pas rdzogs// mtha' dang bral bas dbus mi gnas// yongs su rdzogs pas dngos dang bral// lhag ma med pas cha shas min// gcig tu ma yin gnyis mtha' zad// du mar mi snang gcig las 'das// /
337a6(rnying rgyud): brjod du med pas tshig gi gzhi// dngos thal stong pa snying po'i don// phyogs su ma lhung lta ba'i don// 'di shes 'khor ba'i lam 'gag go// gnad las byung ba'i mngon sum nyid// goms pa'i stobs kyis 'khrul pa 'jig/ rang bzhin dag pas
337a7(rnying rgyud): g.yengs pa med// rgyun du gnas pas 'bral ba med// rang snang yin pas rnam rtog zing // rlung zad ye shes nyid la spyod// 'di dang 'bral ba med pa yis// 'gro drug pam gyi nun gcong ngo // byas shing bcos pa med pa yis// thugs su su pas
337b1(rnying rgyud): 'a yapa dag gsas sa/ lhag par byung bas sgru ba med// 'dzin chags med pas ci dgar rol// na la dus ba pas rtog pa sangs// rang bzhin yin pas thabs pas 'das// 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i sgong gags// g+sa // smon dang
337b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// yon tan brjod kyis langs pa men// phun sum tshogs pa drug cu yis// bstan pa dam pa'i gzhi ma 'dzin// 'jig rten khams su yun reng bar// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnas pa la// yon tan brjod kyis mi pha
337b3(rnying rgyud): pa// de ni gang pas byung zhe na// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// mdzad pa bcu gnyis phrag gsum gyi// ston pa 'jig rten byon nas ni// gdul bya dag gi yon tan no// phyi nang gsang ba'i las bzhi las// dag byed yon tan dpag tu med//
337b4(rnying rgyud): sngar bstan gyi ni rim pa'o// bstan pa phel zhing rdzogs pa yang // bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan no// dris 'di nag/ sku gsum bslab pa'i rim pa nyid// 'thung ba'i 'dod dron gtsor byas te// mchog tu sa chu se rlung gi// sgra la bslabs pas sa
337b5(rnying rgyud): par 'grub// mu ye sgra ni gshang ba la// mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra dbyangs 'dzi ni// 'di la rtag tu goms byas na// sprul pa'i sku yang nges par 'grub// sa yi sgra ni bsil zhing ldi// tshangs pa chen po'i sgra skad ldan// 'di la rtag tu brtan spyod
337b6(rnying rgyud): na// longs spyod rdzogs sku nges 'grub pa'o// ma yi sgra ni ring byed bslab// khyab 'jug chen po'i gsung dbyangs ston// 'di la mnyan par sras spyod pa// chos sku'i yon tan nges par 'thob// rlung gi sgo ni gzir zhing drag/ mkha' lding rgyal
337b7(rnying rgyud): po'i sbyor ba gsung // 'di ni rtag tu blo shes na// sku gsum thun mong bslab bya'o// de ltar 'byung bzhi'i sgra do na ni// phyi yi dus la nges par sbyor// dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dang ston// chu dang sa sti me rlung gi// rim pa dus dang nges sbyar te/
338a1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor lus dang bskrun byas na// 'grub par the tshom mi za'o// rjes pa ste ba'o// 'jig rten thun mong las mtha' ni// 'phur bar 'dod pas de lu bsten// me snang 'dod pas sems bdag la// thig pa skyong pa'i tra/
338a2(rnying rgyud): par ni// lus dang sems gnyis bcug pas 'grub// zad thal 'thob par 'dod pa yis// rlung nyid bzung ste thig ler gzhug/ skabs su shes pa na bun bzhin// tshangs pa'i gnas nas 'don par bya'o// mtshon dang dug las rgyal 'dod pas//
338a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi la sems gtad de// phye mar sbyar zhing las bsgrubs na// de dag nges par 'grub pa'o// khyi dang dred spyad las rgyal bar// 'byung ba bzhi dag rjod byed cing // rten cing 'brel ba bzhi byas na// de rnams las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// 'jigs
338a4(rnying rgyud): pa brgyad las thar 'dod pas// 'khor lo ri mo ldan pa nyid// spyi bor bsgoms te rlung bsgoms na// 'dis kyang de dag rnams las rgyal// mig sman 'grub par 'dod pa yi// khwa ta bya gshog sbyor ba ni// legs par sbyar te gsal byed kyi// yi ge rtag
338a5(rnying rgyud): tu bzlas spyod na// khams gsum po yang gsal bar sdang // dmag dang tshong drong gnyen sbyor las// su dag rgyal bar 'dod pa yis// 'byung ba'i dus dang phyogs bzung nas// 'khrugs pa med par byas na yang // nges par 'grub par the tshom
338a6(rnying rgyud): med// gong gis ral gri 'dzin 'dod na// sa la ser po'i sbyor ba yi// 'byung ba'i yi ge rab bzlas shing // lus kyi gnas lngar legs spyod na// 'byung ba'i dus nyid rab bstims nas// rab tu sbyor ba bstan pa yis// ral gri 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur//
338a7(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud pa'i mis// maM pal so 'i la byung / mo 'du pa'i sar phyin nas// rin po che yi byin me nga su sbyor bdag/ 'byung ba'i mgo nyid 'tshogs dus su/ brjes kyi phung // legs par sbyar te ri lu nyid// gang gis kha yi nang bzung na/
338b1(rnying rgyud): mkhang 'gro rnams dbang du 'gyur// rkang makyogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yis// rdo rje'i gshog bya brta ga la// A dang pa gis rnam par brgyan// 'dug rgyags skor babyung dus la// dus la 'khrul pa med byas te// rkang pa'i mthil sa rdu gru
338b2(rnying rgyud): grangs dang mthun par byugs pa dang // skad cig gis ni 'dzam bu gling // rgya zhing 'khor bar the tshom med// dur khrod gnas su rgyu bas kyang // mig gi sbyor bas ri lu nyid// rang dus sbyor ba'i dus rnams la// legs par sbyar te A yis bskor/
338b3(rnying rgyud): rang po'i 'byung ba bcud pa la// gnas su byedan pas nges par 'grub// brjid kyi sa len par 'dod pa swa ni// bdud rtsi rnam lnga ster ba'i thabs// gzhan du byung ba snyoms pa la// mkhas pas cha snyoms legs sbyar nas// rin po khyams tshal/
338b4(rnying rgyud): sdod du thugs// de nas spang dang u da tsid ta// / kha tshar legs par bAta be nas ni// dngul chu'i thigs pa re blangs nas// nang bzhin sran ma'i rdog ma tsam// mkhas pa dag gis za spyod na// brgyad kyis len pa chen por yang // 'gyur ba the tshom mi
338b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i// ma'o// bye brag su rnams bsgrub pa na// 'thung ba bzhi yi dril bslab// mu yi drig ni pade bsnyer// 'di la banus 'phel chebs// btab ste rlung la sbyar ba byos// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mu nyid 'grub// sa yi dzis na rtogs pa sdud/
338b6(rnying rgyud): pa lA sha yai g+hor lugs dang // rten 'brel rgyun du bstan pa yis// jo bo nyid kyi sku yang 'bub// me yi dris ni nyams bskyed de// rang lus gsal ba'i nyams kyis ni/ goms na he ru ka yang 'grub// rlung gi dris ni bslab kya gnas// gnas
338b7(rnying rgyud): 'jug las kyis bsdeb byas te// nges lus rim pa gsapa bsgoms na// rigs lnga'i sku ni legs par 'grub// gzhan yang ro dang reg nyid la// rim pa ji ltar bslab byas na// gang 'dod su rnams 'grub pa la// the tshom zab ma yin no// seM a/
339a1(rnying rgyud): gnyid kyi rnab 'byor sus bsgom pa// 'dis ni graN+DI nag lam du byed// byi yi dus ni gadri dag las// rnal 'gyur yus kyi rtsal sbyangs te// rtswa rnams blangs su bzung bgan// nang gi dus ni bdi nyid kyis// nal 'byor dag gi
339a2(rnying rgyud): rtsal sbyangs te// brjod pa'i rgyun rnams gcad pa gnad// gsang ba'i dus ni bzhi yis kyang // rnal 'byor sems kyi rtsal sbyangs te// gnyid la goms pa gnad yin no// kho na nyid kyi dus bzhi yis// lus dang ngag sems nges bsdus nas// 'od
339a3(rnying rgyud): gsal chen po gnyid dang bsre// de ltar goms nas sku gsum la// nges par sbyor ro rnal 'byor pas// rmi lam gnad kyi lam khyer ni// sngon du bya dang gnad la dbab// sngon du lus ngag sems sbyangs te// 'byongs pa'i rtags la brten nas ni// brtag dang
339a4(rnying rgyud): zil gyis gnon pa dang // bag chags gsum po nges gzung bya// de nas gnad la 'bebs dus su// sbyang dang bskur dang bcad pa dang // dkrugs dang bcud dang gnad la 'bor// bskyil bzlog las kyi gnad byas pas// las kyi rmi lam mtha' zad de// bag
339a5(rnying rgyud): chags 'khrul pa drung nas thon// 'di dus rang gi brtson 'grus kyis// rab la chad dang 'bring la shes// tha mi 'gyur bar nges pa ste// 'di dag rmi lam thog ma yang // rab la brjed dang tha ma 'gags// 'bring la shin tu gsal ba la// tha ma yin pa
339a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa'o// tha ma migs la de nas 'gyur// de rnams kyis ni tshad la pheb/ dris 'das gcig 'o// skyes bus dang sems ma thul ba// mi tog bsgoms pas des thul te// rnal du phebs nas rang gi'o// sngon du sbyangs pa'i rim pa dang // dngos gzhi rang
339a7(rnying rgyud): gi chud la brten// sngon du spang ba'i ris pa ni// lus kyi sngon du 'tho ba las// so so'i byed pa'i chu 'gags pa// rdo rje'i skyil krung du bcas te// lus spang sems la phan pa'o// ngag/ ra ngas kya/ ni hU~M zhes gnas pa las// byas gdab pa dang rtsal
339b1(rnying rgyud): sbyang dang // gtan ba la lam du grags pa yis// de ltar ngag srung sems pa phan// sems ni zlog mthungs dang // bar du gnas pa tha mar 'gro// de ltar gsum la brtags dpyad na// sems spang sems kyi gnas lugs shes// dngos gzhi rang /
339b2(rnying rgyud): go rgyung brten ni// lus kyi gnad dang ngag dang yang // sems kyi gnad la brten pa yis// rlung ni ci nas dal bya ste// rab tu 'phang ba las byung ba// lus dang sems kyi 'brel chad de// khams gsum du yang ldog pa min/ ji nagaganyis pa// rlung
339b3(rnying rgyud): gi dgos pa rnam pa gnyis// 'jig rten lus rdzogs bskyed pa dang // brten cing gnas pa'i tshe rnams dang // dbang dang tshe la sogs pa 'phel// bsod nams las kyi byed pa'o// 'gro ba'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs bskyed// mched cing sdud pa'i las kun
339b4(rnying rgyud): byed// 'das pa'i sgra dang ye shes dang // thig le nyid la goms pa dang // yang zhing stong dang gsal bar khyab// lus kyi 'byung ba zad pa dang // sems kyi rtog pa 'gags pa dang // mi rtog ye shes skye ba dang // phyi yi snang ba zad pa dang //
339b5(rnying rgyud): rlung sems gnyis su 'dres pa ste// des na rlung gis las kun byed/ dzas 'an 'ogs sa pa// lus kyi gnad ni rtsa yin te// gnas dang bkod pa 'gru ba dang // 'khor lo'i rten dang lus kyi srog/ ming dang bye brag rgyu dang rkyen// byed pa'i las dang mtshan nyid
339b6(rnying rgyud): dang // nyon mongs las dang ye shes las// lam la parten nas mngon snang ba// nang dang 'byung ba'i bye brag dang // 'khrug mar gnas pa'i mtha' yis dbye// bsdams pas 'gags la btsir bas 'ching// mnan pas gnas la gtsud pas gsal//
339b7(rnying rgyud): gcus pas rgal la drang bas shes// 'phul bas sdod la drag pas zin// de ltar rtsa yis gnad kyis kyang // sangs rgyas gnas ni mtshon pa'o// rtsal brten pa'i gamed kyi lung / rlung dag ni// nyi khri dang ni stong phrag gcig/ drug brgya dag tu 'gru ba ni// 'grub chen
340a1(rnying rgyud): ba sa na// du 'i byed pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyan la chung byung ngas pa// ba namadzes pas gan nyid pa // as rgyas par gyur na// dbram thug gsag dang kha zug sa/ khyong brag drug dang bkya zug ga/
340a2(rnying rgyud): nges par 'byung ba ste// 'gyum chung ba'i drung du 'dzid// nang dang ga don dang tshe yi dus// mkhas pas shes par byed pang // de yi gnad kyis sbyor thabs dbad// chen po la ni dus brtsi ste// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub brtag/ so so'i las kyi
340a3(rnying rgyud): bye brag gis// las dang ye shes gnyis par dang // nyon mongs rnams dang rtog med las// so so grangs chod bzung ba ste// sgom pa pos ni rnam par sbyang // des ni so so'i rlung tshad zin/ jis lan so bzhi ba'o// thig le'i chos nyid brtan 'dod pas// don
340a4(rnying rgyud): dam dang ni kun rdzob las// re zhig kun rdzob thig le la// brten nas sangs rgyas 'dod pa yis// rigs ma mtshan nyid rdzogs pa ni// lha dang lha min tshangs pa dang // gal te rigs ngan mu skyegs sam// mtshon nyid rdzogs pa dag mthong na// 'gug
340a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba des brtsams nas// brten phye nyid dang rtsa rnams dang // dmigs bya dag gis lus rdzogs bya// de nas kun rdzob thig le nyid// dbab cing gzung dang bzlog pa dang // rtsa la gdab cing rlung dang bsre// stong nyid brtan bya blo rjes bcad// lus
340a6(rnying rgyud): dang sems gnyis go bzlog bya'o// don dam thig le brtan pa yas// chos lha stong pa'i yul rnams nyid// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma nyid// gtems te rig pa'i rtsal rnams srung // nyin mtshan med par goms spyod na// 'di nyid rtsol thal mngon du ldang
340a7(rnying rgyud): de ni 'phyongs pa'i tshad yin no// ji ni rje 'o// mkha' 'gro ma yi las kyi mthar// dbyen brjod kyis mi langs kyang // mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// rten 'brel zab mo dag gis kyang // zas gos pa sogs bral ba dang / bde chen
340b1(rnying rgyud): zag med thob pa dang // 'byung bzhi dag pa dbang skur 'gyur// dngos la brtags pa'i las mtha' yis// gzugs dang sku dang dri dang ro// reg gi khams la brtags pa yis// 'jig rten thun mong las mtha' dang // mngon par shes pa rdzogs pa dang //
340b2(rnying rgyud): sa sa pa da / ga pa du su dang // pag bas sa// dede'i sa
340b3(rnying rgyud): do// dngos ni rlung gis spyang po'i thabs// sgra dang bzo dang sgyu cal dang // rten cing 'brel la sbyangs pas ni// so so'i 'byung ba nang mthun pas// lus ngag yid kyis gtad pas 'grub// dngos med sems kyi goms stobs brtan// sku lus rmi lam
340b4(rnying rgyud): dag la sbyangs// de nyid 'byor pas lus nyid kyang // grub ma'i rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// dus ni bAR+sha mya dro yi lus// 'di dag rang du 'dzin par 'gyur// 'od gsal 'pho ba rab kyis te// gnyid kyi bsam gtan la sbyangs nas// 'byongs pas nyi na dang
340b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan med par// phyi rol snang ba gsal ba na// 'dis ni 'od gsal chen po 'grub// 'di yi lus kyang gsum yin te// brtson 'grus kyi ni rim pa yis// sprul sku longs sku chos sku la// nges par dngos su 'pho bar nus/ ris pa so napa// rten
340b6(rnying rgyud): 'brel sbyor ba rnam pa gnyis// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul bsgrub pa dang // 'byung ba gnad kyi cho ga'o// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul thabs sna tshogs// lam s+thA zin pas rang shis sbyar// chu dang mi rgyu rlung gis bskor// lus dang dbang po bsgrub pas dbye// 'byung
340b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnad ni ngang dang gzhan// phan ginod 'bras bu nges par 'byin// rang dang lus dang 'byung bar sbyar// ru dang sa dang me dang rlung // so so'i las kyi rten 'brel gyis// gso zhing spel dang nyams/ bzhing bajud/ bar byed// sa dang chu yis 'jig pa
341a1(rnying rgyud): 6/ la// sa dang mes ni khrel ba'o// sa dang rung gis gshad dung babs// mu dang mes ni nyams par byed// chu dang rlung gas gas nga'o// ma dang drung gis snyoms pa nyid// bani 'dus pa sun 'khrugs pa nyid// gang
341a2(rnying rgyud): zhig brjod pa'i rten 'bre la ni// nal 'gyong sa mo'i nyams dang sbyar// yid kyi rten 'bral rlung la dre// gsum 'dus pa yi byed pa nyid// so so'i bre ba dang legs sbyar na// 'dis kyang phan dang gnod pa 'bru ba/ je ma med // nad dang sdug bsngal rdol
341a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas// rang dang gzhan gnyis nyam par sbyar// gzhan la rten 'brel dag gis bya// rang gi sgo dang byabs bya'o// bya ba dag ni gsum yin te// lus kyi gnad dang ngag dang yang // de bzhin sems kyi gnad kyis dgrol// lus ni 'khrul 'khor sna
341a4(rnying rgyud): tshigs la// seng ge nyid dang glang po che// byin dang ga dang lug gis smug/ la mo dang ni skyes bu nying // 'bru srin la sogs lus dang ni// 'khrul 'khod rnam pa tshogs kyis// byi nang stod sded yan lag dus// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa ni// 'byung
341a5(rnying rgyud): ngand sde ba bzhi yis sbyar// tsha dang grang bas mtha' phyes te// de dang de sbyar nad las zol// ngag ni swa skad sna tshogs pa// kA li kA li rab gas langs// rang bzhin rtsal gnas pa yi// yi ge bklog tshul drug gis kyang // so so'i gnas dang sbyar
341a6(rnying rgyud): ba dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po nam mnga' lding gi skad// tshangs dang brgya byin khyab 'jug dang // 'dre dang rlung lha dag gi skad// grul bum sto gyo dri za dang // lhag cing dngos na/ po'i skad kyis kyang // so sor skad dang sbyar bas rtsol/
341a7(rnying rgyud): thams ni dra pa rna tshogs dang // ce ltar 'grus pa'i mtha' yi yang // rnal 'byor pa yi rig pas dbye// gzhan yang lus dag med de sa da gyis bsgyur// yang na sems kyi bya ba'i las// 'a tshogs ting pa dzin gyis bsgyur// sdug /
341b1(rnying rgyud): las kyang mtha' dbye'o// des so sub// 'byung ba'i 'phob 'di lta bu// e mdo mchor che bar bshad// phyi rol nang gi dbye ba las// sa dngas ste lhag ma yang // gong ma'i 'gres kyis she par bya'o// nyin mtshan na nub zhag dang ni// zla ba mo yi 'khrul
341b2(rnying rgyud): lugs kyis// bcu gnyis phrag dang sdom pa yang // zug dang byer dang snyoms pa las// nges med 'khrugs mar gnas pa bzhi// dus la nges bye bcu drug gi// so so'i dus nges 'pho ba'i mtshams// rten 'brel la sogs 'byung ba'i gnas/ 'dugs 6/
341b3(rnying rgyud): 'pho ba'i dus la 'bo ba ste// de bzhin 'jug dus 'dug pa la// gnas pa'i dus na gnas pa'o// 'khrugs ma nyid la 'khrugs mar ro// nyin mtshan zhag dang zla ba'o// 'pho ba'i gnas ni mkhas pas dpyad// mu dang sa snye me chung gis// mthun
341b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang ni mi mthun pa// so so'i las dus srab ka yes// las kyi mtha' rnams bsgyur bar bya'o// ma na tug// gnad kyi 'byung ba rnam phyen// bzhi brgya nyid deng rtsa bzhi las// des bcas 'jug pa brgyad drung srung // de las nyi shu rtsa
341b5(rnying rgyud): bzhi'o// mchog tu gnas pa bcu drug nyid// pho mo'i sdebs kyis brgyad du 'gyur// rang ngo dag pa bzhi yis ni// gnad rnams bsdus te nges par bstan// byer zug snyoms pa'i byed las kyi// chos dang zla ba po rnams dang // 'khrul pa
341b6(rnying rgyud): med par sbyar byas na// gnang rnams dag kyang nges par 'gyur// jis lazhin gsheb// de ltar gnad la brten nas ni// gyis kyi sbyor ba'i yan lag bshad// oM mdo mtshang rje ba nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan gyis ma gsungs pa'i// 'byung ba'i rtsis
341b7(rnying rgyud): kyi rim pa lo// brten nas 'khor 'das 'jal byed pa'i// rab tu gsang ba 'di nyon cig/ chu dang sa ste me rlung las// rnam pa dang bye ba'i rim pa nyid// lnga pa gcig ni ma nang stong // shes shing bci ba'i rim pa yin/ me kyang / zug dang byer dang snyoms pa'i las// bcug
342a1(rnying rgyud): dag las ma la nams kyang // bcu gnyis dag stegs ma gsum skyes// sa so'i dumags dang du brel yang // ngas dang blo ba ma 'asgrubs brtags// za ma zhag dang zla bar// byeng cag stoms bya dngas sa
342a2(rnying rgyud): kyang // skye dang rgas dang na ba dang // de bzhin 'chi ba'i dus rnams gzung // gza' dang skang ma gdon rnams dang // nyi ma'i dus kyi rim pa'o// bzang dang ngan pa'i bye zug partsi// bya dang mi bya mkhas pas gzung // gzugs dang sgra dang rdo yis/
342a3(rnying rgyud): tshe rabs snga rtse'i las 'brel brtags// 'byung ba so so'i 'gyu byed kyis// dge sbyong 'phel dang gdon dus bzung // nang mthun dbye ba bcu drug gis// las dang nyon mongs ye shes brtags// 'byung bas bskyed dang gnas dang 'jig/ stong dang
342a4(rnying rgyud): 'khyams dang 'byams pa dang // 'khyil dang 'khor dang log pa dang // rno dang drug dang drag zhan dang // dgra dang gshed dang grogs dag gis// rang rang las kyi rnam grangs brtsi// phyi rol 'byung ba'i gzugs dag gis// ya bzhi bzung ste rang dang bstan
342a5(rnying rgyud): rang dang 'byung ba'i bsdeb ka yis// tshe dang dbang thang dus rnams bzung / nye nga gzugs kyang ThA // skyes dang na dang 'chi ba ni// rang dang gzhan du nges par sbyar// zla ba dgran dbyar dpyid ston dang // gsum gyi grangs brtsis bcu gnyis/ sa gzhi sa lja/ la// lo ts+tsha
342a6(rnying rgyud): zhag kyang 'bum zag gsum// skar ma yi ni gnyis med pas// lo dang zla ba steng brtsegs 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan gyi sgrar byed las// nyin mtshan mnyam pa dus gnyis 'gyur// chos zhes rnam grangs grags pa las// yang gyi rol mtshan mo
342a7(rnying rgyud): da dag kya chagagasas/ 'gyung / ring // de nas brgya dang brgyad cu yis// mar gyi ngo la nyin mo ring // nyin mtshan ring zung byed pa yi// 'byung ba pho mo'i thabs dbye las// bcu gnyis rim pa nyin mtshan las// log pa'i dus te mkhas pas bzung //
342b1(rnying rgyud): nyin mtshan ring dang thung ba las// dge dang mi dge dbye ba'o// nyin mtshan 'gres pa'i zhag la yang // zla ba lo ste gyer zug snyoms// rten 'brel dus te bcu gnyis sbyar// thams cad bcu gnyis rim shes na// 'jam dpal mkhyen pa rdzogs pa'o//
342b2(rnying rgyud): phyi rol 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul dang // nyin mtshan ring thung rnam grangs las// 'byung ba'i lo rnams dus tshod sbyar// lo ni so so'i 'gres// gsuM ste du ni tsu nyis kyang/ yang byung / sbyar te// mgo la rang dus mnyam sbyar nas// rlung dang 'od dang sgra chen dang //
342b3(rnying rgyud): g.yos mnyam dang gzugs brnyan dang // nam mkha' dag gi ya la lugs ni// so so'i phyogs dang nges bstun nas// sad dang chur chen char med dang // mu ge nad dang gdon rigs dang // rtsod dang ri khri g.yo ba ni// so so'i dus dang rigs las
342b4(rnying rgyud): shes// rgyal po dmangs dang dge sbyong dang // btsun mo blon po paN+Di ta// rgan dang gzhon dang phyugs rnams dang // gzhan yang byol song so so'i bye brag dang // skyes pa bud med gzugs rnams dang // shing thog lo thog rtsi thog rnams// legs dang nyes
342b5(rnying rgyud): dang bzang ngan rnams// rim pas rnal 'byor pas shes bya'o// zis lan me gnyis pa// e ma do mtshar rmad byung ba'i// 'byung ba'i bde ba 'di lta bu// bstan pa gzhan du ma grags pa'i// yang gsang bla na med pa nyid// lta bu skal ldan ngo che bas// ngo mi tshogs pa/
342b6(rnying rgyud): khyod la bshad// mchog tu skal ldan brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba'i yid dang bral ba yis// bla ma mchod dang bstod bya ste// 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs la// so so'i 'byung ba dang bskrun te// chu dang sa dang me dang rlung // so so'i lus dang res sbyar te//
342b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba so so'i go rim gyis// dngos po'i gzugs rnams des dpyad la// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ngo // so so'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la// sla nas brtsams te bslab par bya'o// de yang rnal 'byor skal ldan pas// dngos po so so'i kha dog dang /
343a1(rnying rgyud): dbyibs la lags par brtags kyang te// thun mong mchog gi bsgrub par snang / denas so so'i sgral byung // skral nges par 'byangs pa yis// zhagan rnamasal ba rnams pas 'thag// de gyur la 'thung ba la// datsun
343a2(rnying rgyud): 'grus rab dang 'bring mtha' yi// zhag dang zla ba lo rnams kyis// so so'i tshad la rtags kyis 'grub// 'di ltar su yi 'grub pa la// sprul pa'i sku dang longs sgra dang // chos spri ngo bo nyid kyi sku// mchog tu sgra yi 'bras bur sbyor// gcig ni ma ning stong
343a3(rnying rgyud): phyir ro// sbrul sogs pa'i dbye ba ni// gnas 'jug 'byung dang bzlog drag rje// so so'i bri brag la bzhin nas// bran mong las kyi stong ga ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang rigs drag da // 'brang bso so'i skang rnams la// bden nas mngon par shes pa 'brug//
343a4(rnying rgyud): zas gos 'bral dang 'byung ba la// / sgra dang bral nas dbang bskur ro// lus kyi 'byung ba zad pa dang // mar me'i grib ma bzhin du 'gyur// rga shi'i sdug bsngal nyer bral nas// nyi zla dag dang mnyam par 'gyur// phyi nang dbugs ni rgyun bcad nas// rnam
343a5(rnying rgyud): par rtog pa thams cad 'gags// mi rtog bsam gtan la brten nas// chos kyi dbyings dang nye bar sbyor// 'jig rten thun mong lus bzung nas// 'di nyid zad nas khams gsum ru// ldog pa de ni ma yin no// dris lan nigasum pa// spo ba'i las ni rnam
343a6(rnying rgyud): pa gnyis// dngos po nyid dang stong pa'o// dngos po gzugs kyis bsdus pa ste// de ltar 'byung ba la 'byongs na// rlung la goms pa brtan byas nas// dngos po'i gzugs can gang rung la// shes pa bcug pas 'gul bar nus// de ni dngos por
343a7(rnying rgyud): slob kyi// nga bas sus kyig mas pa gci/ chos kyi dbyings pa chos kyiste// gnyis cing byung bas da dzinas// nga nyi dgasal pa'i ba bzhin pa// sems kyang demang po // nan thal tshag rdzogs pa yis// gan gyi grolab
343b1(rnying rgyud): smran/ sa s+ho/ // sa sa/ / so /
343b2(rnying rgyud): bdag/ dngas bcags pa sa / rnam tho // kun du thab pa yinano// dbazhin gzhan ga cigs pa dgas/ tham pas bkan kya // rlung gornas pas na byab/ ga pa'i
343b3(rnying rgyud): ma// nam byu pa shA kya/ dun pa rgyabs pas/ gzugs pa sna pa'i srog napa/ ba nam thang drug gis/ ga gags pa
343b4(rnying rgyud): nAM// de ltar tham pas dngas las grol// g+hA k+Sha rten phrel byung bgang // bem po'i dbyung ba ba'i gra lan// dngos pa'i thung pa'i don rje kyis// grangs dung brda 'du gang dag gis// dmigs pa bsgra shA rna migs su// ni
343b5(rnying rgyud): 'du gsags dang // nang mug dzim tha mamag// / da da sa nam sakhas kya// rjes pa las// rnam ma me kyi shi kyis bsgod// deg gas ma rnam brtags// gzhazhan brgyag ras byung bdag
343b6(rnying rgyud): du da/ / bye da/ bam+b+his/ / dzinas dzings pa ga /
343b7(rnying rgyud): ga// 'a ga na phru sa gyu/ nas// rlu sa /
344a1(rnying rgyud): dang na / pa da dang/ phrul da sa du / na // sa dang
344a2(rnying rgyud): rjod pang kyang ba bcwa te/ mal sa Al// sa dang 'dilag nga // da ded pa / du gsu dub da dam ga ma/ sa pal 'dzi rdzogs dag/ 'du gsu pa
344a3(rnying rgyud): na nga la drangs// a sman pag myi gis// sa myur mas // ngan rdzogs dang / ma pa nga rkyo tshogs da // gnas dzid pod don ces zang // sems nas rnam nga dang // da gas pa
344a4(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal/ ga par ga phyims// pasa'i grangs te// nges pa dgas di thas da sa par shes byams// nyid pas tshul ra dang // gzhan kyis nin 'bral gyur bzlas/ 'di ltar byas pa d+ha 'a
344a5(rnying rgyud): sa so// zab ma pa'i dgongs pan ma gnyis te// 'jig tan lam 'jug nag pa pa dang // mapa don gyi don ma / sa'i gzhir dbang po yis// 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa ste// theg pa dag ni gnyis su 'dod// gzhan 'ag
344a6(rnying rgyud): rten pa yin// / 'di las 'dod pa gnyis yin na// 'das pa rgyung nga bras thapas// d+ha lpags pa la rgyas zung gi nas// gnas tshalas kyi drug tu gyur// 'di ltar ba ba ngamapas sa// dgang ngag brten nas ni// khams gsam pa
344a7(rnying rgyud): dang yang dag gi// lam du 'jug par byed pa'o// dam pa'i na thal nas// dbang po cig nga grol pas// mang nasus bzang ba'i gni gyis ni// rang gi thub pa'i mtha shiganas// gang lazhin dang 'dzin med par// yang rag rgyas
344b1(rnying rgyud): ro sbyangs nas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rten med par// mkha' la mra pa' nyid bris bltar// rnal 'byor mchog kyang de bzhin no// ji 'di dab// mthar thug pa yi dgongs pa ni// bskyed pa mna' ni lus yin te// de nyid skra dang zung 'jug pas/
344b2(rnying rgyud): dngos po zad pa nyid 'jug// rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyi mtha'// 'dra zhing 'dzin par byed pas na// rlung dang shes pa zung 'jug pa'o// snang ba zad pa nyid la thug/ thub pa'i mtha' yi brjod bya la// rang gzhan 'dod bzung 'jug pas// rang ngo shes pa nyid
344b3(rnying rgyud): pa bug/ phyag rgya chen po nyid kyi mtha'// bsgyur ba bde ba dag yin te// bde dang stong pa zung 'jug pas// yid la byed pa med la thug/ rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i mtha'// chos rnams rang sar bzhag pa ste// snang shes chos nyid zung 'jug pas// ye grol
344b4(rnying rgyud): cog bzhag hrid la thug/ dgongs pa d+mo las 'das pa dang // mtshan bcas rang sar dag pa dang // stong dang dngos po'i mtha' grol dang // 'gyu zad rtog pa med pa dang // blo zad yid las 'das pa'o// rdzis dag brgyad pa// e ma gsang sngags mthar thug pa'i//
344b5(rnying rgyud): bsrub pa'i rim pa grangs mang yang // gtso bos rnam par phye ba ste// thugs dang shes rab mchog tu nab// de nyid las ni nyer bsdus pa// ro zhig zhes rab rnam par bshad// byin rlabs ston pa rnal 'byor ma// 'di ltas bsrub pa bdun du 'gyur// bsnyen pa bsgrub
344b6(rnying rgyud): pa las gyi mthung // so so'i sngags rab mchog tu zab// ci ltar yi ge'i sbyor 'brel gyis// so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags bzung la// sgrub pa pos ni bzlas pa brtsam// skyed par byed pa'i gsal byed las// so so'i 'dog gis kyi nas// cho ga'i yan lag kun rdzogs te// bcom
344b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ma'i gzugs su ldang // ye shes dbang bskur gyis brgyan te// dngos bub 'dod pas rtag tu bsgom// A li kA pa'i phreng ba la// dmigs te rnam 'byor broganas bya'o// rgyas gdab sems la rdzogs pa brten// slad gso ye shes lus kyis ni// yang nas yang du ma
345a1(rnying rgyud): saH/ sngad na// drug dang bdun dang dgra ste gcig/ gnyis dang gsum dang lnga yis ni// gdan mi za bar 'brub pa // dngos bu bston pa'i 'od ze can// 'di la bslab pa gsum du 'gyur// gsal byed phreng ba rnang sbrebs kyis// 'di yim du/
345a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyang shes// de la brten pasgrubs dang mtshungs// yan lag 'dus pa'i chog las// lha mo'i mdog dang na'aphrag ni// gsal bar na la grod lus gnas na// thugs kyi 'ang kyi phreng ba las// dmigs pa ci 'ad gsopa pa gadrag// sems ni m-i
345a3(rnying rgyud): gi bgasal te// zung 'dug rdzogs pa chen por bklag/ de ltar rtag tu bgom pa'am// yang na thun drug d+han brtenan// dgu dang bdun dang la yis ni// nges par 'grub par gdon myi na'o// las rnams ston pa can ti// 'di nyid la yang sgrub pa/
345a4(rnying rgyud): gsus// dbyangs kyi yig 'phral khebs kyis// 'di namus sngags kyang shes byas la// dz+hag ldan pa'i rnam 'byo ngas// ra mo mas gi gnas bsams te// lha mo'i gzugs kyi mdog gsum la// yi ge gzug pa phy-i gA las// mi mthun
345a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid bsal ba la// lus nis so'i khro mo bsgom// las rdzogs nas n-i stong pa yi// sems kyi rnal dargyar rdzogs pa'o// de skang rtag tu bsgoms pa yis// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum gyis ni// dong pa'i don kun sa
345a6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// thabs kyi sgrub pa zab mo nyid// mdor bslus pas ni bshad par bya'o// las kyi mthar thug gshin rje'i gshed// 'di la sgrub pa gnyis yo dang // A li kA li mnyam sbar bas// de yi sngags kyang shes par bya// 'khor pa'i las rnam
345a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byas te// tshiga'i dgongs pa tshang ba las// kyai D+ha mos pa'i yig ni// 'dogangs par bas mabyas te// gshi rdo'i gshid kyi ra 'o// gcig si la sa kyi mtha' baspyar na// ji lce da pa'i mos pas bsnyen// gcin ni mi rdzog
345b1(rnying rgyud): pa la// rnal 'byor pa yi sems gnas bya'o// nus pa'i mthar thug mi g.yo mgon// 'di la sgrub pa gsum yod de// A li kA li so so'i 'brel// de rnams sngags ni shes par bya// bsrung ba'i dam tshig lnga po la// cho ga rnams ni rdzogs byas te// rdza
345b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal mi g.yo mgon po'i sku// dad pas nges par rang lus bsam// lcags kyu yi ni 'od zer gyis// dgug dang bsad dang bcings pa'i las// rang gis ci ltar 'dod pa smra// rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du bsngo// 'di ltar bsgrub pa zab mo nyid// gshin rje'i gshed
345b3(rnying rgyud): ni 'bum phrag gsum// gnyis dang lngas ni rnal 'byor rdzogs// mi g.yo 'bum phrag gcig dang ni// de bzhin bathad kya/ gnyis dang gsum gyis 'grub// zab mo'i don gyi bsgrub pa gnyis// mdor bsdus nges par dril ba yin// 'di la the tshom sus za ba/
345b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kyi bka' bcag go// de phyir nges par 'grub pa'o// dris pa na zhe pa// gnas lugs 'dug tshul 'di lta bu// bshad na nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// rab tu skrag ste ba rgyal bar 'gyur// des na mchog tu gsang bar bya'o// brtag pa med pa'i chos rnams ni// byung
345b5(rnying rgyud): ba med pa'i gzhi zhes bya// de la gnas pa med pa'i phyir// dngos dang stod pa gang mi gnas// gsal dang mun pa srid 'byung min// 'gro 'ong srid mtha' med phyir ro// 'bad cing rtsol bas ma bcings pas// zad ma nyid dang thal byung ngo // rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa'i phyir//
345b6(rnying rgyud): dge dang sdig pa'ang 'grub pa med// dge sdig gnyis ka sel phyir ro// 'khor dang 'das pa mi gnas pas// chos nyid stong pa kun khyab phyir// ye shes rang ngor gnas pa las// gsum gyi tshul du dbyer med do// dris lan lnga bcum// 'di ltar gzhan du ma bshad pa'i// 'khrul
345b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtses sbyor ngo mchor can// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// rtsa ba yi ni rten 'brel las// so so'i lus kyi 'byung ba dang // rten 'brel 'khor lo'i 'brel so yis// 'khrul pa'i dus tshod nges bzung ste// rags par gnas pa'i dus dag las// rnal 'byor sems kyi 'khrul
346a1(rnying rgyud): ngos bzung // 'khrul dus gnas dus bzlog pa'i dus// bye brag gsum las bcu gnyis tshad // mtha' ldan tshad kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis// ri mig rnams ni mkhas pas bzung // dus dang bu dang nyer len gyis// phung khams pa
346a2(rnying rgyud): sogs par gyur// ldog par byed pa'i gnang kyis kyang // lus can so so'i 'khrul pa bzlog/ dzi lenas cig pa// shes bya rang gi mtshan nyid la// skye dang byi brag 'gyur shes kyis// mosa'i 'dod pa tha dad kyang / 'jig rten ying spyod bkru ba yi// spros pa la dga'i
346a3(rnying rgyud): gro rnams kyis// re zhig tshig dang bcas pa spyod// lugs su khyad par sdebs gnyis kyi// 'du shes can dag mtha' la 'jog/ mngon su ma gnad kyi man ngag gis// 'khor 'das 'byed pa'i spos pa gcod// bzhom pa gnad kyi 'khor lo yis// rlung sems
346a4(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i smos pa gcod// shes 'jug lam gyi rim pa yis// the tshom 'khrul pa'i blo rnams gcod// rje lanang gnyis pa// bla mardo rje 'chang chen gyis// rim pa rnam par bshad par bya'o// mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'i bla ma ni// yon tan kun gyi 'byung khrungs shing //
346a5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzhi 'dzin pa'o// rtsa ba yan lag gla ma gnyis// so so'i mtshan nyid rkyong ba la// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// 'khor dang longs spyod rnams kyis bzhin// lus ngag spyod pas mnyes pa yi// bla ma sangs rgyas mnyam stor bsten//
346a6(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab ldan pa dang // mos shing 'khrul pa med pa dang // brjod bya rnams ni 'khrul nor med// dbang po gas labs bla ma bsnyen// bsnyen pa de las yin tan ni// dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin nor// 'dod 'jo ba dang 'dra ba yi// yon tan dpag/
346a7(rnying rgyud): tu med pa 'thob// de la dmigs te bla ma bsnyen// 'khor ba'i g.yul las bzlog phyir ro// dris pa nang gtum pa// phyi rol 'byung rtags sra ba dang // tshe zhing bsreg dang sdud cing brlan// yang zhing 'byed dang khyab pa nyid// 'byung ba'i bslab bya'i bum bu yi// rnal
346b1(rnying rgyud): byor ba yi lus dag gis// 'di dag rnams kyang 'dzin pa ste// bcu ga nyis mo yings ngas dang // rang dang mthun par legs sbyar te// ma mo'i dus kyi dang po la// sgra dang gdums ngag la sogs te// dmigs kyi cho phral bcu gnyis las// !
346b2(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis ni 'jig rten lha// skyong bar byed pa bcu gcig la// than du nges par dmigs byas te// 'dzam bu gling du snang bar byed// nam mkha' dag gi yal lugs kyis/ spri dang gtam ngan yang byung // cho 'phrul gyis kyang nges par dbye// 'dzam gling rang
346b3(rnying rgyud): sa'i phyogs bzung ste// shar la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang // mi chen dmangs la sogs pa la// dge dang mi dge nges par ston// de bzhin rgyal khams legs nyes dang // dge dang mi dge mkhas pas brtags// 'di ni dngos po'i grub pa bzlas
346b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mngon shes nges 'grub po// bris lan bzhig/ dus ni las 'phro sad pa dang // 'byung ba'i 'gyur dang sems kyi gnad// 'khrul pa dag pas rang dus rnyed// de yi bzlog pa'i dus yin no// bstan pa'i ba ba ni stong pa dang // stong pa nyid
346b5(rnying rgyud): dang mthar byed de// lhag ma gang zag so so'i dus// gong du bstan pa nyid dang mtshungs/ dris la nang ldag// e ma lha bdag dbang phyug nyid// dang ldan skal pa chen po nyon// rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas pa yi// sus kyang shes pa med pa yi// dbang
346b6(rnying rgyud): bskur ba yi cho ga bshad// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa'o// sdebs ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis// 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid sems bzhi// rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir// dbang ni rnam pa bzhi yis kyang // skal bar ldan pa
346b7(rnying rgyud): smin par bya'o// spos bcas nyid dang spos med dang // shin tu spros pa med pa dang // de bzhin rab tu spros pa med// dbye ba bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// dad ldan dang rgyud smin par byed// spros pa can gyi don du yang // bsnyen pa bsgrub pa nye bar bsnyen/
347a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid tshang ba'i bla mas bya// gzhan yang sa yi cho ga dang // sta gon thig dang tshon 'gye dang // rgyud las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs// de nas dbang bskur cho ga yang // nyan thos theg pa nas brtsams te// rim
347a2(rnying rgyud): pa brgyad po rdzogs byas nas// rdzogs chen rig pa rtsal dbang bskur// de dag so so'i dgos pa dang // 'jug cing nus pa'i khyad par bshad// spros med dang ldan 'jug sprin gyir// spros pa med pa'i dbang mchog ni// maN+Dal bus pa la brten nas// tshigs
347a3(rnying rgyud): su bcad pa'i dbang sbyin bya// shin tu smos pa med pa la// 'khor 'das ru shan 'og bzhin dbye// de tshe nam mkha'i mtshan nyid las// lus ngag yid kyi sgrib pa spang // mtshan nyid kyis ni nges par brtags// gal te spyod pa ma dag na// rang dang mthun pa'i dge
347a4(rnying rgyud): bas sbyang // dbang ni brdal brten pa yis// rang rig gsal ba'i rang ngo 'grod// brda 'grol man ngag mkhas pas b+ha// rab tu spros pa med pa la// sems kyi dkyil 'khor lo skye la// lus kyi 'dug stangs nges par brtsam// de la goms te gzigs spangs sbyar//
347a5(rnying rgyud): mngon sum rig pa lung gi brda'o// bris pan drug pa// rtog med sems dpa' lha yi bu/ dga' byed dbang phyug mgu bya'i phyir// dbang brten pa yi dam tshig bshad// bye brag brjod kyis mi langs kyang / mdor bsdus sku dang gsung dang bugs// rnal 'byor lus
347a6(rnying rgyud): ngag yid la sbyar// dmigs pa bla ma rdo rje mched// bsrung ba'i yul gyi rnam par dbye// sdom pa lus dang ngag tu 'dus// rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas gzung bya'o// dris lan bdun pa// yang ni lha dbang dga' byed nyon// tshig brjod grub mtha'i rnam grangs kyis// rim
347a7(rnying rgyud): pa dgu ni yid spyod pas// mngon sum gnad de dang bral ba la// ma 'ongs gdul bya'i sems can rnams// tshig la yid ces byed pa 'byung // rtog pa rags pa'i sems can rnams// tshig la spyod phyir spen pa min// 'di yi bstan pa tha ma'i dus// mos pa
347b1(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i sa zhes bya'o// dris la nang brgyad pa// tshig 'das spros pa yongs rdzogs che// gsang ba nges pa'i rgyud 'di ni// mngon sum lam la brten pa yi// rang shes rig par 'dus pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa yi// rang rig nges pa'i chos nyid
347b2(rnying rgyud): mnyam nyid 'dres pa med pas spyad// de ni tshig 'das rim pa'o// dris na sul// mngon sum gnad ni lus ngag sems// so so'i gnad rnams nges par bstun// de yang lus ni sku gsum las// rgyun du 'da' bar mi bya'o// ngag ni bslab dang gnas pa dang /
347b3(rnying rgyud): labazla ba yang bstan par bya'o// sems ni dbyings la gtad pas 'grub// gnad gsum man ngag 'bral mi bya// de yang sgo dang yul nyid dang // rlung dang reg pa'i gnad nyid brten// sgo ni sku gsum mig gis blta// yul ni sgrib rdzar/ byed bral ba'o// rlung
347b4(rnying rgyud): rig dal bas ye shes 'grub// de la snang ba bzhir 'gyur te// chos nyid mngon sum snang ba yis// yid dpyod 'dzin pa'i tshig las 'das// gong du 'phel ba'i nyams snang gis// 'khrul pa'i snang ba nub par byed// rig pa tshad pheb snang ba yis// su
347b5(rnying rgyud): gsum rtogs pa'i lam snang 'das// chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyun thag bcad// de la mtha' brten yid ches bya'o// mi 'gul gsum la gzhi bcas pas// rlung sems gnad la pheb pa'o// sdod pa gsum gyis tshad
347b6(rnying rgyud): bzung bas// rmi lam bzlog dang lus ngag yid// rtags dang tshad ni nges bzung ba'o// thob pa gsum gyis gzer btab pas// zag bcas phung po mi snang ba'o// dris lan gzung // e ma ngo mtshar che ba yi// 'khor 'das ru shan ma phyes na// khams
347b7(rnying rgyud): gsum lus ngag yid kyi yang // 'brel pa chod par mi 'gyur bas// 'khor 'das ru shan phye ba bshad// 'di la rnam pa gsum yod do// lus ni 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // bcud cing 'khrul 'khor sna tshogs dang // yan lag ben zhing skud pa dang // bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs
348a1(rnying rgyud): brten// dran pa'i sem kyis mngon bsgyangs te// 'gro drug gzugs kyi spyod pa rnams// sems kyis za nyelus kyis bya'o// de ltar sa yis spyod nus na// ci lta bsams pa phyis tun chud// 'di la dgos pa rnam pa gnyis/
348a2(rnying rgyud): thun mong mchog gi dbyebs brtags// de ltar rtags dang tsho phebs na// rnal 'byor pa yi dag sbyong brtsam// brjod pa rtog pa'i rang bzhin phyir// sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs pa// ci sgyus ldog pa med pa'i phyir// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri
348a3(rnying rgyud): bum khyab 'jug gi/ skad ni bzang ngan bye brag brjod// mdor na 'gro ba drug gi skad// sems kyi dran bsam dag gis brjod// 'dir yang dgos pa rnam pa gnyis// mchog dang thun mong mtha' yi dbye ba'o// de ltar tshad la phebs nas kyang // rnal
348a4(rnying rgyud): byor pa yis sems sbyang bya// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dran pasam 'phro 'du'i 'khor lor brten// dga' dang mi dga' bzang ngan sems// yod med sna tshogs thams cad la// phyi ru brtags te nang du bsam// ci ltar bsam pa'i dran pa nyid// phyi
348a5(rnying rgyud): nas skye rgyun 'chad par nges// 'di yi dgos pa gong gis dbye// de ltar spyod pa rdzogs byas na// mngon sum gnang la rtag tu 'gel// de rdzogs khams gsum 'jug pa min// rab tu gsang ste bstan par bya'o// nges pan re gcig pa// gal te lus kyi/
348a6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa la// brten nas nang rlung 'dzin 'dod pas// rlung 'dzin spyod pa nyer gcig ni// rnal 'byor pa yis byed spyod na// rlung la goms he lus 'byongs 'gyur// rgyan cha dag ni ldan pa la// gnas su rten 'grel 'khor lo bya// rlung dang shes pa rgyan la
348a7(rnying rgyud): gad// 'gro zher mig gi lta stangs sbyar// 'dug pa'i tshen sems 'phang ngo // nges shes pa// sems 'dzin bslab pa nyid gcig gis// dang po gnas su gzug pa dang // gnyis pa lus sems 'bral ba dang // gsum pa chos nyid mthong ba'o//
348b1(rnying rgyud): 'di dus lus ngag sems kyi gnang // rnal 'byor ldan pas rnal dab 'a bya'o// 'bru byed rlung gi brda' dang yang // bsres shing 'phen cing sprad pa yi// gnad rnams mkhas pas bsnyen bya na// sems kyi rtog pa tun chad do// dza ga ba// 'jing
348b2(rnying rgyud): rtags kyang nyi shu gcig/ dur khrod dben pa'i phyogs song la// bla ma mchod cing gtor maH// gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba yis// 'gro ba gzhan yang mgu byas te// de nas phyi nang gsang ba yi// 'chi ba'i rtags kyang brtag par bya'o// gal te nganan
348b3(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa brtsam// bzang bas bla mar gsol ba btab/ dris pa sa nipa// sems can don phyir lha dbang khyod// brtse ba'i don de dris pa'i lan+da// ngas bstan 'khrul pa med par bzung // rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po la// dmigs gtad lta ba'i blo zad
348b4(rnying rgyud): kyang // re zhig tshig gis gtan la dbab// chos nyid mngon sum gnad kyis kyang // las la bzang ngan med par rtogs// snying zhig nges par bslu ba yis// dbang po rnams la rno rnal med// yid dpyod tshig gi mthang zad pas// shes
348b5(rnying rgyud): rab mig gi dbang pos mthong // tshig gis chos nyid mi mthong bas// thun mong theg pas don mi 'grub// sku gsum lam snang yin pa'i phyir// 'di mthong khams gsum ldog pa min// chos kun mnyim par ro gcig pas// gzhi dang 'bras bur ltos min pa'o//
348b6(rnying rgyud): rang rig rtog pa kun bral bas// grol lugs bzhi dang bcas pa'o// gnang bzhi grol ba'i gdeng gis ni// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mi gnas// ma byung byas pa med pa'i chos// gzhi dang rtsa ba med pa'o// thos mthong grol ba'i gnang nyid ni// gnyis dang lnga
348b7(rnying rgyud): ste brgyad kyis rtogs// gdeng chen bzhi yis dbyings su sbyar// ngo sprod gsum gyis yid ces bya'o// dris lan rje ba// yang ni bsgom pi'i srog shing bshad// sems kyi lu gis nges sbyar te// gzhan yang bsgom pa'i gnad rnams la// sngon 'gro ba dang dngos gzhi
349a1(rnying rgyud): dang // rjes 'gro rnam pa gsum du 'dod// lus stangs sems nyid gdul ba dang // ngag gi bya ba rdzogs pa yis// sems nyid lam du zhugs pa'o// rlung la brten te lus sems bral// khams gsum 'phros khung bcad pa'i phyir//
349a2(rnying rgyud): lus ngag zhen pa gting nas bzlog/ 'gro drug g.yang sa mnyam pa'i phyir// lus ngag yid kyi gnad rnams gzir// sems nyid chos dang bsre ba'i phyir// rlung dang shes pa gyen du dang // 'khrul snang zad par bya ba'i phyir// rtag tu rlung la goms par bya'o//
349a3(rnying rgyud): dras la na drug pa// spyod pa'i sbyor ba dbyings rig la// gzer gsum ldan pa 'bral med par// rtag tu 'dris na spyod pa bde// chos kun bya ba bral ba dang // 'khor 'das 'brel pa chad pa'i dus// rtog bcas 'khrul pa 'gags pa ste// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa
349a4(rnying rgyud): rgyun bcad pas// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa'o// dris lan de bdun pa// 'bras bu brjod par mi nus kyang // chos rnams zad sar phyin pa dang // rang gi grub pa'i mtha' yang 'jig/ 'di dus bla ma'i man ngag nub// blta sgom spyod pa'i mtha' stongs pas//
349a5(rnying rgyud): chos su snang ba yod ma yin// sku dang ye shes rgyun chad pas// sangs rgyas med cing sems can med// mdor na gang yang gnas pa med// song ba med pas 'ong ba med pa'o// nis ngan re brgyad pa// 'khor ba'i rgyun thag gcad 'dod pas// lus ngag zhen pa
349a6(rnying rgyud): bzlog nas kyang // mngon sum gnad la gzir bar bya'o// 'khrul pa'i rtses kyi sbyor ba yi// 'khor 'das dus tshod bzung byas te// bzlog pa'i gnad la mkhas par bya'o// thub drug tshad du phyin pa yis// skyon dug las ni rnam par grol// des ni 'khor ba'i rgyun
349a7(rnying rgyud): tshad do// dris la da kyal// bcud kyis len pa 'di lta bu// rgyud gzhan kun tu ma bstan pa// e ma do mtshar che bar bshad// lha bdag sems dpa' khyod nyon cig/ rin po che la brten pa yis// tshe ni nyi zla dag dang mnyam// sna tshogs rdo yi sbyor ba yis// mtshan
349b1(rnying rgyud): gyis lus la tshugs pa min// sngo la brten pa'i sbyor ba yis// skra dkar gnyer ma med par 'gyur// rtsi skyor ngag gi bcud len gyis// gzi brjid ldan zhing gzhon par 'gyur// sha la brten pa'i sbyor ba yis// lus zungs ldan zhing stobs bskyed 'gyur//
349b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rlung la brten pa yi// ngo mtshar che ba'i bcud len bshad// 'byung ba rgyun gcod ces bya ba'i// steng dang 'og gi rlung gis shes// mkhas pas rlung ni gnas su snga// yang ni rlung gi 'gyu rtsis kyis// zas kyi rnal 'byor dag tu 'gyur// 'byung ba dag
349b3(rnying rgyud): la brten pa yis// ci ltar snang ba zas su 'gyur// de ltar bcud kyi len pa yis// 'gro ba'i gdung ba chod pa'o// dris lan bdun drug/ gos kyi rnal 'byor 'di lta ste// rlung dang rten 'brel zab mos bya// rlung ni 'phen zhing sdud pa las// 'gro 'ong bskyil ba'i
349b4(rnying rgyud): gnad kyi yang // dmigs pa so so'i 'byung ba dang // rnal 'byor lus la mthun par dbye// rten cing 'brel ba'i sbyor ka yis// gnyis dang drug dang bdun gsum la// ri lu phye ma legs sbyar nas// ltor btang byugs pa'i mtha' yi bya'o// dris lan don gcig pa
349b5(rnying rgyud): yang ni lus 'byung chun gcod pa'i// bcud len ngo mtshang che ba bshad// dri chen rgyun du bskor ldog pas// tha ma lus kyi zag pa zad// yang na bcung phyung mar khwa ni// tshad dang ldan pa bsten pa yis// 'byung ba'i rgyun rnams chad par 'gyur// lus kyi 'byung ba
349b6(rnying rgyud): rgyun chad pas// lus la srog chags mi gnas dang // bshang gci la sogs med pa dang // phyi nang rlung yang med par 'gyur// 'di dus rnal 'byor chen po ste// zas gos gnyis ka dag par 'gyur// 'dis ni tshe dang longs spyod la// ci ltar 'dod pa
349b7(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ rdzi 'dadod tim pa// gal te 'byung ba bzhi po la// rdo snyoms byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sa chu me drung gnad bstan no// lus dang baphres te rlung gis spar// rang lus so so'i 'byung ba yis// bsrung zhing de nyid sprod pa la// gnang dus
350a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o// de nyid goms pa'i tshad sbyin pas// bzhi po'i nus pa ngo mnyam nas// bde bar spyod cing 'jig zal te// 'dis kyang zas gos gnyis 'grub nas// tshe dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'o// dri sa/
350a2(rnying rgyud): don samo// mdzod kyi yon tan 'di lta ste// thun mang mchog gi dngos grub la// ci dgar rol cing bde bar 'thab// rten cing 'brel pa'i yan lag rdzogs// rdzu 'phrul rnams dang mngon shes kyang // mdzod la spyod pas nges par 'grub// nad dang
350a3(rnying rgyud): dus chod shes par 'gyur/ dris la na don ni sa// 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul bslab 'dod pas// dngos po'i rten dang dngos med la// rlung gi sbyangs pas nges 'grub ste// sgra dang bzo dang rten 'brel dang // brda' dang tshig dang tha snyad dang // dpe dang bya byed
350a4(rnying rgyud): bslab thabs la// brten nas las rlung spyad pa yis// rdzu 'phrul ci ltar 'dod pa 'grub// rtog med ye shes bsgom pa dang // stong nyid bsam dang gnad kyis kyang // 'bad rtsol med par rdzu 'phrul rnams// nges par 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// jis
350a5(rnying rgyud): don rdzapa// mi 'dzad gter la spyod 'dod pas// khrom gyi 'khrul 'khor bsten pa ste// de yi sbyor rdzil mkhas par bya// dus gsum bzhi gnyis ldan pa yi// zla bcur sbas shing legs bskams nas// gang 'dod phyogs su gtad brtsams te/
350a6(rnying rgyud): zer dang rlung la sbyar ba yis// gang 'dod brtsam pa'i las rnams 'grub// yang na bsgrug pa zab mo yi// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi mtha' phye bas// nor gyi bdag po bsten byas te// sngags la goms pas longs spyod do// dris pan don drugs// gzhi lnga
350a7(rnying rgyud): dbang du byed pa yis// sems kyi bdag pos lus bzung ste// gnas gsum 'khor lo'i lto bar yang // 'bru bzhi lnga dang gzugs 'dogs kyis/ na gi ma byag// baspro bsdu bstim 'khyil pas bya'o// de nyid rdzogs pas 'phur ba dang // 'dzul zhing
350b1(rnying rgyud): me byed 'chag pa med// byeng par mi nus chug nas pa'o// de gas // ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// yon tan thams cad rang rdzogs pas// brjod cing gsungs pa ma yin par// rang b+ha ya shas ral ba las// sna rgyag
350b2(rnying rgyud): ming gi tsha 'phrul na// skal pa bzang po rnams la snang // de ltar rdzogs chen gsang ba'i chog// lha dbang gis ni ngas bris nas// lus gus thal mo legs myur te// ston pa nyid la rjes yi rang // thams cad rdzogs pa chen po las// rang bzhin spros
350b3(rnying rgyud): pa med par gyur// chos nyid dbyings las dbyer med pa'o// zhes mthal 'byung chen po chos rnams kun gyi rtsab pas/ sna tshogs bkod pa rang byung man ngag gi rtsa ba nges par 'byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / mra laka// de nas lha dbang rtog
350b4(rnying rgyud): pa med// chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med kyang // ma 'ongs dus kyi sems can la// rtogs pas nges par 'khor ba las// bsgral bar bya ba'i blo yis kyang // sems bskyed sngon du btang nas ni// ston pa nyid la 'di skad zhus// kye kye brdzus nas skyes pa
350b5(rnying rgyud): sku// sems can khams gsum 'khor ba las// grol bar byed pa'i gnang nyid gang // bcom ldan bdag gis zhub brgya// sems can 'khor ba'i thog ma gang // 'das pa'i tha ma gang gis bzung // sangs rgyas ma 'khrul gnang dzin ci// sem
350b6(rnying rgyud): na 'phrul ba cilas byung // rang rig ye shes gnas pa grag/ nyid lal la ga 'as 'azug/ legs 'char ba'i sgron ci// phrin pa'i gnad d+hi swA Ta// de 'i mtshand nyid cinang sdug// sab kyi gnang ni gang la 'jur// dang rten byed par ga
350b7(rnying rgyud): gis bslab// blo rim gnad ni ci k+Sha pra// nyams sa ci ltar len pa lags// de yi nags dang tshad snang che// bar mad yi snang ba ci// rang sems grol ba gang gis grol// grol nas thugs rje ci ltar 'byung // de nyid ye shes gnang nyid gang // bcu
351a1(rnying rgyud): tshul gnas lugs ci lta ba// dgongs pa gcig gam tha dang lags// kun gzhi chos pa gnyis gnad gang // sems dang ye shes gnad nyid ci// 'byung ba dngas skyigs gang gyis 'byed// sgron ma ci ltar gtims pa lags// gtam
351a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i snang ba ci lta bu// rtsa yi gnang la du tsam zhig/ sems kyi sbyang ba rnam pa du// nyon mongs 'byung ba ci yi rgyu// 'di dag bdag gis ma shes pas// ston pa thugs rje chen po la// tshig brjod rtog dpyod mi mnga' yang // rang bzhin bcos med nam
351a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' nas// brjod med gsung gis bdag pa gsungs/ dngam partags pa la tsas/ de nas ston pa rdo je 'chang // rang bzhin spros med rdzogs rkyen+ya las// sgra tshig ming du mi gnas kyang // nya dbang nyid la 'di skad gsungs// rtog bzang
351a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i nam mkha' las// sgra tshig ming du ma bsgrags kyang // rang byung ye shes chen po nyid// gdod nas byas med rang bzhin las// ma bkod tshig tu 'di ltar shar// 'khor ba rnams kyi thog ma ni// mi 'byed byas med rang gzhan las// dmigs par
351a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i yul shar te// rtog 'dzin las ni tha dad sdang // dmigs 'dzin 'grel pa bcu gnyis sra// 'khor ba'i thog ma nyid du'o// ma rig gsum gyi 'khrul tshul te// klu gcig 'byed med rtsa ba ste// rang nge yin par ma shes pa// 'di yang 'khor ba'i
351a6(rnying rgyud): thog ma'o// de las gcig gsum brgya phrag bzhi// 'khor rkyen brgyad kyis nges bzung ste// gzhig nas 'khrul pa'i rtsis sbyor ro// de las lhan cig skyes pa ste// don dam kun rdzob snang brtags pa'i// bden gnyis cha yi yul nas ni// las kun spyod pa nyi shur
351a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de yul snang cha'i bye brag las// kun brtags nges pa'i rkyen bzhi'i cha// mu dang bdag pos des bzung ste// dmigs pa nyid dang dus mtshungs pas// 'khrul pa'i cha yang brgyad gnyis te// dmigs pa'i dus ni mtshungs pas na// dadu byeng btags pa'i
351b1(rnying rgyud): babral pa// ba ni snang pa rje/ pas ngogs pas mtha' las pa// dus a nga pas// sngags lathal ba 'a nas// rlungag nga phyag/ shes papa dpyong byang ni grang gyung/
351b2(rnying rgyud): yan lag martsag// de yang ming ga zugs 'thal ba'i ma// ming las ga ga ba nag cug nyi// dayong 'as bzhi napa sa \u0f7fsa/ gzugs rnas rigs dgas kyi nas// zla ba cing 'dzin pa pa // las can gyur byed bzhi rgyas brgya
351b3(rnying rgyud): myed 'apar 'jug gi yang // la du nas pa dbang po gams/ seMs de da ga nyis na/ sa lapa ba // dgi sa sa kyimathus pa'i drugs// da nga brizhems pa mjug/ bsed byeng ba den sa
351b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa bdun 'byung // nur bu kyi lan bdu gcis te// yid lda nga mas/ 'a sem po 'i gyur ba // de mamo na ba pa dzin tu brgya'o// sred pa'i 'thal pags sa
351b5(rnying rgyud): drug+sag+sa// yan lags pa 'am bzlog tshul na sa// brgya pa'i po kyim tha sa kyi'o// sred pa'i la bzhi cag sa sbyin na pan sa ga nas so// rdzu than brjid thag la spang cir 'gyur// ngam byung pa za
351b6(rnying rgyud): bar+N+Na// sred pa'i 'khrul bya bcu gnyis la// mI 'bred mal brgya drug go// rdo las rtog baHsa sul sems nams shes sa dang ma dbyar bya'o// skye ba'i mapos gsum gnyis la// bdus dang ngo bzung gis byed// langs da na
351b7(rnying rgyud): sa la brgyad// 'khor tshul bras tha cu gnas sa// nadang gilalal gyi can du// 'a' 'gags dan pal cad// gnas kyi 'jug pa bcad duH// ngag nas du rnams nga// de nga nyis pang /
352a1(rnying rgyud): dbang po lo rnams dang // sa sa'i 'byung ba dus kyis dbye// rang dang gzhan de bzhir 'gyur ro// 'di dag 'khor ba'i thog mar b+hung // sems cas pams ni du mar bcas// 'jug gyir las kun mthar sbyang ba// ldan pas rdzogs
352a2(rnying rgyud): nyer bstan pa'o// zis lan gnyis pa// lha dbang ngo mtshar chen po nyon// mya ngan 'das pa'i tha ma ni// 'khrul pa'i rtog pa kun zad pas// 'khor ba'i byed snang med tshe na// tog zad 'khrul pa rang sdang bas// 'das pa gzhag phyir sems can khams//
352a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du yang 'di nyid yul// gzhan dbang ma yin yongs su grub// kun brtags las dang brjod pas stong // mtha' glan bye ba ma yin no// gnyis gnyis 'jug dang kun tu khyab// las dang dbang po blo rnams yul// 'jug pa'i las ni thad ka'o//
352a4(rnying rgyud): dris lan gsum pa// de ltar 'khor 'das thog mtha' las// sangs rgyas 'khrul par ma gyur pas// gzhi las 'phags pa'i dbang po yis// rang ljang rang bzhin med par shes// rtog dpyod yid rnams phyir ma shor// 'gru ba rang thog chod pa'o// de yang
352a5(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs chen po las// 'khrul zhes ka nas dag pa la// ma 'khrul nyid du bcos su med// med snang mthong ba med pa'i chos// byas byung rtog pa rang 'phags so// 'khrul nas dmigs par snang ba min// rang bzhin ye gdang sam g.yos pas//
352a6(rnying rgyud): chos kun mnyam par ro gcig go// 'dzin rtog bral nas ye sangs rgyas// bcos shing bskyar du btub pa min// de yi gnad ne yA la yin te// yul dang stong pa rig rtsal mnyam// za dang rtog pas shes pa min// yang ni 'phrul pa min pa'i gnad/
352a7(rnying rgyud): gcig shes nga yis thams cad grol// de nyid shes pas bzlog pa nyid// mi snang 'dod pa med pa las// 'byung rig gnas kyi rtog pa zad// byas pas ma phye bcos su med// bya dang byed pa'i blo med pas// yul rkyen sangs pas sangs kyis so//
352b1(rnying rgyud): grol 'gag pa med pa las// yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting ngon gnas// chen po yin pas gong na med// rang bzhin g.yos pa med phyir ro// rjes pan wAg// sems can 'khrul pa gong ma yi// rtsa ba'i rten 'brel la 'khyal bas// 'khrul 'khor
352b2(rnying rgyud): gzhi mar byung // chos nyid rang gdangs snang ba las// rtog 'don sdang bas yid phrog ste// 'khrul pa'i yul ni phra mo'i las// bsgribs shing rang snang mdag gyur// de las bag la nyal ba nyid// phra zhing rdul gyi cha dag ni// 'bru zhing
352b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa tsam du gyur// phra bas phra 'gyur shis pa las// rtog dpyod gzung cha gnyis su song // phra rdul ye shes snad pa 'gags// yul shes zad ka tsam hA shar// mu rig la sogs bcu gnyis chos// 'gro ba'i 'byud rigs brgya gnyis 'gyur// de yi
352b4(rnying rgyud): nang shes 'byung ba'i lus// phung po rnams dang khams dang yang // skye mched las kyi tshogs pa 'dus// nyon mongs 'dus pa dpag med lngas// 'gro ba'i lus gyi rtog tshogs srung // rten 'brel tshogs pa du ma las// mi mthun gzugs so
352b5(rnying rgyud): bye brag go// 'byung ba bzhi yis bskyed pa'i rgyu// rigs dang grangs kyis rnam bsdus te// mi 'dra'i kha dog tha da' las// gong ma'i cha las mngon snang ba'o// gzhi las rtog tshogs 'dus pa yis// byed pa'i las kyang bcu gnyis kyis//
352b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i phung po brten pa dang // gnas dang chags dang 'jig par byed// 'khrul tshul bcu gnyis dag las ni// byed pa nyid du spen pa yis// 'gro ba'i las dang bsod nams dang // dag dang mdag gzugs rnams kyi// bye brag so sor snang ba
352b7(rnying rgyud): byed// gzhan yang snod dang bcud dag gi// 'byung ba'i las kyang rlung gis byed// rlung gis 'phen cing sdud pa dang // 'gro dang 'od dang 'dug par byed// des na rlung gi sa las kun byed// bzlog pa nyid kyang rlung la bung// 'jug 'phel las kyi
353a1(rnying rgyud): ma // nas na / na smra/ sa// / sa 'a na da/
353a2(rnying rgyud): sa
353a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin sa na kyi sna nas /
353a4(rnying rgyud): su sa
353a5(rnying rgyud): sa
353b1(rnying rgyud): rlung gis bskul zhing thig le 'phen// ro ni rtsa la brten pa yis// bde bas lus sems rgyas par byed// mas ni dngas ma sdud pa dang // gong 'og gnas kyi gzhi ma byed// 'di la bskyil zhing ga/ nyems pa gnad// 'di yi yan lag drug po la// gtar zhingang
353b2(rnying rgyud): na ye shes 'gag/ drod thob 'dod na mnye ba gnad// rlung dang thig le dgug par bya'o// rkyang mas skyed byed 'khor lo la// rlung gis 'dzin spad thig le 'jug/ cang zhes bya ba zla med pas// nyag gcig dgongs pa ston par byed// ma
353b3(rnying rgyud): snyigs ma sel ba dang // ngo bo'i gzi mdangs pa skyed pa'o// 'di las gseng zhing mnye ba gnod// 'di la yal ga mi snad pas// smin so bzhi la thig les gda'// zas la dbang pob 'dod pas ni// klung ni gtems shing mchi la mi 'dor/
353b4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gis ni rab brtag go// kun 'drar mas ni dran pa dang // rtse mo'i 'khor lo sdud pas sprin// las rlung bzlog cing ye shes 'dzin// kun ni sbrul skra'i yon tan ster// 'drar bas longs su'i yon tan no// mas ni chos sgra dngos su ston/
353b5(rnying rgyud): yi yan lag bcu gnyis la// gseng zhing 'dril ba gnad yin no// tshe nyid spel na phyugs pa bstan// thig le lus dang sems kyis bya'o// ye shes lA ma ni 'di dag las/ thig le su dang bcas par 'gyur// rlung ni 'gro 'ong las kun byed//
353b6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi badrag po yid kyis bzung // lam gyis bzung dang dgug pa'o// dris pan ban pa// ye shes 'char ba'i sgo nyid ni// lus bcud dngas ma kun 'dus pa'i// tsak+Shu zhes pa'i sgo las 'thon// gnyis kyi cha 'dzin snang ba ston// skyed byed rtsa las
353b7(rnying rgyud): 'brel byung ba'i// rtse mo las ni gcig gyur pa// dbang po yul la 'char byed pa'i// gcig la ya lag lnga yod pa'i// so so'i dbang po'i sgrol sdang // khyad par skyon dang byed pa yi// ba men dra 'dra 'khyil ba las// a 'bras zhes pa dkar nag
354a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzi pa dag// ga la sa pa na// mnas nas// sang napas pa dang na byad ya// sa 'gags
354a2(rnying rgyud): gnas par// de 'i 'byung sh-i kyi zhesan// don dam chos nyid 'byung ba las// skyon pa rnam pa bzhi zhes te// na d+hi gul btong pas// rlos nyid lam snang spyad po'o// mya nags pa di ga zugs sud nI/ gis stod cing ma//
354a3(rnying rgyud): rdzo dang 'gro ba'i 'phel 'thob gyis// ye shes dag ni spyad par byed// thig gi sring pas lus pa byed// 'das pa'i lam gyi sna bcung nas// rlung gis bzag dadage ga ma dngas brjod// baDU tshogs kyi / shes ring rang byung nas
354a4(rnying rgyud): yis// chos kun mnyam pa ro gcig tu// bsdus to ra nga skang 'dzin par byed// 'dis ni ba gcags 'brel rgyun gcod// dacings kyi dngas ma sbed pa dang // rig pa'i sgrarnams 'dzi pa da // gan dag sa btsu pa pa mis// 'khong ba 'a na
354a5(rnying rgyud): bar rjod // de ltar mig lus sman shar bas// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i gnad 'dus par// rang skang stsal rnams 'dzin pa'o// rim ladapa// smin pa'i gnad ni ngas bzhid kyis// nas ldan rtsod skyon cig/ yul dang rig pa rlung dag gis/
354a6(rnying rgyud): chos nyid la mdza ba zung ba // yogs rdzogs pa'i chos nyid dag/ 'di yang blon pa ga de yin no// klu shegs 'bul ba med pan / skangs gis med gi slo skye ba ga de/ tshogags
354a7(rnying rgyud): khrel ba dang // bsgrub pa'i gnad kyis rgya nyid bskyed// rig po'i sgron ma gtims pa gnas// rtsa dang mtheb mdzub mthal bas// ye shes gong du 'phel ba'o// dbyings kyi gnad ni 'khrid pa ste// nyi ma'i 'asras rnal 'byor pas// legs
354b1(rnying rgyud): par byung gi khrid par bya// zla bdag la'ang bslab par gyu'o// 'di ltar rgyun sus byas pa// 'bral pa sa rdzun da// dag pa la gas la mad// sadzo thug pag stongs na// kurbad dang du kru // byed pa mkhas pas /

354b3(rnying rgyud): par 'chang chu'o// ris padadas// smon ma'i mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// phyir yang snang ba ston pa da // ye shes mthur sbrel bar byed// 'khor 'das sa mtshams sbyor ba'o// rang gdangs gsal bas 'od lus la// zlog zal ye zhes sdu par byed// he
354b4(rnying rgyud): bcas yul gyi sdang ba la// mi rtog ye shes gzhi ma 'dzin// rgyang zhags sgron ma'i mtshan nyid ni// khyab pas 'jug la 'jug pas khyab// 'byung ba bzhi bdag byed par gnas// 'dzin 'jug mched dang byed pa'o// shes rab dag gi mtshan nyid ni// gas
354b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshig 'dug gzhi ma smad// nyon mongs las dang bag chags bsreg/ sprin byed 'khor 'dis srog gcod pa'o// thig le stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// zlum zhing rang bzhin kun gsal ba// dmar dang kha dog gsal ba'i 'od// spo dang bcas
354b6(rnying rgyud): te mched par byed// dbyings nyid dag pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mthing ka rang rdzogs gnyis kyi cha// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs pa yis// phung gnyis cha las sku gnyis 'dzin// rab tu sdang ba mched par byed// 'di dag rnams kyang rang shes rdzogs//
354b7(rnying rgyud): khyab bdag sems dpa'i gzugs brgyan ston// lu gu rgyud ni srang nas 'dren// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i gzugs dang mtshungs// ye shes rnams kyi gzi mdangs ston// 'od kyi gting mdangs bkrag kyang ston// sku dang thig le 'dun pa'o// de ltar
355a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes rdzogs pa'i sgra// 'di nyid su la mthong 'chang rgya ste// ga sum zangs rang bzhin grol// gzung 'dzin 'phra la brgyal nas ni// 'khor 'das gnas zag tshad pa'// dam pa 'a ma// 'di nyid yul gnang 'du
355a2(rnying rgyud): sprin bral gyi yul stong pa la// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i byal ma gnas// 'di dang ma bral chos nyid do// spyir ni so so'i mtshan nyid las// yul ni bdad gcig rdzogs gnad// ye shes 'dus pas sems rgyun 'gags// 'byung ba 'dus pas lus rdzogs
355a3(rnying rgyud): khyad par chen po'i snang ba las// smin 'jug bapyod pa'i yul du gnas/ rtog mtha' zad phyir 'khor las grol// rgyang zhags yul ni gzugs la sogs// skud cing 'dzin la 'phen par byed// gnad kyis bcing dngang zhag pa dang // dngos po
355a4(rnying rgyud): bsgyur dang rtsab bcad// 'dren cing gzugs la bslab par bya'o// shes rab yul ni tshig dang don// tshig don 'brel par 'dod pa yis// mtshon pas shes dang brjod pa sa so// mtshon pa dpe dang brda' mtshon dang // tshig gis mchod
355a5(rnying rgyud): yang brjod// brjod pas shes pa tha snyad dang // jo sprod pa dang 'khrid pa dang // la bzla shan dbye dag gis so// thig le'i yul ni kha dog ste// lnga dang drug dang gsum gnyis drug/ glas la dang dro dang bsil ba dang // yang zhing g.yo ba'i ba
355a6(rnying rgyud): nyid 'dzin// don dam chos nyid 'byung ba'o// dbyings kyi yul ni stong pa dang // gsal dang sgrib bral mdangs 'byin pa// khyab cing yangs la gcig 'dus pa'o// byag rdul dwangs pa'i nam mkha' la// mnyam rdzogs chos nyid dag pa'o//
355a7(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing ye shes lnga yi gdangs// 'od gsal dag pa'i lus nyid do// thib lan ba cu gcig pa// ye shes dag pa'i sgron ma'i rten// spyir ni rten dang brten pa yis// 'khor 'das sa bon 'phel bar byed// kyang zhags rten ni snang ba la// dag dang
355b1(rnying rgyud): mngag kyi blag gis// las dang tshogs pa dag dang ni// su dang ye shes nyid la brten// shes rab dang chu da // tsho ga dang yi mi rtog pa dang // grub pa'i gapa'adang bya ma rmya dang // tsha nyid la ni brgya ma // sdig pa spyo na las rnapa
355b2(rnying rgyud): rnam shes nyid dang sang sngang dang // rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // ye shes dgral brte pa'o// rngam dag dbyings kyi brten pa ni// sprin mtshoms nyid dang nam mkha' dang // 'od dang thog med ga dang yang // mdzegs sbal rten pa'o// da
355b3(rnying rgyud): khyad par ni// gsum gyis byed 'dus byed par brten// chung zhags nyid las rten pas ni// skyon med bye byed rnams spangs pas// chos nyid ma la spyod pa'o// las dang bag chags dag byed pas// chos nyid mngon sum sdang ba la// brten pas la
355b4(rnying rgyud): bdong spags te// myang 'das mtshams su rig nus pa'o// rtog dastod zad pa'i sems nyid kyis// 'khor brgyang du 'phangs pa yis// ye shes dag pa'i sku mthong nas// 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'dunas 'jig// gang gis me tog mdzes mthong ba/
355b5(rnying rgyud): 'dis ni chos nyid yur bar 'drongs// rig pa srang la btab nas ni// chos rnams zad pa'i sar bstsal lo// dbyings la goms par gyur pa'i mis// 'khrul sdang stongs par byas nas ni// chos nyid dag pa'i yul mthong bas// zhen yu
355b6(rnying rgyud): nas thon pa'o// jis lan ra ma ba// blo rim gnad ni 'di lta ste// 'byung ba snod kyi khyad par las// 'byung ba'i sprin mo'i khyad par gyis// 'gro ba'i blo yi bye brag gis// rigs dang dbang po tha dad do// de yang 'byung ba'i rnam 'phrul gyis// chu yi sa
355b7(rnying rgyud): las dag pas// thog ma mched par rus pa la// tha ma zin pa'i chos mi brjed// chu yi mes ni zin sbyin brjed// chu yi rlung gis blo bsgyur cing // kun la 'jug cings zin med// chu'i b+ha lan gnyis chung ba rdzu // chu yi rlung gis yas pa dang // yul dang
356a1(rnying rgyud): shes pa 'thud par 'gyur// rgyu mi chus ni badran zhing // 'du shes chung zhing yin pa'o// sa y+r-i 'byung ba dag 'a las// sa oM wu yis rgyag 'grol dang / rtsug ba rdzogs spel bar byed// sa pa mes namachag du dab
356a2(rnying rgyud): dag/ gsal zhing 'jam des ldan par ston// sa yi rlung gis rdugs pa dang // bar chud can de res 'jog 'gyur// sa yis sa ni tshogs dang yan lag rgyas par 'dzin// me yi sas ni dbang po rgyas// chu yis 'jug cing khyab par skyon// rla gis /
356a3(rnying rgyud): po rab tu no// me yi mes ni zin sbyin brjod// rlung gis sa ni da ni spyad che// chu yis ting 'dzin dmigs pa gsal// me yis tshig la longs spyod nus// rlung gi rlung gis rtog dpyod 'dzin// 'di yi 'byung ba ma dag pas// log pa'i las su
356a4(rnying rgyud): par ston// snang ba g.yengs dang shes pa 'gyur// rtog pa rags shing mi dge slong // chos kyi sems kyang spang ba'o// de ltar 'byung ba snod dag pas// ther po'i lam sna ston pa dang // sru gsum yang dag gtan la 'bebs// de nas ma yi
