356b1(rnying rgyud): dbyibs rnams dang // badz+ra dang sku rtsal tha dad dang // mig 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// s+phu ni pi wang bum ldir dang // rgyud ma dA rdzarnga gling bu dang // pheg dang hA la sogs pa'o// dri ni dang ldan sbyar ba dang // yid mthun rten 'brel bab mas /
356b2(rnying rgyud): ro ni bur ma drug ldan dang // rkun cheng sbyar ba sna tshogs bsgyur// rten 'brel yan lag sbyor ba'o// reg ni mkhas pas khri stong 'dug/ gzhu bsngal 'byung ba'i sbyor ba dang // shing gre lo ma 'ga' zhig gis// reg pa tsam gyis chos nyid
356b3(rnying rgyud): la// 'bral med sems kyi gnas pa'o// sems ni bzung dang gnas pa dang // rtsa ba bcad dang dngos pos ded// yul dang shes pa'i bar nas btsal// yongs la bor ba rnams yin no// thing lanas tu zhig// de ltar nyams su blangs pa las/
356b4(rnying rgyud): rtags dang tshad ni 'di lta ste// lus ni yang zhing zad thal sdang // sa la reg med thogs med dang // ngag gi rus rdzogs gtam zungs zad// sems ni 'pho bar nus pa'o// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus kyi dbang po kun zad ste// rang bzhin med pas
356b5(rnying rgyud): nus pa zad// gis lan bcom pa// bar mdo yi snang ba ni// rang bzhin gnas pa'i phung po dang // khams dang nyon mongs yul du snang // 'chi kha'i ban bun lang ling dang // shes pa gcig tu mi gnas pa'o// chos nyid par do'i sku dang yang // ye shes 'od dang
356b6(rnying rgyud): kha dog go// thig le mched dang 'byung snang dag/ cir snang chos nyid gzhal yas so// srid pa'i snang ba phyed phyod dang // yang yud rmi lam snang ba ltar// bden snang rdzun pa yid kyi lus// dkar gleg la sogs rigs drug 'od// so so'i dmigs pa'i yul
356b7(rnying rgyud): sdang ba'o// jis da cha pa// rang sems grol ba zhes byab// gcig nas gcig tu song ba med// gang gis bkrol ba med pa'i sems// gzhi la rdzogs pas 'gro 'ong med// brtags pas ma rnyed chu mtshan med// gzhi rtsa med pas stong par gnas/
357a1(rnying rgyud): rang gsal gnas pa'i sems de ni// gnad kyis grol bas phyog ris me// dus kyi krol bas ltos gzhim // 'bad med grol bas rtsol smrab med// dang gis grol bas 'ban rtsol zad// du la gdang gis grol bar bshad// ya nas grol bas bdung
357a2(rnying rgyud): gzhi med// rang gis grol bas gnyen po med// cer gyis grol bas mthong sar yal// yongs su grol bas dbad med pa'o// sa na pa// de ltar grol ba'i sems nyid la// thugs rje med pa ma yin te// gzhi la gnas pa'i ye shes kyis//
357a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin shugs kyis 'chang gzhi byed// mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyis// rkyen gyis dag pa smin par byed// shes dang shes bya'i ye shes kyis// mos gus can la dngos grub sbyor// de yang sems nyid smin pa'i tshe// chos kyi sbal ga
357a4(rnying rgyud): gnas te// ka nas dag pa'i dri ma zad// ngo bo ye nas 'khrul pa med// 'char byed ma 'gags lhun grub bo// rang bzhin 'di 'dra nges pa med// kun la khyab pas thugs rje ste// 'khor ba 'das pa chad pa min// longs sgra'i ye shes mtshan
357a5(rnying rgyud): nyid 'dzin// yul dngos dag pas me long ste// 'khor 'das gzugs brnyan gsal ba'o// phyogs ris med pa'i mnyam pa nyid// dbang po'i yul brten so sor rtogs// 'bad pas ma yin bya ba grub// tha dad med pas chos kyi dbyings// sprul
357a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgra la shes bya ste// ji ltar mkhyen pas dngos po yi// gnas lugs rang gi don du shes// ji snyed pas ni gdul bya yi// bsam pa ci ltar gnas pa shes// de ltar thugs rje'i 'char tshul las// gdul bya'i 'gro ba tha dad la// 'dul byed/
357a7(rnying rgyud): spu yang de tsam mo// dris pan tse da pa// de nyid ye shes gnad bstan pas// dang po gzhi la khyab tshul la// bar du la ma la rdzogs pa yi/ tha ma 'gro ba'i lus la khyab// lus kyi dus ni 'di lta ste// 'byung ba 'dus pa'i phung po yi// kro d+ha rin chen
357b1(rnying rgyud): gan na/ gas/ ngag pa s+ho/ dgas / ga / na da
357b2(rnying rgyud): can// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtogs// bu grub chos dbyings ye shes ni// thig le chu dang me rgyu dang // rang rtsi la rdzogs pa'i rti du gnas// dwangs mi 'dus pa'i mig gnyis nas// thobs dang shes/ ba par las// ji ltar mkhyen pa'i bag
357b3(rnying rgyud): le dang // dag pa dbyings kyi sngon mar sten// ji snyed pa ni rgyang zhags dang // shes rab sgron mar sbyin pa yis// 'gro ba rnams kyi las kyi yang // dbang po'i bye brag ci lta bar// de la bslabs pa ste shes par 'gyur// da pa// da lug satshul
357b4(rnying rgyud): gnas lugs rnam pa gnyis// thog ma'i gzhi la gnas pa dang // 'khrul pa'i yul la gnas pa'o// thog ma dzang bo dang bzhin dang // thugs rje rnam pa gsum du gnas// de ya song ba skur gnas pas// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa
357b5(rnying rgyud): ma phye 'byed pa med pa'i tshul// bab las grub pa nyid la yang // su mdog la sogs blo yul med// rang bzhin 'char byed 'od kyi tshul// dkar dmar ser dang ldang mthong ni// mtshan ma ris can ma yin par// ris med shes bya'i bab las thub//
357b6(rnying rgyud): thugs rje 'char ba sna tshogs las// 'di 'dra gcig tu nges med pas// sna tshogs snang phyir gzhi zhes bya// 'khrul pa'i yul la rang bzhag dang // cog bzhag dang grol byas gdab po// ris pa ni ni thub// dgongs pa gcig las g.yos pa med// sna
357b7(rnying rgyud): bsnang ba'i thog gsal bas// bzhin dang me long lta bu las// grol ba de dang de nyid gro la// shes pa 'grub yu la tong bas// mthong shes rig pa tha dad min// de nyid rang gi thog tu grol// gcig shes pas ni kun grol byed// gnyis dang gsum
358a1(rnying rgyud): grangs mthung zad// rtog cing 'dzin pa'i phul ma snang // 'bru dang 'don pa la nas stong// stong pa'i dgangs pags la rdzogs pas// du ma grangs sutha zad par// ga gag/ bdug da na lda gan// dal sun ga ma
358a2(rnying rgyud): bshad// chos dang tsas min pan sdig she// rab ngas chog dbye bshad// de bag chags rnams kyi rjod// de rtsib dang rnyeng ba dang // sno rtogs pa dang gar// ras cig nan 'dus pa la// na tshogs ni sogs pa'o/
358a3(rnying rgyud): spos thal te// rangag 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma med// nga bstang gas la dbyed med la// dbye ba chos dang lings sprul sra// gsum gyi dbyebs khyad par 'jug/ des kyig chos ni yang dag lam// su ni de las grub pa'o// de ltar dbye ba gnad kyi na
358a4(rnying rgyud): dus dang thabs dang dpe nyid dang // byed pa'i tshad kyis 'bras bu'o// nges sa te gnyis pa// sems dang ye shes gan nyid ni// sems zhes bya ba 'khrul tog la// ngo bo 'jug cing khyab pa la// dran bsam rnams kyi gzhima'o// dbye bdag dang mi dag pa/
358a5(rnying rgyud): nges tshig bsam pa dran yul skye// de yang gang la sems dang gang gis sems// gang sems pa dang gang phyir sems// ye shes rtog pa ma yin te// ngo bo rang gsal snying po'i don// dbye ba dag ni gsum du 'dod// nges tshig ye nas gnas pa'i don//
358a6(rnying rgyud): de ltar shes pas ye shes te// de nyid dbya ba'i don bstan pa// dus dang thabs dang dpe dang tshad// dgongs pa so so'i 'bras bu dang // ye shes rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// lus dang ngag dang sems kyis kyang // rtags dang tshad dang 'jug pa dang /
358a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid 'gyur bar shes pa dang // mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i bye brag go// sa pa tegapas// 'thung ba dngas snyigs 'byed 'dod pas// don dam kun rdzob dbyeb pas// 'byung ba la yang gnyis su 'dus// de yi smin po byed las de tsam mo// sa
358b1(rnying rgyud): snyigs ma rags pa las// de yi sprin po phra rab rdul// byed las sha dang de yin // dang sa mas lus zangs rdzogs pa dang // dan dam byangs mas sbal ba dang // rgyang zhags smon mar smin pa dang // gnad kyis goms kyang 'grub pa'o// mu yi stegs mas
358b2(rnying rgyud): rlan zhing sprad// byed las khrag dang de yi nang // spen pas chu ngul tshogs pa sdud// dang sa mas rga she zil gnon dang // byad las chos nyid brtan pa dang // shes rab smon mar smin pa dang // gnad kyis zas kyi rnal 'byor 'grub// me ye snyigs mas bsreg
358b3(rnying rgyud): cing mchod// smin pas lug dang klang rdul lo// byed las drod dang da yi nad// dang sa mas ngag lus rdzogs pa dang // thig le'i sgron ma smin pa dang // gnyid kyi bsam gtan bsgom pa dang // gnad kyis rmi lam 'gags par byed// rlung gi stegs mas
358b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'byed bskyod// smin pas nyi nu pa rdzogs pa dang // byed las dbugs dang de yind// dngas mas sems bde nus pa dang // byed las chos nyid gsal ba dang // rnam rtog tra dngad 'byed pa'o// smin pas dbyings kyi sgron ma las// gnad kyis bag
358b5(rnying rgyud): chags drungs nas 'byin// dus dang thabs dang gnad dang tshig/ de yi rang bzhin 'jug pa yis// 'byung ba'i gnad kyi man ngag rdzogs// rjes lan ter bzhis// sgron ma gtims pa 'di lta ste// dad ldan 'khor ba'i yid brel bas// bla ma mchod dang gto
358b6(rnying rgyud): ma bya// 'khor ba'i 'brel pa kun spangs te// dben pa'i phyogs sam dur khrod du// grogs spang gcig pur gnas par bya// gsum po brten pa ma yin par// rang gi mtheb dang mdzub mo yis// thig le stong pa'i sgron ma gtims// gtims
358b7(rnying rgyud): pade las gar byung ba// chos nyid mngon sum sdang ba'o// de las ye shes 'phel ba'i nyams// kha dog dang ni dbyibs kyis kyang // phyi dang nang kun gsal bar khyab// gong nas gong du nges par 'phel// 'di dus lus ngag bde ba'i rtags// snang ba'i
359a1(rnying rgyud): tshad dang rim pas sbyar// ye shes rdzogs pa'i sdang ba dang // chos nyid dag pa'i snang ba las// sdang gas mdzegs nas zad par 'gyur// de la 'bras bu zhes byang // sa pad ba// de ltar gtims pa'i snang ba
359a2(rnying rgyud): ni// dang po dmar po dag pa yi// dbang rdzogs zlum po rang gsal rdzogs// madro ba gnyis dag las gsum du 'gyur// de nas yang yang gtims pa yis// ye shes lnga yi kha dog ni// dkar dmar ljang gu ser mthing nang // yul la snang ste
359a3(rnying rgyud): tshol bar// das byo thub byin du yang// mas 'thung po dang // mayang dag gi dgribs tsam las// gnyis dang gsum kyi rda snang // de nyi dag tu gams pa las// dag TIs kyis kyang // de sa tsam las tha nad nga /
359a4(rnying rgyud): yul gu tsam las mthong tshad do// de la goms pa'i tshad rnyed nas// thig le'i nang du sku dang bcas// phyed skra dag tu yun 'ga' gnas// de las lnga lnga bung du bcas// rab tu gsal ba'i thig les 'brel// yab yum spyi'i snang ba can// 'khrul
359a5(rnying rgyud): snang zad nas zhing khams so// 'di dus lus ngag yid kyi tshad// so so'i snang ba mthong dus kyi// rang la smin pas rtags rdzogs te// zad pa'i tshad rnams mngon par snang // 'di la brtson 'grus che chung gis// zhag dang zla ba lo rnams kyis// so so'i
359a6(rnying rgyud): dus la nges par 'grub// 'gyur ba med pa'i dusu dag las// so so'i tshad la phebs pa'o// zis lan nyer sdigapa// rtsa yi gnad ni badz+ra phrag gnyis// de la legs pa ga nad bsdus nas// brgya dang bco lngas las kun byed// rab tu 'gyur ba rtsa yi gnad/
359a7(rnying rgyud): drug curtsa brgyad chos nyid sbyor// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i rtsa// gzhi yis bzhing cag 'gro ba'i snang bston// gzhi yi gnas dang 'gro ba'i lam// smin pa'i sgo dang byed pa'i las// dus dang de yi snang da do// de yi gnad kyi man ngag ni// gnas dang 'a
359b1(rnying rgyud): dang 'gro lam rten// smin pa'i sa dang theg le sbyar// de ltar bu yis byas pa yis// rnam rtog 'gags nas ye shes skye'o// dus ni rlung gi tshad kyis bzung // 'gyu ba'i grangs kyis ye shes gnas// mkhas pas shes par byas te bzung // byed
359b2(rnying rgyud): las rlung gi grangs tshad kyis// ma 'khrul pa la chos nyid dang // ma dag las kyi bye brag ston// snang ba'i tshad kyang lus ngag yid// so so'i dus la bab pas so// rjes la nyer bzhag/ sems kyi sbyangs pa 'di lta ste// phyi rol yul dang nang gi lus// bar du
359b3(rnying rgyud): lus dang sems bsdams pas// ngag gi thu ba'i las kyi bya// mchog tu sems kyis skyems 'i sbyar// yul na yang dang med pa dang // 'gro dang dong ba'i gnad kyis bas ma// lus ni mid dang thar ba rdul/ kye brag du ma nyid kyisu gzhag/ lus sems
359b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bar du brtags// ngag gi brjod pa bye brag gis// so so'i rlung dang 'gro dang 'ong // dus kyi gnyis med bsres pas 'grub// mchog tu sems ni gro 'ong gnas// rgyu mtshan brtag pa med pas spangs// de ltar 'byongs pa'i tshad kyang bzung // de ltar
359b5(rnying rgyud): de yi mtshan nyid rdzogs// pi wa te sa// nyon mongs pa ni dang rkyen las// rang gi grib mas 'jigs pa bzhin// rang gi rang bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// de yang rlung gi grangs dzod las// brgya dang nyi shu grangs kyis shes// la la yul la brten pa yis//
359b6(rnying rgyud): bden dang rdzun gyi byed par 'byung // la la dmigs pa med pa las// gzu bo tsam gyis shes par gzung // la la 'khor 'das 'dod pa yang // bden pa gnyis pas sems gnyis 'khrul// de las snang rkyen nyon mongs sogs// gzhan yang rab tu
359b7(rnying rgyud): bya'o// snang ba 'phrul pa'i rang bzhin ni// ye shes yin par sdang ma mthong // tog bcas 'thul pa'i gzhi med pas// sunag ni chos su chen po rtogs// 'bral ba dang rtog rgyun chadade// de snying dzung med snang ba ni// ye nas grol ba'i gang
360a1(rnying rgyud): las 'byung // 'gro ba'i phung po sangs rgyas sgra// ye nas yin par sras ma rig/ phung po sangs rgyas lnga bdag tu// rtsa gnas yi ge grub las byung // chu bur mig las yo nas ni// rang sdang yin par sras ma mthong/
360a2(rnying rgyud): de las 'khrul ba'i snang ba ni// sgron ma'i gnad las byung ba'o// gzhan yang lus kyi spyod lam nyid// sgra gsum dag tu grol ba'i phyir// bya byed thams cad chos nyid do// ngag tu ci ltar smras pa kun// gsang sngags gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste/
360a3(rnying rgyud): yi ge 'i rnam 'phrul gnad las byung // 'gro ba'i sems kyi rtog pa kun// bsam gtan yin par ci ma shes// rang sems rtogs las grol bas na// de ni 'gyur ba'i gnad las byung // de ltar thams cad chos nyid las// bslab pa
360a4(rnying rgyud): pa gang med cing // gzhag par bya ba cung zad med// gong du med pa'i chos nyid do// bya byed brjod dang bsam pa las// 'khor 'das grol ba'i gnad brtags te// sangs ma rgyas pa gcig kyang med// khams gsum 'khor ba dod sngags
360a5(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang khams gsum sems can kun// lus ngag yid las ma 'das pas// sku gsum gzhan du btsal mi dgos// btsal kyang rnyed pa'i gnas med do// ma byung byung ba med pa las// bltas pas mthong ba ngo mtshar che// ngo mtshar chen po 'a
360a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// sangs rgyas sems can 'byed pa med// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du// rang byang rang la rdzogs pas zhi// chos nyid mngon sum khyad par gyis// dbang po rno dang brtsal med pas// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas las// gzhan du gnas pa ma
360a7(rnying rgyud): yin no// lus can sems kyis khyab pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can min// sa bon las ni 'bras bu bzhin// rang gi rang bzhin gshis kyi gnad// brjod pa'i cho ga gis ma yin par// dbang po yul la gsal snang bas// zer mthong
360b1(rnying rgyud): smra/ ga /
360b2(rnying rgyud): mas sa / nga kun pas \u0f7f/ nas pas / ga
360b3(rnying rgyud): mas// debang mam nyid drung rnams gnang // pa sa kyi zhes // / shes pa ga ni dgas pa dang // gsu ma kyi grol ba gyur// ma sa pa 'dum pa // / pa 'di / don mdzang pa// zhe
360b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin dmigs med sbyar// ngas pa jugs yod pa med// mar na sam mthong ba'i rna pa ldanapa// khrims gsum byung ba'i ming med dpapa// mi dag pa' ga nga gcod pa'o// zhes snyam pa ga chen po chos rnams pan mi b.las/ 'a
360b5(rnying rgyud): pa ga pa'i rtsa dzes par 'byu ba pa sheg / de nis ba napa rnyed sa/ sa bkad pa zhes zla ba'o// sangs tha latsham ldan 'dasa'/ nye gang bla sa 'gros/
360b6(rnying rgyud): byung // dathal pa na byad gang dag // mabyid du glas pa ci bskyed// bang bcad pade / ngani mi rdzogs pa'i gan saskabs ga // mi shes tshun nyid byed pagang // las dang dang po byed /
360b7(rnying rgyud): nga sa lagapa mabyung // nga mgying/ bci dag pa ga gang // rang ni yun pa gyi gyid// thags byed la gang gis la/ byed// gas pa /
361a1(rnying rgyud): tsam zhig/ bya ba ji ltar 'grub pa lags// rgyas kyi dbyings pa de ltar spyod// shes pas bsdus pa'i ye shes gang // ji skyed pa ma khyab pa na// ji lta ma khyen pa'i dgongs pa gang// ye shes rnams gcig gang
361a2(rnying rgyud): dag bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// ston pa thugs rje chen pos gsungs// nam mkha' mi 'byed par snang ngas// sus kyang byas pa med pa'i cho ga/ rang bzhin rtog pa gang med par// brjod med bas ma dag sla las kyang // tshig gi rgyal po 'di dag ni/
361a3(rnying rgyud): pas gsungs pa'i tshul du shar/ ris sa da po na gses sams // chos nyid gnas pa zhes bya ba// dus kyi gnas dang rang bzhin dang // 'pho ba nges pa'i tshad kyis gnas// ye nas gnas dang 'bad pa dang // rkyen dang su byed par skangs so// dus kyi gnas
361a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos nyid ni// dbyar dkun ston dpyid cha bzhi las// ston gyi dang por phung po dang // khams dang ye shes rgyas pa'o// 'di dus rten 'brel zab mo bstan// zla ba mar gyi dgu dang brgyad// yid kyi bcu bzhi lnga la gnas// zhag ni bcu gnyis tshal
361a5(rnying rgyud): phyed// nyi ma'i dus kyang bcu gnyis la// cha yi rnam pa bzhi la gnas// 'di dus chos nyid sbyang bar bya'o// rang bzhin du na gnas pa dag/ phyi rol yul dang nang gi sems// 'od gyi dpags la gnas pa ste// 'di yang rnal 'byor pas shes
361a6(rnying rgyud): bya// 'pho ba nges pa'i tshad gnas ni// 'gyu ba chen po'i rlung dag gis// so so'i gnas// sto tung / skabs 'gya tshad la// lnga brgya dag la re re nyid// chos nyid gnas pa'i 'pho ba ste// rtog pa 'dzin pa stong tshigs la'o// rigs thug so so'i
361a7(rnying rgyud): ltung ba'i gnas// rlung gi 'gyu ba'i mtshams sbyar bzung // de la sems nyid gnas pa'i thabs// lnga brgya'i dus nas brtsis nas ni// so so'i dge ba'i sbyor la 'bad// 'di yang rkyen gyis nyon mongs 'gyur// so so'i rlung gi mtshams nas bzung //
361b1(rnying rgyud): tshe ched las kyi bye brag yang // rlung gi 'gyur las shes par bya'o// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid ni// snang ba med pa thog ma'i dus// rang bzhin bcos pa med par gnas// dri med sems kyang de bzhin no// 'bad pas mngon sum gnad gzing gas/
361b2(rnying rgyud): ma bcos gzhi la gnas pa'o// rkyen gyis gnas pa 'byung ba yi// lus kyi bye brag dag pa dang // me dag pa yi khyad par gyis// ye shes gnas pa'i byed pas ni// so so nyi dus tshod mkhas pas bzung // rgyu yis gnas pa'i sems de ni// kun
361b3(rnying rgyud): khyab phyir ches nyid dang // bcos pa med na gnas pa yin// bar skabs gnas pa rlung gis drang // 'gru ba phra ba'i bar du shes// 'di ni ye shes gnad 'dus pa'o// bres pa na gnyis pab don brgyad bstan pa// de las 'khrul pa rgya dang rkyen// cha dang yan lag la
361b4(rnying rgyud): nyid dang // ma smin rnam rtog 'khor ba'o// ma rig pa ni rnam pa gsum// bdag nyid gcig pas 'khrul rtsa byas// lhan cig skyes pas rtog pa gnyis// kun tu brtags pas yul du gyur// rkyen ni rnam pa bzhi dag gis// 'dus shing bzung bas
361b5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul zhes bya// cha ni 'du byed la sogs pas// 'khrul yul cha la bcu gnyis bri// smin pas lo dang byed las so// yan lag spos pa tha dad las// thams cad ming gi bye brag rtse// 'khrul pa'i yul la rnam gnyis 'gyur// las kyis 'dod dang
361b6(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi khams// gzugs med khams te rnam gsum byed// ma smin pa ni rigs drug gzugs// ming dang bye brag tha dad 'gyur// rnam rtog bag la nyal ba dang // kun nas ldang dang khyab tshul lo// 'khor ba zhes pa mtshungs pa dang // tshogs pa'i
361b7(rnying rgyud): las te sdud dang mched// rdzogs dang bye brag sna tshogs pa'o// de ltar 'khrul zhes ming tsam las// rtog 'dzin byed pa'i rtags dang ni// tshogs shing sprad pa'i byed pa can// ming gi bye brag gis brtags so// jis la nag tham padon kya brtan pa// 'khrul
362a1(rnying rgyud): parje rgya ni ma rig pa// gzhi dang shes pa sngags pa dang // gzung dang dbang po 'khor rtsol lo// rkyen ni yul dang gzung cha las// mtha' dang mthang yi byed pa dang // glacig ma shes pa dmigs rten no// gzhi ni gar yang 'byed med kyang /
362a2(rnying rgyud): nges pa med pa tsam las so// shes pa 'dra dang yal ba dang // mched par 'dzin pa rnams yin no// sngags pa dri ma 'angon pa ste// shes byas rang rgyud bcing ba'o// gzung ba ma yin sa la yang // bden pas dam du bcing ba'o// dbang po la
362a3(rnying rgyud): shes pa'i chas// rtag 'dzin yul der snang ba'o// 'khor tshul gcig par shes pas ni// rnam rtog gnyis gnyis zung 'jug go// mtha' yi byed pa las dang rgyu// 'byung ba dbang po'i las su 'gyur// gcig ma shes pa ka dag las/
362a4(rnying rgyud): nyid dang ngo ma shes pas// rgya dang mtshungs pa'i nyer len no// dmigs pa'i rten ni kha dog las// gnyis cha phra ba'i 'argya rten gyis// 'khor ba las kyi dmigs byar to// rjes lan zhi ba rjo bcad brtan pa// mtshan nyid rtogs pa'i bye brag ni// yod dang me
362a5(rnying rgyud): dang snang ba dang // gsal dang stong pa rags pa 'dzin// rnam shes 'dzin pa'i gzugs can no// yod pa dngos po'i byed pa can// snang dang mtshan nyid 'jug pas khyab// las dang bye brag nye bar ston// med pas gzugs la sogs pa spang // yid dang she
362a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'dug pa can// mtshan nyid rtag tu ma rnyed pa'o// sdang ba gzugs la sogs pa ste// 'dzin cing mched pa sdud par byed// gnyis 'jig khyab pa'i rang bzhin can// gsal bas dang ngo ston pa dang // me snang ba las log pa'o// stong pa kye ba ma yin pas/
362a7(rnying rgyud): sa dang mtha' dbus med par ston// ma byung bas na 'gag med do// rags pa rdul dang phra rags las// sna tshogs gzugs su rdzogs pa dang // reg yod 'jig par snang ba'o// 'dzin pa dbang po'i yul dag la// so so'i bzung bas 'ching ba dang // bdag
362b1(rnying rgyud): dang nyon mongs las kun byed// rnab par shes pa rtog par ma// yal la' thaMng spyod pa dang // rtag dang la sa kyirna pa par rtog/ gzugs can dag bcas papa poste// sems sdud pa dang bkad pa'o// 'an sa nas dang // sems can pan gyi bad du
362b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang byed las dang // dbang po nyid dang dbyibs dang tshad// skra dang so sora'i brjod pa dang // gnas pa'i snod kyi bye brag go// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni bzhi dag las// brtags pas drug tu dag yin te// rnam par gyi bas bzhi bcu bzhi'o// byed pa'i lang ni
362b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag las// brtags pas bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// de las rigs drug tha dad do// dbang po mig la sogs pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog mi mthun pas// bzhi brgya dag dad bzhi yis kyang // sems can lus kyang tha dad do// dbyibs ni lus dang yan lag/
362b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis/ dang // so so'i gling dang dbang zug \u0f7f/ pos kyang // 'gro ba'i gzugs kyang des kyi'o// tshad ni rigs drug so so ste// thog ma bar dang tha ma dang // so so'i bsod nams las kyis dbye// sgra ni ring dang nyung ba dang // drag dang zhan dang gzir dang dbyung // phra dang /
362b5(rnying rgyud): mang dang rtse mo'o// dngos pos rgya me rlung gis// shes pa nyid dang bsod nams dang // dbang thang lus kyi shes kyis brtags// brjod pa gnas dang 'byung ba dang // las dang rtog pa rang gnad do// gnas pa'i snod ni dag pa dang // ma dag pa yang bgyid kyis dpya/
362b6(rnying rgyud): des na 'byung ba'i rang gnad las// sems can lus kyang tha dad do// dris lan d+hag bdon cad stan pa// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs ni// chos nyid dgyed pa dang dang ngo dang // 'gyu ba stong dang rtog pa zad// gzhi rdzogs lam dang 'bras bu'o// chos nyid su
362b7(rnying rgyud): bcos su med// rang bzhin dag pa spos pa bral// rnam rtog tha dad yul las 'das// tshig byung 'khrul pa rgyan chad pa'o// dbyings ni phyi dang nang gi ste// phyi ni spen bral mkha' la 'dzin// bag rdul char gyis dengs dus su// mkhas pas mngon sum gnad
363a1(rnying rgyud): gzir dang // nang gi skon ma pa ma dbyang // rang darig pa lug chud// 'gro 'od thal te mabu' la'o// 'gyu ba chung gnyis byed pa bcad// dgra pa yi ni rlung gis dartse// gnas su 'jug pa thabs kyis dbya'o// dpeni rlung dag sta
363a2(rnying rgyud): yi// sdang ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// de ltar rnam rtog zad pa dang // skye med ye shes dus mnyam ste// 'di tshe 'khor 'das 'dres pa'o// de yang gzhi la rdzogs pa'i gnad// rang bzhin ma bcos mngon du sdang // lam ni sngon mAs mtshams
363a3(rnying rgyud): nas// mngon sum nyid du snang ba'o// 'bras bu gang du bzlog pa med// 'dod dang de dogs yul las 'das// rang snang ka nas dag par rdzogs// shes 'dzin rtog pa kun zad pa'o// rjes lan bdun pa don btud bstan pa// ming gi mtshan nyid byed
363a4(rnying rgyud): naM// rgya dang rkyen dang btags pa dang // mtha' dang dang po tha ma bsgyur// brtags pas ma rnyed tha skad gzhi'o// ming gi rgyan chog gi 'ang// mtshan nyid gang du ma grub pas// ltar sdang ga dgras med pa'o// rkyen ni dbang po zad ka'i phul// so so 'an bzhin bcas pa
363a5(rnying rgyud): la// kr-idag ni tshogs pa'i snang thar shar// btags pas bang dang sgrar byed las// mtshan nyid nye bar ston pa dang // khyad pad ming gis gang bkur gnad// so so'i skabs dang lcar byas nas// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'jig par 'gyur// mtha' ni 'gyu ba'i gnad
363a6(rnying rgyud): kyis dbye// bsad dang gso dang 'jig pa'i las// ming dang rten cing 'brel pas bya'o// dang po btags pa'i ming yi ge// dang po dag la brten pa yis// bsad dang gso dang gnas pa nyid// so so'i tshad kyis shes par gyis// tha ma bsgyur ba'i ming gi mtha'//
363a7(rnying rgyud): brje gtsang bzhag pa 'byung lus kyang // yang dag chos nyid rtag thal la// ming ge mtshan nyid rab byenas// phyi dang nang la rab brtags pas// ming gis mtshan nyid marnyed pas// rang gi chog rdzogs par 'dod// thag darnams ni tshig gi mthar//
363b1(rnying rgyud): du'ang ba med mabu 'ayis dbye// lus sems gnyis la btags gzhig pas// tha stang gzhi yang stong pa'o// gzhin gcig dang gnyis sa min// btags stong yod med pathara' 'gags te// byas dung kyang bsus mi rnyed// de bzhin gnas dang ma
363b2(rnying rgyud): med// de phyir chos nyid stong pa'o// drim lan kyad bdon bcan stan pa// sems can las dang dbang po rje// rlung dang shes pa gyi snod dang // 'byung ba sgo dang khub byed tshul// gsum dang dgu dang nyer gcig go// sems can las na rlung gi yang // 'byung
363b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'phen pa dag tu phul// de las las kyi bye brag gis// 'dug cing thabs kyis rab tu 'byed// de yi byed pa'i shes pa ni// mkha' la smin gyi rang bzhin nyid// rlung gis gtor bci bzhin du// dum bu du ma bus las snang ston// las lus ngag yang
363b4(rnying rgyud): gsum la// smin pas las kyi rnam par ston// 'byung bas rdza ma rung gis// sras su rdzogs pa rdung gi las// khyab byed sems can thams cad la// 'byung bzhi'i lus las ma 'das pas// so so'i las kyi sdebs su'o// dz+wal ni gzugs su grub pa dang
363b5(rnying rgyud): de yi las kyi swa phyi las// so sor blangs te mong bar 'gyur// dbang pos sum ni rab 'bring tha// des ni theg gsum 'du shes bral// de las gsum gsum dag phye bas// dgu ste theg dgu dbang po'i gnad// de las gnyis sur 'phyes te// dgra mag
363b6(rnying rgyud): gnyis te sdang ba'i cha// gzhi la gsum bzhag nyid gcig gis// skar ba nyer gcig rdzogs pa'o// dris lan dang lanang don dug bstan pa// tshig gi 'jug pa 'di lta ste// tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang // mkha' lding dbang phyug drag po dang // so so'i sgra dang \u0f88\u0f90 yi
363b7(rnying rgyud): skad// gnas gzhan brtses pas tshig la 'dug/ tshangs pas tshigs bcad dang po dang // phyed rdzogs gnas gzhan brgyad du 'gyur// dbang phyug gis ni tshigs bcad dgu// de yi gnas kyi rtsed gnyis 'gyur// khyab 'jug gis ni stong gnyis la// gnas la dbang
364a1(rnying rgyud): bas gcig rdzogs pa'o// brgya byin gyis ni tshogs bcad lnga// sA la bzlog pas gsum gnyi rdzogs// mkha' ldi tshogs bcad drug gis kyang // rtags byabs na bdun gnyis pa'o// drag pos 'jug pa gsum gnyis la/ !
364a2(rnying rgyud): bkod las kyi bdun bzhi'o// so so'i sgra ni gnas pa dang // 'dug dang 'byung ba ldog pa las// dus la brten pas lnga ldan rdzogs// lha yi skad ni stong phrag drug/ yan lag sbas pas de nyis 'gyur// gnas gzhan rtsa bra gzhi dag las/ sum tha la byeng// tshig la
364a3(rnying rgyud): rtog pas gnas brgya ga brgya gnyis// de las spos gas bzhi brgya bzhi// khyad par nges pa'i rtsis bcur 'gyur// de dag rab tu sbyor shes pas// cho ga las dbang ste spa ba'i rgyal// des ni skyong mchog nges 'phru ya / pa'o// dris 'anas ma da
364a4(rnying rgyud): brtan pa'o// blo dang shes pa zhes brgyad par bya ba/ spos pas paca tha bzhi yang // sems dang yid dang 'gyu nges par de bcang yang/ ba dang // 'phro dang rgod dang rengs pa dang // yul dang 'dzin dang zhen pa'o// sems ni dag dang ma dag pa'i// khams gsum po yang sangs
364a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'dug/ yid ni ngo bo nges tshig dang // dbye ba dag gis shes par 'gyur// 'grub dran dang sdang ba'i cha// brtags pa las ni blo 'gyur ro// 'phro ba yul gyi las mtha' las// blo dang shes pa'i rtsal du snang // rgod pa rlung gi byed pa de las// 'du byed blo dang shes pa'i
364a6(rnying rgyud): brda'o// rengs pa nyon mongs gsum dag las// blo zhes 'gyur dang shes pas gcod// gnyis 'dus pa las shes gsum 'byung // yul ni sgo lnga'i snang cha las// blo dang shes pa'i 'dug cha byung // 'dzin pa mig la sogs pa yis// de dang de la mo shes dngos//
364a7(rnying rgyud): zhen pa zo ye rtogs tsha pa ni// shes pa tshad las brgyad du 'gyur// de las 'byung bas 'don chags so// jis dang ga ba/ 'ja gapa pa yang // de ltar snang tsha'i byed pa las// gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis su shar// gzung ba yul la 'dzin pa sems// yul sems 'dus pas dug
364b1(rnying rgyud): gsupa po// salug na dbang ba dbang gnang sems// sems gan mig 'ag gnas// des rnams kyi dag sungs pa// bgazugs sus cu 'acwo ba stod dang // sangs rgyas dkrongs pa rdzogs pas sbyin zla ba mal pa'o//
364b2(rnying rgyud): bcal zhing gzung dang spel ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor pa yi yan lag go// ji shi pa// nga ngog dag ye shes las// ma s+yai pa de srid med med// gcig dang gnyes kyi blangs med pa'o// brtags pas pod sted thab pa med// gang tsu kyi rjes nyid pas// ye shes tsam
364b3(rnying rgyud): grub pa med// tshig med brjod pas grub pa med// mtha' la mi gnas rang rig dag/ gzung 'don ming gi mtha' zad pa'o// rgya med rkyen gyi phrad med la// gnyis sdang yul dang yul can med// ma na ti dgang du'ang gye ba zed// yul byen dgas par
364b4(rnying rgyud): zad bu'o// ye na med pas dag pas dang // 'khrul rtog 'gags pas kying me med// maskye pasan 'gag/ stong ngo // em sa ga yog// rang bzhin ldan du ga ye shes zhes// mi skye me 'gas/ rtsed mi dgongs// / yul dag nges pa med kyir ro// rtsam
364b5(rnying rgyud): dang yon tan 'gag med pas// rom pa tsam du sngang ba las// snga tshogs rdzogs pa'i gan man/ rmed kyir snga la ldang b+h+ri lta // snang // 'jug pa'i yan lag can// sangs rgyas sems can dag yul lo// 'di ska gzhi nas mngon pa ga nas/
364b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin tsam druganas pa las// ngo ba'i can mya btag sebs snang // yin pag spos phying mkhyen pa rdzogs// rang gi nas ldan gyis grub pa'i phreng // 'di la sang blang gnyis med pa'o// khrel // grags rje bas zab yi shes ras// pi la
364b7(rnying rgyud): dbar ba sgo// sangad bkar snang po ngogs// rjes spong pa'i nga badzin pas// ye shes ma byed pa rdzogs pa'i tsho// grags kyis sems can rnams la 'drang // de med dkor 'das rtsemed pas/ mgyon pas cing gsal bango // dang ga
365a1(rnying rgyud): tu tun tu/ na du na gan su tu na
365a2(rnying rgyud): sa
365a3(rnying rgyud): sa rtog pa // sa 'a// del 'dzu gas pa 'imi// sum 'gas/
365a4(rnying rgyud): shes pas nyon mongs spyod dag no// min
365a5(rnying rgyud): tha bathab pa zhes byab// 'thad cing rtsol ba dang 'gags nas// chos kun rang bzhag nga grol mo// rang po la rdzogs pa'i gde sdang pas// mamarda la bral dri med thong// tog pyod rgyal las
365b1(rnying rgyud): pa s+ho// gang gisum gyi chos nyid // rang bzhin rdzogs pas sdang mtha' zad// tshig char sogs pa bya ba'o// grub pas 'dod pa bral ba ma// bskur dang ldog pa med para'o// me na gnas pa don nyid pa// shes pas mngon du gyu nas /
365b2(rnying rgyud): zad pa'i sar phyin pa'o// jis la nang cadab pa// chos kyi dbyings ni yangs pa la// mtha' dang dbus su mi dmigs pas// grol gzhi chos nyid dag pa la// chos ni spyod par byed pa las// 'das dang 'jig rten bya ba byed// rang bzhin gsal zhing rangs pa'o//
365b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings ni go skabs 'byed pa las// rang byung chen po'i gnas pa'o// ye ni gnas pa'i bdag nyid la// rdzog ma nas ni bcos pa med// shes pas 'khor 'das gnyis las grol// ra skang rdzogs pa'i dkod la pa'o// jis lan nye la// shes pas
365b4(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i ye shes ni// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad la// dbyer med rang bzhin med par chung// de yang sangs rgyas rnam dag rdzogs// dri med dul dang thal bar gnas// sems can rigs drug snyir cha la// so so de rgyud la gnas pa de/
365b5(rnying rgyud): lha rnams dang gsal rdzogs pa ste// lha min rnams la phra zhing 'khrug/ mi rnams rang gsal zlum po nyid// gyol song rnams la nang du gsal// yi dwags rnams la phra ba la// dmyal bar dad snang rdeg ba'o// shes pas rig cing rangs gsal/
365b6(rnying rgyud): bsdus pas ngo bo dang rig pa// yi ni gsal zhing mkhyen rig cha// shes pa dang grol dkyil 'khor gcig/ dris pan ni tha \u0f7f gcigag// shes byas bsdus pa'i ye shes ni// rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya'o// de la shes bya snyed bshad// 'dis ni gdul bya'i
365b7(rnying rgyud): bsam pa mkhyen// gzhan don khong du chud pa yis// chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa'o// ji zhes bya ba gnas lugs la// sbed pas ma sus rdzogs par byas// ye ni sems can kun don la// shes pas khams gsum dong nas 'byen// phu pa'i/
366a1(rnying rgyud): sgra yi mkhyen pa'i cha// rang sngang ngo la rdzogs pa'o// rjes na sag// ji lta mkhyen pa'i ye shes bshad/ snang bas 'arjod ga zhatha' ba la// rang sdang dag pa'i gzugs brtanags pa// dngos po'i gnas lcags mya
366a2(rnying rgyud): pas// dang don rtogs pas 'phrul rgyan zad// ji zhes bya ba gnas grag salas// zlab yongs pa med par spyod// mkhyen pa 'gag pa khrid rdzogs// yi la ba drubyung ba la// shes pa rjod phyin pa'o// ba bcos rang grol chen pos
366a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi la g.yob med pa'o// ji 'di ba// ye shes rnams kyi bsdom pa ni// mtshan nyid khrab kyi dgras la ba la// rang bzhin gsal stong dbyer mi skyed// da bro gang d+hA nga bye ba med// dbyeb pa de yis bsus bya las// tog 'jug thabs kyi
366a4(rnying rgyud): gzhing dgang po rtog gis// mangs shing yang dag rtogs pa nyid// thab dang thababyed tshul gyi yang // rang snang gzhes spyon pa // nam chog 'a byed pa'o// khyad par 'dus pa rnams rjeb/ rtog zal chos nyid dang gangangs 'ang/
366a5(rnying rgyud): dmigs byed ye shes snang ba 'byung // de la rnal 'byor sems rdzogs so// yang dag 'das pa'i yan lag tu// ye shes gnad ni me kA las 'byung // mig gi gzigs stangs shes pa yis// chos kyi dbyings dang lhan cig spyod// khyams gsum
366a6(rnying rgyud): po ni zang bu'i phyir// mig gzugs nang phyang ba'i rtsa// gyen la bzlog pas ye shes 'bebs// gnad las byung ba'i ye shes gang // rig ldan chos nyid ci bzhin du// tog pa kun las rnam grol bas// dasrings las byung ba'i ye shes so// mig /
366a7(rnying rgyud): gnad ni byeng dang cho// mkhas pas rtso pa'i sdugang 'gyur// kun 'das ye shes sdang ban// yang dmig ga ye shes pa// dag sde ye ba gyibs/ dkyila'i tshang rdzogs pa'i ge zugs ba// 'di las 'byung ba gas pa byed na//
366b1(rnying rgyud): gas brjod par mi nus pa'o// e ma mtshar che bzhid// yon tan rdzogs pa'i snang ba'o// zab cing tshwa prA ye shes las// mngon sum pas dang la mdza'o// gzhan yang rab tu bshang ba// ba tog 'dras pa'i byung bas ma las// chos kyi bu yang
366b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs su 'gyur// gal te/ khams gsum 'das 'dod pas// dam pa'i ye shes gnad che bas// so so'i rlung gi dbugs su btags// chos kun dri ma rang dag las// sku gsum lus kyi dbus rdzogs// 'di la rtog pa ci yi phyir// dran pas mi 'dus
366b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin las// chos kyi sgra yang 'khor bar 'gyur// grang tshe 'khor ba'i mtha' zad pas// byas pa med par rang sa grol// grol ba 'di la cwa yang med// med phyed myos nyid dngos po min// ye shes rdzogs pas 'phrul rgyun chad// chad pas
366b4(rnying rgyud): dang nga bzad// zad phyir spong pa'i ye shes so// su gsum ye shes ma 'gags pas// khams gsum po yang yod pastod // 'gro zhing byung ba rnyed pa yis// dngos po dag pas gzugs zad pa'o// gzhan yang snang ba'i ye shes bshad// sarba
366b5(rnying rgyud): nga nam mkha' las// ye shes snang ba ngo mtshar bas// bcom ldan mgon po'irig med pa'o// brtags pas ma rnyed ye shes no// khams gsum gdar sha tshed pa las// sgo lnga'i zhen rgyun gcod pa'o// zla dang nor bu mar dkad 'od// gang gis 'dzin
366b6(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pa yi// 'dzin byung sgra yi snang ba bzung // yang ni rdzogs pa chen po yi// gnad shes pa las ye shes ni// bya bra la nam mkha' ji bzhin du// kun tu rtogs pas sngo dang bral// ngo mtshad rmad byang ye shes ni// sngon med kyis med gdod nas med//
366b7(rnying rgyud): da lta rnam rtog yul las 'das// mtha'i bral skor ba'i rang bzhin no// chog 'das blo bral ngo bos skong // rang bzhin gang dum phye bas// thugs rje mdzad pa mi snang ngo // ye shes snang ba gsum pa las// yid dbyang shes rab 'khrul char bzung // 'di la rnam
367a1(rnying rgyud): par dmigs mtha' med// med pa rma byung rol pa las// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu rnyed// phye dang nang kun chos kyi dbyings// 'di la gang yang mi snang ngo // gzhan yang yul gyi ye shes bshad// gzugs dang sgra ma
367a2(rnying rgyud): bye brag las// bslab bya'i nyams kyang lngar 'gyur ro// shes pa'i nyams zad snang ba ste// 'phel ston zla ba yang ngo bzhin// snang ba re la nyams re 'ong // drod dang tshod dang rtags las ni// bden gnyis drang 'jug rtog mtha' zad// bya ba med pa
367a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid stong // brjod gzhi 'gags pas mtha' mi gnas// zag pa zad phyir rdos bcas min// dran pa'i khong 'gag ngo bo gsal// gsal rig yul gyi mtha' mi rtog/ sgra bral yang dag tshig med phyir// ltos gzhi thams cad zad pa'o// gzhan
367a4(rnying rgyud): yang 'dod yon mngon par spyod// gzugs kyis bslab pa gnyis dag ni// dmigs pa'i rten dang dmigs med do// yid mthun las kyi khyad par gyis// sngon du bla ma mchod byas la// da byibs la goms te kha dog la// goms par byas pas 'khrub snang
367a5(rnying rgyud): 'gags// sgra ni dmigs pa'i rten dag pas// pi l+li rdza rnga bum ldir dang // dra ba rgyud mang mdo gsum pa// hang dang gling bu cha lang dang // pheg rdob cang te'u dril bu sogs// so so'i sbal rlung yang sbyar// dri ni yid mthun dmigs rkyen gyis// ngad dang dang pa
367a6(rnying rgyud): chen po dang // mchog dang khyad par chen po yis// rnal 'byor pa yi bde chen sbyor// ro ni bu ram drug ldan dang // rgun chad 'bras chang mkhas pas sbyar// sdom ldan rim pa lnga shes pas// myang ba tsam gyis ye shes 'bar// reg ni yid mthun dmigs
367a7(rnying rgyud): rten la// so so'i rig pa nyams myong sbyar// shing lo g.yas 'khyil bskum dus la// bslang ste reg pas sangs rgyas rtogs// chos ni bla ma'i lung dang bstun// gal te bsgom pa bzang po rtogs// 'di ltar brtsams pas lam du spong // khams gsum//
367b1(rnying rgyud): 'thab nga tu dang // gzhanas gags pa dan/ dram dag pas dkar palas// 'on gas kya nga ba gcangs// ma byed dogs pa gzugs sa zu// gnatan bgyud pa sa sa pas// gnadung byed das tas ngas
367b2(rnying rgyud): las chos ny-id ston par byed// rang thang rdzogs pa'i dmar po las// rang bden dag pa'i dkyil dang 'khor// mu khrud rab rdzogs par s+ho// thA rbal zul pa'i ldang bra las// phrin las dag pa'i spel ba 'thung / me 'brur rdzogs pa'i babring g.yas/
367b3(rnying rgyud): mnga' dra bas mi gnas zab par spyong // rang 'in ba pas skrag sum shi // zhes thams 'gyur byen panas rnams can tha ba las/ ye shes bkod pa snang ba'i rtsa bgyis par 'thung ba'i li gsus pa // / su ba// denas 'as
367b4(rnying rgyud): dgang byed kyis// ston pa khyab bdag chen po la// chos nyid bkod pa'i rang bzhin zas// rtse kye yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// bdag ni ye shes bkod pa las// 'khor pa'i las las dbugs byung ste// myad 'das la ma la gzengs kyang bstod// 9
367b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin snang ba'i yul yang mthong // sangs kyis dgongs pa'i gded rnyed kyang // ma 'ongs 'dug pa'i sems can rnams// rtog bral ye shes rdzogs don du// chos nyid bkod pa mnyam par 'tshal// gnas pa'i chos nyid gang la bgyi// 'bru bam
367b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi gnad de byung // dur gyi chos nyid ce ltar naH// sangs rgyas chos nyid ce snang // sems can dus nA ci ltar gnas// was kyi gnad ni gang dang gang // sgo nas ci ltar khung ba lags// yul la snang ba'i mtshan nyid gang // de la tsa me sdang bar
367b7(rnying rgyud): mdzang das gtanas rnam ba rdzogs ba dag // chad babasas // ma sa nig ga // 'bra'i khyod pa nga // sha thams sgrun// ya sa da
368a1(rnying rgyud): nyid gang // chos nyid nges pa'i tshig gang lags// gnad kyi chos nyid gang dang gang // 'byung dus gnad 'di ci yis bzung // bar do'i chos nyid ci lta bu// de yi mtshan nyid snang tshul ci// 'di dag sems can don du gsung //
368a2(rnying rgyud): nas ston pa rdo rje 'chang // rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' las// sgratshig spras pa di lta Ta// brjod pa med pa'i gzhol shed// e mdo mtshar rmad du thung // zheng khams gzhan du ma grags pa'i// ngo mtshar brjod pa bstan par bya'o// na po// gnas
368a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos nyid 'di lta ste// gshis kyi gnas pas dge sdig bral// rgyu 'bras gnas pas ltos pa thal// rkyen gyi gnas pas 'byung ba dag/ 'pho zhing 'gyur ba ma yin no// thang non sang // 'gru mchoms chos nyid 'di lta bu// ngo ma zer che bas rab tu bshad//
368a4(rnying rgyud): rlung ni zhag gi rim pa yis// nyi khri dang ni gcig stong dang // drug brgya ru ni brtsis pa yis// zhag gcig la ni rlung rdzogs so// ci ltar so so'i bye brag gis// chung ba rnams la drug cu lhag/ rgas pa dag la chad pa yin// 'byung bsdod kyi las kyis so// 'gyu ba'i
368a5(rnying rgyud): ni drug rdul// phra 'gyur chos nyid rtsis kyis bzung // de phrag gnyis las rags pa ste// de bsdoms gsum la sbom po nyid// de las gsum dbri mnyam pa'o// mdor na 'gyu ba nyi shu'i bar// chos nyid mnyam pa re re'o// bus do gsum pa// dus kyi chos nyid
368a6(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// gyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // kho na nyir dang bzhi yin no// phyini sngon gyi gnyis pa las// dus kyi chos nyid gnas paston// nang ni lha rengs shar dus so// gsang bganyid dang rmi lam mo// kho na nyid ni rlung gis bzung // dus la phebs na rdzogs
368a7(rnying rgyud): pa'o// tha na zhig// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni// ma skyes mi 'byed mnyam pa las// sgra tshig ming drug la sred// ltos gzhi rang dag 'khrul pa dag/ 'khor 'das med du ma grags so// ma byung ma skyes 'gag pa med// kun 'thung yo
368b1(rnying rgyud): ga ma yin// len pa mad cing grol ba med// chu rkyen bral ba mad cing khas/ sangs rgyas sems can gzha mar snang // dram chags kun thal ba'o// nas// shal ta 'khrul pa'i sems can pa// spa dang ye shes rang lpags te// nal ma seM mu gam
368b2(rnying rgyud): paste/ cegar gnas pa khon dang // dbang po yul la rang bzhin no// 'dir ni rang yul bstan pa las/ 'khor gren 'jug pa ma yin par// zang mnyid dang thal bung ngu/ yul dang shes pa'i snang rna las// bdag so so'i ga'i las grol/ 'dod mon
368b3(rnying rgyud): rnams ni rang rdzogs te// sna tshogs 'gru ba so so'i gnad// gcig shes pa yis grol bar gnas// des na chos nyid rtogs pa ste// cha shas nyid dang bral ba'o// tha don rags// lus kyi gnad ni 'di lta ste// spyi dang tsit+taH yi gnad// ma bcos dag pa'i
368b4(rnying rgyud): chos nyid gnas// sems can kun gyi lus spre la// chos nyid rlung gi tshul du khyab// phra dang yang dang 'gyu dang 'byed// byed las bzhi yi tshul gyis ni// dus bzhi'i rnal 'byor shes par bya// tsi t+ta'i nang na skur gnas te// gdangs kyi sku ni rnam pa lnga//
368b5(rnying rgyud): so so'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// zer gyi sku ni drug gis kyang // rang bzhin snang ba'i chos rnams sdud// dag pa'i sku ni rnam gsum gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rnam pa'i sku ni brgyad kyis kyang // sa lam rdzogs pa'i bya ba byed// rtsa
368b6(rnying rgyud): nang na thig le ste// 'dug pa'i thig le rnam gsum gyis// 'khor 'das 'brel pa'i sa bon 'debs// skye ba'i thig le lnga yis kyang // rnal 'byor nyams kyi dkyil 'khor 'dong // bkod pa'i thig le drug gis ni// chos nyid du ma gcig tu sprad// ded
368b7(rnying rgyud): la brten pa yis// chos kun mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// zas pan pa// sgo nas ci ltar 'byung ba ni// 'jug pa'i rlung gis bsgral pa yis// smon ma bzhe las las bzhir 'gyur/ khyab pa'i rlung gis bskyod pa yis// rig pa nyid las lu gu rgyud//
369a1(rnying rgyud): pa rnang gi sumams// zang la sngar byung // mgulas drung gnyis gan da 'an// g.yas pas bzad pas srung bsngal// gzhan pas 'ang na pas pa dgatugs// rnabs pa dang 'dag rdung ngas
369a2(rnying rgyud): g.yas pas khyab pas sgra rnams ston// g.yon pas 'jug pa rlung gi las// gang dang gang rnams 'dzin par byed// spyi gtsug khyab par rdzogs pa'i rlung // phra zhing bskyed pa med pa las// rig pa'i sku yang 'dzin pa'o// zhus nal dang // yul la snang ba'i
369a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// nam mkha' sngo sangs rdzi med las// 'od dang kha dog dbyibs nyid dang // ye shes lnga yi rang snang ston// dag pa dbyings kyi smon ma las// thig le skra dang 'khrul sdang dag/ rang bzhin nyid dang ngo bo nyid// gnyis med 'dra 'bral med par snang //
369a4(rnying rgyud): 'didus zad pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bya bral rnam mkha' ci bzhin no// a gad pa// de la ci yis mthong ba ni// goms dang kun da kyis mthong ba ste// goms pa sngon du 'gro ba nas// brtsams te lus dag gnad gzing bas// rang snang dag pa'i gzugs mthong nas/
369a5(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa thams cad nub pa'o// kadang kyi lus kyis mthong bar byed// chos sru'i bzhugs stangs seng gro yis// 'khrul pa'i rigs pa nubal nas// naTa'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// yongs spring rdzogs su'i bzhugs spangs kyis// glang chen nyal ba la
369a6(rnying rgyud): brten nas// chos nyid rnam par langs spyod nas// bad+ma'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur// d+hi la ba spu mi bzugs spangs kyis// drang srong cog yul brten nas// chos nyid rnam par dang sprul pas// rgyam gyi mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rtswa dang 'bral
369a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis// rang bzhin spang ba'i ye shes lnga// dru bur mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// kye na kyi// mthong nas gnad la dbang pa ste// snang ba 'khrid pa'i thabs kyis kyang // 'byung bzhi snang ba gnad la phebs// drung brgyad las kye 'brel bgyis pas//
369b1(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog du ma gnad la phebs// lus ni gcud dang rtsal spug dang // yan lag brdab 'phen sdud pa'i gnad// phra zhing drang la mnye ba yis// sha dang khrag ste rus pa la'o// rus pan cugacigapa// de ltar phebs nas rdzogs pa'i tshad// zad ka'i ngos snang 'gags pa
369b2(rnying rgyud): dang // sa rdor snang ba gzhug pa dang // rang shes ci la'ang tshud pa dang // de btsud bem po 'gul ba dang // rlung gi 'bru ba'i tshad zin dang // lus kyi rdul phran mthong bar gyung // cir snang gzugs skur rdzogs pa dang // de la yab yum 'khril ba dang // lnga lnga yang
369b3(rnying rgyud): dang yum sbyor dang // kun kyang mu khyud zlum po la// rnal 'byor lus kyang 'od gsal zhing // 'gro dang bong dang 'jug pa dang // thams cad rig pa tshad phebs so// dus sha gnyis pa// tshad phebs lugs kyang 'di ltar 'gyur// so so'i lus kyi rdul thal nas// bar
369b4(rnying rgyud): snang 'od kyi skar khung snang // de las 'od zer ljags kyu'i dbyibs// phra zhing 'khril bas spang ba 'dzin// lus kyi rdos pa rang 'gags nas// zang thal dri med 'od kyi lus// dbus na a yi mtshan ma dang // mdzod spu'i 'od zer 'dom gang tshad// thor tshugs rlung
369b5(rnying rgyud): gis 'geg par snang // zhi skra lag pa'i sor mo las// 'od kyi phreng ba rnam par 'khrigs// slu med sems kyi spyod pa ste// mgo bo thod pa'i gzhal yas las// he ru ka rnams mngon par 'byung // 'di dus dang lus tshad la phebs// zang thal sku gsu
369b6(rnying rgyud): de kyang byung / gcig tu dril ba'o// zhus pa bcug sum pa// 'di dus sems ni gsal ba dang // mngon par shes pa drug rnams dang // ring dang dpag tu gyur pa yi// chos rnams skad cig gis shes 'gyur// tshad med sangs rgyas zhing khams dang // de bzhin
369b7(rnying rgyud): spu yang sems la sbyang // stong ba'i sems la dri ma zad// rang bzhin mi g.yo stong gas la mnyam// ma 'dres mnyam rdzogs dbyings la khyab// snang srid gsal padu ma thal// cha shas med pas smras med de// la zheg/ de ltar snang ba dus rnams
370a1(rnying rgyud): tu ga tu sa na

370b1(rnying rgyud): ba ba// lhag par gnas pas rnal mar khyab// sam gtsug ma dgus mang// sgra zag mi dag grangs zad pa'o// ma pa dang na// gnad gyi chos nyid 'din ste// 'byung pa'i gnas dang rang lus dang // khral dang sgo dang shes pardung // mad nga/

370b3(rnying rgyud): ma padas// sa kyi byengs kyang dag pas smra/ 'di zhig na te 'dzi / na du mi gdung du zhes pa// me mdo ma gyur chib 'gagang bye pa 'byu dus bcad// gnas pa das kyang rtsam las//
370b4(rnying rgyud): ni bzhi la yang // rnal 'byor ldan pas sems gnas pas// mnyam nyid 'du 'bral med pa'o// rang bzhin dag pa'i gnad shes nas// byas pa med par chos rnams shes// dus ni 'pho ba'i grangs kyis bzung // bzung bas 'khrul med dag pa'o// sras pa
370b5(rnying rgyud): thamag// bar do'i chos nyid 'di lta bu// rab tu gsang ba'i chos nyid bshad// dbye na rnam pa bzhi dag las// 'dir ni chos nyid par do bshad// 'chi ka las ni thar pa'i tshe// rnam shes nam mkha' dag la thim// nam mkha' 'od gsal la thim dras//
370b6(rnying rgyud): phra rags snang ba kun 'gags te// dbang po kun ldan 'od kyi lus// lus las grib ma bzhin du 'gyur// de tshe 'od snang dum bu'i tshe// mkhas pas snang ba mched pa bzung // g.yo ba rlung dag mched pa yis// kha dog lnga yi 'od dang zer// ma nges 'ang 'tshon
370b7(rnying rgyud): ris su snang // 'jug cing smin pa'i rlung las kyang // phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla 'og grub// de la phyogs kyi 'od 'dus pas// rigs lnga'i sgra yang mngon par snang // mthi ngag dkar ser dmar ldang ni// sa so'i yul dang bcas par snang // 'di la mtshad
371a1(rnying rgyud): nga da ga// sang+yas byas rnams pa son tan rdzogs// khams gas pa 'dug pa sas na// ma nas// rnamamacan tad 'das // gas pa 'byung ba smos thal bas// 'dul thag sa thar dra' bar// 'og
371a2(rnying rgyud): le/ brel sa chung ste// byed sgra las ni grazugs rdzogs pado// gzugs kyi dgrapas sa pa'i byu // mama'atho ba tha rdzogs pa las// wa n+dan bdu lda brgyad pa ldan// seMm so dang zlam phrag ni// bas pa da rang bzhin dag par snad// 'ad
371a3(rnying rgyud): se gangs grangs med pa// 'di la rang bzhin rang shis na// grags pa gcig su dril ba thob// thob pa 'di las slar log zed// gsal gdab pa las byung ba'o// gzhan yang rdus nyid ngo ni// rang pa'i na nyid las ngo bor grub// snang rdul gcig tum
371a4(rnying rgyud): skyes pas// 'jug pa'i lam yang zadad // dro dang shes dang grol mthong gis// 'jug dang mthong dang goms pa las// jo zhes pa las nga ste// yid ches pa phyis thug pa'o// bag cod pas ni gdeng du chud// de ltar gsum sna nges pa las//
371a5(rnying rgyud): po rdzogs pas kyad 'grags so// gzhan yang chos nyid rang bzhin pa shad// 'di 'dra gcig tu ma nges pas// gang lung btags pa de ltar sdang // rna tshogs ming gi gdags gzhams// smre cog dra ma'i spros par snang // nges med sring ni sna tshogs las//
371a6(rnying rgyud): don yang btags kyis gyis stong // snong nyid gang yang ma grub bas// rang bzhin dag bslar snang ngo // gzhan yang chos nyid thugs rjeb da // gdum gyi'i yul ni rdzogs ngas// 'dul byed sra yang de bzhin no// rigs dang dbang po'i rnam 'phrul las
371a7(rnying rgyud): 'thor 'das rtog pa zad de// na nyid ma so'i yul bzhag na// pang cos don gyi dag sa par// gzhan yang chos nyid pa band// bdag pa ya'i kham pa la// dbang po dzirnamasam brtsis nas// cig gi bzhag pa gnad yin mo//
371b1(rnying rgyud): ma par d+ha mar drag go// gzung ba med pa'i sdang ba la// 'angan pa med pa'i sems shar du// spyod pa mdapa' mag gis mthong // rdzas nyid med pa lam nas drangs// !/ sgrom med pa'i gzhil bslang // byar med krol thal 'bras bur hral/
371b2(rnying rgyud): 'di la snang mthang me gnas so// gzhan yang rig pa'i chos nyid bshad// lu gu rbud du cher mthong bas// rnam rtog 'gru ba'i dran pa 'gags// bya la ma nam mkhar 'gro ba bzhin// chos kyi dbyings las 'gros med// gzhan med reg snang rnam dag pas/
371b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrul par snang ba'i rgyu rkyen zad// dbyings dang rig pa 'bral med pas// lu gu rgyud kyi 'brel snang ston// rig pa'i ngo bo lu gu rgyud// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar la// sras kyang byas pa ma yin la// des na 'dus ma byas pa nyid// lu gu rgyud kyi rang bzhin no//
371b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par rtog pa kun dag pas// ma 'khrul pa yi sangs rgyas so// gzhan yang gud kyi chos nyid bshad// yang dag chos nyid skalas thal// rang gi ngo bo yi ge med// rang rig ye shes smon 'od 'bar// chos nyid dag pas bkra shis mdzes// lta ba 'jigs
371b5(rnying rgyud): bral sed rtsal rdzogs// rang rig smin pas rdzogs rang byung // lu gu rgyud 'brel mu tig greng // nyams kyi snang ba nor tha bkod// rang gnas stong pa'i snying me long // gol sa rang gcod thugs me long // gzhan las ma byung rang shar nyid// rang byur yin
371b6(rnying rgyud): pas rang grol la// dbyings su gcig pas klong yang drug/ yon tan rdzogs pa rin chen srungs// rang rig bzhin pas ngo khyod sbas// snang bdag pas nyi zla sbar// rig pa smin phyer sku gdung 'bar// 'di dag rnams kyang gzhi las shar// 'di ltar chos
371b7(rnying rgyud): nyid brjod med pas// tha skad tshig gi gzhi mar shar// chog brjod rim pas mdag pas// de ltar brjod med pa la gnas// de phyir tshiga'i ma mtha' zad pa'o// gzhan yang grol ba'i chos nyid bshad// gnad kyis grol bas 'bad rtsol zad//
372a1(rnying rgyud): das tha' bas paslang myo nas// rang gas yidapas satan pa du/ sa sa yin pa mthongasar mas// spangs pas ngas bzhi dug/ dus byam sa da sams pa napa// rang banan stsol bdam bcas pam
372a2(rnying rgyud): zol 'as pasang na nyid de// rtogs dang sa togs su mi mas// de 'grol zhes bral dmigs// 'ams gang yang dag bas pa sri// srid ma 'i slong nyid de// gdon par 'argyal rdzong shing ni// bya ba med pas grol ba la// rung ba
372a3(rnying rgyud): pas gnas med pa'o// 'gro ba med pas 'ong 'khor zad// byas byung gcig dang gnyis med pa'o// tha snyad 'khrul btsam yang med// yod med las kyi 'jug pas stong // ye nas 'bras bu blo bral nyid// smra bsam brjod pa kun 'das pa'o// zhes smra thas
372a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyung ra dab ches rnams can gyi rtsa ba las/ rjes pa gad pa sems nga girba ba bstan pa'i me skye bzhi par// de nas rang bzhin na ma ga pas// chos dra brjod pa med pa la sa// chos nyid spos bral nam mapa'am
372a5(rnying rgyud): brjo nga med pa'i gdam las// rang byung bkod pa don gyi tshog/ ston pa'i sngags las dzo 'phros tshab// sras kyang byas pa med par shar// de la lce dbang gi sa sgrisol pa// kyem bcom ldan bral med pa de// lha dang sgom pa'i bkod pa nyid/
372a6(rnying rgyud): gang gis dngon par 'gyur ba lags// bab pas grub pa'i gnas phyogs gang // de la blta ba wAr bgyi// chog don lta ba'i mtshams kyis bzung // lta ba'i ngo bo rang bzhin gang // brjod tshig ming gi rnam grangs te// sdom pa zhes kyi lta bu/
372a7(rnying rgyud): dpe las dang go bgang // mgol gnas pa'i bsgom pa gang // bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid sto rdzob ci// ma bsgoms pa yi sngon gang lags// 'de dag pa da gis mnyan par 'tshal// rarje dzin pas bdag 'i gsung // danas bcas med nam mkhar rang /
372b1(rnying rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang bas// lha sgom bkod pa 'di skad gsungs// lha yi dbang po legs nyon cig/ 'di la the tshom mus za ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul bsgrib// zhab dpa// bskyab bdom pa 'dzin pa ni// dad pa rab dang btsun
372b2(rnying rgyud): 'grus ldan// gtong bar nus shing bla ma gus// brtul zhugs can la sdig la 'jom// 'gyur med rab tu brtan pas 'dzin// yang na rang nyid shugs dal ba// lkug pa glen pa'i lhod yod pas// rtogs pa chung zhing rang bzhind la// lus ngag bya
372b3(rnying rgyud): dral ba dang // shes rab ldan pas 'dzin par 'gyur// dras na gnyis pa// bab las grub pa'i gnas lugs ni// gnas pa bdun gyi tshul la yang // sna tshogs ngos nas spyan thub pa// 'gyur tshad cha nas nges med pa// mi 'gyur ba las nges pa can/
372b4(rnying rgyud): spang ba'i rtsal ni cir yang bsgyur// thams cad 'byung zhing khas len bcas// 'khrul pa dag phyir ka dag pa// snang tshul tha dang khra bor 'dod// 'di ltar 'dod pa'i bye brag las// rdzogs pa chen po tsong ldang phyir// thad de 'dod pa grangs mang yang // gnas pa
372b5(rnying rgyud): bib kyi lta ba la// gcig med gnyis med gang dang bral// srog gcod ma byin len pa yang // nga las byung zhing nga yi chos/ lha dang skom dang spyod pa yang // yod med stong pa'i mtha' las 'dis// mdor na mtshan nyid kyis phye'o// rdzam na dmam pa/
372b6(rnying rgyud): de la blta ba rnam pa gnyis// tshig gi blta dang don blta'o// tshig gi blta ba bdun rim las// so so'i 'dod pa zlos byas te// bla bral 'bad pa med pa dang // ri mang drug rang gzhan khyad 'don dang // srog gcod dge sdig bral ba dang // byas med byu
372b7(rnying rgyud): pa med pa dang // ma bsgyur snang ba rang ngag dang // nyon mongs rang bzhin gro la bar 'dod// don ni chos nyid mngon sum la// shes rab kyis ni ma yin par// dbang po'i spyod yul nyid du blta// tshig gis gtan la mi phebs te// gnad gsum mthong

373b2(rnying rgyud): kye dgongs pa'o// dus ladan thum// de yi las drang go ba ni// las kyis yul zhen gcod pa dang // nyon mongs la sogs spang ba dang // 'khor ba'i rtsa ba 'byin pa'o// go bas sems nyid 'dzin pa dang // gnas par byed dang rlung zad dang // chos nyid sto
373b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam rnyed dang // rang bzhin dag pa'i gzhi sdang ngo // rngam pa na pa// mgo la gnas pa'i bsgom pa ni// dbang po'i sgo rnams gsal ba la// yid kyi rtog pa ma 'akrus pas// shes pa nyid la dpyod pa'i yid// phyi rol shor ba med pa nyid// ris
373b4(rnying rgyud): can gsal ba ma yin dang // gud bcad stong par ma song dang // bde brgyan chags ma yin dang // btang snyoms steng por ma sing dang // dran rig gsal ba ngal gso dang // sbyangs pa pog tshal ma song dang // 'dzin cha nang du kun bde dang // cha lugs
373b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i 'dzinaH dang // kha dog yi grwa 'bru sbyar byed rnams// de rnams phyogs sum lhung na// mgo la gnas pa'i bsgom pa'o// dus pan tsu shig/ bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid sdang tshul ni// mtshan nyid stong gsal rig pa la// rang bzhin gang dang ma 'dres pa//
373b6(rnying rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i mtha' zad dang // chos nyid rang ngo dag pa'o// sdang tshul 'khrul pa ma yin la// rgyu rkyen dag pa'i rang bzhin la// dngos dang dngos med rang dag nas// sgo lnganga'i yul zhon dag pa dang // 'byung ba'i rigs pa dag pa dang // ye shes dag pa'i
373b7(rnying rgyud): 'phel snang ston// de la zad pa'i chos nyid do// lus na zu gnyis pa// mi bsgoms pa yi skyon nyid ni// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mngon snang ba// bdag dang gzhan te yul shes dang // tshig dang bcas pa'i blta ba dang // dmigs dang bcas pa'i yul dag dang /
374a1(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs bdag tu 'ching bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas lam yang stor ba dang // 'bras bu'i rang bzhin ma shes dang // chos kun mnyam pa gzhi med dang // rang rig khams gsum 'ching ba dang // rtog dang bcas pa'i ltung dang
374a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ 'di da bsru don bshad// gzhan yang chos nyid 'khor lo bshad// gnas pa'i lta bas chos kun rtogs// rang bzhin dag pas 'khor 'das phyed// byas pa med pas byung ba'o// yang dag lam du btang bas khyab// rdzogs 'byung chos nyid stong
374a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bya ba med pas byung med rdzogs// 'khor bdag pas 'das pa'o// gzhan yang mthong dag blta ba ni// dngos med rang dag rdzogs pa che// lha la mchod pa mi dgos te// sngags kyi bzlas dang dka' thub med// bdug pa mar me lha bshos med// tshogs
374a4(rnying rgyud): dang bla ma mchod pa med// bstod dang sbyin bsreg mchod pa med// nga rol gyen dug las mtha' med// de ltar gzhi rtsa gang med pas// srog gcod ma byin mi tshangs spyod// lta ba med dang bsgom med spyod pa med// bltar med srung du med pas bsgom pa'i 'dod pa
374a5(rnying rgyud): gleng // snying dang gsapa pa seMms kyi dad pa 'gas/ de bzhin ces dang sa ng+yas rgyas rjes med por// gdon pang rang bden bas pa ni// ra sa mang rang bzhin rdzogs pa \u0f7f// sakyi ma rjeng byung ba mi na sangs rgyas// bcos pa med par dang tho chen pa
374a6(rnying rgyud): 'did rtags de sdang gti zug cing drung da // na' rtog pa kyi togs pa gdang // 'khor nga ma snangs sangs rgyas dgongs par// sras dang dag pang dngas pas sra ga su mi rdzogs// sems dang ma rig 'thul pa rjes tang ga go// dza
374a7(rnying rgyud): dang bag chags rten pa bsre ga da do// gzhan par bcos pa'i b+ha ba ni// chos pas mabyung sangs rgyas pa// chu yis ma bskyed 'bras bu rdzogs// rkyen gyis mi jig phres blang ste// sung las ma byung thub pa mthang// rdud la ma brten man ga zhes/
374b1(rnying rgyud): myangan das pa babacad// 'khor ba 'bras basmin par byas// yang dag sa len ma dag gzhi// nyon mongs dag gi gnyis la// byang rngubs pan stongs par byas// ngan song gsum ci gzug tun// blagasum pa yang babu nga
374b2(rnying rgyud): gdan yang brjod kyi'i lta ba bshad// srog ma bcad na sangs mi bya// skar khrung dag ni mu bkag na// mun pa nyid ni sangs pa min// sangs rgyas rnams kyi slob dpon ni// dmyal 'chos kyi rgyal po la// tshes kyis ngan song gsum du khrid// sdig sdud pas ni dag
374b3(rnying rgyud): thob po// bltas pas khams gsum 'khor ba la// bsgoms pas nyon mongs tshogs kun sogs// spod pa spyad pas gol sgrib la// 'bras bu 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid do// gzhan yang brda don chog 'brel bshad// bskal pa'i me dpung klong dkyil na// mi ga
374b4(rnying rgyud): tshig pa med par yang // kha nas sde snod chos bshad cing // las su gzhan gyi srog bcad pas// dge sbyong 'phel ba ya re che// lugs kyi khang yangs sgro med nang // snang med mun pa'i klong dkyil na// nyi ma zla ba 'od gsal yang // sus kyang mthong ba
374b5(rnying rgyud): med pa ni// so so'i dbang po'i yul gsal bas// mthong ba med pa ya re cha// gzhan yang yul 'dzin blta ba bshad// khams gsum 'khor ba'i gzhi ljongs pas// mya ngan 'das pa phyugs mas btang // ma rig 'khor ba'i rtsad bcad pas// sku gsum
374b6(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu drungs nas phyung // mun pa'i go gyon nyi ma bsgrubs// gsal ba'i mthong byed mun pas gtibs// rno ba'i dar gdags gcig mchod// rgya che dkyil stong gcig ma shongs// sna tshogs 'dus pas gcig ma rnyed// yod med mtha' rtog bsal ba'o// gzhan
374b7(rnying rgyud): yang 'dod sems blta ba bshad// kun brgyab gcig kyang mchod pas// gcig brgya pa thams cad gsad par bya// mi brgya lcags sgrog gcig mthar// gcig bzung bas ni thams cad thar// zar pas gong du grol ba ma zad// 'jug pa las kyi rgya
375a1(rnying rgyud): 'gags so// gzhan yang spyod pa'i 'khor lo bshad// mabyung bas na bdag med cing // mi len ming dor sru yi n+ya// 'byung ba mi btsal yod mi spang // 'dod pa bskyed cing rdzogs mi bya// chags par byas te gtang bar bya'o//
375a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan lus mi smad mthom btsam// sngags dang phyag tu rgyun mi bcad // bub mtha mi snang chos mi da // grogs dang b+hA pa mi spyod do// gzhan pa dam chog sdom pa bshad// dzA ma sangs rgyas mchod pa'i rten// chos dang dge 'dun yid ma lha//
375a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma rnams la// tshogs dang mchod pa rgyan mig cad// bla ma mtshan nyid ldan mthong na// bstod dang mchod pa rdzogs par bya'o// bud med mi du khro ma gyi// phung po mi smad yi dam brten// dkyil 'khor dang ni sngags dang lha// phyag rgya bstan pa ya
375a4(rnying rgyud): dganyid// deng na tshogs nyid mi brtag la// dag ldan sams ni mi dbugs te// sdom ldan de mtshig gnas par bya'o// gnan yang bsla'i pa rim pa nyid// lus kyi spyod pa rdzogs rgya ste// ngag ni rab tu gcad par byer// mi mas ni gnas dang rags
375a5(rnying rgyud): dpyad // rim 'jug pas kyi rim par ni// tshad dang mtshan nyid shes par bya'o// rtag tu byugs dang ril bu yis// rta rnams thig le'i dra bar gzhug/ phreng ba do shal byed pa yang // mdzem shing 'khor bas spel bar bya// las kyi bya ba dngos med gsal// dngo
375a6(rnying rgyud): lung mchog gi gang blang // gnas drug rkyen gyi 'khor lo bya'o// gzhan yang bsten cing 'jug pa nyid// bla ma bsnyen pas pa khor rkyen 'gags/ dbang bskur brten pas pus dag drin// dam chog bsten pas dngos grub 'thug// blta ba brten pas khams gsum chad// bsgom pa
375a7(rnying rgyud): gyud gags/ spros dpas su byung zung// mas ga // ga tshul pa'o// 'a pa sa sa sa/ kyi pa medan// gde la ba cad du gyur// mas kyi 'jug pa na /
375b1(rnying rgyud): rims kyad par byed pazhing// las dang ya nas lud nye dang // gzhan yang bsgom pa'i gnas nga sar nyid// lus ni la la 'am dang tshogs kyis// spungs pas se rgyas kyi gnas par dgang // gsum gi sbyor bas bya rnams mnyas// bems ni bags kyis dpud pa byung/
375b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma thabs papa'i stor ba yi// lus sems thabs kyi khyad par gyis// nab 'byor sems ni gnas par bya'o// gzhan yang 'khrul ba'i den rgyun bcang // ke zla'i 'od 'grus rgya mtshodrangs// stong gsu ma rab srang la gzhal// ma rig pa'i bcwog rung rig go// 'khor
375b3(rnying rgyud): ma da ra / ba dpyis phyung ngadas lam bkag/ chos dang gang zag rgyagasams btab// 'bras bu rang rdzogs chos nyid pa ni// bya dang byed pa dang 'gags so// gdung 'dod sred brdungs nas 'don// chos kyi 'dul bas gas gzhi byas// de nyid rang sar grol ba'i yul// bams
375b4(rnying rgyud): gsum lam byas sangs rgyas med// ston pa'i bstan pa sul srid med pa'o// chos kun gzhi med zab stsal srid// srid bral 'dod pa med pa'i sems// rang bzhin ma bcos brjod las 'das// bya byed 'khrul pa'i rtog/ y-ig de nga / pa zad// chos med sangs rgyas med cing sem
375b5(rnying rgyud): can med// nga sed bdag med gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa'o// gzhan pa chos rtswa 'og/ cig bshad// chog tu brjod pa ma yin te// sems zhes gnas bcom drang nga med// med phyir stong pa'i snang ba pa// dran shes rnams kyi khungs zad pa'o// byas pa med par chos nyid la// drung
375b6(rnying rgyud): bya med pa lnga mtshan che// thung ba med pa'i chos sbal// 'thong med pa la mtshon che// 'khongs med pa'i rig pa la// dargyu ba med pa'i chos nyid do// gdan pang 'dus zhing mnyam par bshad// dram ldangs pas rba snyed pa // gcig ma dzub pas rang bzhin dag/ rang bzhin sa pa
375b7(rnying rgyud): don rlang pa'o// rang dag pa dang ga'i ma dang // 'khor dang 'dres pa gzhi ma dang / skye // gdog dang snying po med pa dang // rim ng+ga des mtshon bral lo// gzhan yang rang ba na 'phrul ba ba'ang // dus dang dbang po nyid dang yang // bye gang dag pa so so mas// phung po lams dang rgyam ched rnam/
376a1(rnying rgyud): da zu pa nang gdang / nang na ma thabs// dang theb mang bye dung ba// sa bza 'a// sems can las tshogasaso// gzhan yang dag pa'i snang ba bshad// chos nyi ma pa sus du 'a//
376a2(rnying rgyud): ba rdo las nges thon te// sprin med pa yi mkha' la gas pa// nyams kyi snang ba gong 'phel ni// ye shes khadog phyir phyung nas// rkyen 'grengs pa dang ci ba shar dang // thig pa sna tshogs sku nyid du// rags pa'i sdang ba'i yul lagasal// reg pa zad phebs sdang po ni// longs pa
376a3(rnying rgyud): mtshon dpe gsal bar ni// ma des kha dog 'ja 'tshon pas// rigs lnga yang ding yum du sna // chos nyid zad pa'i snang ba ni// nyams kyi snang ba stongs nas ni// lus zad dbang po'i yul kyang zad// rtogs tshogs 'khrul pa rang grol nas// brjod pa'i cho ga dang bral ba'o// gzhan yang
376a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i sgra rtags bshad// me yi sgra ni 'tshog pa dang // stag dang lta ba dang 'gro ba na// rnal dpyor pa yis don mi 'grub// gseng zhing 'bar ba bar med dang // nga la ring rtse mo rno pa na// rnal 'byor pas ni don chen 'grub// kha dog nyid kyang rnam par bshad// dmar dang ce yo gnag pa pa// dum bu
376a5(rnying rgyud): rang gdong du chad// par tshod nyid ni 'byung ba'o// dkar zhas la 'dra lta bu dang // rdo pa 'dog sna rdzogs la// 'khor lo gdugs dang mtshonaH dang // dmar gas pa dngas pa'i zer 'grol// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dril bu dang // mig mang ris dang gur khyim dang // mchod rten gtsigs pa sogs
376a6(rnying rgyud): dral 'byor pas ni rdzogs pa che// don la mngon sum byas nas ni// khams gsum dag las 'das pa'o// gzhan yang 'byung ba'i yan lag ni// chu ni ga shang dang sna tshogs sla// dkar po'i ri mo du ma ston// rnal 'byor pa 'ani don rab 'grub// sa ni ldeg dang sing ba dang // thur la 'bar na
376a7(rnying rgyud): 'dril bas 'grub// rlung ni sring zhing gzing ba dang // sngo zhing 'gyur ba dag gis so// de ltar rtags pa ma sbyong na// cho ga bsgyur la mkhas pas brtsam// lan gsum lnga dang bdun gyis kyang // 'gru bar gyur 'di la the tshom med// so song rtags dang nges sbyong ba'o// zhes smrab la
376b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur rjen po chos rnams cad kyi rtsa ba pas/ lha sgom bkod pa gnas par rtsa ba bstan pa'i le'u skye lnga pa'o// / mab sa// de nas chos kun brjod med kyang // sems can 'khrul tog du ba lus// tshig pa skrad ga/ dmar yang // bcas pa med pa'i rnamamapa
376b2(rnying rgyud): lal// tshig dbyung ston pa'i khyad par bzhugs// pad+ma las byung sangs rgyas la// dga' byed kyis ni 'di skad gsol// kye kye pad+ma'i dbus na bzhugs pa nyid// 'di ltar nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la// 'od kyi thigs pa 'bum phrag ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi sdang ba dang // yang zhun pa ru bdun
376b3(rnying rgyud): yi rgyu// chos kyi snyun ji lta bu// yongs su zhes pa gang le bgyi// sprul pa'i sku ni gang tsam rig/ sku yi mtshan nyid ci lta bu// bzhugs pa'i tshul ni ji ltar lags// rang bzhin chos nyid snga rnams ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag pa gsungs// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // pad+ma
376b4(rnying rgyud): dbus nas bzhengs nas ni// nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya mdzad// de nyid mdzad pa tsam gyis ni// chos nyid rang snang nam mkha' las// brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las// brjod pa'i tshig tu 'di skad du// ra byung byas pa med par byung // chus nad so// rtse kye lha yi dbang phyug
376b5(rnying rgyud): nyon// 'od dkar dbu ma phrag drug cu ni// rtsa bzhi yang dag bshad bya'o// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po las// tshig gi bye brag rnam 'phros pas// sde gsum las ni klong dkur 'gyur// tshig bsdus pa las sh+lo ka/ 'bum rdzag drug cu rtsa bzhi las// le'u stong phrag sum
376b6(rnying rgyud): shu lnga// bam po nyi khri stong phrag gcig/ brjod bya nam mkha mtha' dang mnyam// gdul bya'i sems can rtog pa gcod// 'di la brjod bya nyer bsdus pas// gzer bu brgya dang brgyad phul// bgag ni stong phrag byed dang gnyis// gnad chen dadus pa stong phrag gsum// go
376b7(rnying rgyud): sgrib khri phrag bzhi bcul// med thog rgyud ni khro brag nyis// tshig brjod rim pa gas la bkod do// dza.a da rtenas// 'od kyi yang kun bcu bdun pashad// rang shar ba dang rang grol dang // rang byung nyid dang la rdzogs dang // mdzes ldan dag dang phra bkod dang // chu tig 'phe
377a1(rnying rgyud): dang mi ge med// rdzing dang thugs kyi ma long dang // ti klu nga spyod smras// mugadung 'bar b.rid chen spangs// blon ma 'ab dang klod rkyen drug/ de skar brgyu ga rim pa rnams// thal 'gyur las ni ngas 'bros nas// gdul
377a2(rnying rgyud): yul sems can rnams la snang // brgyad 'dus bstan pa 'dzin pas na// bskul pa yod pa 'khor las sgrol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon snang ba'o// chos kyi sgra ni ga slong dang thugs// yon tan dang ni phrin las so// sku stong dang gsal ba drang // mtshan ma med/
377a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin no// gsung ni spyi tshig ming bral nas// brjod cing gleng ba nyid bral lo// thugs ni bsam dang 'gyur med pas// 'phyo zhing spyod pa rnams las 'das// yon tan phyir mi 'od dang ldog pa med// dbying pa dang ye shes khyab pa dang // rang bzhin bcos pa med pa'o//
377a4(rnying rgyud): phrin pas mthung ma skyes byis pa meng// shugs 'jung ba dang 'gags pa med// ma byas byas pa med pa'o// tha ma zhig/ longs spyod su yang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrirdulas lnga yin no// skye'i sbyar pa rang bzhin med// gsal dang gas pa byed rig pas khyab// gsung ni dang
377a5(rnying rgyud): rlu nga swAng // blo rdzun pa'i tshong pa pa// drug byung ba dgazigs pa dang // mamen pa dang dgadus pa'o// rkyen ti dam da dbardzog sa pa las// dgongs gise pa dag rdzogs ga/ rjer pa rnaMs bang pa la ste// nang gsang ba sa
377a6(rnying rgyud): so so'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // rang byung ljags las rnam spros te// 'khor la rang gi ngo bos ston// lus pan rdza ba// sprul pa'i sgra yang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las lnga lnga'o// sku ni mtshan dang dpe byad la// gdul bya gar byung
377a7(rnying rgyud): lus sprul pa// gsung ni tshig rkyor lags pa la// tshangs pa'i sa ni phan lag drug/ thugs ni shes bya'i ye shes kyis// rang gzhan don gnyis dgongs par gnas// yon tan khyen pa rdzogs pa dang // dri na las phyin gsang ba yi// mdzad pa ma su sa rdzogs pa dang // chun
377b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa lda ga dun/ nga da/ sa nas mas sa dang / las da
377b2(rnying rgyud): khyad kyis kyang // mngon nyid chos las grub pa dang // 'dod yon rnams las grub pa dang // sku tshogs sgribs las grub pa'o// go ba rlang bzhin dag pa dang // so so'i sbrad yul smyon pa dang // gzugs ldan dbang po
377b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs paro// tham na pa// sgra yi bzhugs tshul rnam pa gsum// mtshan ma'i chos las grol ba'i phyir// ris can gzugs su ma yin dang // gsal ba'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i phyed// snang la rang bzhin med pa dang /
377b4(rnying rgyud): gdus bya sbyi rnams sbyang ba'i phyir// mig yo mnyam gzhag chen por bzhugs// mi g.yo ba dang gsal bu dang // rlig cing mkhyen pa'i chang snang dang // mAN+Da mA dang phyogs med mi 'byed pa'o// zla 'dis dang // sku yi rang bzhi
377b5(rnying rgyud): sa nyid ni// rang bzhin skyong dang gsal ba dang // mkhyer rig ma 'gags mngon spang ba'o// sku yi chos nyid rdzogs pa dang // phyir mi ldog dang 'gro 'ong med// spa bsam brjod pa med pa'o// gzhan yang bruM rnams bzlag
377b6(rnying rgyud): padI// gong du bstan pa'i khyad par las// rjes sku'i sa bon rang sems la// mngon snum pa yi gnang gzing nas// rtag tu goms par byas pa nI// chos kyi sku yi bsgrub pa'o// longs sku'i sa bon 'dod yon la// bad+ma
377b7(rnying rgyud): te gams par rgyas pa mi// yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsgrib pa dang / sbrul sgra'i sa bon 'byung banas/ spyado ni dmas la bslangs ni// gams pas bsgrub pa // gi 'ad 'a jim yilas mthang ba shang /
378a1(rnying rgyud): kha dag gis ni ma rtag/ dkar gas la'ang sa na' bru 'thub// mang tha rang brgyas pa 'grug// dmar dngas 'gro bar bdag las// dang banag zung dag po 'brug/ datshogs cad byeng babyung
378a2(rnying rgyud): par// mchogs las kyi bye phyag 'grug+sa// sh-in tu rba byung bar 'gyur// d+hA shing drag na bar chud 'byung // mchod ka ma le bar ldan// dmachog tu mas pang 'i ldang ba'o// sgra yi rnam par bye ba ni// su'i sgru ga
378a3(rnying rgyud): drug dang 'tsheg na drag po nyid// rung zhing thug na zhe rgyas gnyis// gshang zhing bsnying na mchog 'grub pa'o// gzhan yang chu pi las mtha' bshad// / ba dog ngas
378a4(rnying rgyud): su ga shang dang bsing ba dang // shwa dang rdung zhing thug pa yis// zas dang gos dang 'bras bu 'thub// sir dang sgril dang lha ba pA yis// sku gsumaso so'i byung thob pa'o// gzhan yang sa yi 'am/
378a5(rnying rgyud): bzung bshad// kha dog dkar dmar gong gis shes// ma nges 'gyur bas don mi 'grub// gsal zhing 'tsher pos mchog 'grub pa'o// sgra ne shag dang sdig pa dang // tog dang seng pas sna tshogs las// 'u
378a6(rnying rgyud): ting sing bas mchog thob pa'o// gzhan yang rlung gi las mtha' bshad// kha dog dkar dmar gong bzhin no// gnag cing 'dzub pas don mi 'thug// sna tshogs 'bar mchog 'grub pa yin// s+pha ni zung 'thi sna tshogs las//
378b1(rnying rgyud): sing dang tshogs mchog 'thob po// gzhan yang rtags dang rang bzhin bshad// dwe ljang gong gi rtags byung nas// zla gsum dang ni bla drug nas// gnyis kyis be ma dang rig sgra shes// zla brgya dang ni bco brgyad nas// sa sa
378b2(rnying rgyud): sgradang rigs drug skad// ci ltar gsungs pa bzhin shes so// gzhan yang 'bras bu'i drim pa ni// chos sku sems kyi lus kyis dang // longs su dag gis rnam par thob// sprul pa'i sku ni lus kyis so// de ba nyid ni cha mnyam pas/
378b3(rnying rgyud): lus ni 'thung bdag pa dang // dgra ni A li kA lI sbyor// sems ni dngos med zang thal lo// gsum 'dus pas ni bde chen no// gzhan yang rab tu bshud bya ba// sru yi mtshan nyid rab shes pas// 'khrul pa thams cad dus
378b4(rnying rgyud): gcig 'gags// sku yi rang bzhin yongs shes paso// gsal dang stong pa'i so mtshams zin// ngo bo shes pas stong par dag/ dang shes pas ni mi rtog skye// bdag nyid chen po shes pa yi// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod//
378b5(rnying rgyud): de dag gis ni rang grol gdeng // byas pa med pa thob par nges// e mdo mtshar rmad du byung // byas pa med pa'i nam mkha' la// bcos pa med pa'i tshig shar ba// ma bsams dang byung blol go// de ltar go nas shes rtogs pas/
378b6(rnying rgyud): snod kun gyi rtsa bar yang // rgyud kyi rgyal po thal 'gyur nyid// yang gsung bla med bstan pa 'di// 'di nyid yin par yid ches te// rang bzhin snang ba'i 'khor rnams kun// rab tu mgu ba'i sems bskyed nas// rgyud 'di bklag dang bcang ba dang /
378b7(rnying rgyud): bri zhing 'dzin pa nyid du ste// mgul dang spyi bor brdung bcangs pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bkur bar spyod// de lta bas blangs dam bcas nas// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// yon tan rdzogs pa'i sprul bstod// de nas rab tu 'dus pa
379a1(rnying rgyud): rnams// dga' mgu rang ba'i sems skyes nas// nam mkha' dang dag gsal ba dang // brjod med cho ga rnams rang shar la// rjes su yi rang bde rnyed nas// rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po yi/
379a2(rnying rgyud): smos pa med dang mnyam par gyur// chos rnams thig le nyag gcig gi// dgongs pa ro mnyam thob nas ni// pad+ma las skyes bcom ldan 'das// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag sku gsum smin mdzad
379a3(rnying rgyud): pa// gsol 'debs rjes su yi rang ngo // sku rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ste/ le'u drug pa'o// // rin po che 'byung bar byed pa/ sgyu thal 'gyur chen po ches rnams kun gyi rtsa bar bstan pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ ring ba
379a4(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen po sho lo ka 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las khyad par du bkod pa rdzogs so// / rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rgya chu rgya/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di ni/ 'gro ba khyad par can la ma gtogs pa su dga' dgra' la yod pa ma yin no//
379a5(rnying rgyud): dpe la sngags srung gi rgyal mo smug nag khros ma'i rgyal mo rag gdong mas srungs shig/ sa ma ya/ so phag/ ag tham/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po khyod la gtad/ snod med pa la byin na dam tshig gi chad pa chod cig/ sa ma la/
379a6(rnying rgyud): rgyargya/ thal 'gyur rgyud la mabu bdun/
